analyzed: tām bhavānīm
śāradām śāradām numaḥ
an apekṣita guru vacanā sarvān granthīn vibhedayati samyak
prakaṭayati para rahasyam vimarśa śaktiḥ nijā jayati
sva anubhūti eka mānāya namaḥ śāntāya tejase
prayatnam unmeṣa nimeṣa vibhramam
vadanti yasya īkṣaṇa lola pakṣmaṇām
parasmai tasmai parameṣṭhine namaḥ
namaḥ tribhuvana utpatti sthiti saṃhāra hetave
viṣṇave pāra saṃsāra pāra uttaraṇa setave
sura asura śiraḥ ratna kānti vicchurita aṅghraye
namaḥ tribhuvana īśāya haraye siṃha rūpiṇe
namaḥ tasmai varāhāya helayā uddharate mahīm
khura madhya gataḥ yasya meruḥ khurakhurāyate
namaḥ tuṅga śiraḥ cumbi candra cāmara cārave
trailokya nagara ārambha mūla stambhāya śaṃbhave
abhipreta artha siddhi artham pūjitaḥ yaḥ suraiḥ api
sarva vighna chide tasmai gaṇādhipataye namaḥ
nitamba alasa gāminyaḥ pīna unnata payodharāḥ
manmathāya namaḥ tasmai yasya āyatanam aṅganāḥ
ananta māmadheyāya sarva ākara vidhāyine
samasta mantra vācyāya viśva eka pataye namaḥ
om namaḥ paramārtha eka rūpāya paramātmane
sva icchā avabhāsita asatya bheda bhinnāya śaṃbhave
kamala viṣṭaram
karṇikā ādiṣu iva svarṇam arṇava ādiṣu iva udakam

original: Subhv_0014-2 bhediṣvabhedi yattasmai parasmai mahase namaḥ //
analyzed: bhediṣu abhedi yat tasmai parasmai mahase namaḥ
namaḥ vāc manasā atīta mahimne parameṣṭhine
namaḥ śivāya niḥśeṣa kleśa praśama śāline
triguṇa granthi durbheda bhava bandha vibhedine
samasta lakṣaṇa ayogaḥ eva yasya upalakṣaṇam

original: Subhv_0017-2 tasmai namostu devāya kasmaicidapi śaṃbhave //
analyzed: tasmai namaḥ astu devāya kasmaicid api śaṃbhave
saṃsāra eka nimittāya saṃsāra eka virodhine
namaḥ saṃsāra rūpāya niḥsaṃsārāya śaṃbhave

original: Subhv_0019-1 yathā tathāpi yaḥ pūjyo yatra tatrāpi yorcitaḥ /
analyzed: yathā tathā api yaḥ pūjyaḥ yatra tatra api yaḥ ūrcitaḥ

original: Subhv_0019-2 yopi vā sopi vā yosau devastasmai namostu te //
analyzed: yaḥ pi vā saḥ api vā yaḥ asau devaḥ tasmai namaḥ astu te

original: Subhv_0020-1 sadasattvena bhāvānāṃ yuktā yā dvitayī sthitiḥ /
analyzed: sat asat tvena bhāvānām yuktā yā dvitayī sthitiḥ
tām ullaṅghya tṛtīyasmai namaḥ citrāya śaṃbhave
namaḥ svatantra cicchakti mudrita sva vibhūtaye
avyakta vyakta rūpāya kasmaicid mantra mūrtaye
āsannāya su dūrāya guptāya prakaṭa ātmane
sulabhāya ati durgāya namaḥ citrāya śaṃbhave
carācara jagat sphāra sphurat tā mātra dharmiṇe
durvijñeya rahasyāya yuktaiḥ api ātmane namaḥ

original: Subhv_0024-1 viṣṇurvā tripurāntako bhavatu vā brahmā surendrothavā
analyzed: viṣṇuḥ vā tripurāntakaḥ bhavatu vā brahmā
bhānuḥ vā śaśalakṣaṇaḥ utha bhagavān buddhaḥ utha siddhaḥ athavā
rāga dveṣa viṣa ārti moha rahitaḥ sattva anukampā udyataḥ

original: Subhv_0024-4 yaḥ sarvaiḥ saha saṃskṛto guṇaguṇaistasmai namaḥ sarvadā //
analyzed: yaḥ sarvaiḥ saha saṃskṛtaḥ guṇa guṇaiḥ tasmai namaḥ sarvadā
ślokaḥ ayam svāmidattasya tad smṛtyai kāvya lakṣitaḥ
bhava bīja aṅkura jaladāḥ rāga ādyāḥ kṣayam upāgatāḥ yasya

original: Subhv_0026-2 brahmā vā viṣṇurvā haro jino vā namastasmai //
analyzed: brahmā vā viṣṇuḥ vā haraḥ jinaḥ vā namaḥ tasmai
kastūrī tilakam lalāṭa phalake vakṣaḥ sthale kaustubham

original: Subhv_0027-2 nāsāgre navamauktikaṃ karatale veṇuṃ kare kaṅkaṇam /
analyzed: nāsā agre nava mauktikam kara tale veṇum kare kaṅkaṇam

original: Subhv_0027-3 sarvāṅge haricandanaṃ suvimalaṃ kaṇṭhe ca muktāvalīṃ
analyzed: sarva aṅge haricandanam su vimalam kaṇṭhe ca muktā āvalīm
bibhrat strī pariveṣṭitaḥ vijayate gopāla cūḍāmaṇiḥ
avirata ambuja saṃgati saṃgalat bahala kesara saṃvalitā iva vaḥ
lalita vastu vidhāna sukha ullasat tanuruhā tanuḥ ātmabhuvaḥ vatāt

original: Subhv_0029-2 dordrumāḥ pāntu vaḥ śaurerghanacchāyā mahāphalāḥ //
analyzed: dos drumāḥ pāntu vaḥ śaureḥ ghana chāyāḥ mahā phalāḥ
pātu vaḥ medinī dolā bala indu dyuti taskarī
daṃṣṭrā mahāvarāhasya pātalagṛha dīpakā
mada maya mada maya duragam yamunām avatīrya vīrya śālī yaḥ
mama rati mamara tiraskṛti śamana puraḥ sa kriyāt kṛṣṇaḥ

original: Subhv_0032-1 sa pātu vo yasya hatāvaśeṣās
analyzed: sa pātu vaḥ yasya hata avaśeṣāḥ
tad tulya varṇa añjana rañjiteṣu
vālaṇya yukteṣu api vitrasanti
daityāḥ sva kāntā nayana utpaleṣu
bāla veṣasya viṣṇoḥ gopa tanoḥ vapuḥ
nānā stuti śravaṇa lajjita mānasasya
smṛtvā varāha vapuḥ indu kalā prakāśa
daṃṣṭra uddhṛta kṣiti hareḥ avatu smitam vaḥ
mantha kṣmā adhara ghūrṇita arṇava payaḥ pūra antarāla ullasal
harṣa utkaṇṭakita tvacaḥ madhuripoḥ deva asura ākarṣaṇa
vyāpāra uparamāya pāntu jagatīm ābaddha vīpsāḥ giraḥ

original: Subhv_0036-2 nidrāloḥ kamaṭhākṛterbhagavataḥ śvāsānilāḥ pāntu vaḥ /
analyzed: nidrāloḥ kamaṭha ākṛteḥ bhagavataḥ śvāsa anilāḥ pāntu vaḥ
yat saṃskāra kalā anuvartana vaśāt velā nibhena ambhasaḥ
yāta āyātam atandritam jalanidheḥ na adya api viśrāmyati
kiṃcid kuñcita locanasya pibataḥ paryāptam ekam stenam
sadyas prasruta dugha vindum aparam hastena saṃmārjataḥ
mātrā eka aṅguli lālitasya cibuke smera ānanasya ānanā

original: Subhv_0037-4 cchaureḥ kṣīrakaṇāvalīva patitā dantadyutiḥ pātu vaḥ //
analyzed: chaureḥ kṣīra kaṇā āvalī iva patitā danta dyutiḥ pātu vaḥ
kālindī pulina udareṣu musalī yāvat gataḥ krīḍitum

original: Subhv_0038-2 tāvatkarburikāpayaḥ piba hare vardhiṣyate te śikhā /
analyzed: tāvat karburikā payaḥ piba hare vardhiṣyate te śikhā

original: Subhv_0038-3 itthaṃ bālatayā pratāraṇaparāḥ śrutvā yaśodāgiraḥ
analyzed: ittham bāla tayā pratāraṇa parāḥ śrutvā yaśodā giraḥ

original: Subhv_0038-4 pāyādvaḥ svaśikhāṃ spṛśanpramuditaḥ kṣīrerdhapīte hariḥ //
analyzed: pāyāt vaḥ sva śikhām spṛśan pramuditaḥ hariḥ
ānandena yaśodayā sa madanam gopa aṅganābhiḥ ciram

original: Subhv_0039-2 sāśaṅkaṃ balavidviṣā sakusumaṃ siddhaiḥ pṛthivyākulam /
analyzed: sa āśaṅkam bala vidviṣā sa kusumam siddhaiḥ pṛthivī ākulam

original: Subhv_0039-3 serṣyaṃ gopakumārakaiḥ sakaruṇaṃ pauraiḥ suraiḥ sasmitaṃ
analyzed: sa īrṣyam gopa kumārakaiḥ sa karuṇam pauraiḥ suraiḥ sa smitam

original: Subhv_0039-4 yo dṛṣṭaḥ sa punātu vo madhuripuḥ protkṣipragovardhanaḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ sa punātu vaḥ madhuripuḥ protkṣipra govardhanaḥ

original: Subhv_0040-1 kṛṣṇenāmba gatena rantumadhunā mṛdbhakṣitā svecchayā
analyzed: kṛṣṇena amba gatena rantum adhunā mṛd bhakṣitā sva icchayā

original: Subhv_0040-2 satyaṃ kṛṣṇa ka evamāha musalī mithyāmba paśyānanam /
analyzed: satyam kṛṣṇa kaḥ evam āha musalī mithyā amba paśya ānanam

original: Subhv_0040-3 vyādehīti vikāsitetha vadane mātā samastaṃ jagad-
analyzed: vyādehi iti vadane mātā samastam jagat

original: Subhv_0040-4 dṛṣṭvā yasya jagāma vismayavaśaṃ pāyātsa vaḥ keśavaḥ //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā yasya jagāma vismaya vaśam pāyāt sa vaḥ keśavaḥ

original: Subhv_0041-1 kiṃ yuktaṃ bata māmananyamanasaṃ vakṣaḥsthalasthāyinīṃ
analyzed: kim yuktam bata mām ananya manasam vakṣaḥsthala sthāyinīm

original: Subhv_0041-2 bhaktāmapyavadhūya kartum adhunā kāntāsahasraṃ tava /
analyzed: bhaktām api avadhūya kartum adhunā kāntā sahasram tava

original: Subhv_0041-3 ityuktvā phaṇabhṛtphaṇāmaṇigatāṃ svāmeva matvā tanuṃ
analyzed: iti uktvā phaṇabhṛt phaṇāmaṇi gatām svām eva matvā tanum

original: Subhv_0041-4 nidrāchedakaraṃ hareravatu vo lakṣmyā vilakṣasmitam //
analyzed: nidrā cheda karam hareḥ avatu vaḥ lakṣmyāḥ vilakṣa smitam
sva prāsādita darśanām anunayan prāneśvarīm ādarā
daṃse ismin patitaiḥ apāṅga valitaiḥ yat bodhitaḥ upi aśrubhiḥ

original: Subhv_0042-3 pratyāyyastvamato mayā nanu hare koyaṃ kramavyatyayaḥ
analyzed: pratyāyyaḥ tvam atas mayā nanu hare kaḥ yam krama vyatyayaḥ

original: Subhv_0042-4 pātu tvāṃ vrajayoṣitetyabhihitaṃ lajjākar śārṅgiṇaḥ //
analyzed: pātu tvām vraja yoṣitā iti abhihitam lajjā akaḥ śārṅgiṇaḥ
dhyāna ālambana tām samādhi nirataiḥ nīte hita prāptaye
lāvaṇyasya mahā nidhiḥ rasika tām lakṣmī dṛśoḥ tanvatī

original: Subhv_0043-4 yuṣmākaṃ kurutāṃ bhavārtiharaṇaṃ netre tanurvā hareḥ //
analyzed: yuṣmākam kurutām bhava ārti haraṇam netre tanuḥ vā hareḥ
yena dhvasta manobhavena bali jit kāyaḥ purā astrī kṛtaḥ
yaḥ ca udvṛtta bhujaṃgara hāra valayaḥ gaṅgām ca

original: Subhv_0044-3 yasyāhuḥ śaśimacchiro hara iti stutyaṃ ca nāmāmarāḥ
analyzed: yasya āhuḥ śaśimat śiraḥ haraḥ iti stutyam ca nāma amarāḥ
pāpāt sa svayam andhaka kṣaya karaḥ tvām sarvadā umādhavaḥ

original: Subhv_0045-1 kiṃcinnirmucyamāne gagana iva mukhe nāṭyanidrāpayodair-
analyzed: kiṃcid nirmucyamāne gagane iva mukhe nāṭya nidrā payodaiḥ
nyakkurvāṇe sva bhāsā phaṇipati śirasām ratna dīpa aṃśu jālam

original: Subhv_0045-3 pāyāstāṃ vo muroreḥ śaśitapanamaye locane yadvibhāsā
analyzed: pāyā āstām vaḥ murā ūreḥ śaśi tapana maye locane yad vibhāsā

original: Subhv_0045-4 lakṣmyā kastasthamardhaṃ vikasati kamalasyārdhamabhyeti nidrām //
analyzed: lakṣmyā kaḥ tastham ardham vikasati kamalasya ardham abhyeti nidrām
mallaiḥ śailendra kalpaḥ śiśuḥ akhila janaiḥ puṣpa cāpa uṅganābhiḥ

original: Subhv_0046-2 gopaistu prākṛtātmā divi kuliśabhṛtā viśvakāyoprameyaḥ /
analyzed: gopaiḥ tu prākṛta ātmā divi kuliśa bhṛtā viśva kāya uprameyaḥ

original: Subhv_0046-3 kruddhaḥ kaṃsena kālo bhayacakitadṛśā yogibhirdhyeyamūrtir-
analyzed: kruddhaḥ kaṃsena kālaḥ bhaya cakita dṛśā yogibhiḥ dhyeya mūrtiḥ
dṛṣṭaḥ raṅgāvatāre hariḥ amara jana ānanda kṛt pātu yuṣmān
bhindan arāti hṛdayāni hareḥ punātu
niḥśvāsa vāta mukharīkṛta koṭaraḥ vaḥ
saṃghaṭṭa ghoratara ghoṣaḥ iva āśu śaṅkhaḥ
pāyāt sa vaḥ kumuda kunda mṛṇāla gauraḥ
śaṅkhaḥ hareḥ kara tala ambara pūrṇa candraḥ
nādena yasya sura śatru vilāsinīnām
kāñcyaḥ bhavanti śithilāḥ jaghana sthalīṣu

original: Subhv_0049-1 dṛṣṭasya yasya hariṇā raṇamūrdhni mūrtir-
analyzed: dṛṣṭasya yasya hariṇā raṇa mūrdhni mūrtiḥ
udbhūta duḥsaha mahaḥ prasarā samantāt
tad locana sthita ravi pratibimba garbhe
vā ābhāti cakram ari cakra nudeḥ tu tat vaḥ
udvṛtta daitya pṛtanāpati kaṇṭha pīṭha
cheda ucchalat bahala śoṇita śoṇa dhāram
cakram kriyāt abhimatāni hareḥ udāra
digdāha dāruṇa nabhaḥ śriyam udvahat vaḥ
yasya udyat bāṇa vāhu druma gahana vana cheda goṣṭhī kuṭhāram
cakram niṣkrānta tīvra anala bahala kaṇā ākīrṇa dhāram vicintya
jāta grāsa avasāyaḥ

original: Subhv_0051-4 muhyatyadyāpi rāhuḥ sa dahatu duritānyāśu daityāntako vaḥ //
analyzed: muhyati adya api rāhuḥ sa dahatu duritāni āśu daitya antakaḥ vaḥ
daitya asthi pañjara vidāraṇa labdha randhra
rakta ambu nirjara sarit dhana jāta paṅkāḥ
bāla indu koṭi kuṭilāḥ
rakṣantu siṃha vapuṣaḥ nakharāḥ hareḥ vaḥ

original: Subhv_0053-1 ādityāḥ kiṃ daśaite pralayabhayakṛtaḥ svīkṛtākāśadeśāḥ
analyzed: ādityāḥ kim daśā ete pralaya bhaya kṛtaḥ svīkṛta ākāśa deśāḥ
kim vā ulkā maṇḍalāni tribhuvana dahanāya udyatāni iti bhītaiḥ
pāyāsuḥ nārasiṃham vapuḥ amara gaṇaiḥ bibhrataḥ śārṅgapāṇeḥ
dṛṣṭvā dṛpta asura uras tala daraṇa galat rakta raktāḥ nakhāḥ vaḥ
meru ūru kesaram udāra diganta pattram
ā mūla lambi cala śeṣa śarīra nālam
yena uddhṛtam kuvalayam salilāt sa līlam

original: Subhv_0054-4 uttaṃsakārthamiva pātu sa vo varāhaḥ //
analyzed: uttaṃsaka artham iva pātu sa vaḥ varāhaḥ

original: Subhv_0055-1 na mṛdnīyānmṛdvī kathamiva mahī potranikaṣair-
analyzed: na mṛdnīyāt mṛdvī katham iva mahī potra nikaṣaiḥ
mukha agni jvālābhiḥ kanakagiriḥ īyāt na vilayam

original: Subhv_0055-3 na śuṣyeyuḥ śvāsaiḥ salilanidhayaḥ sapta ca kathaṃ
analyzed: na śuṣyeyuḥ śvāsaiḥ salilanidhayaḥ sapta ca katham
varāhaḥ vaḥ pāyāt iti vipula cintā parikaraḥ

original: Subhv_0056-1 svāmī sanbhuvanatrayasya vikṛtiṃ nītosi kiṃ yācñayā
analyzed: svāmī san bhuvanatrayasya vikṛtim nītaḥ usi kim yācñayā

original: Subhv_0056-2 yadvā viśvasṛjā tvayaiva na kṛtaṃ taddīyatāṃ te kutaḥ /
analyzed: yat vā viśvasṛjā tvayā eva na kṛtam tat dīyatām te kutas

original: Subhv_0056-3 dānaṃ śreṣṭhatamāya tubhyamatulaṃ bandhāya no muktaye
analyzed: dānam śreṣṭhatamāya tubhyam atulam bandhāya naḥ muktaye

original: Subhv_0056-4 vijñapto balinā niruttaratayā hrīto hariḥ pātu vaḥ //
analyzed: vijñaptaḥ balinā niruttara tayā hrītaḥ hariḥ pātu vaḥ

original: Subhv_0057-1 līne śrotraikadeśe nabhasi nayanayostejasi kvāpi yāte
analyzed: līne śrotra eka deśe nabhasi nayanayoḥ tejasi kvāpi yāte
śvāsa grāsa upayukte maruti jalanidhau pāyu randhra ardha pīte
potra prānta eka roma antara vivara gatām mṛgyataḥ śārṅgapāṇeḥ

original: Subhv_0057-4 kroḍākārasya pṛthvīmakalitaviṣayaṃ vaibhavaṃ vaḥ punātu //
analyzed: kroḍa ākārasya pṛthvīm akalita viṣayam vaibhavam vaḥ punātu
kva idānīm darpitāḥ te ghana mada madirā āmodinaḥ digdhipa indrā

original: Subhv_0058-2 he mero mandarāndre malaya himagire sādhu vaḥ kṣmādharatvam /
analyzed: he mero mandara andre malaya himagire sādhu vaḥ kṣmādhara tvam

original: Subhv_0058-3 śeṣa ślāghyosi dīrghaiḥ pṛthubhuvanabharoccaṇḍaśauṇḍaiḥ śirobhiḥ
analyzed: śeṣa ślāghyaḥ asi dīrghaiḥ pṛthu bhuvana bhara uccaṇḍa śauṇḍaiḥ śirobhiḥ
śaṃsan sa utprāsam uccais iti dharaṇi bhṛtaḥ pātu yuṣmān varāhaḥ
vāmanaḥ yasya kaustubha pratibimbitā
kautuka ālokinī jātā jāṭharī iva jagat trayī
ekastham jīvita īśe tvayi sakala jagat sāram ālokayāmaḥ

original: Subhv_0060-2 śyāme cakṣustavāsminvapuṣi niviśate nālpapuṇyasya puṃsaḥ /
analyzed: śyāme cakṣuḥ tava asmin vapuṣi niviśate na alpa puṇyasya puṃsaḥ
kasya anyatra amṛte ismin ratiḥ ati vipulā dṛṣṭiḥ eva amṛtam te
daityaiḥ iti ucyamānaḥ munibhiḥ api hariḥ
bhrāmyat mahā giri nigharṣaṇa labdha pṛṣṭha
kaṇḍūyana kṣaṇa sukhāyita gāḍha nidraḥ
suṣvāpa dīrghatara gharghara ghora ghoṣaḥ
śvāsa abhibhūta jaladhiḥ kamaṭhaḥ sa

original: Subhv_0062-1 sa dhūrjaṭijaṭājūṭo jāyatāṃ vijayāya vaḥ /
analyzed: sa dhūrjaṭi jaṭā jūṭaḥ jāyatām vijayāya vaḥ
yasya eka palita bhrāntim kara utpadya api jāhnavī

original: Subhv_0063-1 sa pātu vo yasya jaṭākalāpe
analyzed: sa pātu vaḥ yasya jaṭā kalāpe
sthitaḥ śaśāṅkaḥ sphuṭa hāra gauraḥ
nīlotpalānām iva nāla puñje
nidrāyamāṇaḥ śaradi iva haṃsaḥ
diśyāt sa śītakiraṇa ābharaṇaḥ śivam vaḥ
yasya uttamāṅga bhuvi visphurat ūrmi pakṣā
haṃsī iva nirmala śaśāṅka kalā mṛṇāla
kanda arthinī surasarit nabhasaḥ papāta

original: Subhv_0065-1 śreyāṃsi vo diśatu yasya sitābhraśubhrā
analyzed: śreyāṃsi vaḥ diśatu yasya sita abhra śubhrā
vibhrājate surasarit vara mauli mālā
ūrdhva īkṣaṇa jvalana tāpa vilīyamāna
candra amṛta pravitata amṛta vāhinī iva
cyutām indoḥ lekhām rati kalaha bhagnam ca valayam
śanais ekīkṛtya prahasita mukhī śailatanayā

original: Subhv_0066-3 avocadyaṃ paśyotyavatu sa śivaḥ sā ca girijā
analyzed: avocat yam sa śivaḥ sā ca girijā
sa ca krīḍā candraḥ daśanakiraṇa āpūrita tanuḥ

original: Subhv_0067-1 eṣā te hara kā sugātri katamā mūrdhni sthitā kiṃ jaṭā
analyzed: eṣā te hara kā su gātri katamā mūrdhni sthitā kim jaṭā

original: Subhv_0067-2 haṃsaḥ kiṃ bhajate jaṭāṃ nahi śaśī candro jalaṃ sevate /
analyzed: haṃsaḥ kim bhajate jaṭām nahi śaśī candraḥ jalam sevate

original: Subhv_0067-3 mugdho bhūtiriyaṃ kutotra salilaṃ bhūtistaraṅgāyate
analyzed: mugdhaḥ bhūtiḥ iyam kutas utra salilam bhūtiḥ taraṅgāyate

original: Subhv_0067-4 evaṃ yo vinigūhate tripathagāṃ pāyātsa vaḥ śaṃkaraḥ //
analyzed: evam yaḥ vinigūhate tripathagām pāyāt sa vaḥ śaṃkaraḥ
āśleṣa adhara vimba cumbana sukha ālāpa smitā

original: Subhv_0068-2 dūre tāvadidaṃ mitho na sulabhaṃ jātaṃ mukhālokanam /
analyzed: dūre tāvat idam mithas na sulabham jātam mukha ālokanam
ittham vyartha kṛta eka deha ghaṭana upanyāsayoḥ āvayoḥ
kā iyam prema viḍambanā iti avatu vaḥ smeroḥ dhanārī īśvaraḥ
mātar jīva kim etat añjali puṭe tātena gopāyyate

original: Subhv_0069-2 vatsa svādu phalaṃ prayacchati na me gatvā gṛhāṇa svayam /
analyzed: vatsa svādu phalam prayacchati na me gatvā gṛhāṇa svayam

original: Subhv_0069-3 mātraivaṃ prahite gṛhe vighaṭayatyākṛṣya saṃdhyāñjaliṃ
analyzed: mātrā evam prahite gṛhe vighaṭayati ākṛṣya saṃdhyā añjalim
śaṃbhoḥ bhinna samādhi ruddha rabhasaḥ hāsa udgamaḥ pātu vaḥ
ekam cantacchadasya sphurati japa vaśāt ardham anyat prakopāt

original: Subhv_0070-2 ekaḥ pāṇiḥ praṇantuṃ śirasi kṛtapadaḥ kṣeptumanyastameva /
analyzed: ekaḥ pāṇiḥ praṇantum śirasi kṛta padaḥ kṣeptum anyaḥ tam eva
ekam dhyānāt nimīlati aparam aviṣaham vīkṣitum cakṣuḥ ittham

original: Subhv_0070-4 tulyānicchāpi vāmā tanuravatu sa vo yasya saṃdhyāvasāne //
analyzed: tulya anicchā api vāmā tanuḥ avatu sa vaḥ yasya saṃdhyā avasāne
śailarāja tanayāḥ tanaya gma vyāpṛta āsya yugalasya gṛhasya

original: Subhv_0071-2 śeṣavakrakamalāni malaṃ vo dugdhapānavidhurāṇi harantu //
analyzed: śeṣa vakra kamalāni malam vaḥ dugdha pāna vidhurāṇi harantu
kara jālam apūrva ceṣṭitam vaḥ tat abhīṣṭa pradam astu tigmabhāsaḥ
kriyate bhava bandhanāt vimuktiḥ praṇatānām upasevitena yena
yuṣmākam ambaramaṇe prathame mayūkhāḥ
te maṅgalam vidadhatu udaya rāga bhājaḥ
kurvanti ye divasa janma mahā utsaveṣu
sindūra pāṭala mukhīḥ iva diś puraṃdhrīḥ
ā bāhu udgata maṇḍala agra rucayaḥ saṃnaddha vakṣaḥ sthalāḥ
sa ūṣmāṇaḥ vraṇinaḥ vipakṣa hṛdaya pronmāthinaḥ karkaśāḥ
utsṛṣṭa ambara dṛṣṭa vigraha bharā yasya smara agresarā

original: Subhv_0074-4 yodhā vāravadhūstanāśca na dadhuḥ kṣobhaṃ sa vovyājjinaḥ //
analyzed: yodhāḥ vāravadhū stanāḥ ca na kṣobham sa vovyāt jinaḥ

original: Subhv_0075-1 kiṃ syādbhāsvānna bhānoramṛtaghanarasasyandinaḥ santi pādāḥ
analyzed: kim syāt bhāsvān na bhānoḥ amṛta ghana rasa syandinaḥ santi pādāḥ

original: Subhv_0075-2 kiṃ vā rākāśaśāṅko nahi tuhinaruciḥ kutracinniṣkalaṅkaḥ /
analyzed: kim vā rākā śaśāṅkaḥ nahi tuhina ruciḥ kutracid niṣkalaṅkaḥ

original: Subhv_0075-3 sākṣāccintāmaṇiḥ kiṃ vipulaphalamaṇeḥ saukumāryaṃ kutastyaṃ
analyzed: sākṣāt cintāmaṇiḥ kim vipula phala maṇeḥ saukumāryam kutastyam

original: Subhv_0075-4 saṃdehānmugdhadhībhiḥ prathamamiti muneḥ pātu dṛṣṭaṃ vapurvaḥ //
analyzed: saṃdehāt mugdha dhībhiḥ prathamam iti muneḥ pātu dṛṣṭam vapuḥ vaḥ
ciram āviṣkṛta prīti bhītayaḥ pāntu vaḥ dviṣām
valaya jyā rava unmiśrāḥ caṇḍyāḥ kodaṇḍa kṛṣṭayaḥ
diśyān mahā asura śiraḥ sarasi īpsitāni
preṅkhat nakha āvali mayūkha mṛṇāla nālam
caṇḍyāḥ calat caṭula nūpura cañcarīka
jhāṃkāra hāri caraṇa amburuha dvayam vaḥ
sa vrīḍā dayita ānane sa karuṇā mātaṅga carma ambare
sa trāsā bhujage sa vismaya rasā candra imṛta syandini
sa īrṣyā jahnusutā avalokana vidhau dīnā kapāla udare

original: Subhv_0078-4 pārvatyā navasaṃgamapraṇayinī dṛṣṭiḥ śivāyastu vaḥ //
analyzed: pārvatyāḥ nava saṃgama praṇayinī dṛṣṭiḥ śivāya astu vaḥ

original: Subhv_0079-1 uttiṣṭhantyā ratānte bharamuragapatau pāṇinaikena kṛtvā
analyzed: uttiṣṭhantyāḥ rata ante bharam uraga patau pāṇinā ekena kṛtvā

original: Subhv_0079-2 dhṛtvā cānyena vāso vigalitakabarībhāramaṃsaṃ vahantyāḥ /
analyzed: dhṛtvā ca anyena vāsaḥ vigalita kabarī bhāram aṃsam vahantyāḥ
bhūyas tad kāla kānti dvi guṇita surata prītinā śauriṇā vaḥ

original: Subhv_0079-4 śayyāmāliṅgya nītaṃ vapuralasalasadbāhu lakṣmyāḥ punātu //
analyzed: śayyām āliṅgya nītam vapuḥ alasa lasat bāhu lakṣmyāḥ punātu
pāyāt gaja indra vadanaḥ saḥ imām trilokīm
yasya udgatena gagane mahatā kareṇa
mūla avalagna sita danta bisa aṅkureṇa
nālāyitam tapana bimba saroruhasya
sa ānandam nandi hasta āhata muraja rava āhvata kaumāra barhi
trāsāt nāsā agra randhram viśati phaṇipatau bhoga saṃkoca bhāji
gaṇḍa uḍḍīna ali mālā mukharita kakubhaḥ tāṇḍave śūlapāṇeḥ

original: Subhv_0081-4 vaināyakyaściraṃ vo vadanavidhutayaḥ pāntu sītkāravatyaḥ //
analyzed: vaināyakyaḥ ciram vaḥ vadana vidhutayaḥ pāntu sītkāravatyaḥ
dhanuḥ mālā maurvī kvaṇat ali kulam lakṣyam abalā

original: Subhv_0082-2 mano bhedyaṃ śabdaprabhṛtaya ime pañca viśikhāḥ /
analyzed: manaḥ bhedyam śabda prabhṛtayaḥ ime pañca viśikhāḥ
iyān jetum yasya tribhuvanam adehasya vibhavaḥ

original: Subhv_0082-4 sa kāmaḥ kāmānvo diśatu dayitāpāṅgavasatiḥ //
analyzed: sa kāmaḥ kāmān vaḥ diśatu dayita apāṅga vasatiḥ
brahmā dakṣaḥ kuberaḥ yama varuṇa marut vahni candra indra rudrāḥ

original: Subhv_0083-2 śailā nadyaḥ samudrā grahagaṇamanujā daityagandharvanāgāḥ /
analyzed: śailāḥ nadyaḥ samudrāḥ graha gaṇa manujāḥ daitya gandharva nāgāḥ

original: Subhv_0083-3 dvīḥā nakṣatratārāravivasumunayo vyoma bhūraścinau ca
analyzed: nakṣatra tārā aravi vasu munayaḥ vyoma bhūraścinau ca

original: Subhv_0083-4 saṃlīnā yasya sarve vapuṣi sa bhagavāpātu vo viśvarūpaḥ //
analyzed: saṃlīnāḥ yasya sarve vapuṣi sa bhagavā apātu vaḥ viśva rūpaḥ

original: Subhv_0084-1 mugdhe muñca viṣādamatra balajitkampo gurustyajyatāṃ
analyzed: mugdhe muñca viṣādam atra bala jit kampaḥ guruḥ tyajyatām
sadbhāvam bhaja puṇḍarīkanayane mānyān imān mānaya
lakṣmīm bodhayataḥ svayaṃvara vidhau dhanvantareḥ vāc chalā

original: Subhv_0084-4 danyatra pratiṣedhamātmani vidhiṃ śṛṇvanhariḥ pātu vaḥ //
analyzed: pratiṣedham ātmani vidhim śṛṇvan hariḥ pātu vaḥ
diśyāt sukham
yasya āhave ditisuta uddalana udyatasya
krodha uddhatam mukham avekṣitum akṣama tvam
jānebhavat nija nakheṣu api yat natāḥ te

original: Subhv_0086-1 svasti svāgatamarthyahaṃ vada vibho kiṃ dīyatāṃ medinī
analyzed: svasti svāgatam arthi aham vada vibho kim dīyatām medinī

original: Subhv_0086-2 kā mātrā mama vikramatrayapadaṃ dattaṃ gṛhītāṃ mayā /
analyzed: kā mātrā mama vikrama traya padam dattam gṛhītām mayā

original: Subhv_0086-3 mā dehītyuśanāḥ kuto harirayaṃ pātraṃ kimasmātparaṃ
analyzed: mā dehi iti uśanāḥ kutas hariḥ ayam pātram kim asmāt param

original: Subhv_0086-4 yo hītthaṃ balinārcito makhamukhe pāyātsa vo vāmanaḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ hi ittham balinā arcitaḥ makha mukhe pāyāt sa vaḥ vāmanaḥ

original: Subhv_0087-1 cakra brūhi vibho gade jaya hare kambo samājñāpaya
analyzed: cakra brūhi vibho gade jaya hare kambo samājñāpaya

original: Subhv_0087-2 bho bho nandaka jīva pannagariyo kiṃ nātha bhinno mayā /
analyzed: bho bho nandaka jīva pannagariyaḥ kim nātha bhinnaḥ mayā

original: Subhv_0087-3 ko daityaḥ katamo hiraṇyakaśipuḥ satyaṃ bhavadbhyaḥ śape
analyzed: kaḥ daityaḥ katamaḥ hiraṇyakaśipuḥ satyam bhavadbhyaḥ śape

original: Subhv_0087-4 kenāstreṇa nakhairiti pravadato viṣṇormukhaṃ pātu vaḥ //
analyzed: kena astreṇa nakhaiḥ iti pravadataḥ viṣṇoḥ mukham pātu vaḥ

original: Subhv_0088-1 cintācakriṇi hanta cakriṇi bhiyā kubjāsanebjāsane
analyzed: cintā cakriṇi hanta cakriṇi bhiyā kubjāsana ibjāsane

original: Subhv_0088-2 naśyaddhāmani tigmadhāmani dhṛtāśaṅke śaśāṅke bhṛśam /
analyzed: naśyat dhāmani tigma dhāmani dhṛta āśaṅke śaśāṅke bhṛśam

original: Subhv_0088-3 bhraśyaccetasi ca pracetasi śucā tānte kṛtānte ca yo
analyzed: bhraśyat cetasi ca pracetasi śucā tānte kṛtānte ca
vyagraḥ bhūt kaṭu kālakūṭa kavalīkārāya pāyāt sa vaḥ
ānanda dhāma jagat aṅkura bījam ekam
diś deśa kāla kalanā ādi samasta hasta

original: Subhv_0089-4 mardāsahaṃ diśatu śarma mahanmaho vaḥ //
analyzed: mardāsaham diśatu śarma mahat mahaḥ vaḥ
vyomni iva nīrada bharaḥ sarasi iva vīci
vyūhaḥ sahasra mahasi iva sudhā aṃśu dhām

original: Subhv_0090-3 yasminnidaṃ jagadudeti ca līyate ca
analyzed: yasmin idam jagat udeti ca līyate ca
tat śāmbhavam bhavatu vaibhavam ṛrddhaye vaḥ
kāryeṇa yaḥ hari hara druhiṇa tvam eti
devaḥ sa

original: Subhv_0091-4 śaktiḥ śivaṃ diśatu śaśvadanaśvaraṃ vaḥ //
analyzed: śaktiḥ śivam diśatu śaśvat anaśvaram vaḥ
sarvaḥ kila ayam avaśaḥ puruṣa aṇu karma
kāya ādi kāraṇa gaṇaḥ yad anugraheṇa
viśva prapañca racanā catura tvam eti
sa trāyatām tribhuvana eka mahā īśvaraḥ vaḥ
yaḥ kandukaiḥ iva puraṃdara padma sadma
padmā pati prabhṛtibhiḥ prabhuḥ aprameyaḥ
khelati a laṅghya mahimā sa himādri kanyā
kāntaḥ kṛtānta dalanaḥ laghayatu adham vaḥ

original: Subhv_0094-1 muktirhi nāma paramaḥ puruṣārtha ekas-
analyzed: muktiḥ hi nāma paramaḥ puruṣa arthaḥ ekaḥ
tām antarāyam avayanti yad antara jñāḥ

original: Subhv_0094-3 kiṃ bhūyasā bhavatu saiva sudhāmayūkha-
analyzed: kim bhūyasā bhavatu sā eva sudhā mayūkha
lekhā śikhā ābharaṇa bhaktiḥ abhaṅgurā vaḥ
śrīkaṇṭhasya mūrtiḥ sadā ārohiṇī

original: Subhv_0095-2 jyeṣṭhā bhadrapadā punarvasuyutā citrā viśākhānvitā /
analyzed: jyeṣṭhā bhadrapadā punarvasu yutā citrā viśākhā anvitā

original: Subhv_0095-4 śreyo vaiśravaṇānvitā bhagavato nakṣatrapālīva vaḥ //
analyzed: śreyaḥ vaiśravaṇa anvitā bhagavataḥ nakṣatra pālī iva vaḥ

original: Subhv_0096-1 trātā bhītibhṛtāṃ patiścidacitāṃ kleśaṃ sataṃ śaṃsatāṃ
analyzed: trātā bhīti bhṛtām patiḥ cit acitām kleśam satam śaṃsatām

original: Subhv_0096-2 hantā bhaktimatāṃ satāṃ svasamatāṃ kartāpakartāsatām /
analyzed: hantā bhaktimatām satām sva samatām kartā apakartā asatām
nirmāṇa sthiti saṃhṛti prakaṭita krīḍaḥ mṛḍaḥ pātu vaḥ
rājā rāja arcita aṅghreḥ anupacita kalaḥ yasya cūḍāmaṇi tvam

original: Subhv_0097-2 nāgā gāgātmajārdhaṃ na bhasitadhavalaṃ yadvapurbhūṣayanti /
analyzed: nāgāḥ gāgā ātmaja ardham na bhasita dhavalam yat vapuḥ bhūṣayanti

original: Subhv_0097-3 mā rāmārāgiṇī bhūnmatiriti yamināṃ yena vodāhi māraḥ
analyzed: mā rāma a rāgiṇī bhūt matiḥ iti yaminām yena māraḥ

original: Subhv_0097-4 sa ptāḥ saptāśvanunnāruṇakiraṇanibhāḥ pātu bibhrattrinetraḥ //
analyzed: sa ptāḥ sapta aśva nunna aruṇakiraṇa nibhāḥ pātu bibhrat trinetraḥ
rādhā mohana mandiram jagamiṣoḥ candrāvalī mandirāt

original: Subhv_0098-2 rādho kṣemamiti priyasya vacanaṃ śrutvāha candrāvalī /
analyzed: rādho kṣemam iti priyasya vacanam śrutvā āha candrāvalī

original: Subhv_0098-3 kṣemaṃ kaṃsa tataḥ priyaḥ prakupitaḥ kaṃsaḥ kva dṛṣṭastvayā
analyzed: kṣemam kaṃsa tatas priyaḥ prakupitaḥ kaṃsaḥ kva dṛṣṭaḥ tvayā

original: Subhv_0098-4 rādhā kveti tayoḥ prisannamanasorhāsodgamaḥ pātu vaḥ //
analyzed: rādhā kva iti tayoḥ pri sanna manasoḥ hāsa udgamaḥ pātu vaḥ

original: Subhv_0099-1 ākṛṣṭe yudhi kārmuke samavadadvāmaḥ karo dakṣiṇaṃ
analyzed: ākṛṣṭe yudhi kārmuke samavadat vāmaḥ karaḥ dakṣiṇam

original: Subhv_0099-2 re re dakṣiṇahasta bhojanamahādānādi te kurvataḥ /
analyzed: re re dakṣiṇa hasta bhojana mahā dāna ādi te kurvataḥ
paścāt gantum ayuktam iti atha punar saḥ api abravīt adravam

original: Subhv_0099-4 praṣṭuṃ rāghavamāśu rāvaṇaśirovṛndāni bhindāni kim //
analyzed: praṣṭum rāghavam āśu rāvaṇa śiraḥ vṛndāni bhindāni kim

original: Subhv_0100-1 dṛṣṭaḥ kvāpi sa keśavo vrajavadhūmādāya kāṃcidgataḥ
analyzed: dṛṣṭaḥ kvāpi sa keśavaḥ vraja vadhūm ādāya kāṃcid gataḥ

original: Subhv_0100-2 sarvā eva hi vañcitāḥ khula vayaṃ sonveṣaṇīyo yadi /
analyzed: sarvāḥ eva hi vañcitāḥ vayam yadi

original: Subhv_0100-3 dve dve gacchata ityudīrya sahasā rādhāṃ gṛhītvā kare
analyzed: dve dve gacchataḥ iti udīrya sahasā rādhām gṛhītvā kare

original: Subhv_0100-4 gopīveṣadharo nikuñjabhavanaṃ prāpto hariḥ pātu vaḥ //
analyzed: gopī veṣa dharaḥ nikuñja bhavanam prāptaḥ hariḥ pātu vaḥ
mātar tarṇaka rakṣaṇāya yamunākaccham na gacchāmi aham
kasmādvat sa pinaṣṭi pīvara kuca dvandvena gopī janaḥ
bhrū bhaṅgaiḥ vinivāritaḥ api bahuśas

original: Subhv_0101-4 gopībhiḥ karapadmamudritamukhaḥ pāyātsa vaḥ keśavaḥ //
analyzed: gopībhiḥ kara padma mudrita mukhaḥ pāyāt sa vaḥ keśavaḥ
saṃdhyām yat praṇipatya loka puratas baddhāñjaliḥ yācase

original: Subhv_0102-2 dhatse yacca nadīṃ vilajja śirasā tannāma soḍhaṃ mayā /
analyzed: dhatse yat ca nadīm vilajja śirasā tat nāma soḍham mayā

original: Subhv_0102-3 śrīryātāmṛtamanthane yadi hariṃ kasmādviṣaṃ bhakṣitaṃ
analyzed: śrīḥ yātā amṛta manthane yadi harim kasmāt viṣam bhakṣitam

original: Subhv_0102-4 mā strīlaṃpaṭa māṃ spṛśeti gadito gauryā haraḥ pātu vaḥ //
analyzed: mā strī laṃpaṭa mām spṛśa iti gaditaḥ gauryā haraḥ pātu vaḥ

original: Subhv_0103-1 kastvaṃ śūlī mṛgaya bhiṣajaṃ nīlakaṇṭhaḥ priyehaṃ
analyzed: kaḥ tvam śūlī mṛgaya bhiṣajam nīlakaṇṭhaḥ priya iham

original: Subhv_0103-2 kekāmekāṃ vada paśupatirnaiva dṛśye viṣāṇe /
analyzed: kekām ekām vada paśupatiḥ na eva dṛśye viṣāṇe

original: Subhv_0103-3 mugdhe sthāṇuḥ sa carati kathaṃ jīviteśaḥ śivāyā
analyzed: mugdhe sthāṇuḥ sa carati katham jīvita īśaḥ śivāyā
gaccha aṭavyām iti hata vacāḥ pātu vaḥ candracūḍaḥ

original: Subhv_0104-1 koyaṃ dvāri hariḥ prayāhyupavanaḥ śākhāmṛgasyātra kiṃ
analyzed: kaḥ iyam dvāri hariḥ prayāhi upavanaḥ śākhāmṛgasya atra kim

original: Subhv_0104-2 kṛṣṇohaṃ dayite bibhemi sutarāṃ kṛṣṇādahaṃ vānarāt /
analyzed: kṛṣṇaḥ uham dayite bibhemi sutarām kṛṣṇāt aham vānarāt

original: Subhv_0104-3 mugdhehaṃ madhusūdanaḥ piba latāṃ tāmeva tanmīvale
analyzed: mugdha iham madhusūdanaḥ piba latām tām eva tat mīvale

original: Subhv_0104-4 itthaṃ nirvacanīkṛto dayitayā hrīto hariḥ pātu vaḥ //
analyzed: ittham nirvacanīkṛtaḥ dayitayā hrītaḥ hariḥ pātu vaḥ

original: Subhv_0105-1 nirlajja hare kimidaṃ pramadānugataḥ sadā paribhramasi /
analyzed: nirlajja hare kim idam pramadā anugataḥ sadā paribhramasi

original: Subhv_0105-2 mugdhe tvatsaṃparkātpramado bhavatīti kiṃ citram //
analyzed: mugdhe tvad saṃparkāt pramadaḥ bhavati iti kim citram

original: Subhv_0106-1 śaṭha varṇayāmi bhavato nārīṇāmuparibhūyasī prītiḥ /
analyzed: śaṭha varṇayāmi bhavataḥ nārīṇām upari bhūyasī prītiḥ

original: Subhv_0106-2 pralapasi kimasaṃbaddhaṃ kasyāriṣu vidyate prema //
analyzed: pralapasi kim asaṃbaddham kasya ariṣu vidyate prema

original: Subhv_0107-1 vyāmohayasi kimevaṃ rāmāsaktiṃ bravīmi bhavadīyām /
analyzed: vyāmohayasi kim evam rāma āsaktim bravīmi bhavadīyām

original: Subhv_0107-2 jyeṣṭhe bhrātari rāme na kriyatāṃ kathamivāsaktiḥ //
analyzed: jyeṣṭhe bhrātari rāme na kriyatām katham iva āsaktiḥ

original: Subhv_0108-1 kiṃ māmevaṃ bhramayasi śocāmi vyasanameva bhavadīyam /
analyzed: kim mām evam bhramayasi śocāmi vyasanam eva bhavadīyam

original: Subhv_0108-2 niṣkāraṇakupitāyāṃ tvayi kathaya kimalpakaṃ vyasanam //
analyzed: niṣkāraṇa kupitāyām tvayi kathaya kim alpakam vyasanam
vakra vacanaiḥ amībhiḥ gopa vadhūm iti nar uttarīkṛtya
maṇḍalita guru payodharam upagūḍham pātu vaḥ śaureḥ

original: Subhv_0110-1 ayi saṃprasīda pārvati śivopi tava pādayornipatitoham /
analyzed: ayi saṃprasīda pārvati śivaḥ api tava pādayoḥ nipatitaḥ uham

original: Subhv_0110-2 śiva iti kathaṃ hi jalpasi sarudhiragajacarmasaṃvītaḥ //
analyzed: śivaḥ iti katham hi jalpasi sa rudhira gaja carma saṃvītaḥ

original: Subhv_0111-1 śiva iti yadi tava gadite dviguṇo roṣo bhavāmyahaṃ sthāṇuḥ /
analyzed: śivaḥ iti yadi tava gadite dviguṇaḥ roṣaḥ bhavāmi aham sthāṇuḥ

original: Subhv_0111-2 sthānurasi satyametaccetasi bhavato na kiṃcidapi //
analyzed: sthānuḥ asi satyam etat cetasi bhavataḥ na kiṃcid api

original: Subhv_0112-1 tyaja ruṣamavehi mānini māmīśvaramarcitaḥ tribhuvanasya /
analyzed: tyaja ruṣam avehi mānini mām īśvaram arcitaḥ tribhuvanasya

original: Subhv_0112-2 tryambaka yadīśvarastvaṃ nagnaḥ kiṃ dhūlidhūsaritaḥ //
analyzed: tryambaka yadi īśvaraḥ tvam nagnaḥ kim dhūli dhūsaritaḥ

original: Subhv_0113-1 saṃprati kimatra vakṣyasi paśupatireṣosmi pāṇḍurakapole /
analyzed: saṃprati kim atra vakṣyasi paśupatiḥ eṣaḥ asmi pāṇḍura kapole

original: Subhv_0113-2 paśupatireva na gaṇayasi yuktāyuktāni yasmāttvam //
analyzed: paśupatiḥ eva na gaṇayasi yukta ayuktāni yasmāt tvam

original: Subhv_0114-1 mugdhe bhramasi kimevaṃ satyamimaṃ māṃ bhavaṃ vijānīhi /
analyzed: mugdhe bhramasi kim evam satyam imam mām bhavam vijānīhi

original: Subhv_0114-2 satyaṃ bhavosi śaṭha he yenātivicitrarūposi //
analyzed: satyam bhavaḥ usi śaṭha he yena ati vicitra rūpā usi

original: Subhv_0115-1 paṇḍitabādastava yadi lokehaṃ tryambako vidita eṣaḥ /
analyzed: paṇḍita bādaḥ tava yadi loka iham tryambakaḥ viditaḥ eṣaḥ

original: Subhv_0115-2 ambā hyekāpi na te prajalpasi tvaṃ kutastisraḥ //
analyzed: ambā hi ekā api na te prajalpasi tvam kutas tisraḥ

original: Subhv_0116-1 vādo mahānihaiva hi tathā vijānīhyanaṅgadahanaṃ mām /
analyzed: vādaḥ mahān iha eva hi tathā vijānīhi anaṅga dahanam mām
dagdham idam aṅgam aṅgam tvayā mama eva īdṛśaiḥ caritaiḥ
saṃdhyā praṇāma doṣāt yaḥ anunayati tam vijitya pārvatyā

original: Subhv_0117-2 āliṅgitaśca sarabhasamurasā vai haratu duritaṃ vaḥ //
analyzed: āliṅgitaḥ ca sarabhasam urasā vai haratu duritam vaḥ

original: Subhv_0118-1 bhava niḥsnehastvaṃ me na bhavāmyevaṃ yathā tvayā gaditam /
analyzed: bhava niḥsnehaḥ tvam me na bhavāmi evam yathā tvayā gaditam
niḥsneha tā abhilāṣaḥ tava devi kutas samutpannaḥ
kusṛtibhiḥ alam etābhiḥ kimartham upari sthitā nadī iyam te
kā nara kapāla mālā mama upari sthā gṛhāṇa etāḥ
janam anurāgiṇam evam saṃtāpayasi vyalīka karaṇena
tava nara kapāla paṅktibhiḥ avaśyam eva upari stheyam

original: Subhv_0121-1 kiṃ kupitosi tyaja ruṣamapanayatāṃ vigrahaṃ mayā hi bhavān /
analyzed: kim kupitaḥ asi tyaja ruṣam apanayatām vigraham mayā hi bhavān

original: Subhv_0121-2 saha vigraho bhavatyā na jātu vighāṭiṣyatesmākam //
analyzed: saha vigrahaḥ bhavatyā na jātu vighāṭiṣyate smākam
gaṅgā vigraha kaluṣām iti śiva vacanaiḥ niruttarām gaurīm

original: Subhv_0122-2 parihāsya yonuninye sa karotu śivaḥ śivaṃ bhavatām //
analyzed: parihāsya yaḥ nuninye sa karotu śivaḥ śivam bhavatām

original: Subhv_0123-1 vijaye kuśalastryakṣo na krīḍitumahamanena saha śaktā /
analyzed: vijaye kuśalaḥ tryakṣaḥ na krīḍitum aham anena saha śaktā

original: Subhv_0123-2 vijaye kuśalosmi na tu tryakṣokṣadvayamidaṃ pāṇau //
analyzed: vijaye kuśalaḥ asmi na tu tri akṣa ukṣa dvayam idam pāṇau

original: Subhv_0124-1 kiṃ me durodareṇa prayātu yadi gaṇapatirna tebhimataḥ /
analyzed: kim me durodareṇa prayātu yadi gaṇapatiḥ na

original: Subhv_0124-2 kaḥ pradveṣṭi vināyakamahilokaḥ kiṃ na jānāsi //
analyzed: kaḥ pradveṣṭi vināyaka mahi lokaḥ kim na jānāsi

original: Subhv_0125-1 vasurahitena krīḍā bhavatā saha kīdṛśī na jihreṣi /
analyzed: vasu rahitena krīḍā bhavatā saha kīdṛśī na jihreṣi
kim vasu bhinnam atas amūn sura asurān eva paśya puras

original: Subhv_0126-1 candragrahaṇena vinā nāsmi rame kiṃ pravartayasyevam /
analyzed: candra grahaṇena vinā nā asmi rame kim pravartayasi evam

original: Subhv_0126-2 devyai yadi rucitamidaṃ nandinnāhvayatāṃ rāhuḥ //
analyzed: devyai yadi rucitam idam nandin āhvayatām rāhuḥ

original: Subhv_0127-1 hā rāhau nikaṭasthe sitadaṃṣṭre bhayakṛti ratiḥ kasya /
analyzed: hā rāhau nikaṭa sthe sita daṃṣṭre bhaya kṛti ratiḥ kasya

original: Subhv_0127-2 yadi necchasi tattyaktaḥ saṃpratyevaiṣa hārāhiḥ //
analyzed: yadi nā icchasi tat tyaktaḥ saṃprati eva eṣa hāra ahiḥ

original: Subhv_0128-1 āropayasi mudhā kiṃ nāhamabhijñā tvadaṅkasya /
analyzed: āropayasi mudhā kim na aham abhijñā tvad aṅkasya
divyam varṣa sahasram sthitvā evam yuktam abhidhātum
harṣa vaśa tarala tārakam ānanam avyāt bhavānyāḥ vaḥ

original: Subhv_0130-1 aṅgulyā kaḥ kavāṭe praharati kuṭilo mādhavaḥ kiṃ vasanto
analyzed: aṅgulyā kaḥ kavāṭe praharati kuṭilaḥ mādhavaḥ kim

original: Subhv_0130-2 no cakrī kiṃ kulālo nahi dharaṇidharaḥ kiṃ praṇīndro dvijihvaḥ /
analyzed: no cakrī kim kulālaḥ nahi dharaṇidharaḥ kim praṇīndraḥ dvijihvaḥ

original: Subhv_0130-3 mugdhe ghorāhimāthī kimuta khagapatirno hariḥ kiṃ kapīndra
analyzed: mugdhe ghora ahi māthī kim uta khaga patiḥ naḥ hariḥ kim kapi indra

original: Subhv_0130-4 itthaṃ lakṣmyā kṛtosau pratihatavacanaḥ pātulakṣmīdhavo vaḥ //
analyzed: ittham lakṣmyā kṛta usau pratihata vacanaḥ pātu lakṣmīdhavaḥ vaḥ

original: Subhv_0131-1 khedaḥ kiṃ khalu dayite na vetsi ravimaṇḍalaṃ jagadviditam /
analyzed: khedaḥ kim khalu dayite na vetsi ravi maṇḍalam jagat viditam

original: Subhv_0131-2 na krodhaḥ kartavyo jalacaramūrdhvaṃ na jātu paśyāmaḥ //
analyzed: na krodhaḥ kartavyaḥ jalacaram ūrdhvam na jātu paśyāmaḥ

original: Subhv_0132-1 kopastyaktuṃ yogyo yasya pipāsā na saṃbhavati /
analyzed: kopaḥ tyaktum yogyaḥ yasya pipāsā na saṃbhavati

original: Subhv_0132-2 saṃtyaja mānini mānaṃ kiṃ mānenādhunā mamānena //
analyzed: saṃtyaja mānini mānam kim mānena adhunā mama anena

original: Subhv_0133-1 kiṃ tena kila kāvyena mṛdyamānasya yasya tāḥ /
analyzed: kim tena kila kāvyena mṛdyamānasya yasya tāḥ
udadheḥ iva na āyānti rasa amṛta paramparāḥ

original: Subhv_0134-1 kiṃ kavestasya kāvyena kiṃ kāṇḍena dhanuṣmataḥ /
analyzed: kim kaveḥ tasya kāvyena kim kāṇḍena dhanuṣmataḥ

original: Subhv_0134-2 parasya hṛdaye lagnaṃ na ghūrṇayati yacchiraḥ //
analyzed: parasya hṛdaye lagnam na ghūrṇayati yat śiraḥ
a pragalbha padanyāsāḥ jananī rāga hetavaḥ

original: Subhv_0135-2 santyeke bahulālāpāḥ kavayo bālakā iva //
analyzed: santi eke bahula ālāpāḥ kavayaḥ bālakāḥ iva

original: Subhv_0136-1 kiṃ tena kāvyamadhunā plāvitā rasanirjharaiḥ /
analyzed: kim tena kāvya madhunā plāvitāḥ rasa nirjharaiḥ

original: Subhv_0136-2 jaḍātmānopi no yasya bhavantyaṅkuritān tarāḥ //
analyzed: jaḍa ātmānaḥ api no yasya bhavanti aṅkuritān tarāḥ

original: Subhv_0137-1 navortho jātiragrāmyā śleṣokliṣṭaḥ sphuto rasaḥ /

analyzed: vikaṭa akṣara bandhaḥ ca kṛtsnam ekatra duṣkaram
mukha mātreṇa kāvyasya karoti ahṛdayaḥ janaḥ
chāyām achām api śyāmām rāhuḥ tārāpateḥ iva
boddhāraḥ matsara grastāḥ vibhavaḥ smaya dūṣitāḥ
abodha upahatāḥ ca anye subhāṣitam
pada dvayasya saṃdhānam kartum apratibhāḥ khalāḥ
tathā api para kāvyeṣu duṣkareṣu api asaṃbhramāḥ

original: Subhv_0141-1 kva doṣotra mayā labhya iti saṃcintya cetasā /
analyzed: kva doṣaḥ utra mayā labhyaḥ iti saṃcintya cetasā

original: Subhv_0141-2 khalaḥ kāvyeṣu sādhūnāṃ śravaṇāya pravartate //
analyzed: khalaḥ kāvyeṣu sādhūnām śravaṇāya pravartate
upapattibhiḥ amlānāḥ na upadeśaiḥ kadarthitāḥ
keṣāṃcid vāci śuka vat pareṣām hṛdi mūka vat

original: Subhv_0143-2 kasyāpyā hṛdayādvaktre valgu valganti sūktayaḥ //
analyzed: kasya āpyāḥ hṛdayāt vaktre valgu valganti su uktayaḥ

original: Subhv_0144-1 bahūni naraśīrṣāṇi lomaśāni bṛhanti ca /
analyzed: bahūni nara śīrṣāṇi lomaśāni bṛhanti ca
grīvāsu pratibaddhāni kiṃcid teṣu sa karṇakam
sādhvī iva bhāratī bhāti su ukti sat vrata cāriṇī
grāmya artha vastu saṃsparśa bahiraṅgāḥ mahā kaveḥ

original: Subhv_0146-1 te vandyāste mahātmānasteṣāṃ loke sthiraṃ yaśaḥ /
analyzed: te vandyāḥ te mahātmānaḥ teṣām loke sthiram yaśaḥ

original: Subhv_0146-2 yairnibaddhāni kāvyānī ye vā kāvyeṣu kīrtitāḥ //
analyzed: yaiḥ nibaddhāni kāvyānī ye vā kāvyeṣu kīrtitāḥ
prasannāḥ kānti hāriṇyaḥ nānā āśleṣa vicakṣaṇāḥ

original: Subhv_0147-2 bhavanti kasyacitpuṇyairmukhe vāco gṛhe striyaḥ //
analyzed: bhavanti kasyacid puṇyaiḥ mukhe vācaḥ gṛhe striyaḥ
kavīnām mahatām sūktaiḥ gūḍha artha antara sūcibhiḥ
vidhyamāna śruteḥ mā bhūhuḥ janasya katham vyathā

original: Subhv_0149-1 yāsyati sajjanahastaṃ ramayiṣyati taṃ bhavecca nirdoṣā /
analyzed: yāsyati sat jana hastam ramayiṣyati tam bhavet ca nirdoṣā
utpāditayā api kaviḥ tāmyati kathayā duhitrā iva
avasara paṭhitam sarvam subhāṣita tvam prayāt pasūktam api

original: Subhv_0150-2 kṣudhi kadaśanamapi nitarāṃ bhoktuḥ saṃpadyate svādu //
analyzed: kṣudhi kadaśanam api nitarām bhoktuḥ saṃpadyate svādu
durjana hutāśa taptam kāvya suvarṇam viśuddhim upayāti
darśayitavyam tasmāt matsari manasaḥ prayatnena

original: Subhv_0152-1 gaṇayanti nāpaśabdaṃ na vṛttabhaṅgaṃ kṣatiṃ na cārthasya /
analyzed: gaṇayanti na apaśabdam na vṛtta bhaṅgam kṣatim na ca arthasya
rasika tvena ākulitāḥ veśyā patayaḥ ku kavayaḥ ca

original: Subhv_0153-1 vipulahṛdayābhiyogye khidyati kāvye jaḍo na maurkhye sve /
analyzed: vipula hṛdaya abhiyogye khidyati kāvye jaḍaḥ na maurkhye sve

original: Subhv_0153-2 nindati kañcukameva prāyaḥ śuṣkastanā nārī //
analyzed: nindati kañcukam eva prāyas śuṣka stanā nārī

original: Subhv_0154-1 khyātiṃ gamayati sujanaḥ sukavirvidadhāti kevalaṃ kāvyam /
analyzed: khyātim gamayati su janaḥ su kaviḥ vidadhāti kevalam kāvyam

original: Subhv_0154-2 puṣṇāti kamalamambho lakṣmyā tu ravirniyojayati //
analyzed: puṣṇāti kamalam ambhaḥ lakṣmyā tu raviḥ niyojayati
vyākhyātum eva kecid kuśalāḥ śāstram prayoktum alam anye

original: Subhv_0155-2 upanāmayati karonnaṃ rasāṃstu jihbaiva jānāti //
analyzed: upanāmayati karonnam rasān tu jihbā eva jānāti

original: Subhv_0156-1 jivita iva kaṇṭhagate sūkte duḥkhāsikā kavestāvat /
analyzed: jivite iva kaṇṭha gate sūkte duḥkhāsikā kaveḥ tāvat
pratīyamānam punar anyat eva
vastu asti vāṇīṣu mahā kavīnām
yat tat prasiddha avayava atirikta
mā ābhāti lāvaṇyam iva aṅganāsu
kaveḥ abhiprāyam aśabda gocaram
sphurantam ārdreṣu padeṣu kevalam
vadadbhiḥ aṅgaiḥ kṛta roma vikriyaiḥ
janasya tūṣṇīṃbhavataḥ yam añjaliḥ
sahṛdayāḥ kavi gumphanikāsu ye
katipayāḥ te ime na viśṛṅkhalāḥ
rasa mayīṣu latāsu iva ṣaṭpadā
hṛdaya sāra juṣaḥ na mukha spṛśaḥ
khyātāḥ narādhipatayaḥ kavi saṃśrayeṇa

original: Subhv_0160-2 rājāśrayeṇa ca gatāḥ kavayaḥ prasiddhim /
analyzed: rāja āśrayeṇa ca gatāḥ kavayaḥ prasiddhim

original: Subhv_0160-3 rājñā samosti na kaveḥ paramopakārī
analyzed: rājñā samaḥ asti na kaveḥ parama upakārī

original: Subhv_0160-4 rājño na cāsti kavinā sadṛśaḥ sahāyaḥ //
analyzed: rājñaḥ na ca asti kavinā sadṛśaḥ sahāyaḥ
ānandi sarva rasa yuktam ati prasannam

original: Subhv_0161-3 kāvyaṃ khalasya na karoti hṛdi pratiṣṭhāṃ
analyzed: kāvyam khalasya na karoti hṛdi pratiṣṭhām
pīyūṣa pānam iva vaktra vivarti rāhoḥ
baddhā yat arpaṇa rasena vimarda pūrvam
arthān katham jhaṭiti tān prakṛtān na dadyuḥ
caurāḥ iva ati mṛdavaḥ mahatām kavīnām
artha antarāṇi api haṭhāt vitaranti śabdāḥ
tat kim kāvyam analpa pīta madhu vat kuryāt na yat hṛd gatam
mātsarya āvṛta cetasām rasa vaśāt api udgatim lomasu

original: Subhv_0163-3 kampaṃ mūrdhni kapolayugmamaruṇaṃ bāṣpāvile locane
analyzed: kampam mūrdhni kapola yugmam aruṇam bāṣpa āvile locane
adhyāropita vastu kīrtana param vācaḥ kara ālambanam
ye tāvat sva guṇa upabṛṃhita dhiyaḥ teṣām araṇyam jagat

original: Subhv_0164-2 yepyete kṛtamatsarāḥ paraguṇaṃ svapnepi necchanti te /
analyzed: ye pi ete kṛta matsarāḥ para guṇam svapne pi na icchanti te

original: Subhv_0164-3 anyeṣāmanurāgiṇāṃ kvacidapi snigdhaṃ mano nirvṛtā-
analyzed: anyeṣām anurāgiṇām kvacid api snigdham manaḥ nirvṛtā

original: Subhv_0164-4 vitthaṃ yāntu tapovanāni mahatāṃ sūktāni manyedhunā //
analyzed: vittham yāntu tapaḥ vanāni mahatām sūktāni manye adhunā
yā sādhūn iva sādhuvāda mukharān mātsarya mūkān api

original: Subhv_0165-2 proccairno kurute satāṃ matimatāṃ dṛṣṭirna sā vāstavī /
analyzed: proccais no kurute satām matimatām dṛṣṭiḥ na sā vāstavī

original: Subhv_0165-3 yā yātāḥ śrutigocaraṃ ca sahasā harṣollasatkaṃdharās-
analyzed: yāḥ yātāḥ śruti gocaram ca sahasā harṣa ullasat kaṃdharāḥ

original: Subhv_0165-4 tiryañcopi na muktaśaṣpakavalāstāḥ kiṃ kavīnāṃ giraḥ //
analyzed: tiryañcaḥ api na mukta śaṣpa kavalāḥ tāḥ kim kavīnām giraḥ

original: Subhv_0166-1 svecchābhaṅgurabhāgyameghataḍitaḥ śakyā na roddhuṃ śriyaḥ
analyzed: sva icchā bhaṅgura bhāgya megha taḍitaḥ śakyāḥ na roddhum śriyaḥ

original: Subhv_0166-2 prāṇānāṃ satataṃ prayāṇapaṭahaśraddhā na viśrāmyati /
analyzed: prāṇānām satatam prayāṇa paṭaha śraddhā na viśrāmyati

original: Subhv_0166-3 trāṇaṃ yetra yaśomaye vapuṣi vaḥ kurvanti kāvyāmṛtais-
analyzed: trāṇam yetra yaśaḥ maye vapuṣi vaḥ kurvanti kāvya amṛtaiḥ
tān ārādhya pade vidhatta su kavīn nirgarvam urvī īśvarāḥ
he rājānaḥ tyajata su kavi prema bandhe virodham

original: Subhv_0167-2 śuddhā kīrtiḥ sphurati bhavatāṃ nūnametatprasādāt /
analyzed: śuddhā kīrtiḥ sphurati bhavatām nūnam etad prasādāt
tuṣṭaiḥ baddham tat alaghu raghu svāminaḥ sat caritram
ruṣṭaiḥ nītaḥ tribhuvana jayī hāsya mārgam daśa āsyaḥ
namaḥ namaḥ kāvya rasāya tasmai
niṣiktam antar pṛṣata api yasya
suvarṇa tām vaktram upaiti sādhoḥ
durvarṇa tām yāti ca durjanasya
ye kāvya mārge dadhata abhimānam
te gāruḍīyān an adhītya mantrān
hālāhala āsvādanam ārabhante
sarasvatī mātuḥ abhūt ciram na yaḥ
katham sa sarva aṅgam anāpta sauṣṭhavaḥ
dināt dinam prauḍhi viśeṣam aśnute
vitīrṇa śikṣāḥ iva hṛd pada stha
sarasvatī vāhana rājahaṃsaiḥ
ye kṣīra nīra pravibhāga dakṣā
vivekinaḥ te kavayaḥ jayanti
prāpyam bhavet no sumona janasya

original: Subhv_0172-4 aikṣṇyaprakarṣaṃ yadi nāma na syāt //
analyzed: aikṣṇya prakarṣam yadi nāma na syāt
vinā na sāhitya vidā aparatra
guṇaḥ kathaṃcid prathate kavīnām
ālambate tad kṣaṇam ambhasi iva
vistāram anyatra na taila binduḥ
atyartha vakra tvam anarthakam yā
śūnyā tu sarva anya guṇaiḥ vyanakti
a spṛśya tā dūṣitayā tayā kim
vācā
nīca stanotu aśru nitānta kārṣṇyam
puṣṇātu sādharmya bhṛt añjanena

original: Subhv_0175-3 vinā tu jāyeta kathaṃ tadīya-
analyzed: vinā tu jāyeta katham
arthaḥ usti ced na pada śuddhiḥ atha asti sā api

original: Subhv_0176-2 no rītirasti yadi sā ghaṭanā kutastyā /
analyzed: no rītiḥ asti yadi sā ghaṭanā kutastyā
sā api asti ced na nava vakra gatiḥ tat etat

original: Subhv_0176-4 vyarthaṃ vinā rasamaho gahanaṃ kavitvam //
analyzed: vyartham vinā rasam aho gahanam kavi tvam
ślāghyā eva vakrima gatiḥ ghana dārḍhya bandhoḥ
tasyāḥ kavi pravara sūkti dhanuḥ latāyāḥ
karṇa antika praṇaya bhāji guṇe yadīye
cetāṃsi matsaravatām jhaṭiti truṭanti

original: Subhv_0178-1 yātāste rasasārasaṃgrahavidhiṃ niṣpīḍya niṣpīḍya ye
analyzed: yātāḥ te rasa sāra saṃgraha vidhim niṣpīḍya niṣpīḍya ye
vāc tatva ikṣu latām purā katipaye tattva spṛśaḥ cakrire

original: Subhv_0178-3 jāyantedya yathāyathaṃ tu kavayaste tatra saṃtanvate
analyzed: jāyanta idya yathāyatham tu kavayaḥ te tatra saṃtanvate
ya enu prāsa ka ṭhora citra yamaka śleṣa ādi śalka uccayam
para ślokān stokān anudivasam abhyasya nanu ye

original: Subhv_0179-2 catuṣpādīṃ kuryurbahava iha te santi kavayaḥ /
analyzed: catuṣpādīm kuryuḥ bahavaḥ iha te santi kavayaḥ

original: Subhv_0179-4 suhṛdyā vaiśadyaṃ dadhati kila keṣāmcana giraḥ //
analyzed: suhṛdyāḥ vaiśadyam dadhati kila keṣām cana giraḥ

original: Subhv_0180-1 hemno bhāraśatāni vā madamucāṃ vṛndāni vā dantināṃ
analyzed: hemnaḥ bhāra śatāni vā mada mucām vṛndāni vā dantinām

original: Subhv_0180-2 śrīharṣeṇa samarpitāni guṇine bāṇāya kutrādya tat /
analyzed: śrī harṣeṇa samarpitāni guṇine bāṇāya kutra adya tat

original: Subhv_0180-3 yā bāṇena tu tasya sūktivisarairuṭṭaṅkitāḥ kīrtayas-
analyzed: yāḥ bāṇena tu tasya su ukti visaraiḥ uṭṭaṅkitāḥ kīrtayaḥ

original: Subhv_0180-4 tāḥ kalpapralayepi yānti na manāṅmanye parimlānatām //
analyzed: tāḥ kalpa pralaye pi yānti na manāk manye parimlāna tām
dhanyāḥ śūcīni surabhīṇi
vāc vīrudhaḥ sva vadana upavana udgatāyāḥ
uccitya su ukti kusumāni
varṇāni karṇa pulineṣu avataṃsayanti
tenanta vāc maya mahā arṇava dṛṣṭa pārāḥ
sāṃyātrikāḥ iva mahā kavayaḥ jayanti
yat su ukti pelava lavaṅga lavaiḥ vaimi
santaḥ sadaḥ su vadanāni adhivāsayanti
ekaḥ cakāsti kavitā savitā dvitīyaḥ
śaṃsanti yasya mahima atiśayam śirobhiḥ
pāda graham vidadhataḥ pṛthivībhṛtaḥ api

original: Subhv_0184-1 śabdārthamātramapi ye na vidanti tepi
analyzed: śabda artha mātram api ye na vidanti te api

original: Subhv_0184-2 yāṃ mūrchanāmiva mṛgāḥ śravaṇaiḥ pibantaḥ /
analyzed: yām mūrchanām iva mṛgāḥ śravaṇaiḥ pibantaḥ
saṃruddha sarva karaṇa prasarāḥ bhavanti
citra sthitāḥ iva kavi indra giram numaḥ tām

original: Subhv_0185-1 asthāne gamitā layaṃ hatadhiyāṃ vāgdevatā kalpate
analyzed: asthāne gamitā layam hata dhiyām vāgdevatā kalpate

original: Subhv_0185-2 dhikkārāya parābhavāya mahate tāpāya pāpāya vā /
analyzed: dhikkārāya parābhavāya mahate tāpāya pāpāya vā

original: Subhv_0185-3 sthāne tu vyayitā satāṃ prabhavati prakhyātaye bhūtaye
analyzed: sthāne tu vyayitā satām prabhavati prakhyātaye bhūtaye
cetaḥ nirvṛtaye para upakṛtaye prānte śiva avāptaye
valmīka prabhaveṇa rāma nṛpatiḥ vyāsena

original: Subhv_0186-2 vyākhyātaḥ kila kālidāsakavinā śrīvikramāṅko nṛpaḥ /
analyzed: vyākhyātaḥ kila kālidāsa kavinā śrī vikramāṅkaḥ nṛpaḥ
bhojaścittapa bihlaṇa prabhṛtibhiḥ karṇaḥ api vidyāpateḥ

original: Subhv_0186-4 khyātiṃ yānti nireśvarāḥ kavivaraiḥ sphārairna bherīravaiḥ //
analyzed: khyātim yānti nireśvarāḥ kavi varaiḥ sphāraiḥ na bherī ravaiḥ
bhuja taru vana chāyām niṣevya mahā ojasām
jaladhi raśanā medinī āsīt asau akutobhayā

original: Subhv_0187-3 smṛtimapi na te yānti kṣmāpā vinā yadanugrahaṃ
analyzed: smṛtim api na te yānti kṣmāpāḥ vinā yad anugraham
prakṛti mahate kurmaḥ tasmai namaḥ kavi karmaṇe
ye pi āsannibha kumbha śāyita padāḥ ye pi śriyam lebhire
yeṣām api avasan purā yuvatayaḥ geheṣu ahar candrikāḥ
tān lokaḥ yam avaiti loka tilakān svapne pi ajātān iva

original: Subhv_0188-4 bhrātaḥ satkavikṛtya kiṃ stutiśatairandhaṃ jagattvāṃ vinā //
analyzed: bhrātar sat kavi kṛtya kim stuti śataiḥ andham jagat tvām vinā
sphāreṇa saurabha bhareṇa
tat ha anasāram api sāram asāram eva
sraj saumanasī api na puṣyati saumanasyam
prasyandate yadi madhu drava mukti devī
prayacchati camatkṛtim viracanā vidhau cetasaḥ
sabhāsu paṭhitaḥ bhavati asama sādhuvāda āptaye
prathām upagataḥ tanoti atitarām udāram yaśaḥ

original: Subhv_0190-4 na puṣyati manorathaṃ kamiva kāvyacintāmaṇiḥ //
analyzed: na puṣyati manoratham kam iva kāvya cintāmaṇiḥ
yaḥ sat pada stham iva kāvya madhu prasannam
muṣṇan parasya tanute nija padma madhye
asthāna doṣa janitā iva pipīla kālī
kālī vibhāti likhita akṣara paṅktiḥ asya
yaḥ syāt kevala lakṣya lakṣaṇa rataḥ no tarka saṃparka bhṛt
tasmāt ced rasa śāli kāvyam udayet ekāntataḥ sundaram

original: Subhv_0192-4 prāsādo dhavalastadā kṣitipateḥ kākasya kārṣṇyādbhavet //
analyzed: prāsādaḥ dhavalaḥ tadā kṣitipateḥ kākasya kārṣṇyāt bhavet
sva prajñayā kuñcikayā iva kaṃcid
sārasvatam vakrima bhaṅgi bhājam
kavi īśvaraḥ kopi padārtha kośa
viśva ābharaṇam karoti
daivīḥ giraḥ ke api kṛtā arthayanti
tāḥ kuṇṭhayanti eva punar vimūḍhāḥ
yāḥ vipruṣaḥ śukti mukheṣu daivyaḥ

original: Subhv_0194-4 tā eva muktā na tu cātakeṣu //
analyzed: tāḥ eva muktāḥ na tu cātakeṣu
pariśrama jñam janam antareṇa
mauna vratam bibhrati vāgminaḥ api
vācaṃyamāḥ santi vinā vasantaḥ
puṃskokilāḥ pañcama cañcavaḥ pi
vyālāḥ ca rāhuḥ ca sudhā prasādāt
jihvā śiraḥ nigraham ugram āpuḥ
iti iva bhītāḥ piśunāḥ bhavanti
parāṅmukhāḥ kāvya rasa amṛteṣu

original: Subhv_0197-1 sākūtaṃ nijasaṃvidekaviṣayaṃ tattvaṃ sacetā bruvan-
analyzed: sa ākūtam nija saṃvid eka viṣayam tattvam sa cetāḥ bruvan
nagre nūnam abodha mohita dhiyām hāsya tvam āyāsyati

original: Subhv_0197-3 tadyuktaṃ viduṣo janasya jaḍavajjoṣaṃ nu nāmāsituṃ
analyzed: tat yuktam viduṣaḥ janasya jaḍa vat joṣam nu nāma āsitum
jāti andham pratirūpa varṇana vidhau kaḥ yam vṛthā evā udyamaḥ
jayanti jita matsarāḥ para hita artham abhyudyatāḥ
para abhyudaya su sthitāḥ para vipatti kheda ākulāḥ
mahāpuruṣa sat kathā śravaṇa jāta kautūhalāḥ
samasta durita arṇava prakaṭa setavaḥ sādhavaḥ
para parivāde mūkaḥ para nārī darśane pi jātyandhaḥ

original: Subhv_0199-2 paṅguḥ paradhanaharaṇe sa jayati loke mahāpuruṣaḥ //
analyzed: paṅguḥ para dhana haraṇe sa jayati loke mahā puruṣaḥ
saṃpatsu mahatām cetaḥ bhavati utpala komalam
āpatsu ca mahā śaila śilā saṃghāta karkaśam
kusuma stabakasya iva dvayī mṛttiḥ manasvinaḥ

original: Subhv_0201-2 mūrdhni vā sarvalokasya śīryate vana eva vā //
analyzed: mūrdhni vā sarva lokasya śīryate vane eva vā
upakāreṇa dūyante na
āpatsu api durārādhyāḥ nitya duḥkhāḥ manasvinaḥ
jala sekena vardhante taravaḥ na aśma saṃcayāḥ

original: Subhv_0203-2 bhavyo hi dravyatāmeti kriyāṃ prāpya tathāvidhām //
analyzed: bhavyaḥ hi dravya tām eti kriyām prāpya tathāvidhām
avṛtti bhayam antyānām madhyānām maraṇāt bhayam
uttamānām tu sattvānām avamānāt param bhayam

original: Subhv_0205-1 tāpaṃ hanti sukhaṃ sūte jīvayatyujjvalaṃ yaśaḥ /
analyzed: tāpam hanti sukham sūte jīvayati ujjvalam yaśaḥ
amṛtasya prakāraḥ yam durlabhaḥ sādhu saṃgamaḥ
na ānandayati kam nāma sādhu saṃgati candrikā
sādhu saṅga taroḥ jātam viveka kusumam śubham

original: Subhv_0207-2 rakṣanti ye mahātmāno bhājanaṃ te phalaśriyaḥ //
analyzed: rakṣanti ye mahātmānaḥ bhājanam te phala śriyaḥ
śūnyam ākīrṇa tām eti mṛtyuḥ api utsavāyate
āpad saṃpad iva ābhāti vidvas jana samāgame
himam āpad sarojinyāḥ moha nīhāra mārutaḥ
jayati ekaḥ jagati asmin sādhuḥ sādhu samāgamaḥ
param vivardhanam buddheḥ ajñāna taru śātanam
samutsāraṇam ādhīnām viddhi sādhu samāgamam
yaḥ snātaḥ śīta sitayā sādhu saṃgati gaṅgayā

original: Subhv_0211-2 kiṃ tasya dānaiḥ kiṃ tīrthaiḥ kiṃ tapobhiḥ kimadhvaraiḥ //
analyzed: kim tasya dānaiḥ kim tīrthaiḥ kim tapobhiḥ kim adhvaraiḥ

original: Subhv_0212-1 hṛdayāni satāmeva kaṭhinānīti me matiḥ /
analyzed: hṛdayāni satām eva kaṭhināni iti me matiḥ
khala vāc viśikhaiḥ tīkṣṇaiḥ bhidyante na manāgyatas
āḥ kimartham idam cetaḥ satām ambhodhi durbharam
iti krudhā iva durvedhāḥ para duḥkhaiḥ apūrayat

original: Subhv_0214-1 kāco maṇirmaṇiḥ kāco yeṣāṃ tenye hi dehinaḥ /
analyzed: kācaḥ maṇiḥ maṇiḥ kācaḥ yeṣām tena ye hi dehinaḥ

original: Subhv_0214-2 santi te sudhiyo yeṣāṃ kācaḥ kāco maṇirmaṇiḥ //
analyzed: santi te sudhiyaḥ yeṣām kācaḥ kācaḥ maṇiḥ maṇiḥ
doṣān api guṇīkartum doṣīkartum guṇān api

original: Subhv_0215-2 śakto vādī na tattathyaṃ doṣā guṇā guṇāḥ //
analyzed: śaktaḥ vādī na tat tathyam doṣāḥ guṇāḥ guṇāḥ
guṇa rāśi mahā bhāra nirbhara āpūrita antarāḥ

original: Subhv_0216-2 santo gauravamāyānti yadi tatra kimadbhutam //
analyzed: santaḥ gauravam āyānti yadi tatra kim adbhutam

original: Subhv_0217-1 svātmanyeva layaṃ yātu tādṛśo guṇināṃ guṇaḥ /
analyzed: sva ātmani eva layam yātu tādṛśaḥ guṇinām guṇaḥ

original: Subhv_0217-2 svayaṃ prakhyāpyamānopi yastṛṇāya na manyate //
analyzed: svayam prakhyāpyamānaḥ upi yaḥ tṛṇāya na manyate
guṇavat jana saṃparkāt yāti su alpaḥ api gauravam
puṣpa mālā anuṣaṅgeṇa tṛṇam śirasi dhāryate
su vṛttasya eka rūpasya para prītyai dhṛta unnateḥ

original: Subhv_0219-2 sādhoḥ stanayugasyeva patanaṃ kasya tuṣṭaye //
analyzed: sādhoḥ stana yugasya iva patanam kasya tuṣṭaye

original: Subhv_0220-1 udeti savitā rakto rakta evāstameti ca /
analyzed: udeti savitā raktaḥ raktaḥ eva astam eti ca

original: Subhv_0220-2 saṃpatau ca vipatau ca mahatāmekarūpatā //
analyzed: saṃpatau ca vipatau ca mahatām eka rūpa tā
pātena kandukaḥ iva utpatati āryaḥ patan api

original: Subhv_0221-2 tathā tvanāryaḥ patati mṛtpiṇḍapatanaṃ yathā //
analyzed: tathā tu anāryaḥ patati mṛd piṇḍa patanam yathā
pātitaḥ api kara āghātaiḥ utpatati eva kandukaḥ
prāyeṇa hi su vṛttānām asthāyinyaḥ vipattayaḥ

original: Subhv_0223-1 ghyutopyudgacchati punaḥ prajñāvānna tu mūḍhadhīḥ /
analyzed: punar prajñāvān na tu mūḍha dhīḥ

original: Subhv_0223-2 kandukaḥ patanotthāyī na tu kāntākucadvayī //
analyzed: kandukaḥ patana utthāyī na tu kāntā kuca dvayī

original: Subhv_0224-1 apekṣante na ca snehaṃ na pātraṃ na daśāntaram /
analyzed: apekṣante na ca sneham na pātram na daśā antaram

original: Subhv_0224-2 sadā lokahite yuktā ratnadīpā ivottamāḥ //
analyzed: sadā loka hite yuktāḥ ratna dīpāḥ iva uttamāḥ

original: Subhv_0225-1 nirguṇeṣvapi sattveṣu dayāṃ kurvanti sādhavaḥ /
analyzed: nirguṇeṣu api sattveṣu dayām kurvanti sādhavaḥ
nahi saṃharate jyotsnām candraḥ caṇḍāla veśmani

original: Subhv_0226-1 nālokaḥ kriyate sūrye bhūḥ pratīpaṃ na dhāryate /
analyzed: na ālokaḥ kriyate sūrye bhūḥ pratīpam na dhāryate
nahi pratyupakārāṇām apekṣā satsu vidyate

original: Subhv_0227-1 apakurvannapi prāyaḥ prāpnoti mahataḥ śubham /
analyzed: apakurvan api prāyas prāpnoti mahataḥ śubham

original: Subhv_0227-2 dahantamapyaurvamagniṃ saṃtarapayati vāridhiḥ // Qsv0227-3 kasyāpi
analyzed: dahantam api aurvam agnim saṃtarapayati vāridhiḥ    kasya api

original: Subhv_0227-4 satpakṣā ṛjavaḥ śuddhāḥ saphalā guṇasevinaḥ dṛṣṭvāpi dṛśyate dṛśyaṃ śrutvāpi śrūyate punaḥ /
analyzed: sat pakṣāḥ ṛjavaḥ śuddhāḥ sa phalāḥ guṇa sevinaḥ dṛṣṭvā api dṛśyate dṛśyam śrutvā api śrūyate punar

original: Subhv_0227-5 satyaṃ na sādhuvṛttasya dṛśyate punaruktatā //
analyzed: satyam na sādhu vṛttasya dṛśyate punarukta tā

original: Subhv_0229-1 satpakṣā ṛjavaḥ śuddhāḥ saphalā guṇasevinaḥ /
analyzed: sat pakṣāḥ ṛjavaḥ śuddhāḥ sa phalāḥ guṇa sevinaḥ

original: Subhv_0229-2 tulyairapi guṇaiścitraṃ santaḥ santaḥ śarāḥ śarāḥ //
analyzed: tulyaiḥ api guṇaiḥ citram santaḥ santaḥ śarāḥ śarāḥ
lābha praṇayinaḥ nīcāḥ māna kāmāḥ manasvinaḥ

original: Subhv_0230-2 madguḥ sarasi matsyārthī haṃsasyeṣṭā prasannatā //
analyzed: madguḥ sarasi matsya arthī haṃsasya iṣṭā prasanna tā
para duḥkham samākarṇya svabhāva saralaḥ janaḥ
upakāra asamartha tvāt prāpnoti hṛdaye vyathām

original: Subhv_0232-1 te vandyāste kṛtinaḥ ślāghyā teṣāṃ hi janmanotpattiḥ /
analyzed: te vandyāḥ te kṛtinaḥ ślāghyā teṣām hi janmanā utpattiḥ
yaiḥ ujjhita ātma kāryaiḥ suhṛdām arthāḥ hi sādhyante
a śaṭham a lolam a jihmam tyāginam anurāgiṇam viśeṣa jñam

original: Subhv_0233-2 yadi nāśrayati naraṃ śrīḥ śrīreva hi vañcitā tatra //
analyzed: yadi nā āśrayati naram śrīḥ śrīḥ eva hi vañcitā tatra

original: Subhv_0234-1 ārogyaṃ vidvattā sajjanamaittrī mahākule janma /
analyzed: ārogyam vidvat tā sat jana maittrī mahā kule janma

original: Subhv_0234-2 svādhīnatā ca puṃsāṃ mahadaiśvaryaṃ vināpyarthaiḥ //
analyzed: svādhīna tā ca puṃsām mahat aiśvaryam vinā api arthaiḥ

original: Subhv_0235-1 svalpāpi sādhusaṃpadbhogyā mahatāṃ na pṛthvyapi khalaśrīḥ /
analyzed: su alpā api sādhu saṃpad bhogyā mahatām na pṛthvī api khala śrīḥ
sārasam eva payaḥ tṛṣam apaharati na vāridheḥ jātu

original: Subhv_0236-1 na bhavati bhavati ca na ciraṃ bhavati ciraṃ celphalo visaṃvadati /
analyzed: na bhavati bhavati ca na ciram bhavati ciram ced phalaḥ visaṃvadati

original: Subhv_0236-2 manyuḥ satpuruṣāṇāṃ tulyaḥ snehena nīcānām //
analyzed: manyuḥ sat puruṣāṇām tulyaḥ snehena nīcānām

original: Subhv_0237-1 doṣo guṇāya guṇināṃ mahadapi doṣāya doṣiṇāṃ sukṛtam /
analyzed: doṣaḥ guṇāya guṇinām mahat api doṣāya doṣiṇām sukṛtam

original: Subhv_0237-2 tṛṇamiva dugdhāya gavāṃ dugdhamiva viṣāya sarpāṇām //
analyzed: tṛṇam iva dugdhāya gavām dugdham iva viṣāya sarpāṇām

original: Subhv_0238-1 viṣamagatā api na budhāḥ paribhavamiśrāṃ śriyaṃ hi vāñchanti /
analyzed: viṣama gatāḥ api na budhāḥ paribhava miśrām śriyam hi vāñchanti

original: Subhv_0238-2 na pibanti bhaumamambhaḥ sarajasamiti cātakā ete //
analyzed: na pibanti bhaumam ambhaḥ sarajasam iti cātakāḥ ete

original: Subhv_0239-1 yogyatayaiva vināśaṃ prāyonāryeṣu yānti guṇavantaḥ /
analyzed: yogya tayā eva vināśam prāyas nāryeṣu yānti guṇavantaḥ

original: Subhv_0239-2 sphuṭavacanā eva śukāḥ pañjarabandhaṃ niṣevante //
analyzed: sphuṭa vacanāḥ eva śukāḥ pañjara bandham niṣevante

original: Subhv_0240-1 sakṛdapi dṛṣṭvā puruṣaṃ prājñāstulayanti sāraphalgutvam /
analyzed: sakṛt api dṛṣṭvā puruṣam prājñāḥ tulayanti sāra phalgu tvam
hasta tulayā api nipuṇāḥ pala parimāṇam vijānanti

original: Subhv_0241-1 sujano na yāti vairaṃ parahitanirato vināśakālepi /
analyzed: su janaḥ na yāti vairam para hita nirataḥ vināśa kāle pi

original: Subhv_0241-2 chedepi candanataruḥ surabhayati mukhaṃ kuṭhārasya //
analyzed: chede api candana taruḥ surabhayati mukham kuṭhārasya

original: Subhv_0242-1 nirguṇamapyanuraktaṃ prāyo na samāśritaṃ jahati santaḥ /
analyzed: nirguṇam api anuraktam prāyas na samāśritam jahati santaḥ
saha vṛddhi kṣaya bhājam vahati śaśāṅkaḥ kalaṅkam api

original: Subhv_0243-1 antyāvasthopi budhaḥ svaguṇaṃ na jahāti jātiśuddhatayā /
analyzed: antya avasthaḥ api budhaḥ sva guṇam na jahāti jāti śuddha tayā
na śveta bhāvam ujjhati śaṅkhaḥ śikhi bhukta muktaḥ api

original: Subhv_0244-1 doṣamapi guṇavati jane dṛṣṭvā guṇarāgiṇo na khidyante /
analyzed: doṣam api guṇavati jane dṛṣṭvā guṇa rāgiṇaḥ na khidyante

original: Subhv_0244-2 prītyaiva śaśini patitaṃ paśyati lokaḥ kalaṅkamapi //
analyzed: prītyā eva śaśini patitam paśyati lokaḥ kalaṅkam api
sāptapadīnam sakhyam bhavet prakṛtyāḥ viśuddha cittānām
kim uta anyonya guṇa kathā visrambha nibaddha bhāvānām

original: Subhv_0246-1 spṛhaṇīyāḥ kasya na te sumateḥ saralāśayā mahātmānaḥ /
analyzed: spṛhaṇīyāḥ kasya na te sumateḥ sarala āśayāḥ mahātmānaḥ

original: Subhv_0246-2 trayamapi yeṣāṃ sadṛśaṃ hṛdayaṃ vacanaṃ tathācāraḥ //
analyzed: trayam api yeṣām sadṛśam hṛdayam vacanam tathā ācāraḥ

original: Subhv_0247-1 guṇinaḥ samīpavartī pūjyo lokasya guṇavihīnopi /
analyzed: guṇinaḥ samīpa vartī pūjyaḥ lokasya guṇa vihīnaḥ api
vimala īkṣaṇa prasaṅkāt añjanam āpnoti kāṇākṣi

original: Subhv_0248-1 sahasiddhamidaṃ mahatāṃ dhaneṣvanāsthā guṇeṣu kṛpaṇatvam /
analyzed: saha siddham idam mahatām dhaneṣu anāsthā guṇeṣu kṛpaṇa tvam

original: Subhv_0248-2 paraduḥkhe kātaratā mahacca dhairyaṃ svaduḥkheṣu //
analyzed: para duḥkhe kātara tā mahat ca dhairyam sva duḥkheṣu

original: Subhv_0249-1 atikupitā api sujanā yogena mṛdūbhavanti na tu nīcāḥ /
analyzed: ati kupitāḥ api su janāḥ yogena mṛdūbhavanti na tu nīcāḥ

original: Subhv_0249-2 hemnaḥ kaṭhinasyāpi dravaṇopāyosti na tṛṇānām //
analyzed: hemnaḥ kaṭhinasya api dravaṇa upāyaḥ asti na tṛṇānām

original: Subhv_0250-1 upakṛtisāhasikatayā kṣatimapi gaṇayanti no guṇinaḥ /
analyzed: upakṛti sāhasika tayā kṣatim api gaṇayanti no guṇinaḥ

original: Subhv_0250-2 janayanti hi prakāśaṃ dīpaśikhāḥ svāṅgadāhena //
analyzed: janayanti hi prakāśam dīpa śikhāḥ sva aṅga dāhena
rakta tvam kamalānām sat puruṣāṇām para upakāri tvam

original: Subhv_0251-2 asatāṃ ca nirdayatvaṃ svabhāvasiddhaṃ triṣu tritayam //
analyzed: asatām ca nirdaya tvam svabhāva siddham triṣu tritayam
upakartum aprakāśam kṣantum nyūneṣu a yācitam dātum

original: Subhv_0252-2 abhisaṃdhātuṃ ca guṇaiḥ śateṣu kecidvijānanti //
analyzed: abhisaṃdhātum ca guṇaiḥ śateṣu kecid vijānanti

original: Subhv_0253-1 guṇini guṇajño ramate nāguṇaśīlasya guṇini paritoṣaḥ /
analyzed: guṇini guṇa jñaḥ ramate na a guṇa śīlasya guṇini paritoṣaḥ
aliḥ eti vanāt kamalam na darduraḥ tāt nivāsaḥ api

original: Subhv_0254-1 ādau tu mandamandāni madhye samarasāni ca /
analyzed: ādau tu manda mandāni madhye samarasāni ca

original: Subhv_0254-2 ante snehāyamānāni saṃgatāni budhaiḥ saha //
analyzed: ante snehāyamānāni saṃgatāni budhaiḥ saha
iyam unnata sattva śālinām
mahatām kā api kaṭhora citta tā
upakṛtya bhavanti dūratas
paratas pratyupakāra śaṅkayā
upakāriṇi vīta matsare vā
sa daya tvam yadi tatra kā ūtiḥ ekaḥ
ahite sahasā aparāddha labdhe

original: Subhv_0256-4 saghṛṇaṃ yasya manaḥ satāṃ sa dhuryaḥ //
analyzed: sa ghṛṇam yasya manaḥ satām sa dhuryaḥ
ādi madhya nidhaneṣu sauhṛdam
sat jane bhavati na itare jane
cheda tāḍana nigharṣa tāpanaiḥ
na anya bhāvam upayāti kāñcanam
dīpāḥ sthitam vastu vibhāvayanti
kula pradīpāḥ tu bhavanti kecid
cira vyatītān api pūrvajān ye
prakāśayanti sva guṇa prakarṣāt
tuṅga ātmanāḥ tuṅgatarāḥ samarthā
manaḥ rujam dhvaṃsayitum na nīcāḥ
dhārādharāḥ eva dharādharāṇām
nidāgha dāva ogha harāḥ na nadyaḥ
guṇāḥ guṇa jñeṣu guṇībhavanti

original: Subhv_0260-2 te nirguṇaṃ prāpya bhavanti doṣāḥ /
analyzed: te nirguṇam prāpya bhavanti doṣāḥ
su svādu toya prabhavāḥ hi nadyaḥ
samudram āsādya bhavanti apeyāḥ
tṛṇāni na unmūlayati prabhañjano
mṛdūni nīcaiḥ praṇatāni sarvaśas
samucchritān eva tarūn prabādhate
mahān mahatsu eva karoti vikriyām
cirāya sat saṃgama śuddha mānasaḥ
na yāti asat saṃgatam ātmavān naraḥ
manohara indīvara khaṇḍa gocaraḥ

original: Subhv_0262-4 na jātu bhṛṅgaḥ kuṇape nilīyate //
analyzed: na jātu bhṛṅgaḥ kuṇape nilīyate

original: Subhv_0263-1 api vibhavavihīnaḥ pracyuto vā svadeśān-
analyzed: api vibhava vihīnaḥ pracyutaḥ vā sva deśān
nahi khala jana sevām prārthayati unnata ātmā

original: Subhv_0263-3 tanu tṛṇamupabhuṅkte na kṣudhārtopi siṃhaḥ
analyzed: tanu tṛṇam upabhuṅkte na kṣudhā ārtaḥ api siṃhaḥ
pibati rudhiram uṣṇam prāyaśas kuñjarāṇām

original: Subhv_0264-1 vitte tyāgaḥ kṣamā śaktau duḥkhe dainyavihīnatā /
analyzed: vitte tyāgaḥ kṣamā śaktau duḥkhe dainya vihīna tā
nirdambha tā sat ācāre svabhāvaḥ yam mahātmanām
sukha lava daśā harṣa klaivye khalaḥ khalu khelate
skhalati bhajate leśa kleśe viṣāda viṣūcikām

original: Subhv_0265-3 bhavati na satāṃ darpoddāmā na dainyamayī matir-
analyzed: bhavati na satām darpa uddāmā na dainya mayī matiḥ
durabhibhava tā gambhīrāṇām sukheṣu asukheṣu ca

original: Subhv_0266-1 svāmye peśalatā guṇe praṇayitā harṣe nirutsekatā
analyzed: svāmye peśala tā guṇe praṇayi tā harṣe nirutseka tā

original: Subhv_0266-2 mantre saṃvṛtatā śrute sumatitā vittodaye tyāgitā /
analyzed: mantre saṃvṛta tā śrute sumati tā vitta udaye tyāgi tā

original: Subhv_0266-3 sādhau sādaratā khale vimukhatā pāpe paraṃ bhīrutā
analyzed: sādhau sādara tā khale vimukha tā pāpe param bhīru tā

original: Subhv_0266-4 duḥkhe kleśasahiṣṇutā ca mahatāṃ kalyāṇamākāṅkṣati //
analyzed: duḥkhe kleśa sahiṣṇu tā ca mahatām kalyāṇam ākāṅkṣati
dhairyam atha abhyudaye kṣamā
sadasi vāc paṭu tā yudhi vikramaḥ
yaśasi ca abhiratiḥ vyasanam śrute
prakṛti siddham idam hi mahātmanām
idam hi māhātmya viśeṣa sūcakam
vadanti cihnam mahatām manīṣiṇaḥ
manaḥ yat eṣām sukha duḥkha saṃbhave
prayāti naḥ harṣa viṣāda vaśya tām
su bhāṣitaiḥ prītiḥ anunnatiḥ śriyā
guṇeṣu atṛptiḥ guṇavatsu ca ādaraḥ
nigūḍham etat caritam mahātmanām
satyam guṇāḥ guṇavatām vidhi vaiparītyāt

original: Subhv_0270-2 yatnārjitā api kalau viphalā bhavanti /
analyzed: yatna arjitāḥ api kalau viphalāḥ bhavanti
sāphalyam asti sutarām idam eva teṣām
yat tāpayanti hṛdayāni punar khalānām
yat vañcana āhita matiḥ bahu cāṭu garbham
kārya unmukhaḥ khala janaḥ kṛtakam bravīti

original: Subhv_0271-3 tatsādhavo na na vidanti vidanti kiṃ tu
analyzed: tat sādhavaḥ na na vidanti vidanti kim tu

original: Subhv_0271-4 kartuṃ vṛthā praṇayamasya na pārayanti //
analyzed: kartum vṛthā praṇayam asya na pārayanti
pāpam samācarati vīta ghṛṇaḥ jaghanyaḥ

original: Subhv_0272-2 prāpyāpadaṃ saghṛṇa eva tu madhyabuddhiḥ /
analyzed: prāpya āpadam sa ghṛṇaḥ eva tu madhya buddhiḥ

original: Subhv_0272-3 prāṇātyayepi na tu sādhujanaḥ suvṛttaṃ
analyzed: prāṇa atyaye pi na tu sādhu janaḥ su vṛttam

original: Subhv_0272-4 velāṃ samudra iva laṅghayituṃ samarthaḥ //
analyzed: velām samudraḥ iva laṅghayitum samarthaḥ

original: Subhv_0273-1 śuddhiḥ sa eva kulajaśca sa eva dhīraḥ
analyzed: śuddhiḥ saḥ eva kula jaḥ ca saḥ eva dhīraḥ

original: Subhv_0273-2 ślāghyo vipatsvapi na muñcati yaḥ svabhāvam /
analyzed: ślāghyaḥ vipatsu api na muñcati yaḥ svabhāvam
taptam yathā dinakarasya marīci jālaiḥ

original: Subhv_0273-4 dehaṃ tyajedapi himaṃ na tu śītalatvam //
analyzed: deham tyajet api himam na tu śītala tvam
yām ca āpadam maraṇa duḥkham iva anubhāvya
dattena kim khalu bhavati ati bhūyasā api
kalpadrumān parihasantaḥ iva iha santaḥ
saṃkalpitaiḥ atidadati a kadarthitam yat
te sādhavaḥ bhuvana maṇḍala mauli bhūtā
ye sādhu tām nirupakāriṣu darśayanti
ātma prayojana vaśīkṛta khinna dehaḥ
pūrva upakāriṣu khalaḥ upi hi sa anukampaḥ
na antar vicintayati kiṃcid api pratīpam
a kopitaḥ api su janaḥ piśunena pāpam
arka dviṣaḥ api hi mukhe patita agra bhāgāḥ
tārāpateḥ amṛtam eva karāḥ kiranti
ākopitaḥ api kula jaḥ na vadati avācyam
niṣpīḍitaḥ madhuram eva vamet kila ikṣuḥ
nīcaḥ janaḥ guṇa śataiḥ api sevyamānaḥ
hāseṣu tat vat ati yat kalaheṣu vācyam
nidantu nīti nipuṇāḥ athavā stuvantu

original: Subhv_0278-2 lakṣmīḥ parāpatatu gacchatu vā yatheccham /
analyzed: lakṣmīḥ parāpatatu gacchatu vā yatheccham

original: Subhv_0278-3 adyaiva vā maraṇamastu yugāntare vā
analyzed: adyā eva vā maraṇam astu yuga antare vā

original: Subhv_0278-4 nyāyyātpathaḥ pracalayanti padaṃ na dhīrāḥ //
analyzed: nyāyyāt pathaḥ pracalayanti padam na dhīrāḥ
hetoḥ kutopi a sadṛśāḥ su janāḥ garīyaḥ
kāryam nisarga guravaḥ sphuṭam ārabhante

original: Subhv_0279-3 utthāya kiṃ kalaśatopi na sindhunātham-
analyzed: utthāya kim na sindhunātham
udvīci mālam apibat bhagavān agastyaḥ
priyā nyāyyā vṛttiḥ malinam asu bhaṅga ipi a sukaram

original: Subhv_0280-2 hyasanto nābhyarthyāḥ suhṛdapi na yācyokṛśadhanaḥ /
analyzed: hi asantaḥ na abhyarthyāḥ suhṛd api na yācya u kṛśa dhanaḥ

original: Subhv_0280-3 vipadyuccaiḥ stheyaṃ padamanuvidheyaṃ ca mahatāṃ
analyzed: vipadi uccais stheyam padam anuvidheyam ca mahatām
satām kena uddiṣṭam viṣamam asi dhārā vratam idam
pradānam su channam gṛham upagate saṃbhrama vidhiḥ
an utsekaḥ lakṣmyā api an abhibhavanīyāḥ para kathāḥ

original: Subhv_0281-3 priyaṃ kṛtvā maunaṃ sadasi kathanaṃ cāpyupakṛteḥ
analyzed: priyam kṛtvā maunam sadasi kathanam ca api upakṛteḥ
śruta ityanta āsaktiḥ puruṣam abhijātam kathayati
kasya ādeśāt kṣapayati tamaḥ saptasaptiḥ prajānām

original: Subhv_0282-2 chāyāhetoḥ pathi viṭapināmañjaliḥ kena baddhaḥ /
analyzed: chāyā hetoḥ pathi viṭapinām añjaliḥ kena baddhaḥ

original: Subhv_0282-3 abhyarthyante jalalavamucaḥ kena vā vṛṣṭihetor-
analyzed: abhyarthyante jala lava mucaḥ kena vā vṛṣṭi hetoḥ
jātyā eva ete para hita vidhau sādhavaḥ baddha kakṣyā
sva phala nicayaḥ śākhā bhaṅgam karoti vanaspateḥ
gamanam alasam barha āṭopi karoti śikhaṇḍinaḥ

original: Subhv_0283-3 caturagamano yo jātyāśvaḥ sa gauriva vāhyate
analyzed: catur agamanaḥ yaḥ jātya aśvaḥ sa gauḥ iva vāhyate

original: Subhv_0283-4 guṇavati jane prāyeṇaite guṇāḥ khalu vairiṇaḥ //
analyzed: guṇavati jane prāyeṇa ete guṇāḥ khalu vairiṇaḥ

original: Subhv_0284-1 khyātiṃ yatra guṇā na yānti guṇinastatrādaraḥ syātkutaḥ
analyzed: khyātim yatra guṇāḥ na yānti guṇinaḥ tatra ādaraḥ syāt kutas

original: Subhv_0284-2 kiṃ kuryādbahuśikṣitopi puruṣaḥ pāṣāṇabhūte jane /
analyzed: kim kuryāt bahu śikṣitaḥ api puruṣaḥ pāṣāṇa bhūte jane

original: Subhv_0284-4 sītkāro hi manoharopi badhire kiṃ nāma kuryādguṇam //
analyzed: sītkāraḥ hi manoharaḥ api badhire kim nāma kuryāt guṇam
kṣudrāḥ santi sahasraśas sva bharaṇa vyāpāra mātra unmukhāḥ

original: Subhv_0285-2 svārtho yasya parārtha eva sa pumānekaḥ satāmagraṇīḥ /
analyzed: sva arthaḥ yasya para arthaḥ eva sa pumān ekaḥ satām agraṇīḥ
duṣpūra udara pūraṇāya pibati srotaḥpatim vāḍavaḥ
jīmūtaḥ tu nidāgha tāpita jagat saṃtāpa vicchittaye
namra tvena unnamantaḥ para guṇa nutibhiḥ svān guṇān khyāpayantaḥ
puṣṇantaḥ svīyam artham satata kṛta mahā ārambha yatnāḥ para arthe
kṣāntyā eva ākṣepa rūkṣa akṣara mukhara mukhān durmukhān duḥkhayantaḥ

original: Subhv_0286-4 santaḥ sāścaryacaryā jagati bahumatāḥ kasya nābhyarthanīyāḥ //
analyzed: santaḥ sa āścarya caryāḥ jagati bahu matāḥ kasya na abhyarthanīyāḥ

original: Subhv_0287-1 sajjanā eva sādhūnāṃ prathayanti guṇotkaram /
analyzed: sat janāḥ eva sādhūnām prathayanti guṇa utkaram

original: Subhv_0287-2 puṣpāṇāṃ saurabhaṃ prāyastanvate dikṣu mārutāḥ //
analyzed: puṣpāṇām saurabham prāyas tanvate dikṣu mārutāḥ
sādhuḥ eva pravīṇaḥ syāt sat guṇa amṛta carvaṇe
nava cūta aṅkura āsvāda kuśalaḥ kokilaḥ kila

original: Subhv_0289-1 prāyaḥ santyupadeśārhā dhīmanto na jaḍāśayāḥ /
analyzed: prāyas santi upadeśa arhāḥ dhīmantaḥ na jaḍa āśayāḥ

original: Subhv_0289-2 tilāḥ kusumasaugandhyagrāhiṇo na yavāḥ kvacit //
analyzed: tilāḥ kusuma saugandhya grāhiṇaḥ na yavāḥ kvacid
manasvi hṛdayam dhatte raukṣyeṇa eva prasanna tām

original: Subhv_0290-2 bhasmanā makuraḥ prāyaḥ prasādaṃ labhatetarām //
analyzed: bhasmanā makuraḥ prāyas prasādam labhatetarām

original: Subhv_0291-1 uttamaḥ kleśavikṣobhaṃ kṣamaḥ soḍhuṃ nahītaraḥ /
analyzed: uttamaḥ kleśa vikṣobham kṣamaḥ soḍhum nahi itaraḥ

original: Subhv_0291-2 maṇireva mahāśāṇagharṣaṇaṃ na tu mṛtkaṇaḥ //
analyzed: maṇiḥ eva mahā śāṇa gharṣaṇam na tu mṛd kaṇaḥ

original: Subhv_0292-1 jaḍe prabhavati prāyo duḥkhaṃ bibhrati sādhavaḥ /
analyzed: jaḍe prabhavati prāyas duḥkham bibhrati sādhavaḥ
sita aṃśau udite padmāḥ saṃkoca ātaṅka dhāriṇaḥ
guṇānām antaram prāyas tad jñaḥ jānāti na itaraḥ

original: Subhv_0293-2 mālatīmallikāmodaṃ ghrāṇaṃ vetti na locanam //
Subhv_0294-1 svabhāvaṃ naiva muñcanti santaḥ saṃsargatosatām /
analyzed: svabhāvam nā eva muñcanti santaḥ saṃsarga tosa tām

original: Subhv_0294-2 na tyajanti rutaṃ mañju kākasaṃparkataḥ pikāḥ //
analyzed: na tyajanti rutam mañju kāka saṃparkataḥ pikāḥ

original: Subhv_0295-1 saṃpattau komalaṃ cittaṃ sādhorāpadi karkaśam /
analyzed: saṃpattau komalam cittam sādhoḥ āpadi karkaśam

original: Subhv_0295-2 sukumāraṃ madhau pattraṃ taroḥ syātkaṭhinaṃ śucau //
analyzed: sukumāram madhau pattram taroḥ syāt kaṭhinam śucau

original: Subhv_0296-1 svabhāvaṃ na jahātyantaḥ sādhurāpadgatopi san /
analyzed: svabhāvam na jahāti antar sādhuḥ āpad gataḥ api san
api āpad samayaḥ sādhoḥ prayāti ślāghanīya tām
sundaraḥ
dṛṣṭa durjana daurātmyaḥ sat jane rajyate janaḥ
āruhya parvatam pānthaḥ nirvṛtim eti alam

original: Subhv_0299-1 kṣaṇakṣayiṇi sāpāye bhoge rajyanti nottamāḥ /
analyzed: kṣaṇa kṣayiṇi sa apāye bhoge rajyanti na uttamāḥ
saṃtyajya ambhoja kiṃjalkam haṃsāḥ prāśnanti śaivalam

original: Subhv_0300-1 adhamaṃ bādhate bhūyo duḥkhāvego na tūttamam /
analyzed: adhamam bādhate bhūyas duḥkha āvegaḥ na tu uttamam

original: Subhv_0300-2 pāṇipādaṃ rujatyāśu śītasparśo na cakṣuṣī //
analyzed: pāṇi pādam rujati āśu śīta sparśaḥ na cakṣuṣī
guṇavān su cira sthāyī daivena api na sahyate
tiṣṭhati ekām niśām candraḥ śrīmān saṃpūrṇa maṇḍalaḥ
sarvatra guṇavān deśe cakāsti prathatetarām

original: Subhv_0302-2 maṇirmūrdhni gale bāhau pādapīṭhepi śobhate //
analyzed: maṇiḥ mūrdhni gale bāhau pāda pīṭhe api śobhate
uttamam su ciram na eva vipadaḥ abhibhavanti alam
rāhu grasana saṃbhūtā kṣaṇam vicchāya tā vidhoḥ
saṃtuṣyati uttamaḥ stutyā dhanena mahatā adhamaḥ
prasīdanti japaiḥ devāḥ balibhiḥ bhūta vigrahāḥ
na kadācid satām cetaḥ prasarati agha karmasu
jaleṣu drutam api antar sarpiḥ āśyāna tām vrajet

original: Subhv_0306-1 narāḥ saṃskārārhā jagati kila kecitsukṛtinaḥ
analyzed: narāḥ saṃskāra arhāḥ jagati kila kecid sukṛtinaḥ

original: Subhv_0306-2 samānāyāṃ jātāvapi vayasi satyāmapi dhiyi /
analyzed: samānāyām jātau api vayasi satyām api dhiyi
ayam dṛṣṭāntaḥ utra sphuṭa paricayāt abhyasanataḥ

original: Subhv_0306-4 śukaḥ ślokānvaktuṃ prabhavati na kākaḥ kvacidapi //
analyzed: śukaḥ ślokān vaktum prabhavati na kākaḥ kvacid api
dhanam api para dattam duḥkam aucitya bhājām
bhavati hṛdi tat eva ānanda kārī itareṣām
malayaja rasa binduḥ bādhate netram antar

original: Subhv_0307-4 janayati ca sa evāhlādamanyatra gātre //
analyzed: janayati ca saḥ eva āhlādam anyatra gātre
sat vaṃśa jasya paritāpa nudaḥ su vṛtta
śuddha ātmanaḥ sakala loka vibhūṣaṇasya
chidram prajātam api sādhu janasya daivān
muktāmaṇeḥ iva guṇāya bhavati avaśyam
geham durgata bandhurbhiḥ guru gṛham chātraiḥ ahaṃkāribhiḥ
haṭṭam pattana vañcakaiḥ muni janaiḥ śāpa unmukhaiḥ āśramān
siṃha ādyaiḥ ca vanam khalaiḥ nṛpa sabhām caurauḥ diś antān api

original: Subhv_0309-4 saṃkīrṇānyavalokya satyasaralaḥ sādhuḥ kva viśrāmyati //
analyzed: saṃkīrṇāni avalokya satya saralaḥ sādhuḥ kva viśrāmyati
sa abhimānam asaṃbhāvyam aucitya cyutam apriyam

original: Subhv_0310-2 duḥkhāvamānadīnaṃ vā na vadanti guṇonnatāḥ //
analyzed: duḥkha avamāna dīnam vā na vadanti guṇa unnatāḥ
bhavati subhaga tvam adhikam vistārita para guṇasya su janasya
vahati vikāsita kumudaḥ dviguṇa rucim himakara uddyotaḥ

original: Subhv_0312-1 guṇināmapi nijarūpapratipattiḥ parata eva saṃbhavati /
analyzed: guṇinām api nija rūpa pratipattiḥ paratas eva saṃbhavati
sva mahima darśanam akṣṇoḥ makura tale jāyate yasmāt

original: Subhv_0313-1 kotibhāraḥ samarthānāṃ kiṃ dūraṃ vyavasāyinām /
analyzed: kaḥ ūti bhāraḥ samarthānām kim dūram vyavasāyinām

original: Subhv_0313-2 ko videśaḥ savidyānāṃ kaḥ paraḥ priyavādinām //
analyzed: kaḥ videśaḥ savidyānām kaḥ paraḥ priya vādinām

original: Subhv_0314-1 aśvaḥ śastraṃ śāstraṃ vīṇā vāṇī naraśca nārī ca /
analyzed: aśvaḥ śastram śāstram vīṇā vāṇī naraḥ ca nārī ca

original: Subhv_0314-2 puruṣaviśeṣaṃ prāptā bhavanti yogyā ayogyāśca //
analyzed: puruṣa viśeṣam prāptāḥ bhavanti yogyāḥ ayogyāḥ ca
utsāha saṃpannam adīrghasūtram
kriyā vidhi jñam vyasaneṣu asaktam
śūram kṛtajñam dṛḍha sauhṛdam ca
lakṣmīḥ svayam vāñchati vāsa hetoḥ
kadarthitasya api mahā āśayasya
na śakyate sarga guṇaḥ pramārṣṭum
adhomukhasya api kṛtasya vahneḥ
na adhas śikhāḥ yānti kadācid eva
nyāyaḥ khalaiḥ parihṛtaḥ calitaḥ ca dharmaḥ

original: Subhv_0317-2 kālaḥ kaliḥ kaluṣa eva paraṃ pravṛttaḥ /
analyzed: kālaḥ kaliḥ kaluṣaḥ eva param pravṛttaḥ
prāyeṇa durjana janaḥ prabhā viṣṇuḥ eva
niścakrikaḥ paribhava āspadam eva sādhuḥ
vrate vivādam vimatim viveke
satya iti śaṅkām vinaye vikāram
guṇa ivamānam kuśale niṣedham

original: Subhv_0318-4 dharme virodhaṃ na karoti sādhuḥ //
analyzed: dharme virodham na karoti sādhuḥ
vandyaḥ sa puṃsam tridaśa abhinandyaḥ
kāruṇya puṇya upacaya kriyābhiḥ
saṃsāra sāra tvam upaitai yasya
para upakāra ābharaṇam śarīram
abhedena upāste kumudam udare vā
vipakṣāt ambhojāt upagatavataḥ vā madhulihaḥ
aparyāptaḥ kaḥ pi sva para paricaryā paricaya
prabandhaḥ sādhūnām ayam anabhisaṃdhāna madhuraḥ
yaiḥ vātūlaḥ bhavati puratas kathyamānaiḥ janānām
kām api antar vidadhati rujam ye pi anudgīryamāṇāḥ

original: Subhv_0321-3 tebhiprāyāḥ kimapi hṛdaye kaṇṭhalagnaḥ sphuranto
analyzed: kim api hṛdaye kaṇṭha lagnaḥ
yasya ākhyeyāḥ tam iha suhṛdam puṇyavantaḥ labhante

original: Subhv_0322-1 udanvacchinnā bhūḥ sa ca nidhirapāṃ yojanaśataṃ
analyzed: udanvat chinnā bhūḥ sa ca nidhiḥ apām yojana śatam

original: Subhv_0322-2 sadā pānthaḥ pūṣā gaganaparimāṇaṃ kathayati /
analyzed: sadā pānthaḥ pūṣā gagana parimāṇam kathayati
iti prāyas bhāvāḥ sphurat avadhi mudrā mukulitāḥ
satām prajñā unmeṣaḥ punar ayam asīmāḥ vijayate

original: Subhv_0323-1 sāgasepi na kupyanti kṛpayā copakurvate /
analyzed: na kupyanti kṛpayā ca upakurvate

original: Subhv_0323-2 bodhaṃ svasyaiva necchanti te viśvoddharaṇakṣamāḥ //
analyzed: bodham svasya eva na icchanti te viśva uddharaṇa kṣamāḥ
pātram pavitrayati na eva guṇān kṣiṇoti

original: Subhv_0324-2 snehaṃ na saṃharati nāpi malaṃ prasūte /
analyzed: sneham na saṃharati na api malam prasūte
doṣa avasāna ruciraḥ calatām na dhatte
sat saṃgamaḥ sukṛta sadmani kopi dīpaḥ
aṇuḥ api maṇiḥ prāṇa trāṇa kṣamaḥ viṣa bhakṣiṇām

original: Subhv_0325-2 śiśurapi ruṣā siṃhīsūnaḥ samāhvayate gajān /
analyzed: śiśuḥ api ruṣā siṃhī sūno samāhvayate gajān
tanuḥ api taru skandha udbhūtaḥ dahati analaḥ vanam

original: Subhv_0325-4 prakṛtimahatāṃ jātyaṃ tejo na mūrtimapekṣate //
analyzed: prakṛti mahatām jātyam tejaḥ na mūrtim apekṣate

original: Subhv_0326-1 namaḥ khalebhyaḥ ka ivāthavā na tā-
analyzed: namaḥ khalebhyaḥ kaḥ iva athavā na
nalam namasyet iha yaḥ jijīviṣuḥ
vinā eva ye doṣam ṛṣi prakāṇḍa van
nayanti śāpena rasātalam narān

original: Subhv_0327-1 viṣadharatopyativiṣamaḥ khala iti na mṛṣā vadanti vidvāṃsaḥ /
analyzed: viṣadha rataḥ api ati viṣamaḥ khalaḥ iti na mṛṣā vadanti vidvāṃsaḥ

original: Subhv_0327-2 yadayaṃ nakuladveṣī sakuladveṣī sadā piśunaḥ //
analyzed: yat ayam nakula dveṣī sa kula dveṣī sadā piśunaḥ

original: Subhv_0328-1 atimaline kartavye bhavati khalānāmatīva nipuṇā dhīḥ /
analyzed: ati maline kartavye bhavati khalānām atīva nipuṇā dhīḥ

original: Subhv_0328-2 timire hi kauśikānāṃ rūpaṃ pratipadyate dṛṣṭiḥ //
analyzed: timire hi kauśikānām rūpam pratipadyate dṛṣṭiḥ
vidhvasta para guṇānām bhavati khalānām atīva malina tvam
antarita śaśi rucām api salila mucām malinima abhyadhikaḥ

original: Subhv_0330-1 hasta iva bhūtimalino laṅghayati yathā yathā khalaḥ sūjanam /
analyzed: haste iva bhūti malinaḥ laṅghayati yathā yathā khalaḥ sūjanam

original: Subhv_0330-2 darpaṇamiva taṃ kurute tathā tathā nirmalacchāyam //
analyzed: darpaṇam iva tam kurute tathā tathā nirmala chāyam
jīvana grahaṇe namrāḥ gṛhītvā punar utthitāḥ

original: Subhv_0331-2 kiṃ kaniṣṭhā uta jyeṣṭhā ghaṭīyantrasya durjanāḥ //
analyzed: kim kaniṣṭhāḥ uta jyeṣṭhāḥ ghaṭīyantrasya durjanāḥ
sadā khaṇḍana yogyāya tuṣa pūrṇa āśayāya ca
namaḥ astu bahu bījāya khalāya ulūkhalāya ca
tulya tām aśuciḥ nityam bibharti piśunaḥ śunaḥ
aho bata khalaḥ puṇyaiḥ mūrkhaḥ api aśruta paṇḍitaḥ
sva guṇa udīraṇe śeṣaḥ para nindāsu vākpatiḥ
khalaḥ su jana paiśunye śiraḥ mukhaḥ
sarvatas śrutimān loke sarvam āvṛtya tiṣṭhati
sat sādhuvāde mūrkhasya mātsarya gala rogiṇaḥ

original: Subhv_0336-2 jihvā kaṅkamukhenāpi kṛṣṭā naiva pravartate //
analyzed: jihvā kaṅka mukhena api kṛṣṭā nā eva pravartate
māyā mayaḥ prakṛtyā eva rāga dveṣa mada ākulaḥ

original: Subhv_0337-2 mahatāmapi mohāya saṃsāra iva durjanaḥ //
analyzed: mahatām api mohāya saṃsāraḥ iva durjanaḥ
kha citram api māyāvī racayati eva līlayā

original: Subhv_0338-2 laghuśca mahatāṃ madhye tasmātkhala iti smṛtaḥ //
analyzed: laghuḥ ca mahatām madhye tasmāt khalaḥ iti smṛtaḥ
khalena dhana mattena nīcena prabhaviṣṇunā

original: Subhv_0339-2 piśunena padasthena hā praje kva gamiṣyasi //
analyzed: piśunena pada sthena hā praje kva gamiṣyasi

original: Subhv_0340-1 kṛtaśatamasatsu naṣṭaṃ subhāṣitaśataṃ ca naṣṭamabudheṣu /
analyzed: kṛta śatam asatsu naṣṭam subhāṣita śatam ca naṣṭam abudheṣu
vacana śatam avacana kare buddhi śatam acetane naṣṭam
naṣṭam apātre dānam naṣṭam hitam aphala buddhi avajñāne
naṣṭaḥ guṇaḥ guṇa jñe naṣṭam dākṣiṇyam akṛtajñe
dūrāt ucchrita pāṇiḥ ārdra nayanaḥ protsārita ardha āsanaḥ
gāḍha āliṅgana tatparaḥ priya kathā praśneṣu sakta uttaraḥ
antar gūḍha viṣaḥ bahis madhu mayaḥ ca atīva māyā mayaḥ
kaḥ nāma ayam apūrva nāṭaka vidhiḥ yaḥ śikṣitaḥ durjanaiḥ

original: Subhv_0343-1 ye śramaṃ hartumīhante mahatāṃ cirasaṃbhṛtam /
analyzed: ye śramam hartum īhante mahatām cira saṃbhṛtam
vandyāḥ te sarala ātmānaḥ durjanāḥ sat janāḥ iva
aho kuṭila buddhīnām durgrāham asatām manaḥ
anyat vacasi kaṇṭhenyat anyat oṣṭha puṭe sthitam

original: Subhv_0345-1 khaleṣu satsu niryātā vayamarjayituṃ guṇān /
analyzed: khaleṣu satsu niryātāḥ vayam arjayitum guṇān
iyam sā taskara grāme ratna kraya viḍambanā
vardhete spardhayā iva ubhau saṃpadā śata śākhayā
aṅkuraḥ vaskara udbhūtaḥ puruṣaḥ ca ākula udbhavaḥ
dahyamānāḥ su tīkṣṇena nīcāḥ para yaśaḥ agninā

original: Subhv_0347-2 aśaktāstatpadaṃ gantuṃ tato nindāṃ pracakrire //
analyzed: aśaktāḥ tad padam gantum tatas nindām pracakrire

original: Subhv_0348-1 yatsmṛtvaiva parāṃ yānti santaḥ saṃtāpasaṃtatim /
analyzed: yat smṛtvā eva parām yānti santaḥ saṃtāpa saṃtatim

original: Subhv_0348-2 tadasanto hasantopi helayaiva hi kurvate //
analyzed: tat asantaḥ hasantaḥ api helayā eva hi kurvate
