guṇa doṣau aśāstra jñaḥ katham vibhajate janaḥ
kim andhasya adhikāraḥ usti rūpa bheda upalabdhiṣu

original: Subhv_0350-1 prāyaḥ prakāśatāṃ yāti malinaḥ sādhubādhayā /
analyzed: prāyas prakāśa tām yāti malinaḥ sādhu bādhayā
na agrasiṣyata ced arkam kaḥ jñāsyat siṃhikāsutam
prāyas para upatāpāya durjanaḥ satata udyataḥ
avaśya karaṇīya tvāt na kāraṇam apekṣate
stokena unnatim āyāti stokena āyāti adhogatim

original: Subhv_0352-2 aho susadṛśī vṛttistulākoṭeḥ khalasya ca //
analyzed: aho su sadṛśī vṛttiḥ tulā koṭeḥ khalasya ca

original: Subhv_0353-1 aho prakṛtisādṛśyaṃ śleṣmaṇo durjanasya ca /
analyzed: aho prakṛti sādṛśyam śleṣmaṇaḥ durjanasya ca
madhuraiḥ kopam āyāti kaṭukaiḥ upaśāmyati
yathā gajapatiḥ śrāntaḥ chāyā arthī vṛkṣam āśritaḥ

original: Subhv_0354-2 viśramya taṃ drumaṃ hanti tathā nīcaḥ svamāśrayam //
analyzed: viśramya tam drumam hanti tathā nīcaḥ svam āśrayam
durjanaḥ parihartavyaḥ vidyayā alaṃkṛtaḥ api san

original: Subhv_0355-2 maṇinā bhūṣitaḥ sarpo bhavetkiṃ na bhayaṃkaraḥ //
analyzed: maṇinā bhūṣitaḥ sarpaḥ bhavet kim na bhayaṃkaraḥ
cāru tā para dāra artham dhanam loka upataptaye

original: Subhv_0356-2 prabhūtvaṃ sādhunāśāya khale khalatarā guṇāḥ //
analyzed: prabhū tvam sādhu nāśāya khale khalatarāḥ guṇāḥ
para upaghāta vijñāna mātra lābha upajīvinām
dāśānām iva dhūrtānām jālāya guṇa saṃgrahaḥ
durjanena ucyamānāni vacāṃsi madhurāṇi api
akāla kusumāni iva trāsam saṃjanayanti me
na lajjate sat jana varjanīyayā
bhujaṃga vakra kriyayā api durjanaḥ
dhiyam kumāyā samaya abhicāriṇīm
vidagdha tām eva hi manyate khalaḥ

original: Subhv_0360-1 vṛtiṃ svāṃ bahu manyate hṛdi śucaṃ dhattenukampoktibhir-
analyzed: vṛtim svām bahu manyate hṛdi śucam dhatte nukampā uktibhiḥ

original: Subhv_0360-2 vyaktaṃ nindati yogyatāṃ mitamatiḥ kurvanstutīrātmanaḥ /
analyzed: vyaktam nindati yogyatām mita matiḥ kurvan stutīḥ ātmanaḥ
garhya upāya niṣevaṇam kathayati sthāsnum vadan vyāpadam

original: Subhv_0360-4 śrutvā duḥkhamaruṃtudāṃ vitanute pīḍāṃ janaḥ prākṛtaḥ //
analyzed: śrutvā duḥkham aruntudām vitanute pīḍām janaḥ prākṛtaḥ

original: Subhv_0361-1 pākaścenna śubhasya medya tadasau prāgeva nādātkimu
analyzed: pākaḥ ced na śubhasya medya tat asau prāk eva nā adāt kimu

original: Subhv_0361-2 svārthaścenna mayāsya kiṃ na bhajate dīnānsvabandhūnayam /
analyzed: svārthaḥ ced na mayā asya kim na bhajate dīnān sva bandhūn ayam

original: Subhv_0361-3 matto randhrudṛśosya bhīryadi na tallubdhaḥ kimeṣa tyajed-
analyzed: mattaḥ randhru dṛśaḥ asya bhīḥ yadi na tad lubdhaḥ kim eṣa tyajet

original: Subhv_0361-4 ityantaḥ puruṣodhaṃaḥ kalayati prāyaḥ kṛtopakriyaḥ //
analyzed: iti antar puruṣodhaṃaḥ kalayati prāyas kṛta upakriyaḥ
sa āścaryam yudhi śauryam apratihatam tat kaṇḍita ākhaṇḍalam
sa bhagavān dānena lakṣmīpatiḥ
aiśvaryam sva kara āpta sapta bhuvanam labdha abdhi pāram yaśaḥ

original: Subhv_0362-4 sarvaṃ durjanasaṃgamena sahasā spaṣṭaṃ vinaṣṭaṃ baleḥ //
analyzed: sarvam durjana saṃgamena sahasā spaṣṭam vinaṣṭam baleḥ

original: Subhv_0363-1 śamayati yaśaḥ kleśaṃ sūte diśatyaśivāṃ gatiṃ
analyzed: śamayati yaśaḥ kleśam sūte diśati aśivām gatim
janayati jana udvega āyāsam nayati upahāsya tām

original: Subhv_0363-3 bhramayati matiṃ mānaṃ hanti kṣiṇoti ca jīvitaṃ
analyzed: bhramayati matim mānam hanti kṣiṇoti ca jīvitam

original: Subhv_0363-4 kṣipati sakalaṃ kalyāṇānāṃ kulaṃ khalasaṃgamaḥ //
analyzed: kṣipati sakalam kalyāṇānām kulam khala saṃgamaḥ
avinaya bhuvām ajñānānām śamāya bhavan api
prakṛti kuṭilāt vidyā abhyāsaḥ khala tva vivṛddhaye
phaṇi bhaya bhṛtām astu cheda kṣamaḥ tamasām asau
viṣadhara phaṇā ratna ālokaḥ bhayam tu bhṛśāyate
karoti pūjyamānaḥ api loka vyasana dīkṣitaḥ

original: Subhv_0365-2 darśane darśane trāsaṃ gṛhāhiriva durjanaḥ //
analyzed: darśane darśane trāsam gṛha ahiḥ iva durjanaḥ
satya dharma cyutāt puṃsaḥ kruddhāt āśīviṣāt iva

original: Subhv_0366-2 nāstikopi hyudvijate janaḥ kiṃ punarāstikaḥ //
analyzed: nāstikaḥ api hi udvijate janaḥ kim punar āstikaḥ

original: Subhv_0367-1 yeṣāṃ prāṇivadhaḥ krīḍā narma marmacchido giraḥ /
analyzed: yeṣām prāṇi vadhaḥ krīḍā narma marma chidaḥ giraḥ

original: Subhv_0367-2 kāryaṃ paropatāpitvaṃ te mṛtyorapi mṛtyavaḥ //
analyzed: kāryam para upatāpi tvam te mṛtyoḥ api mṛtyavaḥ

original: Subhv_0368-1 aho bata mahatkaṣṭaṃ viparītamidaṃ jagat /
analyzed: aho bata mahat kaṣṭam viparītam idam jagat
yena apatrpate sādhuḥ asādhuḥ tena tuṣyati

original: Subhv_0369-1 na tathecchantyakalyāṇāḥ pareṣāṃ vedituṃ guṇān /
analyzed: na tathā icchanti akalyāṇāḥ pareṣām veditum guṇān
yathā eṣām jñātum icchanti nairguṇyam pāpa cetasaḥ
varjanīyaḥ matimatām durjanaḥ sakhya vairayoḥ
śvā bhavati upaghāyāya laḍan api daśan api

original: Subhv_0371-1 ato hāsyataraṃ loke kiṃcidanyanna vidyate /
analyzed: atas hāsyataram loke kiṃcid anyat na vidyate

original: Subhv_0371-2 yatra durjana ityāha durjanaḥ sajjanaṃ janam //
analyzed: yatra durjanaḥ iti āha durjanaḥ sat janam janam
apakāram a saṃprāpya tuṣyet sādhuḥ a sādhutaḥ

original: Subhv_0372-2 naiṣa lābho bhujaṃgena veṣṭito yanna daśyate //
analyzed: na eṣa lābhaḥ bhujaṃgena veṣṭitaḥ yat na daśyate
labdhaḥ stabdhaḥ nṛjuḥ mūrkhaḥ prabhuḥ ekānta dāruṇaḥ
bahūn eṣa khalaḥ sādhūn mārayitvā mariṣyati

original: Subhv_0374-1 kā khalena saha spardhā sajjanasyābhimāninaḥ /
analyzed: kā khalena saha spardhā sat janasya abhimāninaḥ

original: Subhv_0374-2 bhāṣaṇaṃ bhīṣaṇaṃ sādhudūṣaṇaṃ yasya bhūṣaṇam //
analyzed: bhāṣaṇam bhīṣaṇam sādhu dūṣaṇam yasya bhūṣaṇam
mukhena ekena vidhyanti pādam ekasya kaṇṭakāḥ
dūrāt mukha sahasreṇa sarva prāṇa harāḥ khalāḥ
nirmāya khala jihvā agram sarva prāṇa haram nṛṇām
cakāra kim vṛthā śastra viṣa vahnīn prajāpatiḥ

original: Subhv_0377-1 yathā paropakāreṣu nityaṃ jāgarti sajjanaḥ /
analyzed: yathā para upakāreṣu nityam jāgarti sat janaḥ

original: Subhv_0377-2 tathā parāpakāreṣu jāgarti satataṃ khalaḥ //
analyzed: tathā para apakāreṣu jāgarti satatam khalaḥ
bibheti piśunān nīcaḥ prakāśana paṭīyasaḥ
na punar mūḍha hṛdayaḥ nindanīyāt sva karmaṇaḥ
vṛthā jvalita kopa agneḥ paruṣa akṣara vādinaḥ
durjanasya auṣadham nā asti kiṃcid anyat anuttarāt

original: Subhv_0380-1 khalānāṃ kaṇṭakānāṃ ca dvidhaivāsti pratikriyā /
analyzed: khalānām kaṇṭakānām ca dvidhā eva asti pratikriyā

original: Subhv_0380-2 upānanmukhabhaṅgo vā dūrato vāpi varjanam //
analyzed: upānah mukha bhaṅgaḥ vā dūratas vā api varjanam

original: Subhv_0381-1 jīvannapi na tatkartuṃ śaknoti sujanastathā /
analyzed: jīvan api na tat kartum śaknoti su janaḥ tathā
durjanaḥ yat mṛtaḥ kuryāt parebhyaḥ hitam uttaram
yat yat iṣṭatamam tat tat deyam guṇavate kila

original: Subhv_0382-2 ata eva khalo doṣānsādhubhyaḥ saṃprayacchati //
analyzed: atas eva khalaḥ doṣān sādhubhyaḥ saṃprayacchati
roga uṇḍaja uṅkura ugniḥ viṣam aśvataraḥ ghuṇāḥ krimayaḥ
prakṛti kṛtaghnaḥ ca naraḥ sva āśrayam a vināśya na edhante

original: Subhv_0384-1 na vinā paravādena ramate durjano janaḥ /
analyzed: na vinā para vādena ramate durjanaḥ janaḥ

original: Subhv_0384-2 śvā hi sarvarasānbhuktvā vināmedhyaṃ na tṛpyati //
analyzed: śvā hi sarva rasān bhuktvā vinā amedhyam na tṛpyati
varam atyanta viphalaḥ sukha sevyaḥ hi sat janaḥ

original: Subhv_0385-2 na tu prāṇaharastīkṣṇaḥ śaravatsaphalaḥ khalaḥ //
analyzed: na tu prāṇa haraḥ tīkṣṇaḥ śara vatsa phalaḥ khalaḥ
svabhāvena eva niśitaḥ kṛta pakṣa grahaḥ api san

original: Subhv_0386-2 śaravadguṇanirmuktaḥ khalaḥ kasya na bhedakaḥ //
analyzed: śara vat guṇa nirmuktaḥ khalaḥ kasya na bhedakaḥ

original: Subhv_0387-1 durjanaḥ sujanīkartuṃ yatnenāpi na śakyate /
analyzed: durjanaḥ sujanīkartum yatnena api na śakyate
saṃskāreṇa api laśunam kaḥ sugandhīkariṣyati
nīcaḥ samutthitaḥ vaśyam an avāpya para āśrayam
chidreṇa ratim āpnoti dṛṣṭāntaḥ utra kaṭībhavaḥ
paravāde daśa vadanaḥ para randhra nirīkṣaṇe sahasra akṣaḥ
sat vṛtta vṛtti haraṇe bāhu sahasra arjunaḥ nīcaḥ

original: Subhv_0390-1 durjanadūṣitamanasāṃ puṃsāṃ sujanepi nāsti viśvāsaḥ /
analyzed: durjana dūṣita manasām puṃsām su jane pi nā asti viśvāsaḥ
bālaḥ pāyasa dagdha udadhi api phūtkṛtya bhakṣayati

original: Subhv_0391-1 ādau lajjayati kṛtaṃ madhye paribhavati riktamavasāne /
analyzed: ādau lajjayati kṛtam madhye paribhavati riktam avasāne

original: Subhv_0391-2 khalasaṃgatasya kathayata yadi susthitamasti kiṃcidapi //
analyzed: khala saṃgatasya kathayata yadi susthitam asti kiṃcid api
para marma divya darśiṣu jātyā eva ucita nigūḍha vaireṣu

original: Subhv_0392-2 kaḥ khalu khaleṣu śaṅkāṃ ślathayiṣyati dambhānirateṣu //
analyzed: kaḥ khalu khaleṣu śaṅkām ślathayiṣyati dambha a nirateṣu
ajñaḥ sukham ārādhyaḥ sukhataram ārādhyate viśeṣa jñaḥ

original: Subhv_0393-2 jñānalavadurvidagdhaṃ brahmāpi naraṃ na rañjayati //
analyzed: jñāna lava durvidagdham brahmā api naram na rañjayati

original: Subhv_0394-1 asthānābhiniveśī prāyo jaḍe eva bhavati no vidvān /
analyzed: a sthāna abhiniveśī prāyas jaḍe eva bhavati no vidvān
bālāt anyaḥ jighṛkṣati indoḥ sphura bimbam

original: Subhv_0395-1 labdhodayopi hi khalaḥ prathamaṃ svajanaṃ nayati paritāpam /
analyzed: labdha udayaḥ api hi khalaḥ prathamam sva janam nayati paritāpam
udgacchan dava dahanaḥ janma bhuvam dāru nirdahati

original: Subhv_0396-1 alpaśrutalava eva prāyaḥ prakaṭayati vāgvibhavamuccaiḥ /
analyzed: alpa śruta lavaḥ eva prāyas prakaṭayati vāc vibhavam uccais

original: Subhv_0396-2 sarvatra kunaṭa eva hi nāṭakamadhikaṃ viḍambayati //
analyzed: sarvatra kunaṭaḥ eva hi nāṭakam adhikam viḍambayati

original: Subhv_0397-1 prakhalā eva guṇāvatāmākramya dhuraṃ puraḥ prakarṣanti /
analyzed: prakhalāḥ eva guṇāvatām ākramya dhuram puras prakarṣanti
tṛṇa kāṣṭham eva jaladheḥ upariplavate na ratnāni

original: Subhv_0398-1 mahatāṃ yadeva mūrdhasu tadeva nīcāstṛṇāya manyante /
analyzed: mahatām yat eva mūrdhasu tat eva nīcāstṛṇāya manyante

original: Subhv_0398-2 liṅgaṃ praṇamanti budhāḥ kākaḥ punarāsanīkurate //
analyzed: liṅgam praṇamanti budhāḥ kākaḥ punar āsanīkurate
saha vasatām api asatām jalaruha jala vat bhavati asaṃśleṣaḥ

original: Subhv_0399-2 dūrepi satāṃ vasatāṃ prītiḥ kumudenduvadbhavati //
analyzed: dūre api satām vasatām prītiḥ kumuda indu vat bhavati

original: Subhv_0400-1 pariśuddhāmapi vṛttiṃ samāśrito durjanaḥ parānvyathate /
analyzed: pariśuddhām api vṛttim samāśritaḥ durjanaḥ parān vyathate

original: Subhv_0400-2 pavanāśinopi bhujagāḥ paropatāpaṃ na muñcanti //
analyzed: pavana āśinaḥ api bhujagāḥ para upatāpam na muñcanti
sādhayati yat prayojanam ajñaḥ tat tasya kākatālīyam
daivāt katham api akṣaram utkirati ghuṇaḥ api kāṣṭheṣu

original: Subhv_0402-1 prāyaḥ khalaprakṛtayo nāparibhūtā hitāya kalpante /
analyzed: prāyas khala prakṛtayaḥ na a paribhūtāḥ hitāya kalpante
puṣpyati adhikam aśokaḥ gaṇikā caraṇa prahāreṇa

original: Subhv_0403-1 paramarmaghaṭṭanādiṣu khalasya yatkauśalaṃ na tatkṛtye /
analyzed: para marma ghaṭṭana ādiṣu khalasya yat kauśalam na tat kṛtye
yat sāmarthyam upahatau viṣasya tat na upakārāya

original: Subhv_0404-1 atisatkṛtāapi śaṭhāḥ sahabhuvamujjhanti jātu na prakṛtim /
analyzed: ati satkṛtāḥ api śaṭhāḥ saha bhuvam ujjhanti jātu na prakṛtim

original: Subhv_0404-2 śirasā mahāśvareṇāpi nanu dhṛto vakra eva śaśī //
analyzed: śirasā mahā aśvareṇa api nanu dhṛtaḥ vakraḥ eva śaśī

original: Subhv_0405-1 vāyuriva khalajanoyaṃ prāyaḥ pararūpameti saṃparkāt /
analyzed: vāyuḥ iva khala janaḥ yam prāyas para rūpam eti saṃparkāt
santaḥ tu ravi karāḥ iva sat asat yoga ipi asaṃśliṣṭāḥ
prerayati param anāryaḥ śakri daridraḥ api jagat abhidrohe

original: Subhv_0406-2 tejayati khaṅgadhārāṃ svayamasamarthā śilā chettum //
analyzed: tejayati khaṅga dhārām svayam asamarthā śilā chettum

original: Subhv_0407-1 dūrepi parasyāgasi paṭurjano nātmanaḥ samīpepi /
analyzed: dūre api parasya āgasi paṭuḥ janaḥ na ātmanaḥ samīpe api

original: Subhv_0407-2 svaṃ vraṇamakṣi na paśyati śaśini kalaṅkaṃ nirūpayati //
analyzed: svam vraṇam akṣi na paśyati śaśini kalaṅkam nirūpayati
sādhuṣu eva atitarām aruṃtudāḥ svām vivṛṇvate vṛttim

original: Subhv_0408-2 vyādhā nighnanti mṛgānmṛtamapi na tu siṃhamādadate //
analyzed: vyādhāḥ nighnanti mṛgān mṛtam api na tu siṃham ādadate
avikāriṇam api sat janam aniśam anāryaḥ prabādhata iti artham

original: Subhv_0409-2 kamalinyā kimiha kṛtaṃ himasya yattāṃ sadā dahati //
analyzed: kamalinyā kim iha kṛtam himasya yat tām sadā dahati

original: Subhv_0410-1 svaguṇāniva paradoṣānvaktuṃ na satopi śakruvanti budhāḥ /
analyzed: sva guṇān iva para doṣān vaktum na sataḥ api śakruvanti budhāḥ
sva guṇān iva para doṣān asataḥ pi khalāḥ tu kathayanti

original: Subhv_0411-1 kṛtvāpi yena lajjāmupaiti sādhuḥ paroditenāpi /
analyzed: kṛtvā api yena lajjām upaiti sādhuḥ para uditena api
tat a kṛtvā eva khala janaḥ svayam udgirati iti dhik laghu tām

original: Subhv_0412-1 āptvāpyātmavināśaṃ gaṇayati na khalaḥ paravyasanakaṣṭam /
analyzed: āptvā api ātma vināśam gaṇayati na khalaḥ para vyasana kaṣṭam

original: Subhv_0412-2 prāyaḥ sahasranāśe samaramukhe nṛtyati kabandhaḥ //
analyzed: prāyas sahasra nāśe samara mukhe nṛtyati kabandhaḥ

original: Subhv_0413-1 prakṛtikhalatvādasatāṃ doṣa iva guṇopi bādhate lokān /
analyzed: prakṛti khala tvāt asatām doṣaḥ iva guṇaḥ api bādhate lokān

original: Subhv_0413-2 viṣakusumānāṃ gandhaḥ surabhirapi manāṃsi mohayati //
analyzed: viṣa kusumānām gandhaḥ surabhiḥ api manāṃsi mohayati

original: Subhv_0414-1 labdhocchrāyo nīcaḥ prathamataraṃ svāminaṃ parābhavati /
analyzed: labdha ucchrāyaḥ nīcaḥ prathamataram svāminam parābhavati
pathi dhūli rajaḥ hi ādau utthāpakam eva saṃvṛṇute

original: Subhv_0415-2 na tyajati gandhamaśubhaṃ prakṛtimiva sahotthitāṃ nīcaḥ //
analyzed: na tyajati gandham aśubham prakṛtim iva saha utthitām nīcaḥ

original: Subhv_0416-1 upakṛtamanena suhṛdayamiti durjaneṣvasti na kvacidapekṣā /
analyzed: upakṛtam anena suhṛdayam iti durjaneṣu asti na kvacid apekṣā
hotrā saha svam āśrayam udvṛtta agniḥ dahati eva

original: Subhv_0417-1 upakṛtireva khalānāṃ doṣasya garīyaso bhavati hetuḥ /
analyzed: upakṛtiḥ eva khalānām doṣasya garīyasaḥ bhavati hetuḥ
anukūla ācaraṇena hi kupyanti

original: Subhv_0418-1 na paraṃ phalati hi kiṃcitkhala evānarthamāvahati yāvat /
analyzed: na param phalati hi kiṃcid khalaḥ eva anartham āvahati yāvat
mārayati sapadi viṣa taruḥ āśrayamāṇam śrama apanude

original: Subhv_0419-1 svārthanirapekṣa eva hi paropaghātosatāṃ vyasanameva /
analyzed: sva artha nirapekṣaḥ eva hi para upaghātaḥ usatām vyasanam eva

original: Subhv_0419-2 aśanāyodanyā vā viramati phaṇino na dandaśataḥ //
analyzed: aśanāya udanyā vā viramati phaṇinaḥ na dandaśataḥ
ekībhāvam gatayoḥ jala payasoḥ mittra cetasoḥ śva eva
vyatireka kṛtau śaktiḥ haṃsānām durjanānām ca

original: Subhv_0421-1 śalyamapi skhaladantaḥ soḍhuṃ śakyate hālahaladigdham /
analyzed: śalyam api skhalat antar soḍhum śakyate hālahala digdham
dhīraiḥ na punar akāraṇa kupita khala alīka durvacanam
mṛga mīna sat janānām tṛṇa jala saṃtoṣa vihita vṛttīnām
lubdhaka dhīvara piśunāḥ niṣkāraṇa vairiṇaḥ jagati
bhṛśa kṛśam ante vibheda kṛt malinam
mahiṣa viṣāṇam iva anṛju puruṣam bhaya dam khala prema
pātram apātrīkurute dahati guṇān sneham āśu nāśayati

original: Subhv_0424-2 amale malaṃ prayacchati dīpajvāleva khalamaittrī //
analyzed: amale malam prayacchati dīpa jvālā iva khala maittrī

original: Subhv_0425-1 samarpitāḥ kasya na tena doṣā
analyzed: samarpitāḥ kasya na tena doṣā

original: Subhv_0425-2 haṭhādguṇā vā na hṛtāḥ khalena /
analyzed: haṭhāt guṇāḥ vā na hṛtāḥ khalena
tathā api doṣaiḥ na viyujyate asau
spṛṣṭaḥ api na ekena guṇena citram
ārādhyamānaḥ bahubhiḥ prakāraiḥ
na ārādhyate nāma kim atra citram
ayam tu apūrvaḥ pratibhā viśeṣaḥ
yat sevyamānaḥ ripu tām upaiti
vidvān upālambham avāpya doṣān
nivartate asau paritapyate ca
jñātaḥ tu doṣaḥ mama sarvathā iti
pāpaḥ janaḥ pāpataram karoti
evam eva nahi jīvyate khalāt
tatra kā nṛpati vallabhe kathā
pūrvam eva hi su duḥsahaḥ nalaḥ
kim punar prabala vāyunā īritaḥ
amaraiḥ amṛtam na pītam abdheḥ
na ca hālāhalam ulvaṇam hareṇa
vidhinā nihitam khalasya vāci
dvayam etat bahis ekam antar anyat
nimittam uddiśya hi yaḥ prakupyati
dhruvam sa tasya apagase prasīdati

original: Subhv_0430-3 akāraṇadveṣi mano hi yasya vai
analyzed: akāraṇa dveṣi manaḥ hi yasya vai
katham paraḥ tam paritoṣayiṣyati
itarat eva bahirmukham ucyate
hṛdi tu yat sphurati itarat eva tat
caritam etat adhīra vitārakam
dhuri payaḥ pratibimbam iva āsatām
kva piśunasya gatiḥ pratihanyate
daśati dṛṣṭam api śrutam api asau
ati su duṣkaram avyatirikta dṛś
chrutibhiḥ api atha dṛṣṭiviṣaiḥ idam
gaja turaga śataiḥ prayāntu mūrkhā
dhana rahitāḥ vibudhāḥ prayāntu padbhyām
giri śikhira gatā api kākapālī
pulina gataiḥ na sameti rājahaṃsaiḥ
hrepayati priya vacanaiḥ ādaram upadarśayan khalīkurute
utkarṣayan ca laghayati mūrkha suhṛd sarvathā varjyaḥ
prakaṭam api na saṃvṛṇoti doṣam
guṇa lava lampaṭaḥ eṣa sādhu vargaḥ
ati paruṣa ruṣam vinā api doṣaiḥ
piśuna śunām ruṣatām prayāti kālaḥ

original: Subhv_0436-1 yadā vigṛhṇāti tadā hataṃ yaśaḥ
analyzed: yadā vigṛhṇāti tadā hatam yaśaḥ
karoti maittrīm atha dūṣitāḥ guṇāḥ
sthitim samīkṣya ubhayathā parīkṣakaḥ
karoti avajñā upahatam pṛthagjanam
iṣṭaḥ vā sukṛta śata upalālitaḥ vā
śliṣṭaḥ vā vyasana śata abhirakṣitaḥ vā
dauḥśīlyāt janayati nā eva jātu asādhuḥ
visrambham bhujagaḥ iva aṅka madhya suptaḥ
rūkṣam virauti parikupyati nirnimittam
sparśena dūṣayati vārayati praveśam

original: Subhv_0438-3 lajjākaraṃ daśati naiva ca tṛpyatīti
analyzed: lajjā karam daśati na eva ca tṛpyati iti

original: Subhv_0438-4 kauleyakasya ca khalasya ca ko viśeṣaḥ //
analyzed: kauleyakasya ca khalasya ca kaḥ viśeṣaḥ
pāda āhataḥ atha dṛḍha daṇḍa vighaṭṭitaḥ vā

original: Subhv_0439-2 yaṃ daṃṣṭrayā daśati taṃ kila hanti sarpaḥ /
analyzed: yam daṃṣṭrayā daśati tam kila hanti sarpaḥ
kaḥ api anyaḥ eva piśuna udya bhujaṃga dharmā

original: Subhv_0439-4 karṇe paraṃ spṛśati hantyaparaṃ samūlam //
analyzed: karṇe param spṛśati hanti aparam sa mūlam
yuktam yayā kila nirantara labdha vṛtteḥ
asya abhimāna tamasaḥ prasaram niroddhum
vidvas tayā jagati tām avalambya kecid
tanvanti ahaṃkṛtim aho śata śākham āndhyam
nanu āśraya sthitiḥ iyam tava kālakūṭa
kena uttara uttara viśiṣṭa pada upadiṣṭā
prāk arṇavasya hṛdaye vṛṣa lakṣmaṇā utha

original: Subhv_0441-4 kaṇṭhedhunā vasasi vāci punaḥ khalānām //
analyzed: kaṇṭhedhunā vasasi vāci punar khalānām
prāyas svabhāva malinaḥ mahatām samīpe
ṭi ṭhan khalaḥ prakuruta irthi jana upaghātam
śīta arditaiḥ sakala loka sukha āvahaḥ api

original: Subhv_0442-4 dhūme sthite nahi sukhena niṣevyatogniḥ //
analyzed: dhūme sthite nahi sukhena
dhūmaḥ payodhara padam katham api avāpya
varṣa ambubhiḥ śamayati jvalanasya tejaḥ
daivāt avāpya kaluṣa prakṛtiḥ mahā tvam
prāyas sva bandhu janam eva tiraskaroti
ullāsita akhila khalasya viśṛṅkhalasya
prāc jāta vismṛta nija adhama karma vṛtteḥ
daivāt avāpta vibhavasya guṇa dviṣaḥ sya
nīcasya gocara gataiḥ sukham āsyate kaiḥ
na āścaryam etat adhunā hata daiva yogā
durccais sthitiḥ yat adhamaḥ na mahā anubhāvaḥ
rathyā kalaṅka śata saṃkara saṃkula upi
pṛṣṭhe bhavati avakaraḥ na punarnidhānam
prasahya maṇim uddharet makara vaktra daṃṣṭra antarāt
samudram api saṃtaret pracalat ūrmi mālā ākulam
bhujagam api kopitam śirasi puśpa vat dhārayet
na tu pratiniviṣṭa mūrkha jana cittam ārādhayet

original: Subhv_0447-1 labheta sikatāsu tailamapi yatnataḥ pīḍayan-
analyzed: labheta sikatāsu tailam api yatnataḥ pīḍayan
pibet ca mṛgatṛṣṇikāsu salilam pipāsā arditaḥ
kadācid api paryaṭat śaśaviṣāṇam āsādayen
na tu pratiniviṣṭa mūrkha jana cittam ārādhayet
araṇya ruditam kṛtam śava śarīram udvartitam
sthala ibjam avaropitam su ciram ūṣare varṣitam
śva puccham avanāmitam badhira karṇa jāpaḥ kṛtaḥ
kṛta andha mukha maṇḍanā yat abudhaḥ janaḥ secitaḥ
vṛthā dugdhaḥ unaḍvān stana bhara natā gauḥ iti ciram
pariṣvaktaḥ ṣaṇḍhaḥ lāvaṇya sahitā
kṛtā vaidūrya āśā vikaca kiraṇe kāca śakale

original: Subhv_0449-4 mayā mūḍhena tvāṃ kṛpaṇamaguṇajñaṃ praṇamatā //
analyzed: mayā mūḍhena tvām kṛpaṇam aguṇa jñam praṇamatā
sva pakṣa chedam vā samucita phala bhraṃśam athavā
sva mūrteḥ bhaṅgam vā patanam aśucau nāśam athavā
śaraḥ prāpnoti etān hṛdaya patha saṃsthaḥ api
ṛjoḥ vakra āśleṣāt bhavati khalu su vyaktam aśubham
guṇāṇām sā śaktiḥ vipadam anubadhnanti yat amī

original: Subhv_0451-2 prasannastadvedhā mama yadi na tairyogamakarot /
analyzed: prasannaḥ tad vedhāḥ mama yadi na taiḥ yogam akarot
viṣaṇṇam daurgatyāt iti guṇinam ālokya viguṇaḥ
karoti sve gehe dhruva mati samṛddhyā utsavam asau
avekṣya sva ātmānam viguṇam aparān ichati tathā

original: Subhv_0452-2 phalatyetanno cedvilapati na santīha guṇinaḥ /
analyzed: phalati etat no ced vilapati na santi iha guṇinaḥ

original: Subhv_0452-3 nimārṣṭuṃ śaptuṃ vā paribhavitumudyacchati tato-
analyzed: nimārṣṭum śaptum vā paribhavitum udyacchati

original: Subhv_0452-4 pyaho nīce ramyā saguṇavijigīṣā vidhiktā //
analyzed: pi aho nīce ramyā sa guṇa vijigīṣā

original: Subhv_0453-1 yadi paraguṇā na kṣamyante yatasva tadarjane
analyzed: yadi para guṇāḥ na kṣamyante yatasva tad arjane
nahi para yaśaḥ nindā vyājaiḥ alam parimārjitum
viramasi na ced icchā dveṣa prasakta manorathā
dinakara karān pāṇi chattraiḥ nudat śramam eṣyasi
prakṛṣṭe saṃparke bhaṇi bhujagayoḥ janma janite

original: Subhv_0454-2 maṇirnāherdoṣānbhajati na ca sarpo maṇiguṇān /
analyzed: maṇiḥ na aheḥ doṣān bhajati na ca sarpaḥ maṇi guṇān

original: Subhv_0454-3 asādhuḥ sādhurvā bhavati nanu jātyaiva puruṣo
analyzed: asādhuḥ sādhuḥ vā bhavati nanu jātyā eva

original: Subhv_0454-4 nasaṅgāddaurjanyaṃ na ca sujanatā kasyacidapi //
analyzed: na saṅgāt daurjanyam na ca su jana tā kasyacid api
na viṣama mṛtīkartum śakyam prayatna śataiḥ api

original: Subhv_0455-2 tyajati kaṭutāṃ na svāṃ nimbaḥ sthitopi payohrade /
analyzed: tyajati kaṭu tām na svām nimbaḥ sthitaḥ api payohrade

original: Subhv_0455-3 guṇaparicitāmāryāṃ vāṇīṃ na jalpati durjanaś-
analyzed: guṇa paricitām āryām vāṇīm na jalpati durjanaḥ

original: Subhv_0455-4 ciramapi balādhmāte lohe kutaḥ kanakākṛtiḥ //
analyzed: ciram api bala ādhmāte lohe kutas kanaka ākṛtiḥ
vara mahi mukhe krodha āviṣṭe karau viniveśitau

original: Subhv_0456-2 viṣamapi varaṃ pītvā suptaṃ kṛtāntaniveśane /
analyzed: viṣam api varam pītvā suptam kṛtānta niveśane
giri vara taṭāt muktaḥ ca ātmā varam śatadhā

original: Subhv_0456-4 na tu khalajanāvāptairarthaiḥ kṛtaṃ hitamātmanaḥ //
analyzed: na tu khala jana avāptaiḥ arthaiḥ kṛtam hitam ātmanaḥ

original: Subhv_0457-1 varṇasthaṃ gurulāghavaṃ na gaṇathatyāśaṅkate na kvacid-
analyzed: varṇa stham gurulāghavam na na kvacid

original: Subhv_0457-2 rūpaṃ naiva parīkṣate na puruṣaṃ vṛtteṣu vārtā kutaḥ /
analyzed: rūpam nā eva parīkṣate na puruṣam vṛtteṣu vārtā kutas

original: Subhv_0457-3 kaṣṭaṃ nāyaśaso vibheti mahato naivāpaśabdāntarān-
analyzed: kaṣṭam na ayaśasaḥ vibheti mahataḥ na eva apaśabda antarān
mṛtyuḥ mūrkha kaviḥ khalaḥ ku nṛpatiḥ cauraḥ ca tulya kriyāḥ
siṃhaḥ vyākaraṇasya kartuḥ aharat prāṇān priyān pāṇineḥ

original: Subhv_0458-2 mīṃāṃsākṛtamunmamātha tarasā hastī muniṃ jaiminim /
analyzed: mīṃāṃsā kṛtam unmamātha tarasā hastī munim jaiminim

original: Subhv_0458-3 chandojñānanidhiṃ jaghāna makaro velātaṭe piṅgalam-
analyzed: chandaḥ jñāna nidhim jaghāna makaraḥ velā taṭe piṅgalam
ajñāna āhata cetasām ati ruṣām kaḥ ūrthaḥ tiraścām guṇaiḥ
vandyān nindati duḥkhitān upahasati ābādhate bāndhavān
chūrān dveṣṭi dhana cyutān paribhavati ājñāpayati āśritān
guhyāni prakaṭi karoti ghaṭayan yatnena vaira āśayam
brūte śīghram avācyam ujjhati guṇān gṛhṇāti doṣān khalaḥ
hasati lasati harṣāt tīvra duḥkhe pareṣām
skhalati galati mohāt ātmanaḥ kleśa leśe

original: Subhv_0460-3 nadati vadati nindyaṃ mānināṃ kiṃ ca nīcaḥ
analyzed: nadati vadati nindyam māninām kim ca nīcaḥ
paruṣa vacanam alpam śrāvitaḥ hantum eti
yadi sat saṅga nirataḥ bhaviṣyasi bhaviṣyasi
patiṣyasi patiṣyasi

original: Subhv_0462-1 karṇe tatkathayanti dundubhiravai rāṣṭre yaduddhoṣitaṃ
analyzed: karṇe tat kathayanti dundubhi ravaiḥ rāṣṭre yat uddha uṣitam
tat namra aṅga tayā vadanti karuṇam yasmāt trapāvān bhavet

original: Subhv_0462-3 ślāghante tadudīryate yadariṇāpyugraṃ na marmāntakṛ-
analyzed: ślāghante tat udīryate yat ariṇā api ugram na marma anta kṛ

original: Subhv_0462-4 dye kecinnanu śāvyamaugdhyanidhayaste bhūbhṛtāṃ rañjakāḥ //

analyzed: bhaṇḍaḥ tāṇḍava maṇḍape caṭu kathā vīthīṣu kanthā kaviḥ

original: Subhv_0463-2 goṣṭhaśva svagṛhāṅgaṇe śikharibhūgarte khaṭākhuḥ sphuṭam /
analyzed: goṣṭha śva sva gṛha aṅgaṇe śikhari bhū garte khaṭa ākhuḥ sphuṭam

original: Subhv_0463-3 piṇḍīśūratayā viṭaśva paṭutāṃ bhūbhṛdgṛhe gāhate
analyzed: piṇḍīśūra tayā viṭa śva paṭu tām bhūbhṛt gṛhe gāhate

original: Subhv_0463-4 gacchanti hradakṛṣṭakacchapatulāṃ citraṃ tatonyatra te //
analyzed: gacchanti hrada kṛṣṭa kacchapa tulām citram tatas nyatra te

original: Subhv_0464-1 jāḍyaṃ hrīmati gaṇyate vratarucau dambhaḥ śucau kaitavaṃ
analyzed: jāḍyam hrīmati gaṇyate vrata rucau dambhaḥ śucau kaitavam

original: Subhv_0464-2 śūre nirghṛṇatā ṛjau vimatitā dainyaṃ priyālāpini /
analyzed: śūre nirghṛṇa tā ṛjau vimati tā dainyam priya ālāpini
tejasvini avalipta tā mukhara tā vaktari aśaktiḥ sthire

original: Subhv_0464-4 tatko nāma guṇo bhavedguṇavatāṃ yo durjanairnāṅkitaḥ //
analyzed: tat kaḥ nāma guṇaḥ bhavet guṇavatām yaḥ durjanaiḥ nā aṅkitaḥ
ākhuḥ kailāsa śailam tulayati karaṭaḥ tārkṣya māṃsa abhilāṣī
babhruḥ lāṅgūla mūlam calayati capalaḥ takṣaka ahim jighāṃsuḥ
bhekaḥ pāram yiyāauḥ bhujagam api mahā ghasmarasya amburāśeḥ

original: Subhv_0465-4 prāyeṇāsannapātaḥ smarati samucitaṃ karma na kṣudrakarmā //
analyzed: prāyeṇa āsannapātaḥ smarati samucitam karma na kṣudra karmā
aguṇa kaṇaḥ guṇaḥ rāśiḥ dvayam iha daivāt khala mukhe patitam
prasarati tailam iva ekaḥ salile ghṛta vat jaḍa tvam eti anyaḥ

original: Subhv_0467-1 śaraṇaṃ kiṃ prapannāni viṣavanmārayanti kim /
analyzed: śaraṇam kim prapannāni viṣa vat mārayanti kim

original: Subhv_0467-2 na tyajyante na bhujyante kṛpaṇena dhanāni yat //
analyzed: na tyajyante na bhujyante kṛpaṇena dhanāni yat

original: Subhv_0468-1 kṛpaṇena samo dātā na bhūto na bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: kṛpaṇena samaḥ dātā na bhūtaḥ na bhaviṣyati

original: Subhv_0468-2 aspṛśanneva vittāni yaḥ parebhyaḥ prayacchati //
analyzed: a spṛśan eva vittāni yaḥ parebhyaḥ prayacchati
yā vipattiḥ dhana apāye navā bhogi vadānyayoḥ

original: Subhv_0469-2 prajñāpakarṣātprāgeva prāptā hi kṛpaṇena sā //
analyzed: prajñā apakarṣāt prāk eva prāptā hi kṛpaṇena sā
tyāga upabhoga śūnyena dhanena dhaninaḥ yadi

original: Subhv_0470-2 bhavāmaḥ kiṃ na tenaiva dhanena dhanino vayam //
analyzed: bhavāmaḥ kim na tena eva dhanena dhaninaḥ vayam
gṛha madhya nikhātena dhanena ramate yadi

original: Subhv_0471-2 sa tu tenānusāreṇa ramate kiṃ na meruṇā //
analyzed: sa tu tena anusāreṇa ramate kim na meruṇā

original: Subhv_0472-1 kiṃśuke kiṃ śukaḥ kuryātphalitepi bubhukṣitaḥ /
analyzed: kiṃśuke kim śukaḥ kuryāt phalite api bubhukṣitaḥ
a dātri samṛddhe api kim kuryuḥ upajīvinaḥ

original: Subhv_0473-1 dānopabhogabandhyā yā suhṛdhbiryā na bhujyate /
analyzed: dāna upabhoga bandhyā yā suhṛdhbiḥ yā na bhujyate

original: Subhv_0473-2 puṃsāṃ yadi hi sā lakṣmīralakṣmīḥ katama bhavet //
analyzed: puṃsām yadi hi sā lakṣmīḥ alakṣmīḥ bhavet
ati saṃcaya kart vittam anyasya

original: Subhv_0474-2 anyaiḥ saṃcīyate yatnādanyaiśca madhu pīyate //
analyzed: anyaiḥ saṃcīyate yatnāt anyaiḥ ca madhu pīyate

original: Subhv_0475-1 yaddadāsi viśiṣṭebhyo yadāśnāsi dine dine /
analyzed: yat dadāsi viśiṣṭebhyaḥ yat aśnāsi dine dine

original: Subhv_0475-2 tatte vittamahaṃ manye śeṣaṃ kasyāpi rakṣasi //
analyzed: tat te vittam aham manye śeṣam kasya api rakṣasi
viḍambanā eva puṃsi śrīḥ para praṇaya pāṃsule

original: Subhv_0476-2 kāntiṃ kāmiha kurvīta kuṇau kaṭakakalpanā //
analyzed: kāntim kām iha kurvīta kuṇau kaṭaka kalpanā
kṛtvā upakāram yaḥ tasmāt vāñchati pratyupakriyām
dīnaḥ tṛṣṇā vidheya tvāt vāntam api upaleḍhi saḥ

original: Subhv_0478-1 dānaṃ bhogo nāśastisro gatayo bhavanti vittasya /
analyzed: dānam bhogaḥ nāśaḥ tisraḥ gatayaḥ bhavanti vittasya

original: Subhv_0478-2 yo na dadāti na bhuṅkte tasya tṛtīyā gatirnāśaḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ na dadāti na bhuṅkte tasya tṛtīyā gatiḥ nāśaḥ

original: Subhv_0479-1 dānaṃ bhogaṃ ca vinā dhanasattāmātrakeṇa ceddhaninaḥ /
analyzed: dānam bhogam ca vinā dhana sattā mātrakeṇa ced dhaninaḥ

original: Subhv_0479-2 vayamapi kimiti na dhaninistiṣṭhati naḥ kāñcano meruḥ //
analyzed: vayam api kim iti na dhaniniḥ tiṣṭhati naḥ kāñcanaḥ meruḥ
dhaninā upi adāna bhogāḥ gaṇyante dhuri mahā daridrāṇām

original: Subhv_0480-2 hanti na yataḥ pipāsāmataḥ samudropi marureva //
analyzed: hanti na yatas pipāsām atas samudraḥ api maruḥ eva
abhyupayuktāḥ sadbhiḥ gatāgataiḥ aharahar su nirviṇṇāḥ
kṛpaṇa jana saṃnikarṣam saṃprāpya arthāḥ svapanti iva
upabhoga kātarāṇām puruṣāṇām artha saṃcaya parāṇām
kanyā ratnam iva gṛhe tiṣṭhanti arthāḥ parasya arthe

original: Subhv_0483-1 te mūrkhatarā loke yeṣāṃ dhanamasti nāsti ca tyāgaḥ /
analyzed: te mūrkhatarāḥ loke yeṣām dhanam asti na asti ca tyāgaḥ
kevalam arjuna rakṣaṇa viyoga duḥkhāni anubhavanti
kṛpaṇa samṛddhīnām api bhoktāraḥ santi kecid ati nipuṇāḥ
jala saṃpadā umburāśeḥ yānti layam śaśvat aurva agnau

original: Subhv_0485-1 prāptānapi na labhante bhogānbhoktuṃ svakarmabhiḥ kṛpaṇāḥ /
analyzed: prāptān api na labhante bhogān bhoktum sva karmabhiḥ kṛpaṇāḥ

original: Subhv_0485-2 mukharogaḥ kila bhavati drākṣāpāke balibhujāṃ hi //
analyzed: mukha rogaḥ kila bhavati drākṣā pāke balibhujām hi
na niryiyāsanti kadarya hastāt
dhanāni pāṃsoḥ iva taila leśāḥ
daivāt kadācid viniyoktuḥ eva
nirgantum icchanti asubhiḥ saha eva
saṃcitam kratuṣu na upayujyate
yācitam guṇavate na dīyatye
tat kadarya parirakṣitam dhanam
caura pārthiva gṛheṣu gacchati
varam amī taravaḥ vana gocarāḥ
śakuni sārtha vilupta phala śriyaḥ

original: Subhv_0488-3 na tu dhanāḍhyagṛhāḥ kṛpaṇāḥ phaṇa-
analyzed: na tu dhana āḍhya gṛhāḥ kṛpaṇāḥ phaṇa
nihita ratna bhujaṃgama vṛttayaḥ
su saṃvṛtaiḥ jīvitavat su rakṣitaiḥ
nije api dehe kṛta yantraṇasya ca
tava anumārgam vrajataḥ bhava antare
śaṭhaiḥ dhanaiḥ pañcapadī na pūritā
aho dhanānām mahatī vidagdha tā
sukha uṣitānām kṛpaṇasya veśmani

original: Subhv_0490-3 vrajanti na tyāgadaśāṃ na bhogyatāṃ
analyzed: vrajanti na tyāga daśām na bhogya tām
parām ca kāñcid prathayanti nirvṛtim
na śānta antaḥ tṛṣṇām dhana lavaṇa vāri vyatikaraiḥ
kṣata chāyaḥ kāyaḥ cira virasa rūkṣa aśana tayā
anidrā manda agniḥ nṛpa salila caura anala bhayāt
kadaryāṇām kaṣṭam sphuṭam adhana kaṣṭāt api param
ekaika atiśayālavaḥ para guṇa jñāna eka vaijñānikāḥ
santi ete dhanikāḥ kalāsu sakalāsu ācārya caryā caṇāḥ
api ete sumanaḥ girām niśamanāt bibhyati aho ślāghayā

original: Subhv_0492-4 dhūte mūrdhani kuṇḍale kaṣaṇataḥ kṣīṇe bhavetāmiti //
analyzed: dhūte mūrdhani kuṇḍale kaṣaṇataḥ kṣīṇe bhavetām iti

original: Subhv_0493-1 prītiṃ na prakaṭīkaroti suhṛdi dravyavyayāśaṅkayā
analyzed: prītim na prakaṭīkaroti suhṛdi dravya vyaya āśaṅkayā
bhītaḥ pratyupakāra kāraṇa bhayāt na ākṛṣyate sevayā

original: Subhv_0493-3 mithyā jalpati vittamārgaṇabhayātstutyāpi na prīyate
analyzed: mithyā jalpati vitta mārgaṇa bhayāt stutya api na prīyate
kīnāśaḥ vibhava vyaya vyatikara trastaḥ katham prāṇiti

original: Subhv_0494-1 matvā sāraṃ guṇānāṃ śirasi yadi śaśī sthāpito daivayogā-
analyzed: matvā sāram guṇānām śirasi yadi śaśī sthāpitaḥ daiva yogā

original: Subhv_0494-2 dīśena kṣīṇabimbaṃ sakalamupacayaṃ kiṃ na nītaḥ kṣaṇena /
analyzed: dīśena kṣīṇa bimbam sakalam upacayam kim na nītaḥ kṣaṇena

original: Subhv_0494-3 mithyaivaṃ khyāpayanto guṇini saralatāṃ lokabhaktyarthamuccair-
analyzed: mithyā evam khyāpayantaḥ guṇini sarala tām loka bhakti artham uccais

original: Subhv_0494-4 āḍhyāḥ kurvanti vittavyayacakitadhiyo mānamarthena śūnyam //
analyzed: āḍhyāḥ kurvanti vitta vyaya cakita dhiyaḥ mānam arthena śūnyam
brahmāṇḍa maṇḍalī mātram kim lobhāya manasvinaḥ
śapharī sphuritaiḥ nā abdheḥ kṣubdha tā jātu jāyate
na alpīyasi nibadhnanti padam uddāma cetasaḥ
yeṣām bhuvana lābhe pi niḥsīmānaḥ manorathāḥ
puṃsām unnata cittānām sukha āvaham idam dvayam
sarva saṅga nivṛttiḥ vā vibhūtiḥ vā su vistarā

original: Subhv_0498-1 ayaṃ bandhuḥ paro veti gaṇanā laghucetasām /
analyzed: ayam bandhuḥ paraḥ vā iti gaṇanā laghu cetasām
puṃsām udāra cittānām vasudhā eva kuṭumbakam
jarā maraṇa daurgatya vyādhayaḥ tāvat āsatām

original: Subhv_0499-2 janmaiva kiṃ na dhīrasya bhūyo bhūyastrapākaram //
analyzed: janma eva kim na dhīrasya bhūyas bhūyas trapā karam

original: Subhv_0500-1 parivartini saṃsāre mṛtaḥ ko vā na jāyate /
analyzed: parivartini saṃsāre mṛtaḥ kaḥ vā na jāyate

original: Subhv_0500-2 sa jāto yena jātena yāti vaṃśaḥ samunnatim //
analyzed: sa jātaḥ yena jātena yāti vaṃśaḥ samunnatim

original: Subhv_0501-1 api nāma sa dṛśyeta puruṣātiśayo bhuvi /
analyzed: api nāma sa dṛśyeta puruṣa atiśayaḥ bhuvi
garva ucchūna mukhāḥ yena dhaninaḥ na avalokitāḥ

original: Subhv_0502-1 pṛthvī pṛthvī guṇā mānyāḥ santi bhūpā vivekinaḥ /
analyzed: pṛthvī pṛthvī guṇāḥ mānyāḥ santi bhūpāḥ vivekinaḥ
parābhava āpadam yānti kasmāt unnata buddhayaḥ
adṛṣṭa mukha bhaṅgasya yuktam andhasya yācitum

original: Subhv_0503-2 aho bata mahatkaṣṭaṃ cakṣuṣmānapi yācate //
analyzed: aho bata mahat kaṣṭam cakṣuṣmān api yācate
kaḥ nāma paśyatu
paripūrṇa guṇa ābhoga garima udnāraḥ eva saḥ
trijagat spṛhaṇīye smin na ruciḥ draviṇe api yat

original: Subhv_0506-1 vidyayaiva mado yeṣāṃ kārpaṇyaṃ ca dhane sati /
analyzed: vidyayā eva madaḥ yeṣām kārpaṇyam ca dhane sati
teṣām daiva abhiśaptānām salilāt agniḥ utthitaḥ

original: Subhv_0507-1 kiṃ tayā kriyate lakṣmyā yā vadhūriva kevalā /
analyzed: kim tayā kriyate lakṣmyā yā vadhūḥ iva kevalā

original: Subhv_0507-2 yā na veśyeva sāmānyā pathikairapi bhujyate //
analyzed: yā na veśyā iva sāmānyā pathikaiḥ api bhujyate

original: Subhv_0508-1 tyāgo guṇo vittavatāṃ vittaṃ tyāgavatāṃ guṇaḥ /
analyzed: tyāgaḥ guṇaḥ vittavatām vittam tyāgavatām guṇaḥ
paraspara viyuktau tu vitta tyāgau viḍambanā
kusuma stabakasya iva dvayī vṛttiḥ manasvinaḥ

original: Subhv_0509-2 mūrdhni vā sarvalokasya śīryate vana eva vā //
analyzed: mūrdhni vā sarva lokasya śīryate vane eva vā

original: Subhv_0510-1 nṛṇāṃ dhuri sa evaiko yaḥ kaścittyāgapāṇinā /
analyzed: nṛṇām dhuri saḥ eva ekaḥ yaḥ kaścid tyāga pāṇinā
nirmārṣṭi prārthanā pāṃsu dhūsaram mukham arthinām
ākāra mātra vijñāna saṃpādita manorathāḥ

original: Subhv_0511-2 dhanyāste ye na śṛṇvanti dīnāḥ praṇayināṃ giraḥ //
analyzed: dhanyāḥ te ye na śṛṇvanti dīnāḥ praṇayinām giraḥ

original: Subhv_0512-1 buddhiryā sattvarahitā strītvaṃ tatkevalaṃ matam /
analyzed: buddhiḥ yā sattva rahitā strī tvam tat kevalam matam

original: Subhv_0512-2 sattvaṃ cānayasaṃpannaṃ tatpaśutvaṃ na pauruṣam //
analyzed: sattvam ca anaya saṃpannam tat paśu tvam na pauruṣam
kāmam priyān api prāṇān vimuñcanti manasvinaḥ

original: Subhv_0513-2 icchanti na tvamitrebhyo mahatīmapi satkriyām //
analyzed: icchanti na tu amitrebhyaḥ mahatīm api satkriyām
ati adbhutam imam manye svabhāvam amanasvinaḥ
yat upakriyamāṇaḥ api prīyate na vilīyate
pratyupakurvat pūrvam kṛta upakāram api lajjayati cetaḥ
yaḥ tu vihita upakārāt upakāraḥ saḥ adhikaḥ mṛtyoḥ

original: Subhv_0516-1 pratyupakurvanbahvapi na bhavati pūrvopakāriṇā tulyaḥ /
analyzed: pratyupakurvan bahu api na bhavati pūrva upakāriṇā tulyaḥ
ekaḥ anukaroti kṛtam niṣkāraṇam eva kurutenyaḥ

original: Subhv_0517-1 jīvañjīvayati hi yo jñātijanaṃ parijanaṃ ca suhṛdaśca /
analyzed: jīvan jīvayati hi yaḥ jñāti janam parijanam ca suhṛdaḥ ca
tasya saphalā gṛha śrīḥ dhik anupajīvyām dhana samṛddhim
yacchan jalam api jaladaḥ vallabha tām eti sarva lokasya
nityam prasārita karaḥ savitām api bhavati acakṣuṣyaḥ

original: Subhv_0519-1 nāptaṃ yatkenacidapi manorathā api yato nivartante /
analyzed: na āptam yat kenacid api manorathāḥ api yatas nivartante
tadī api na kim abhimāna phalam

original: Subhv_0520-1 ghaṭanaṃ vighaṭanamathavā kāryāṇāṃ bhavati vidhiniyogena /
analyzed: ghaṭanam vighaṭanam athavā kāryāṇām bhavati vidhi niyogena
ucite nucite karmaṇi vṛtti nivṛttī mama āyatte

original: Subhv_0521-1 kalpasthāyi na jīvitamaiścaryaṃ nāpyate ca yadabhimatam /
analyzed: kalpa sthāyi na jīvitam aiścaryam na āpyate ca yat abhimatam
lokaḥ tathā api akāryam kurute kāryam kim uddiśya
dhana bāhulyam ahetuḥ kopi nisargeṇa mukta karaḥ
prāvṛṣi kasya ambumucaḥ saṃpattiḥ kim adhika ambunidheḥ
utpāditā svayam iyam yadi tad tanūjā

original: Subhv_0523-2 tātena vā yadi tadā bhaginī khalu śrīḥ /
analyzed: tātena vā yadi tadā bhaginī khalu śrīḥ
yadi anya saṃgamavatī ca tadā para strī
tad tyāga baddha manasaḥ sudhiyaḥ bhavanti
draviṇa arjana jaḥ pariśramaḥ
draviṇa arjanam ātma tuṣṭaye
param āvarjayitum guṇa arjanam
yaḥ praśaṃsati naraḥ naram anyam
devatāsu vara dāsu satīṣu
mugdha dhīḥ dhana lava spṛhayāluḥ
tam nṛśaṃsam aham ādyam avaimi
yathā śarīram kila jīvitena
vinākṛtam kāṣṭham iva avabhāti
tathā eva lajjī vitam api avaimi
lokottareṇa sphuritena śūnyam

original: Subhv_0527-1 santopi santaḥ kva kirantu tejaḥ
analyzed: santaḥ api santaḥ kva kirantu tejaḥ

original: Subhv_0527-2 kva nojjvalantu kva nu na prathantām /
analyzed: kva nā ujjvalantu kva nu na prathantām
vidhāya ruddhā nanu vedhasā eva
brahmāṇḍakośe ghaṭa dīpa kalpāḥ
kadarthitasya api hi dhairya vṛtteḥ
na śakyate sattva guṇaḥ pramārṣṭum
adhomukhasya api kṛtasya vahneḥ
na adhas śikhāḥ yānti kadācid eva

original: Subhv_0529-1 jātaśca nāma na vinaṅkṣyanti cetyayuktam-
analyzed: jātaḥ ca nāma na vinaṅkṣyanti ca iti ayuktam
utpādaḥ eva niyama iva vināśa hetuḥ
tulye ca nāma maraṇa vyasana upatāpe
mṛtyuḥ varam para hita avahita āśayasya
iyati api etasmin niravadhi mahati adhvani guṇāḥ

original: Subhv_0530-2 ta evāmī dvitrā jaraṭhajaraṭhā yānti gaṇanām /
analyzed: te eva amī dvitrāḥ jaraṭha jaraṭhāḥ yānti gaṇanām

original: Subhv_0530-3 aho grāmyo lokaḥ sa na paramamībhiḥ kṛtadhṛtiḥ
analyzed: aho grāmyaḥ lokaḥ sa na param amībhiḥ kṛta dhṛtiḥ
smaya stabdhaḥ yāvat kalayati samagram tṛṇam idam
sva citta paricintayā eva paritāpam ātmani amī

original: Subhv_0531-2 na bibhrati manāsvino yadamunā na tāvatkṣatiḥ /
analyzed: na bibhrati manāsvinaḥ yat amunā na tāvat kṣatiḥ
aharniśam iha eva ye para manaḥ nuvṛttyā punar
vahanti vijigīṣu tām kim iva te nukampā āspadam
vipula hṛdayaiḥ anyaiḥ kaiścid jagat janitam purā
vidhṛtam aparaiḥ dattam ca anyaiḥ vijitya tṛṇam yathā

original: Subhv_0532-3 iha hi bhuvanānyanye dhīrāścaturdaśa bhuñjate
analyzed: iha hi bhuvanāni anye dhīrāḥ caturdaśa bhuñjate

original: Subhv_0532-4 katipayapurasvāmye puṃsāṃ ka eṣa madajvaraḥ //
analyzed: katipaya pura svāmye puṃsām kaḥ eṣa mada jvaraḥ

original: Subhv_0533-1 abhuktāyāṃ yasyāṃ kṣaṇamapi na yātaṃ nṛpaśatair-
analyzed: abhuktāyām yasyām kṣaṇam api na yātam nṛpa śataiḥ

original: Subhv_0533-2 bhuvastasyā lābhe ka iva bahumānaḥ kṣitibhujām /
analyzed: bhuvaḥ tasyāḥ lābhe kaḥ iva bahu mānaḥ kṣitibhujām
tad aṃśasya api aṃśe tad avayava leśe pi

original: Subhv_0533-4 viṣāde kartavye vidadhati jaḍāḥ pratyuta mudam //
analyzed: viṣāde kartavye vidadhati jaḍāḥ pratyuta mudam
pareṣām cetāṃsi pratidivasam āyāsya bahudhā

original: Subhv_0534-2 prasādaṃ kiṃ netuṃ viśāsi hṛdaya kleśakalilam /
analyzed: prasādam kim netum viśāsi hṛdaya kleśa kalilam
prasanne tvayi eva svayam udita cintāmaṇi guṇe

original: Subhv_0534-4 viviktaḥ saṃkalpaḥ kimabhilaṣitaṃ puṣyati na te //
analyzed: viviktaḥ saṃkalpaḥ kim abhilaṣitam puṣyati na te
vinā api arthaiḥ dhīraḥ spṛśati bahu māna unnati padam
pariṣvaktaḥ api arthaiḥ paribhava padam yāti kṛpaṇaḥ
svabhāvena udbhūtām guṇa samudaya avāpti vipulām

original: Subhv_0535-4 dyutiṃ saiṃhīṃ na śvā dhṛtakanakamālopi labhate //
analyzed: dyutim saiṃhīm na śvā dhṛta kanaka mālopi labhate

original: Subhv_0536-1 bhujyante svagṛhasthitā iva sukhaṃ yasyāthibhiḥ saṃpadaḥ
analyzed: bhujyante sva gṛha sthitāḥ iva sukham yasya āthibhiḥ saṃpadaḥ

original: Subhv_0536-2 paṭvī yasya matistamaḥprahataye dvāveva tau prāṇitaḥ /
analyzed: paṭvī yasya matiḥ tamaḥ prahataye dvau eva tau
yaḥ tu ātmaṃbhariḥ unnate api vibhave hīnaḥ ca vidvas tayā
tasya ālekhya maṇeḥ iva ākṛti dhṛtaḥ sattā api asattā nanu
ādhārāya dharā avakāśa vidhaye pi ākāśam ālokane

original: Subhv_0537-3 ityasminnupakārakāriṇi sadā varge paraṃ dustyaje
analyzed: iti asmin upakāra kāriṇi sadā varge param dustyaje
dainya vrīḍa kalaṅkam ujjhatu katham cetaḥ mahā cetasām

original: Subhv_0538-1 nityaṃ yā gurubhṛtyabandhusujanairna svecchayā bhujyate
analyzed: nityam yā guru bhṛtya bandhu su janaiḥ na sva icchayā bhujyate

original: Subhv_0538-2 paśyanti spṛhayālavo na ripavo yāṃ vikramāsāditām /
analyzed: paśyanti spṛhayālavaḥ na ripavaḥ yām vikrama āsāditām

original: Subhv_0538-3 yasyāḥ sādhuparikṣayeṇa suhṛdāṃ nāśena vā saṃbhavo
analyzed: yasyāḥ sādhu parikṣayeṇa suhṛdām nāśena vā

original: Subhv_0538-4 no saṃpadvipadeva sā guṇavatāṃ prītistayā kīdṛśī //
analyzed: no saṃpad vipadā iva sā guṇavatām prītiḥ tayā kīdṛśī
nyāyyam mārgam anujjhataḥ su kṛtinaḥ daivāt bhavanti āpadaḥ

original: Subhv_0539-2 yāstāḥ santu balerivādipuruṣāyorvīṃ svayaṃ yacchataḥ /
analyzed: yāḥ tāḥ santu baleḥ iva ādipuruṣāya urvīm svayam yacchataḥ
śakrasya iva jugupsitaiḥ su bahubhiḥ nindyaiḥ bhṛśam karmabhiḥ

original: Subhv_0539-4 devānāmupari prabhutvamapi me mā bhūttrapākāraṇam //
analyzed: devānām upari prabhu tvam api me mā bhūt trapā kāraṇam

original: Subhv_0540-1 śayyā śādvalamāsanaṃ śuciśilā sadma dramāṇāmadhaḥ
analyzed: śayyā śādvalam āsanam śuci śilā sadma dramāṇām adhas

original: Subhv_0540-2 śītaṃ nirjharavāri pānamaśanaṃ kandāḥ sahāyā mṛgāḥ /
analyzed: śītam nirjhara vāri pānam aśanam kandāḥ sahāyāḥ mṛgāḥ
iti prārthita sarva labhya vibhave doṣaḥ yam ekaḥ vane
duṣprāpa arthini yat parārtha ghaṭana avandhyaiḥ vṛthā sthīyate
alpīyasām eva hi janma bhūmeḥ

original: Subhv_0541-2 tyāgaḥ pramādo viduṣāṃ na sosti /
analyzed: tyāgaḥ pramādaḥ viduṣām na saḥ asti
sthānāt apetāḥ maṇayaḥ vrajanti
rājñām śiraḥ kāka mukhāni bhekāḥ
śūrāḥ ca kṛtavidyāḥ ca rūpavatyaḥ ca yoṣitaḥ

original: Subhv_0542-2 yatra yatra gamiṣyanti tatra tatra kṛtālayāḥ //
analyzed: yatra yatra gamiṣyanti tatra tatra kṛta ālayāḥ

original: Subhv_0543-1 rudrodriṃ jaladhiṃ harirdiviṣado dūraṃ vihāyaḥ śritā
analyzed: rudra udrim jaladhim hariḥ diviṣadaḥ dūram vihāyaḥ śritā

original: Subhv_0543-2 bhogīndrāḥ prabalā api prathamataḥ pātālamūle sthitāḥ /
analyzed: bhogi indrāḥ prabalāḥ api prathamatas pātāla mūle sthitāḥ
līnā padma vane saroja nilayā manyā īrthi sārthāt bhiyā
dīna uddhāra parāyaṇāḥ kali yuge sat pūruṣāḥ kevalam

original: Subhv_0544-1 prārabhyate na khalu vighnabhayena nīcaiḥ
analyzed: prārabhyate na khalu vighna bhayena nīcaiḥ
prārabhya vighna vihatāḥ viramanti madhyāḥ
vighnaiḥ sahasra guṇitaiḥ api hanyamānāḥ
prārabdham uttama guṇāḥ na parityajanti

original: Subhv_0545-1 prasaradbhiḥ karairyasya vikasanti na sadguṇāḥ /
analyzed: prasaradbhiḥ karaiḥ yasya vikasanti na sat guṇāḥ

original: Subhv_0545-2 tasya doṣākarasyeyaṃ kathaṃ nityāsti pūrṇatā //
analyzed: tasya doṣa ākarasya iyam katham nityā asti pūrṇa tā

original: Subhv_0546-1 kṣīṇaḥ kṣīṇaḥ samīpatvaṃ pūrṇaḥ pūrṇotidūratām /
analyzed: kṣīṇaḥ kṣīṇaḥ samīpa tvam pūrṇaḥ pūrṇa uti dūra tām

original: Subhv_0546-2 upaiti mitrādyaccandro yuktaṃ yanmalinaḥ sadā //
analyzed: upaiti mitrāt yat candraḥ yuktam yat malinaḥ sadā

original: Subhv_0547-1 kathaṃ na lajjitastādṛksavitā tejasāṃ nidhiḥ /
analyzed: katham na lajjitaḥ tādṛś savitā tejasām nidhiḥ
brahmāṇḍa khaṇḍikām prāpya kurvan pāda prasārikām
raveḥ eva udayaḥ ślāghyaḥ kaḥ nyeṣām udaya grahaḥ

original: Subhv_0548-2 na tamāṃsi na tejāṃsi yasminnabhyudite sati //
analyzed: na tamāṃsi na tejāṃsi yasmin abhyudite sati

original: Subhv_0549-1 kimanena na paryāptaṃ kāntatvaṃ śaśalakṣmaṇā /
analyzed: kim anena na paryāptam kānta tvam śaśalakṣmaṇā
su saṃtaptā api nalinī yat viśvāsam upāgamat
karān prasārya raviṇā dakṣiṇa āśā vilambinā
na kevalam anena ātmā divasaḥ api laghūkṛtaḥ

original: Subhv_0551-1 vartate yena pātaṅgiḥ ṣaṇmāsāndvau ca vatsarau /
analyzed: vartate yena pātaṅgiḥ ṣaṣ māsān dvau ca vatsarau

original: Subhv_0551-2 rāśiḥ sa eva candrasya na yāti divasatrayam //
analyzed: rāśiḥ saḥ eva candrasya na yāti divasa trayam

original: Subhv_0552-1 śirasā dhāryamāṇopi somaḥ somena śaṃbhunā /
analyzed: śirasā dhāryamāṇaḥ api somaḥ somena śaṃbhunā

original: Subhv_0552-2 tathāpi kṛśatāṃ dhatte kaṣṭaḥ khalu parāśrayaḥ //
analyzed: tathā api kṛśa tām dhatte kaṣṭaḥ khalu para āśrayaḥ
pa pājakasya
patatu vāriṇi yātu digantaram

original: Subhv_0552-5 viśatu vahnimatho vrajatu kṣitim kathaṃ sa dantarahitaḥ sūryaḥ sūribhirucyate /
analyzed: viśatu vahnim atho vrajatu kṣitim katham sa danta rahitaḥ sūryaḥ sūribhiḥ ucyate

original: Subhv_0552-6 yo mīnarāśiṃ bhuktvaiva meṣaṃ bhoktuṃ samudyataḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ mīna rāśim bhuktvā eva meṣam bhoktum samudyataḥ
patatu vāriṇi yātu digantaram
viśatu vahnim atho vrajatu kṣitim
ravi rasau iyatā asya guṇeṣu kā
tat tāvat eva śaśinaḥ sphuritam mahīyaḥ
yāvat no tīkṣṇa ruci maṇḍalam abhyupaiti
abhyudyate sakala dhāma nidhau ca tasmin

original: Subhv_0555-4 nindoḥ sitābhraśakalasya ca ko viśeṣaḥ //
analyzed: nindoḥ sita abhra śakalasya ca kaḥ viśeṣaḥ
sat vṛttayaḥ sat asat artha vivekinaḥ ye
te paśya kīdṛśam amum samudāharanti
caura asatī prabhṛtayaḥ bruvate yat asya
tat gṛhyate yadi kṛtam tat ahaskareṇa
ekā eva sā amṛta mayī sutarām anarghā
kā api asti asau śaśadharasya kalā yayā eva
āropitaḥ guṇa vidā parameśvareṇa
cūḍāmaṇau na gaṇitaḥ usya kalaṅka doṣaḥ
udyanti amūni su bahūni mahā mahāṃsi
candraḥ upi alam bhuvana maṇḍala maṇḍanāya

original: Subhv_0558-3 sūryādṛte na tadudeti na cāstameti
analyzed: sūryāt ṛte na tat udeti na ca astam eti
yena uditena dinam astamitena rātriḥ

original: Subhv_0559-1 lokānandādviramati na yaḥ kṣīyamāṇopi bhūyaḥ
analyzed: loka ānandāt viramati na yaḥ kṣīyamāṇaḥ api bhūyas

original: Subhv_0559-2 svaḥsthe tasminkila dinamukhaṃ nūtanaṃ nābhaviṣyat /
analyzed: svaḥsthe tasmin kila dina mukham nūtanam nā abhaviṣyat
daivam kīdṛś katham api yathā bhartum ātmānam eva

original: Subhv_0559-4 vyagraḥ kālaṃ gamayati sakhe sopyayaṃ paśya candraḥ //
analyzed: vyagraḥ kālam gamayati sakhe saḥ upi ayam paśya candraḥ

original: Subhv_0560-1 kṣīṇaścandro viśāti taraṇermaṇḍalaṃ māsi māsi
analyzed: kṣīṇaḥ candraḥ viśāti taraṇeḥ maṇḍalam māsi māsi
labdhvā kāṃcid punar api kalām dūra dūra anuvartī
saṃpūrṇaḥ ced katham api tathā spardhayā udeti bhānoḥ

original: Subhv_0560-4 no daurjanyādviramati jaḍo nāpi dainyādvyaraṃsīt //
analyzed: no daurjanyāt viramati jaḍaḥ nā api dainyāt vyaraṃsīt
pāda nyāsam kṣitidhara guroḥ mūrdhni kṛtvā sumeroḥ

original: Subhv_0561-2 krāntaṃ yena kṣapitatamasā madhyamaṃ dhāma viṣṇoḥ /
analyzed: krāntam yena kṣapita tamasā madhyamam dhāma viṣṇoḥ
saḥ ayam candraḥ patati gaganāt alpa śeṣaiḥ mayūkhaiḥ
dūra ārohaḥ bhavati mahatām api upabhraṃśa niṣṭhaḥ
kalaśakasya

original: Subhv_0561-6 pātaḥ pūṣṇo bhavati mahate nopatāpāya yasmāt-
analyzed: pātaḥ pūṣṇaḥ bhavati mahate na upatāpāya yasmāt

original: Subhv_0561-7 kālenāstaṃ ka iva na gatā yānti yāsyanti cānye kva tattejastādṛgjvalanamahaso nāśapiśunaṃ
analyzed: kālena astam kaḥ iva na gatāḥ yānti yāsyanti ca anye kva tat tejaḥ tādṛś jvalana mahasaḥ nāśa piśunam
parābhūtiḥ kva asau visadṛśatarāt rāhuśirasaḥ
vidheḥ yogāt etat samucitam idam tu vyathayati
trapā hīnaḥ mitrāt tat api gagane yat viharati

original: Subhv_0563-1 pātaḥ pūṣṇo bhavati mahate nopatāpāya yasmāt-
analyzed: pātaḥ pūṣṇaḥ bhavati mahate na upatāpāya yasmāt

original: Subhv_0563-2 kālenāstaṃ ka iva na gatā yānti yāsyanti cānye /
analyzed: kālena astam kaḥ iva na gatāḥ yānti yāsyanti ca anye
etāvat tu vyathayati yat āloka bāhyaiḥ tamobhiḥ
tasmin eva prakṛti mahati vyomni labdhaḥ uvakāśaḥ

original: Subhv_0564-1 ā sargātprativāsaraṃ rasaśatairyā bodhitā poṣitā
analyzed: ā sargāt prativāsaram rasa śataiḥ yā bodhitā poṣitā

original: Subhv_0564-2 kalpāntāvasaretha saiva pṛthivī svaireva dagdhā karaiḥ /
analyzed: sā eva pṛthivī svaiḥ eva dagdhā karaiḥ

original: Subhv_0564-3 kṛtvetthaṃ kimapi svakarma niyateḥ pūrvāparopaplutaṃ
analyzed: kṛtvā ittham kim api sva karma niyateḥ pūrva apara upaplutam
kaṣṭam saḥ api dina anta vīta kiraṇaḥ tigmāṃśuḥ astam gataḥ

original: Subhv_0565-1 yenonmathya tamāṃsi māṃsalaghanaspardhīni sarvaṃ jagac-
analyzed: yena unmathya tamāṃsi māṃsala ghana spardhīni sarvam jagat
cakṣuṣmat paramārthataḥ kṛtam idam devena tigmatviṣā

original: Subhv_0565-3 tasminnastamite vivasvati kiyānkrūro jano durjano
analyzed: tasmin astamite vivasvati kiyān krūraḥ janaḥ durjanaḥ
yat badhnāti dhṛtim

original: Subhv_0566-1 śocyastāvadumāpatiḥ prabhutayā yo mūrdhni gaṅgokṣite
analyzed: śocyaḥ tāvat umāpatiḥ prabhu tayā yaḥ mūrdhni gaṅgā ukṣite

original: Subhv_0566-2 sacchidraṃ nṛśiraḥkapālamamalaṃ candraṃ ca dhatte samam /
analyzed: sa chidram nṛ śiraḥ kapālam amalam candram ca dhatte samam

original: Subhv_0566-3 candraḥ śocyatarastataḥ paribhavepyevaṃvidhe yaḥ sati
analyzed: candraḥ śocyataraḥ tatas paribhave pi evaṃvidhe yaḥ sati
pūrṇam vīci bhujaiḥ sva vṛddhi rabhasa ādi nndum samāliṅgati

original: Subhv_0567-2 kṣīṇaṃ dūrata eva muñcati pitā bhūtvā jalānāṃ nidhiḥ /
analyzed: kṣīṇam dūratas eva muñcati pitā bhūtvā jalānām nidhiḥ

original: Subhv_0567-3 prakṣīṇasya tu yena tasya vasunā kṛtvā krameṇodayaṃ
analyzed: prakṣīṇasya tu yena tasya vasunā kṛtvā krameṇa udayam

original: Subhv_0567-4 pūrṇatve ca davīyasi sthitamaho mitrāya tasmai namaḥ //
analyzed: pūrṇa tve ca davīyasi sthitam ahar mitrāya tasmai namaḥ
dhvāntena grathitaiḥ graha kṣitipateḥ devasya dūra sthiteḥ
sat cakra pramadā vaha abhyudita tā kaiḥ nāma na ākāṅkṣitā

original: Subhv_0568-3 etenābhyuditena saṃprati punaḥ kaṣṭaṃ tathā ceṣṭitaṃ
analyzed: etena abhyuditena saṃprati punar kaṣṭam tathā ceṣṭitam
lokaḥ tīkṣṇa karaḥ yam iti abhimukham na enam yathā prekṣate
dṛṣṭā eva yam kara sahasra hṛta andhakāram
bhītyā apayānti anudinam śataśas piśācāḥ
kṣīṇe vidhau citram
gṛhṇāti tam dyu maṇim abhra piśācaḥ ekaḥ

original: Subhv_0570-1 tamograstaṃ jagatsarvaṃ trātuṃ bhānuḥ sadodyataḥ /
analyzed: tamaḥ grastam jagat sarvam trātum bhānuḥ sadā udyataḥ

original: Subhv_0570-2 taṃ tu trātuṃ tamograstaṃ jagatyekopi na kṣamaḥ //
analyzed: tam tu trātum tamaḥ grastam jagati ekaḥ api na kṣamaḥ
rātrau guṇa nidheḥ padmāt kumudam yat anakṣaram

original: Subhv_0571-2 prāptā lakṣmīḥ sa mahimā rājño jaḍanidherdhruvam //
analyzed: prāptā lakṣmīḥ sa mahimā rājñaḥ jaḍa nidheḥ dhruvam

original: Subhv_0572-1 ābhāti candrarahitā na kadāpi rātriś-
analyzed: ābhāti candra rahitā na kadāpi rātriḥ
candraḥ api rātri rahitaḥ gata kāntiḥ eva
kim kāraṇam yat anayoḥ pratimāsam ekaḥ
jātaḥ nistara tayā parirambha yogaḥ
gagana śayana līnām rātrim utsṛjya candraḥ

original: Subhv_0573-2 vrajati dhavalapakṣe kṛṣṇapakṣe tu rātriḥ /
analyzed: vrajati dhavala pakṣe kṛṣṇa pakṣe tu rātriḥ
apasarati yadi indoḥ vyomatalpe prasuptāt

original: Subhv_0573-4 truṭati tadanayoḥ kiṃ tāvatā dampatitvam //
analyzed: truṭati tat anayoḥ kim tāvatā dampati tvam
āśāḥ prakāśayati yaḥ timirāṇi bhaṅktvā
bodham dṛśām diśati bhūri guṇeṣu abhīṣṭaḥ
khedāya yasya na para upakṛtiṣu aṭāṭyā
dhīmān namasyati na kaḥ taminam praśasyam

original: Subhv_0575-1 vicārastathyo vā bhavatu vitatho vā kimaparaṃ
analyzed: vicāraḥ tathyaḥ vā bhavatu vitathaḥ vā kim aparam
tathā api uccais dhāmnaḥ bhavati bahu jalpaḥ jana ravaḥ
tulā uttīrṇasya api prathita mahima dhvasta tamasaḥ

original: Subhv_0575-4 ravestādṛktejo na bhavati hi kanyāṃ gata iti //
analyzed: raveḥ tādṛś tejaḥ na bhavati hi kanyām gataḥ iti
uḍu gaṇa parivāraḥ
amṛta maya śarīraḥ kānti yuktaḥ api candraḥ
bhavati vigata raśmiḥ maṇḍalam prāpya bhānoḥ

original: Subhv_0576-4 parasadananiviṣṭaḥ ko laghutvaṃ na yāti //
analyzed: para sadana niviṣṭaḥ kaḥ laghu tvam na yāti
uccaḥ sat phala daḥ yathā ayam aham api etādṛś etāvatā

original: Subhv_0577-2 spardhāṃ manda madoddhataḥ svajanakenārkeṇa mā mā kṛthāḥ /
analyzed: spardhām manda mada uddhataḥ sva janakena arkeṇa mā mā kṛthāḥ

original: Subhv_0577-3 dūrādeva bhavādṛśosya mahasā dhvastāḥ samastāḥ svayaṃ
analyzed: dūrāt eva bhavādṛśaḥ asya mahasā dhvastāḥ samastāḥ svayam
na evā icchati ayam atyayam guṇi sakhaḥ kasya api tejaḥ nidhiḥ
tulyā sukha sthitiḥ amuṣya mama iti rājñi
spardhām nije pi janake jana keli hetau

original: Subhv_0578-3 mā rājanandana kṛthāḥ sa hi sarvaloka-
analyzed: mā rāja nandana kṛthāḥ sa hi sarva loka
mātsaryeṇa jahat graha anvi sadṛśe dhūmadhvaje yogya tām
jñātvā svām vidadhat tviṣam dinapatiḥ hāsya praśānti unmukhaḥ

original: Subhv_0579-3 daivaṃ vetti na yaḥ śikhī sa parato nāmāstu tatsaṃbhavāḥ
analyzed: daivam vetti na yaḥ śikhī sa paratas nāma astu tad saṃbhavāḥ

original: Subhv_0579-4 syurdīpā api yadvaśena jagatāṃ tigmāṃśuvismārakāḥ //
analyzed: syuḥ dīpāḥ api yad vaśena jagatām tigmāṃśu vismārakāḥ

original: Subhv_0580-1 pādmā ye madanuvratā dadhati te klāntiṃ tuṣārāhatā
analyzed: pādmāḥ ye mad anuvratāḥ dadhati te klāntim tuṣāra āhatā

original: Subhv_0580-2 yepyete divasā madekaśaraṇāḥ kārśyaṃ paraṃ yānti te /
analyzed: ye pi ete divasāḥ mad eka śaraṇāḥ kārśyam param yānti te
gacchan ittham asau samāśrita jana prītyā iva dūrām diśam

original: Subhv_0580-4 hemante bhagavānaharpatiraho loke gataḥ sevyatām //
analyzed: hemante bhagavān aharpatiḥ aho loke gataḥ sevyatām

original: Subhv_0581-1 nābhiṣeko na saṃskāraḥ siṃhasya kriyate vane /
analyzed: na abhiṣekaḥ na saṃskāraḥ siṃhasya kriyate vane
vikrama arjita sattvasya svayam eva mṛgendra tā
ekaḥ aham asahāyaḥ ūham kṛśaḥ aham aparicchadaḥ

original: Subhv_0582-2 svapnepyevaṃvidhā cintā mṛgendrasya na jāyate //
analyzed: svapne pi evaṃvidhā cintā mṛgendrasya na jāyate
matta ibha kumbha nirbheda kaṭhora nakhara aśaniḥ

original: Subhv_0583-2 mṛgāririti nāmnaiva laghutvaṃ yāti kesarī //
analyzed: mṛgāriḥ iti nāmnā eva laghu tvam yāti kesarī
patanti nā eva mātaṅga kumbha pāṭana lampaṭāḥ
valgatsu api kuraṅgeṣu mṛgāreḥ nakharāḥ kharāḥ

original: Subhv_0585-1 kiṃ kirmaḥ ka upālabhyo yatredamasamañjasam /
analyzed: kim kirmaḥ kaḥ upālabhyaḥ yatra idam asamañjasam

original: Subhv_0585-2 kākiṇyapi na siṃhasya mūlyaṃ koṭistu dantinaḥ //
analyzed: kākiṇī api na siṃhasya mūlyam koṭiḥ tu dantinaḥ
līlā dalita dhṛṣṭa ibha kumbha pīṭhasya nirbhayaiḥ

original: Subhv_0586-2 kathaṃ kesariṇaḥ krāntaṃ suptasyāpi mṛgaiḥ padam //
analyzed: katham kesariṇaḥ krāntam suptasya api mṛgaiḥ padam
matta ibha kumbha nirbheda rudhira aruṇa pāṇinā

original: Subhv_0587-2 hariṇā hariṇaḥ spardhāṃ varākaḥ kurute katham //
analyzed: hariṇā hariṇaḥ spardhām varākaḥ kurute katham
tāvat garjati mātaṅgaḥ vane mada bhara alasaḥ
śiraḥ vilagna lāṅgūlaḥ yāvat na āyāti kesarī
śaurya darpa bala ādhmāta śvasat gaṇḍa anta śobhinaḥ

original: Subhv_0589-2 saṭāmutpāṭya siṃhasya kiṃ narāḥ sukhamāsate //
analyzed: saṭām utpāṭya siṃhasya kim narāḥ sukham āsate
kopa udeka tala āghāta nipatat matta dantinaḥ
hareḥ hariṇa yuddhe isya kiyān vyākṣepa vistaraḥ

original: Subhv_0591-1 yāvadasthiṣu saṃlagnāḥ karāḥ kesariṇaḥ kṣaṇam /
analyzed: yāvat asthiṣu saṃlagnāḥ karāḥ kesariṇaḥ kṣaṇam
yūthasya prāṇitam tāvat tat araṇya nivāsinaḥ
sa grva garjat gaja gaṇḍa maṇḍalī
ananta viśrānta kuraṅga saṃgara
prasaṅgam aṅgīkurute katham hariḥ

original: Subhv_0593-1 siṃhaḥ śiśurapi nipatati madamalinakapolabhittiṣu gajeṣu /
analyzed: siṃhaḥ śiśuḥ api nipatati mada malina kapolabhittiṣu gajeṣu

original: Subhv_0593-2 prakṛtiriyaṃ sattvavatāṃ na khalu vayastejaso hetuḥ //
analyzed: prakṛtiḥ iyam sattvavatām na khalu vayaḥ tejasaḥ hetuḥ
ekākini

original: Subhv_0594-2 sattvocchrite mṛgapatau rājeti giraḥ pariṇamanti //
analyzed: sattva ucchrite mṛgapatau rājā iti giraḥ pariṇamanti

original: Subhv_0595-1 siṃhaḥ karoti vikramamalijhāṅkārāṅkite kare kariṇaḥ /
analyzed: siṃhaḥ karoti vikramam ali jhāṅkāra aṅkite kare kariṇaḥ
na punar nakha mukha vilikhita bhūdhara kuhara sthite nakule
sa mada kari kumbha dāraṇa mada paṅka churita kesara saṭasya

original: Subhv_0596-2 siṃhasya ka iva vaktre karatalamādhātumutsahate //
analyzed: siṃhasya kaḥ iva vaktre kara talam ādhātum utsahate
niṣpragraheṣu kari pota śateṣu mohāt
valgatsu bāliśa tayā puratas api aṭatsu
matta ibha kumbha dalana ucita cittavṛtteḥ
siṃhasya locana nimīlanam eva yuktam
dṛṣṭvā eva roṣa vaśa ghūrṇita kesara aṃsa
māyā antam antaka samam puratas mṛgārim
māṃsam cikhādiṣubhiḥ etya patatri pūgaiḥ
bhrāntam mada andha gaja yūthapa mastakeṣu
yaḥ kesarī khara nakha krakaca ugra pāṇi
nirdārita ibha vara kumbha samudbhavena
navyena śoṇita cayena nirasta tṛṣṇo

original: Subhv_0599-4 nityaṃ babhūva dhigahodya tṛṇena sorthī //
analyzed: nityam babhūva dhigahodya tṛṇena sorthī

original: Subhv_0600-1 visraṃ vapuḥ paravadhapravaṇā ca buddhis-
analyzed: visram vapuḥ para vadha pravaṇā ca buddhiḥ
tiryak tayā eva kathitaḥ sat asat vivekaḥ

original: Subhv_0600-3 itthaṃ na kiṃcidapi sādhu mṛgādhipasya
analyzed: ittham na kiṃcid api sādhu mṛgādhipasya
tejaḥ tu tat sphurati yena jagat varākam
siṃhoḥ tu śatruḥ athavā adhipatiḥ mṛgāṇām

original: Subhv_0601-2 śaṃsāspadaṃ tadapi na dvayameva manye /
analyzed: śaṃsa āspadam tat api na dvayam eva manye
tasya sphurat karaja vajra śiraḥ abhighāta
helā nipātita mataṅga ja jaṅgama adreḥ
preṅkhat mayūkha nakha pāta śikhā nikhāta
vikhyāta vāraṇa gaṇasya hareḥ guhāyām
kroṣṭā nikṛṣṭa saramā suta dṛṣṭi naṣṭa

original: Subhv_0602-4 dhārṣṭyo niviṣṭa iti kaṣṭamihādya dṛṣṭam //
analyzed: dhārṣṭyaḥ niviṣṭaḥ iti kaṣṭam iha adya dṛṣṭam
matta ibha kumbha dalana ākula lola valga
dantaḥ kvaṇat karaja vajra śikhā abhighātaḥ
kim kesarī jagati māna nidhiḥ tṛṇena
prāṇa atyaye api kurute sva śarīra yātrām

original: Subhv_0604-1 viśvasya sthitaye dhanurdharatayā garjantamuccaiḥ pade
analyzed: viśvasya sthitaye dhanurdhara tayā garjantam uccais pade
megham danti mada anta durlalita dhīḥ mā siṃha lālaṅghiṣīḥ
asmāt vajra vidārita kṣitibhṛtaḥ mā pāti varṣopalaiḥ
jhampā lampaṭa bhāva bhāvi patanāt cintya ūṅga bhaṅgaḥ svayam
khara nakhara nikhāta uttuṅga mātaṅga kumbha
sthala vigalita muktā alaṃkṛta kṣmā talasya
harati hariṇa vṛndam kim hareḥ vairam ājau
militam api samantāt eka kāryeṇa kṛtsnam
anukṛta gaṇḍa śaila mada maṇḍita gaṇḍa taṭa
bhramat ali maṇḍalī nibiḍa guṃguma ghoṣa juṣaḥ
dalayati helayā eva hariḥ ugra karān kariṇaḥ

original: Subhv_0606-4 trijagati teja eva guru no vikṛtākṛtitā //
analyzed: trijagati tejaḥ eva guru no vikṛta ākṛti tā
śaila śreṇi guhā gṛheṣu nivasan jīvan nija āḍambaraiḥ
a vyāja ūrjita vikramaḥ mṛgapatiḥ vīra indra mā kupyatām
asmāt kuñjara kumbha saṃbhava vasā apāna eka hevākinaḥ

original: Subhv_0607-4 yallabdhaṃ vyasanākulena manasā svenaiva taccintyatām //
analyzed: yat labdham vyasana ākulena manasā svena eva tat cintyatām
kaśmīrān gatu kāmasya mīraśāha ākhya bhūpateḥ
prāhiṇot iti lekhakam
kim evam aviśa aṅkitaḥ śiśu kuraṅga lola kramam

original: Subhv_0609-2 parikramitumīhase virama naiva śūnyaṃ vanam /
analyzed: parikramitum īhase virama nā eva śūnyam vanam
sthitā utra gaja yṅthana atha mathana ucchalat śoṇita
luṭhat rudhira rañjita ullalita kesaraḥ kesarī
gabhīra rava kātara āturatara ātura vyāhṛtaiḥ
patan hariṇakaiḥ samam samara bhūmikām lajjate
carata vṛṣabhāḥ jālīmāṃsam yatheccham abhīravaḥ
pibata nalinī kaccheṣu accham punar mahiṣāḥ payaḥ

original: Subhv_0611-3 vahata kariṇo bhūyaḥ śobhāṃ madena kapolayor-
analyzed: vahata kariṇaḥ bhūyas śobhām madena kapolayoḥ
asahana tayā dūrībhūtaḥ vidherta kesarī

original: Subhv_0612-1 labdhā ḍambharamambare jaladharaṃ garjantamālokya yad-
analyzed: labdhā ḍambharam ambare jaladharam garjantam ālokya yat

original: Subhv_0612-2 dūrāducchalitosi siṃha mahatāṃ tenaiva khinnaṃ manaḥ /
analyzed: dūrāt ucchalitaḥ asi siṃha mahatām tena eva khinnam manaḥ
yat tu āsāra bhayena saṃprati darī sāṃmukhyam ālambase

original: Subhv_0612-4 taddṛṣṭvaiva vayaṃ hriyā kimaparaṃ pātālamūlaṃ gatāḥ //
analyzed: tat dṛṣṭvā eva vayam hriyā kim aparam pātāla mūlam gatāḥ
yasya aneka mada andha vāraṇa ghaṭā kumbha sthalī bhedana
vyāpāra eka vinoda durlalitayā
udgarjat jala bhāra vāmana ghana spardhī saḥ eva adhunā
siṃhaḥ pañjara pāta puñjita tanuḥ dhatte daśām īdṛśīm

original: Subhv_0614-1 kṣutkṣāmepi jarākṛśopi śithilaprāṇopi kaṣṭāṃ daśā-
analyzed: kṣudh kṣāmaḥ api jarā kṛśaḥ upi śithila prāṇaḥ api kaṣṭām daśā
mā āpannaḥ api vipanna dhī dhṛtiḥ api prāṇeṣu naśyatsu api

original: Subhv_0614-4 kiṃ jīrṇaṃ tṛṇamatti mānamahatāmagresaraḥ kesarī //
analyzed: kim jīrṇam tṛṇam atti māna mahatām agresaraḥ kesarī

original: Subhv_0615-1 nāsyocchrāyavatī tanurna daśanau no dīrghadīrghaḥ karaḥ
analyzed: na asya ucchrāyavatī tanuḥ na daśanau naḥ dīrgha dīrghaḥ karaḥ

original: Subhv_0615-2 satyaṃ vāraṇa naiṣa kesariśiśustvāḍambaraiḥ spardhate /
analyzed: satyam vāraṇa nā eṣa kesari śiśuḥ tu āḍambaraiḥ spardhate

original: Subhv_0615-3 tejobījamasahyamasya hṛdaye nyastaṃ purā vedhasā
analyzed: tejaḥ bījam asahyam asya hṛdaye nyastam purā vedhasā

original: Subhv_0615-4 tādṛktvādṛśameva yena sutarāṃ bhojyaṃ paśuṃ manyate //
analyzed: tādṛś tvādṛśam eva yena sutarām bhojyam paśum manyate
mādyat mātaṅga kumbha sthala bahala vasā vāsanā visra gandha

original: Subhv_0616-4 vibhyatsāraṅgasārthaḥ satatamasahanaḥ kesarī kena dṛṣṭaḥ //
analyzed: vibhyat sāraṅga sārthaḥ satatam asahanaḥ kesarī kena dṛṣṭaḥ

original: Subhv_0617-1 kaḥ kaḥ kutra na ghurghurāyitaghurīghoro ghuretsūkaraḥ
analyzed: kaḥ kaḥ kutra na ghurghurāyita ghurī ghoraḥ ghuret sūkaraḥ

original: Subhv_0617-2 kaḥ kaḥ kaṃ kamalākaraṃ vikamalaṃ kartuṃ karī nodyataḥ /
analyzed: kaḥ kaḥ kam kamala ākaram vikamalam kartum karī na udyataḥ

original: Subhv_0617-3 ke ke kāni vanānyaraṇyamahiṣā nonmūlayeyuryataḥ
analyzed: ke ke kāni vanāni araṇya mahiṣāḥ na unmūlayeyuḥ yatas
ā bālyāt api yaḥ vidārita mada unmatta ibha kumbha sthalī

original: Subhv_0618-3 hastastasya kathaṃ prasarpatu puraḥ kṛcchrepyavasthāntare
analyzed: hastaḥ tasya katham prasarpatu puras kṛcchre pi avasthā antare
garta āvarta vivartamāna śaśaka prāṇa apahāre hareḥ
rakta akta yat nakhara koṭi nibha ādi bhānām
yūthāḥ palāśa vanataḥ upi palāyya jagmuḥ

original: Subhv_0619-3 siṃhasya tasya jarato viṣamā daśā yad-
analyzed: siṃhasya tasya jarataḥ viṣamā daśā yat
gomāyavaiḥ avayavaiḥ api na asti vṛttiḥ

original: Subhv_0620-1 parjanyaṃ prati garjataḥ pratinidhīnvindhyasya vātoddhatā-
analyzed: parjanyam prati garjataḥ pratinidhīn vindhyasya vāta uddhatā

original: Subhv_0620-2 nambhodhīniva dhāvataḥ sarabhasaṃ hatvā raṇe vāraṇān /
analyzed: nambhodhīn iva dhāvataḥ sarabhasam hatvā raṇe vāraṇān
vṛkṣāt vṛkṣam upeyuṣā ulpa vapuṣaḥ śākhāmṛgasya upari

original: Subhv_0620-4 kruddhaḥ sopi bhavānaho bata gataḥ pañcāsya hāsyāṃ daśām //
analyzed: kruddhaḥ saḥ api bhavān aho bata gataḥ pañca asya hāsyām daśām
huṃkāraiḥ stanita anukāra caturaiḥ nyakkāram ākārita
kṣauṇī bhṛt śikhara śriyaḥ gaja ghaṭāḥ nītvā mada āṭopinīḥ

original: Subhv_0621-3 siṃhaḥ saṃhatabhāvato daśadiśaḥ kliśyatsu durvāśitair-
analyzed: siṃhaḥ saṃhata bhāvataḥ daśa diśaḥ kliśyatsu durvāśitaiḥ
gomāyuṣu api viśva viśva vidita prauḍhiḥ kim udyacchate
kari kalabha vimuñca lola tām
cara vinaya vratam ānata ānanaḥ
mṛgapati nakha koṭi bhaṅguro
guruḥ upari kṣamate na te iṅkuśaḥ
kelim kuruṣva paribhuṅkṣva saroruhāṇi
gāhasya śaila taṭa nirjhariṇī payāṃsi
bhāva anurakta kariṇī kara lālita aṅga
mātaṅga muñca mṛgarāja raṇa abhilāṣam
ucchṛṅkhalena nirapekṣa tayā unmadena
yena ākulīkṛtam idam kariṇā babhūva
dattvā padam śirasi hastipaka arbhakeṇa

original: Subhv_0624-4 mandaḥ kathaṃ gamita eṣa vaśaṃ prasahya //
analyzed: mandaḥ katham gamitaḥ eṣa vaśam prasahya
vindhya adri sānu taru puṣpa patat parāga
yaḥ abhūt saḥ eva nṛ nideśa karaḥ kari indraḥ

original: Subhv_0625-4 jātaḥ kathaṃ kimathavā prabhuratra kālaḥ //
analyzed: jātaḥ katham kim athavā prabhuḥ atra kālaḥ
antar samuttha viraha anala tīvra tāpa
saṃtāpita aṅga kari puṅgava muñca śokam
dhātrā sva hasta likhitāni lalāṭa paṭṭe
kaḥ vā akṣarāṇi parimārjayitum samarthaḥ

original: Subhv_0627-1 bho bhoḥ karīndra divasāni kiyanti tāvad-
analyzed: bho bhoḥ karīndra divasāni kiyanti tāvat
asmin marau samativāhaya kutracid tvam
revā jalaiḥ nija kareṇu kara prayuktaiḥ
bhūyas śamam gamayitāsi nidāgha kāle

original: Subhv_0628-1 asmiñjaḍe jagati ko nu bṛhatpramāṇa-
analyzed: asmin jaḍe jagati kaḥ nu bṛhat pramāṇa

original: Subhv_0628-2 karṇaḥ karī nanu bhavedduritasya pātram /
analyzed: karṇaḥ karī nanu bhavet duritasya pātram
iti āgatam tam api yolinam unmamātha
mātaṅgaḥ eva kim atas param ucyate asau

original: Subhv_0629-1 na gṛhṇāti grāsaṃ navakamalakiṃjalkini jale
analyzed: na gṛhṇāti grāsam nava kamala kiṃjalkini jale
na paṅkaiḥ āhlādam vrajati bisa bhaṅga ardha śakalaiḥ
lalantīm prema ārdrām api viṣahate na anya kariṇīm
smaran dāva bhraṣṭām hṛdaya dayitām vāraṇa patiḥ

original: Subhv_0630-1 latāntānnādatte śaśiśakalaśītaṃ na ca jalaṃ
analyzed: latā antān na ādatte śaśi śakala śītam na ca jalam
bhramat bhṛṅga āsaṅgāḥ pariharati kāntāḥ kamalinīḥ
dadhat bhāra ākāram karam api karī jāta viraho
vitanvan ucchvāsān kṣaṇam api vata ante na ramate
nadī vaprān bhittvā kisalaya vat utpāṭya ca tarūn
mada unmattān jitvā kara caraṇa dantaiḥ pratigajān
jarām prāpya anāryām taruṇa jana vidveṣa jananīm

original: Subhv_0631-4 sa evāyaṃ nāgaḥ sahati kalabhebhyaḥ paribhavam //
analyzed: saḥ eva ayam nāgaḥ sahati kalabhebhyaḥ paribhavam
varam iyam aṅkuśa kṣatiḥ alakṣitam āpatitā
vinaya vidhitsayā śirasi te gaja yūtha pate
na punar apaścimā karaja vajra śikhā abhihatiḥ
prasabha samutthitasya niśitāḥ vana kesariṇaḥ

original: Subhv_0633-1 svādhīnāṃ pravihāya śailakaṭakaprānte kareṇa vane
analyzed: sva ādhīnām pravihāya śaila kaṭaka prānte kareṇa vane

original: Subhv_0633-2 yatte nāgarikājane nipatitaṃ sadbhāvaśūnye manaḥ /
analyzed: yat te nāgarikā jane nipatitam sadbhāva śūnye manaḥ
tasya etat dṛḍha rajju bandhana vadha vyāpāra kheda ātmakam

original: Subhv_0633-4 he mattadvipu karmaṇaḥ pariṇataṃ rāgānurūpaṃ phalam //
analyzed: he matta dvipu karmaṇaḥ pariṇatam rāga anurūpam phalam

original: Subhv_0634-1 kvākāro girisannibhaḥ kva ca gatirvegena līlā ca sā
analyzed: kva ākāraḥ giri sannibhaḥ kva ca gatiḥ vegena līlā ca sā

original: Subhv_0634-2 helākuḍmalitekṣaṇāḥ kva nu dṛśastadvā kva te bṛṃhitam /
analyzed: helā kuḍmalita īkṣaṇāḥ kva nu dṛśaḥ tat vā kva te bṛṃhitam

original: Subhv_0634-3 vaprāghātarasaḥ kva te kva ca karaḥ kaṣṭaṃ yadevaṃvidhaṃ
analyzed: vapra āghāta rasaḥ kva te kva ca karaḥ kaṣṭam yat evaṃvidham

original: Subhv_0634-4 tvāmāruhya śiśuḥ padā paravaśaṃ saṃcārayatyājñayā //
analyzed: tvām āruhya śiśuḥ padā paravaśam saṃcārayati ājñayā
pāda āghāta vighūrṇitā vasumatī trāsa alasāḥ pakṣiṇaḥ
paṅka aṅkāni sarāṃsi gaṇḍa kaṣaṇa kṣoda kṣatāḥ śākhinaḥ
prāpya idam kari potakaiḥ vidhi vaśāt śārdūla śūnyam vanam

original: Subhv_0635-4 tattannāma kṛtaṃ viśṛṅkhalatayā vaktuṃ na yatpāryate //
analyzed: tat tat nāma kṛtam viśṛṅkhala tayā vaktum na yat pāryate
puṇḍra ikṣūn api bhakṣayan ghṛta bhṛtaḥ māṃsa odana ādīn api

original: Subhv_0636-2 prāvṛṇvanvividhāḥ kuthā api vahannakṣatramālā api /
analyzed: prāvṛṇvan vividhāḥ kuthāḥ api vahan nakṣatra mālāḥ api

original: Subhv_0636-3 karṇe cāmaramālikāmapi dadhaddantī tathāpi smara-
analyzed: karṇe cāmara mālikām api dadhat dantī tathā api smara
nu aindhyīnām ghana sallakī vana bhuvām āste sadā duḥkhitaḥ
nīvāra prasava agra muṣṭi kavalaiḥ yaḥ vardhitaḥ śaiśavaḥ

original: Subhv_0637-2 pītaṃ yena sarojapattrapuṭake homāvaśeṣaṃ payam /
analyzed: pītam yena saroja pattra puṭake homa avaśeṣam payam
tam dṛṣṭvā mada manthara ali valaya vyālu pragaṇḍam gajam

original: Subhv_0637-4 sotkaṇṭhaṃ sabhayaṃ ca paśyati muhurdūre sthitastāpasaḥ //
analyzed: sa utkaṇṭham sa bhayam ca paśyati muhur dūre sthitaḥ tāpasaḥ

original: Subhv_0638-1 dante nyasya karaṃ pralambitaśirāḥ saṃmīlya netradvayaṃ
analyzed: dante nyasya karam pralambita śirāḥ saṃmīlya netra dvayam

original: Subhv_0638-2 kiṃ tvaṃ vāraṇa tapyase gaṇikayā ko nāma no vañcitaḥ /
analyzed: kim tvam vāraṇa tapyase gaṇikayā kaḥ nāma naḥ vañcitaḥ

original: Subhv_0638-3 grāsaṃ śāntamanā gṛhāṇa satataṃ śokodhunā tyajyatāṃ
analyzed: grāsam śānta manāḥ gṛhāṇa satatam śokaḥ adhunā tyajyatām
ye mattāḥ avivekinaḥ cala dhiyaḥ te prāpnuvanti āpadam
patyuḥ yat kavala avaśeṣa patita grāsena vṛttiḥ kṛtā

original: Subhv_0639-2 pītaṃ yacca karāvagāhakaluṣaṃ tatpītaśeṣaṃ payaḥ /
analyzed: pītam yat ca kara avagāha kaluṣam tat pīta śeṣam payaḥ

original: Subhv_0639-3 prāṇānpūrvataraṃ vihāya tadidaṃ prāptaṃ kariṇyā phalaṃ
analyzed: prāṇān pūrvataram vihāya tat idam prāptam kariṇyā phalam

original: Subhv_0639-4 yadbandhārpaṇakātarasya kariṇaḥ kliṣṭaṃ na dṛṣṭaṃ mukham //
analyzed: yat bandha arpaṇa kātarasya kariṇaḥ kliṣṭam na dṛṣṭam mukham

original: Subhv_0640-1 ghāsagrāsaṃ gṛhāṇa tyaja gajakalabha premabandhaṃ kariṇyāḥ
analyzed: ghāsa grāsam gṛhāṇa tyaja gaja kalabha prema bandham kariṇyāḥ
pāśa granthi vraṇānām abhimatam adhunā dehi paṅka anulepam
dūrībhūtāḥ tava ete śabara vara vadhū vibhrama udbhrānta ramyā
revā ākula upakaṇṭa druma kusuma rajaḥ dhūsarāḥ vindhya pādāḥ
lāṅgūla cālanam adhas caraṇa avapātam
bhūmau nipatya vadanodara darśanam ca
śvā piṇḍadasya kurute gaja puṅgavaḥ tu
dhīram vilokayati cāṭu śataiḥ ca bhuṅkte

original: Subhv_0642-1 yadvindhyaḥ śikharī tadantarapi yatpīlupriyaḥ pippalaḥ
analyzed: yat vindhyaḥ śikharī tad antar api yat pīlupriyaḥ pippalaḥ
sa utkaṇṭhā rabhasa āgamāt abhipatat reṇuḥ kareṇuḥ ca yat

original: Subhv_0642-3 tatkiṃ bhadratayā smaratyapi karī daivaṃ hi sarvaṃkaṣaṃ
analyzed: tat kim bhadra tayā smarati api karī daivam hi sarvaṃkaṣam

original: Subhv_0642-4 tanmṛtyorapi duḥsahaṃ tu yadayaṃ mando dhuri sthāpitaḥ //
analyzed: tat mṛtyoḥ api duḥsaham tu yat ayam mandaḥ dhuri sthāpitaḥ
helā uddhūlita mallikā kisalayaiḥ yaḥ vṛddhim abhyāgataḥ
sā uyam daiva vaśāt vaśā virahitaḥ śūtkāra kārī karī
nirmajjat vaja rajju pāśa vivaśaḥ kaṣṭam
he gandha kuñjara mahā giri kuñja rāji
madyā api mā smara sa līlā nimīlita akṣaḥ
muñca abhimānam adhunā bhaja vartamānam
vakram vidheḥ upari śāsanam aṅkuśam ca

original: Subhv_0645-1 svacchasvādujalā vihāya sarito hartuṃ tṛṣaṃ duḥsahāṃ
analyzed: su accha svādu jalāḥ vihāya saritaḥ hartum tṛṣam duḥsahām

original: Subhv_0645-2 mā matta dviradākṣi nikṣipa śaratkṛṣṭe taḍāgāmbuni /
analyzed: mā matta dvirada akṣi nikṣipa śarad kṛṣṭe taḍāga ambuni

original: Subhv_0645-3 pītesminsakalepi gacchati na te śāntiṃ pipāsā jale
analyzed: pīte ismin sakale api gacchati na te śāntim pipāsā jale
grāmasya eka gateḥ amuṣya niyatam syāt jīvite saṃśayaḥ
dūrvā kura tṛṇa āhārāḥ dhanyāḥ tāta vane mṛgāḥ

original: Subhv_0646-2 vibhavonmattacittānāṃ na paśyanti mukhāni yat //
analyzed: vibhava unmatta cittānām na paśyanti mukhāni yat
amṛtā vigata prāṇā sā antar śalyā akṛtavraṇā

original: Subhv_0647-2 abaddhā niścalevāste kūṭasaṃsthe mṛge mṛgī //
analyzed: abaddhā niścalā iva āste kūṭa saṃsthe mṛge mṛgī

original: Subhv_0648-1 rajjvā diśaḥ pravitatāḥ salilaṃ viṣeṇa
analyzed: rajjvā diśaḥ pravitatāḥ salilam viṣeṇa
pāśaiḥ mahī hutabhujā jvalitāḥ vanāntāḥ
vyādhāḥ padāni anusaranti gṛhīta bāṇāḥ
kam deśam āśrayati yūtha patiḥ mṛgāṇām

original: Subhv_0649-1 drutataramito gaccha prāṇaiḥ kuraṅga viyujyase
analyzed: drutataram itas gaccha prāṇaiḥ kuraṅga viyujyase
kim iti valita grīvam sthitvā muhur muhur īkṣase

original: Subhv_0649-3 vidadhati hatavyādhānāṃ te manāgapi nārdratāṃ
analyzed: vidadhati hata vyādhānām te manāk api na ārdra tām
kaṭhina manasām eṣām ete vilocana vibhramāḥ
sthalīnām dagdhānām upari mṛgatṛṣṇām anusaran

original: Subhv_0650-2 tṛṣārtaḥ sāraṅgo viramati na khinnepi manasi /
analyzed: tṛṣā ārtaḥ sāraṅgaḥ viramati na khinne api manasi

original: Subhv_0650-3 ajānānastattvaṃ na sa mṛgayatenyatra sarasī-
analyzed: a jānānaḥ tattvam na sa

original: Subhv_0650-4 mabhūmau pratyāśā na ca phalati vighnaṃ ca kurute //
analyzed: ma bhūmau pratyāśā na ca phalati vighnam ca kurute

original: Subhv_0651-1 he sāraṅga tṛṇānyaśāna salilaiḥ prāṇānpuṣāṇāthavā
analyzed: he sāraṅga tṛṇāni aśāna salilaiḥ prāṇān puṣāṇa athavā

original: Subhv_0651-2 yadvā syāḥ pavanāśanastadapi te sāviṣkṛti prāṇitam /
analyzed: yat vā syāḥ pavanāśanaḥ tat api te sāviṣkṛti prāṇitam
yena iyam bhavatā ucchvasat kuvalaya prastāra cāru dyutiḥ
dṛṣṭiḥ vitta mada uddhata akṣiṇi mukhe mūrkhasya na āyāsitā

original: Subhv_0652-1 alpīyaḥskhalanena yatra patanaṃ kṛcchreṇa yatronnatir-
analyzed: alpīyaḥ skhalanena yatra patanam kṛcchreṇa yatra unnatiḥ
dvāre vetra latā vitāna gahane kaṣṭaḥ praveśa kramaḥ

original: Subhv_0652-3 he sāraṅga manoramā vanabhuvastyaktvā viśeṣārthinā
analyzed: he sāraṅga manoramāḥ vana bhuvaḥ tyaktvā viśeṣa arthinā

original: Subhv_0652-4 kiṃ bhūbhṛtkaṭakasthitivyasaninā vyarthaṃ khurāḥ śātitāḥ //
analyzed: kim bhūbhṛt kaṭaka sthiti vyasaninā vyartham khurāḥ śātitāḥ
na etāḥ tāḥ malaya kānana bhuvaḥ su accha sravat nirjharāḥ
tṛṣṇā yāsu nivartate tanubhṛtām āloka mātrāt api
rūkṣa dhvāṅkṣa parigrahaḥ bharuḥ ayam sphārībhavat bhrāntayaḥ

original: Subhv_0653-4 tā etā mṛgatṛṣṇikā hariṇa he nedaṃ payo gamyatām //
analyzed: tāḥ etāḥ mṛgatṛṣṇikāḥ hariṇa he na idam payaḥ gamyatām

original: Subhv_0654-1 tyaktaṃ janmavanaṃ tṛṇāṅkuravatī māteva muktā sthalī
analyzed: tyaktam janma vanam tṛṇa aṅkuravatī mātā iva muktā sthalī

original: Subhv_0654-2 visrambhasthitihetavo na gaṇitā bandhūpamāḥ pādapāḥ /
analyzed: visrambha sthiti hetavaḥ na gaṇitāḥ bandhu upamāḥ pādapāḥ
bāla apatya viyoga duḥkha vidhurā na apekṣitā sā mṛgī

original: Subhv_0654-4 mārgantaḥ padavīṃ tathāpyakaruṇā vyādhā na muñcantyamī //
analyzed: mārgantaḥ padavīm tathā api akaruṇāḥ vyādhāḥ na muñcanti amī

original: Subhv_0655-1 chittvā pāśamapāsya kūṭaracanāṃ bhaṅktvā balādvāgurāṃ
analyzed: chittvā pāśam apāsya kūṭa racanām bhaṅktvā balāt vāgurām
paryasta agni śikhā kalāpa jaṭilān nirgatya dūram vanāt
vyādhānām śara gocarāt api javena utplutya dhāvat mṛgaḥ

original: Subhv_0655-4 kūpāntaḥ patitaḥ karoti vidhure kiṃ vā vidhau pauruṣam //
analyzed: kūpa antar patitaḥ karoti vidhure kim vā vidhau pauruṣam

original: Subhv_0656-1 svairī bhrāmyasi nātha kāmyasi paradvārāṇi nottāmyasi
analyzed: svairī bhrāmyasi nātha kāmyasi para dvārāṇi na uttāmyasi
na ādyānām animitta kopa kuṭila ālāpam mukham paśyasi

original: Subhv_0656-3 muñcasyekamapi kṣaṇaṃ prakaṭitapremāṃ ca na preyasīṃ
analyzed: muñcasi ekam api kṣaṇam prakaṭita premām ca na preyasīm

original: Subhv_0656-4 he sāraṅga tavātisundaramidaṃ kenopadiṣṭaṃ vratam //
analyzed: he sāraṅga tava ati sundaram idam kena upadiṣṭam vratam

original: Subhv_0657-1 svacchandaṃ hariṇena yā viharatā daivātsamāsāditā
analyzed: svacchandam hariṇena yā viharatā daivāt samāsāditā
niḥśvāsa anala dagdha komala tṛṇa prakhyāpita antar vyathaḥ

original: Subhv_0657-4 tāmeva prativāsaraṃ muniriva dhyāyanvane śuṣyati //
analyzed: tām eva prativāsaram muniḥ iva dhyāyan vane śuṣyati

original: Subhv_0658-1 sāraṅgo na latāgṛheṣu ramate no paṃsule bhūtale
analyzed: sāraṅgaḥ na latā gṛheṣu ramate no paṃsule bhū tale
no ramyāsu vana upakaṇṭha harita chāyāsu śītāsu api
tām eva āyata locanām anudinam dhyāyan muhur preyasīm
śailendra udara kaṃdareṣu gata dhīḥ śṛṅgāri veṣaḥ sthitaḥ

original: Subhv_0659-1 śṛṅgeṇāṅgaṃ mṛgāṇāṃ kaṣati paricayaprāptaye niḥspṛhāṇāṃ
analyzed: śṛṅgeṇa aṅgam mṛgāṇām kaṣati paricaya prāptaye niḥspṛhāṇām
manda svacchanda cārī pariharati bhayāt ālayam yūthapasya
dṛṣṭaḥ tiṣṭhati alakṣyaḥ nipatitaiḥ tad kuraṅgī kaṭākṣaiḥ
sāraṅgaḥ duḥkham āste vidhura vidhi vaśāt anya yūtha praviṣṭaḥ
ādāya māṃsam akhilam stana varjam aṅgān

original: Subhv_0660-2 māṃ muñca vāgurika yāhi kuru prasādam /
analyzed: mām muñca vāgurika yāhi kuru prasādam
adyā api ghāsa kavala grasana anabhijñaḥ
mad mārga vīkṣaṇa paraḥ tanayaḥ madīyaḥ
puras revā pāre giri rati durāroha śikharaḥ
saraḥ savye vāme dava dahana dāha vyatikaraḥ
dhanuṣpāṇiḥ paścāt śabara hatakaḥ dhāvatitarām

original: Subhv_0661-4 na yātuṃ na sthātuṃ hariṇāśiśureṣa prabhavati //
analyzed: na yātum na sthātum hariṇā śiśuḥ eṣa prabhavati

original: Subhv_0662-1 kva krīḍati kva carati kva karoti vṛttiṃ
analyzed: kva krīḍati kva carati kva karoti vṛttim

original: Subhv_0662-2 vāri kva nāma pibati svapiti kva nāma /
analyzed: vāri kva nāma pibati svapiti kva nāma
ittham mṛgam niraparādham abādhamānam
vyādhaḥ nudhāvati vadhāya dhanuḥ dadhānaḥ
candraḥ sudhāṃśuḥ ayam atri sutaḥ dvijeśaḥ
puṇyaiḥ avāpi śaraṇāya mayā iti toṣam

original: Subhv_0663-3 mugdhaiṇaśāva bhaja mā tyaja pāpamenaṃ
analyzed: mugdha aiṇaśāva bhaja mā tyaja pāpam enam
mīnam prabhujya sahasā kṛta meṣa bhogam
karabha yadi kadācid prabhraman daivayogān
madhukara kulataḥ tvam prāpayethāḥ madhūni

original: Subhv_0664-3 virama virama tebhyaḥ santi śaṣpāṇyaraṇye
analyzed: virama virama tebhyaḥ santi śaṣpāṇi araṇye
prathama mukha rasāḥ te śoṣayanti eva paścāt
vikaca kumudaiḥ phulla ambhojaiḥ sarobhiḥ alaṃkṛtām
marakata maṇi śyāmām śaṣpaiḥ vihāya vana sthalīm
smarati karabhaḥ yat vṛkṣāṇām caran maru dhanvanām

original: Subhv_0665-4 paricayaratiḥ sā durvārā na sā guṇavairitā //
analyzed: paricaya ratiḥ sā durvārā na sā guṇa vairi tā
karabha dayite yat tat pītam su durlabham ekadā

original: Subhv_0666-2 madhu vanagataṃ tasyālābhe virauṣi kimutsukā /
analyzed: madhu vana gatam tasya alābhe virauṣi kim utsukā

original: Subhv_0666-3 kuru paricitaiḥ pīloḥ pattrairdhṛtiṃ marugocare
analyzed: kuru paricitaiḥ pīloḥ pattraiḥ dhṛtim maru gocare

original: Subhv_0666-4 jagati sakale kasyāvāptiḥ sukhasya nirantarā //
analyzed: jagati sakale kasya avāptiḥ sukhasya nirantarā
karabha dayite yaḥ asau pīluḥ tvayā madhu lubdhayā
vyapagata dhana chāyaḥ tyaktaḥ na sa ādaram īkṣitaḥ
cala kisalayaḥ saḥ upi idānīm prarūḍha nava aṅkuraḥ
karabha dayitā vṛndaiḥ anyaiḥ sukham paribhujyate

original: Subhv_0668-1 karabha kimidaṃ dīrghocchvāsaiḥ kṣiṇoṣi śarīrakaṃ
analyzed: karabha kim idam dīrgha ucchvāsaiḥ kṣiṇoṣi śarīrakam

original: Subhv_0668-2 virama śaṭhe he kasyātyantaṃ sakhe sukhamāgatam /
analyzed: virama śaṭhe he kasya atyantam sakhe sukham āgatam

original: Subhv_0668-3 cara kisalayaṃ svasthaḥ pīlorvimuñca madhuspṛhāṃ
analyzed: cara kisalayam svasthaḥ pīloḥ vimuñca madhu spṛhām
punar api bhavān kalyāṇānām bhaviṣyati bhājanam
karabha rabhasāt kroṣṭum vāñchasi aho śravaṇa jvaraḥ
śaraṇam athavā anṛjvī dīrghā tava eva śirodharā
pṛthu gala bila āvṛtti śrāntā uccariṣyati vāṅmukhā

original: Subhv_0669-4 diyati samaye ko jānīte bhaviṣyati kasya kim //
analyzed: diyati samaye kaḥ jānīte bhaviṣyati kasya kim
tathā saṃtuṣṭaḥ san jala vṛṇa śamī pīlu badaraiḥ
caran svastha uraṇye karabha śiśukaḥ śoka rahitaḥ
kṛtaḥ madhu āsvāda pravaṇa hadayaḥ mugdha vidhinā

original: Subhv_0670-4 yathā nānyadbhuṅkte na pibati na śete na ramate //
analyzed: yathā na anyat bhuṅkte na pibati na śete na ramate
yasya āsīt nava pīlu pattra badara grāsaḥ api saṃtuṣṭaye

original: Subhv_0671-2 dīrghādhvanyanugamyate na padavī yasya svayūthyairapi /
analyzed: dīrgha adhvani anugamyate na padavī yasya sva yūthyaiḥ api

original: Subhv_0671-3 soyaṃ saṃprati yāti bālakarabhaḥ kṣīṇodyamaḥ kṣāmatāṃ
analyzed: saḥ yam saṃprati yāti bāla karabhaḥ kṣīṇa udyamaḥ kṣāma tām
manye nūnam anena daivahatakena āsvāditam bhrāmaram

original: Subhv_0672-1 pīlūnāṃ hi phalaṃ kaṣāyarahitaṃ romanthayitvā marau
analyzed: pīlūnām hi phalam kaṣāya rahitam marau

original: Subhv_0672-2 śākhāgraṃ yadakhādi cāru karabhīvaktrārpitaṃ premataḥ /
analyzed: śākhā agram yat akhādi cāru karabhī vaktra arpitam premataḥ

original: Subhv_0672-3 tatsmṛtvā karabhena khedavidhuraṃ dīrghaṃ tathā kūjitaṃ
analyzed: tat smṛtvā karabhena kheda vidhuram dīrgham tathā kūjitam
prāṇānām abhavat tat eva sahasā prasthāna tūryam yathā
nindati
prītau tayoḥ iṣṭa bhujoḥ samāyām
madhyastha tā na ekatara upahāsaḥ

original: Subhv_0674-1 eka eva khago mānī vane vasati cātakaḥ /
analyzed: ekaḥ eva khagaḥ mānī vane vasati cātakaḥ

original: Subhv_0674-2 pipāsito vā mriyate yācate vā puraṃdaram //
analyzed: pipāsitaḥ vā mriyate yācate vā puraṃdaram

original: Subhv_0675-1 ayi cakitamugdhacātaka marubhuvi dhāvasi mudhā kimudgrīvam /
analyzed: ayi cakita mugdha cātaka maru bhuvi dhāvasi mudhā kim udgrīvam
grīṣme dava agni valitaḥ tāpicchaḥ yam na vidyutvān
pipāsuḥ api eva jalam śikhaṇḍī
pratīkṣate prāṇa samām pibantīm
nūnam priyā sneha nibaddha dṛṣṭiḥ
su alpam payaḥ paśyati nimnagāsu
ati unnati vyasaninaḥ śirasā udhunā eṣa
svasya eva cātaka śiśuḥ praṇayam vidhattām
asya etat icchati na hi pratatāsu dikṣu

original: Subhv_0677-4 tāḥ svacchaśītamadhurāḥ kva nu nāma nāpaḥ //
analyzed: tāḥ su accha śīta madhurāḥ kva nu nāma na apaḥ
kekāḥ kalāḥ vana bhuvaḥ tilakāyamānaḥ
ramyaḥ kalāpa mahimā eṣa śikhaṇḍinā usya
durlakṣaṇam nanu vihāyasi vāyasa ādi
kṣuṇṇe api ayam caṭaka tulya gatiḥ na jātaḥ
nīla abja puñja rajasā aruṇitān vimucya
svacchān sudhā adhika rasān api vāri rāśīn
yat cātakaḥ pibati vāridhara uda bindūn
