manye tadā anati bhayāt śirasaḥ abhimānī
divya ambu pāna niyamaḥ tava mohayet kam

original: Subhv_0679-6 doṣopi saṃvṛtimatāṃ bhajate guṇatvam bhūmisthamambu yadi cātaka pātumiccheḥ
analyzed: doṣaḥ api saṃvṛtimatām bhajate guṇa tvam bhūmi stham ambu yadi cātaka pātum iccheḥ
kaṇṭha vraṇam prakaṭayeḥ tad ayogya tām ca
divya ambu pāna niyamaḥ tava mohayet kam
doṣaḥ api saṃvṛtimatām bhajate guṇa tvam
kim nā eva santi nava tāmarasa avataṃsā
haṃsa āvalī valayinaḥ jala sanniveśāḥ

original: Subhv_0681-3 kopi graho gururayaṃ bata cātakasya
analyzed: kaḥ api grahaḥ guruḥ ayam bata cātakasya
pauraṃdarīm yat abhivāñchati vāri dhārām

original: Subhv_0682-1 kiṃ dūreṇa payodharā upari kiṃ nānye raṭantaḥ śrutā
analyzed: kim dūreṇa payodharāḥ upari kim nā anye raṭantaḥ śrutā

original: Subhv_0682-2 nindyāḥ pāpatayā svakukṣiṣu gatāḥ kiṃ nāma pakṣāḥ kṣayam /
analyzed: nindyāḥ pāpa tayā sva kukṣiṣu gatāḥ kim nāma pakṣāḥ kṣayam

original: Subhv_0682-3 ramyaṃ vā gagane na kiṃ viharaṇaṃ kiṃ tūgrakākāvalī-
analyzed: ramyam vā gagane na kim viharaṇam kim tu ugra kāka āvalī
paryāya pratipatti lāghava bhayāt bhūmau sthitāḥ barhiṇaḥ
no tāṇḍavena nayana amṛta nirjhareṇa
kekā āraveṇa na ca karṇa rasāyanena
barheṇa ca api sura cāpa rucā
motuḥ na tuṣyati śikhin vadham antareṇa
cātaka tāta kiyat bhavatā pātakam atulam akāri

original: Subhv_0684-2 navajaladādapi cañcupuṭe yattava na patati vāri //
analyzed: nava jaladāt api cañcu puṭe yat tava na patati vāri
jala kaṇa vitaraṇa rahitaḥ prakaṭita dhavalita veṣaḥ

original: Subhv_0685-2 cātaka raṭasi vṛthā kiṃ jaladaḥ śārada eṣaḥ //
analyzed: cātaka raṭasi vṛthā kim jaladaḥ śāradaḥ eṣaḥ

original: Subhv_0686-1 santi kūpāḥ sphuradrūpāḥ paritaḥ saritaḥ śubhāḥ /
analyzed: santi kūpāḥ sphurat rūpāḥ paritas saritaḥ śubhāḥ
tathā api cātakasya ekaḥ phala daḥ jalada udayaḥ
kekā nibhāt dhaṭayase paṭu cāṭukāni
cañcat kalāpam api nṛtyasi rañjanāya

original: Subhv_0687-3 he cātaka prayatase jaladaṃ pratītthaṃ
analyzed: he cātaka prayatase jaladam prati ittham

original: Subhv_0687-4 binduṃ jalasya labhase na ca lajjase ca //
analyzed: bindum jalasya labhase na ca lajjase ca
vāha tvam īśvara sutasya vidhāya barhin
pramlāyitaḥ sa nija pakṣa kalāpaḥ eva

original: Subhv_0688-3 nārādhitaḥ sa bhavatā puruṣottamaḥ kiṃ
analyzed: na ārādhitaḥ sa bhavatā puruṣottamaḥ kim
yaḥ te tṛṣam praśamayet kaca megha varṣaiḥ
palvala ambhasi haṃsasya haṃsa tā eva vikalpyate

original: Subhv_0690-1 pibanti madhu padmebhyo bhṛṅgāḥ kesaradhūsarāḥ /
analyzed: pibanti madhu padmebhyaḥ bhṛṅgāḥ kesara dhūsarāḥ
haṃsāḥ śaivālam aśnanti dhik daivam asamañjasam

original: Subhv_0691-1 yadi nāma daivayogājjagadasarojaṃ kadācidapi jātam /
analyzed: yadi nāma daiva yogāt jagat a sarojam kadācid api jātam

original: Subhv_0691-2 avakaranikaraṃ vikirati tatkiṃ kṛkavākuriva haṃsaḥ //
analyzed: avakara nikaram vikirati tat kim kṛkavākuḥ iva haṃsaḥ

original: Subhv_0692-1 kaṭu raṭati nikaṭarvatī vācāṭaṣṭiṭṭibhaḥ paṭuryatra /
analyzed: kaṭu raṭati nikaṭarvatī vācāṭaḥ ṭiṭṭibhaḥ paṭuḥ yatra

original: Subhv_0692-2 apasaraṇameva śaraṇaṃ maunaṃ vā tatra haṃsasya //
analyzed: apasaraṇam eva śaraṇam maunam vā tatra haṃsasya

original: Subhv_0693-1 astu yadyapi sarvatra nīraṃ nīrajamaṇḍitam /
analyzed: astu yadi api sarvatra nīram nīraja maṇḍitam

original: Subhv_0693-2 ramate na marālasya mānasaṃ mānasaṃ vinā //
analyzed: ramate na marālasya mānasam mānasam vinā

original: Subhv_0694-1 kṣudhitopi padmakhaṇḍe jahāti rajasāvṛtaṃ hi kiṃjalkam /
analyzed: kṣudhitaḥ api padma khaṇḍe jahāti rajasā āvṛtam hi kiṃjalkam

original: Subhv_0694-2 guṇini kṛtapakṣapāto bisaṃ tu bahu manyate haṃsaḥ //
analyzed: guṇini kṛta pakṣapātaḥ bisam tu bahu manyate haṃsaḥ
taralayasi dṛśam kim utsukā
makula ṣa mānasa vāsa lālite
avatara kalahaṃsi vāpikām
punar api yāsyasi paṅkaja ālayam
rājīva reṇu kraṇa kīrṇa paśaṅga toyām
ramyām himācala nadīm pravihāya haṃsa

original: Subhv_0696-4 he he hatāśa vada kāṃ diśamutsukosi //
analyzed: he he hata āśa vada kām diśam utsukā asi
he haṃsa melita payaḥ salilam vivektum

original: Subhv_0697-2 śaktasya saṃprati matiḥ kva nu tedya yātā /
analyzed: śaktasya saṃprati matiḥ kva nu tā idya yātā
kāsāra vāriṇi kalām patitām yat indo
rā dātum icchasi bisa aṅkura vāñchayā tvam
śītāṃśu śekhara śiroruha saṃśritāni
puṇyāni pāvita jaganti manoramāṇi
bhrāntvā ciram surasarit salilāni

original: Subhv_0698-4 labdhāni hātumiha vāñchasi nāsi haṃsaḥ //
analyzed: labdhāni hātum iha vāñchasi na asi haṃsaḥ
sthitvā ciram nabhasi niścala tārakeṇa
mātaṅga saṅga kaluṣām nalinīm nirīkṣya
utpanna manyu pari gharghara niḥsvanena

original: Subhv_0699-4 haṃsena sāśru parivṛtya gataṃ na līnam //
analyzed: haṃsena sa aśru parivṛtya gatam na līnam
yena ujjhitam sahacarī vadana upanītam
ramyam mṛṇāla śakalam hima śaṅkha śubhram

original: Subhv_0700-3 soyaṃ khago hatavidhe tava ceṣṭitena
analyzed: saḥ uyam khagaḥ hatavidhe tava ceṣṭitena
śevāla nāla lava lampaṭa tām vidhatte

original: Subhv_0701-1 raṭasi kaṭu kimuccairvāyasa spardhayā me
analyzed: raṭasi kaṭu kim uccais vāyasa spardhayā me
vitata dhavala pakṣa ākṣepa vikṣobhita ambhāḥ
kamala vana vihārī na kākaḥ
haṃsaḥ udhvagaḥ śramam apohayitum dina ante
kāraṇḍa kāka baka bhāsavanam praviṣṭaḥ
mūkaḥ iyam iti upahasanti lunanti pakṣān
nīca āśrayaḥ hi mahatām avamāna bhūmiḥ

original: Subhv_0703-1 kva kaṭhinamaho pīloḥ pattraṃ mṛduḥ kva bisāṅkuraḥ
analyzed: kva kaṭhinam aho pīloḥ pattram mṛduḥ kva bisa aṅkuraḥ

original: Subhv_0703-2 kva kaṭu lavaṇaṃ kaupaṃ cāmbhaḥ kva tāmarasāsavaḥ /
analyzed: kva kaṭu lavaṇam kaupam ca ambhaḥ kva tāmarasa āsavaḥ

original: Subhv_0703-3 kva kusumarajo hṛdyaṃ rūkṣāḥ kva coṣarapāṃsavaḥ
analyzed: kva kusuma rajaḥ hṛdyam rūkṣāḥ kva ca ūṣara pāṃsavaḥ

original: Subhv_0703-4 kva maruviṣayo dhvāṅkṣakṣetraṃ kva haṃsa bhavādṛśāḥ //
analyzed: kva maru viṣayaḥ dhvāṅkṣa kṣetram kva haṃsa bhavādṛśāḥ
bho rājahaṃsa kim iti tvam iha āgataḥ asi

original: Subhv_0704-2 yosau bakaḥ sa iha haṃsa iti pratītaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ asau bakaḥ saḥ iha haṃsaḥ iti pratītaḥ
tat gamyatām tvaritam eva tatas prabhāte

original: Subhv_0704-4 yāvadvadanti baka eṣa na mūḍhalokāḥ //
analyzed: yāvat vadanti bakaḥ eṣa na mūḍha lokāḥ
aye vāpī haṃsāḥ nija vasati saṃkoca piśunam

original: Subhv_0705-2 karudhvaṃ mā ceto viyati bahato vīkṣya vihagān /
analyzed: karudhvam mā cetaḥ viyati bahataḥ vīkṣya vihagān
amī te sāraṅgāḥ bhuvana mahanīya vrata bhṛtaḥ
nirīhāṇām eṣām tṛṇam iva bhavanti ambunidhayaḥ
tarau tīra udbhūte kvacid api dala ācchādita tanuḥ
patat dhārā sārām gamaya viṣamām prāvṛṣam imām
nivṛttāyām tu asyām sarasi sarasā utphulla naline

original: Subhv_0706-4 sa eva tvaṃ haṃsaḥ punarapi vilāsāsta iha te //
analyzed: saḥ eva tvam haṃsaḥ punar api vilāsāḥ te iha te

original: Subhv_0707-1 gataṃ tadgāmbhīryaṃ jalamapi vṛtaṃ jālakaśataiḥ
analyzed: gatam tat gāmbhīryam jalam api vṛtam jālaka śataiḥ
sakhe haṃsa uttiṣṭha prathamam amutas dagdha sarasaḥ
sa yāvat paṅka ambhaḥ kaluṣita vapuḥ bhūri vilapan

original: Subhv_0707-4 na kāko vācāṭaścaraṇayugalaṃ mūrdhni kurute //
analyzed: na kākaḥ vācāṭaḥ caraṇa yugalam mūrdhni kurute

original: Subhv_0708-1 spṛśati na bisaṃ cañcvā bhūyastayā saha khaṇḍitaṃ
analyzed: spṛśati na bisam cañcvā bhūyas tayā saha khaṇḍitam

original: Subhv_0708-2 pibati na jalaṃ yāti svaptuṃ na śevalajālakam /
analyzed: pibati na jalam yāti svaptum na śevala jālakam
karoti na
kvaṇati karuṇam śoka grastaḥ priyā viraha ākulaḥ
sarasi bahuśas tārā chāyām daśan parivañcataḥ

original: Subhv_0709-3 daśati na punastārāśaṅkī divāpi sitotpalaṃ
analyzed: daśati na punar tārā āśaṅkī divā api sita utpalam
kuhaka cakitaḥ lokaḥ satye pi apāyam apekṣate
muktā ābhāni payāṃsi bhaṅga vilasat dugdhāḥ bisa granthayaḥ
sphītāḥ tāmarasa āsavāḥ viharaṇa krīḍā saham saikatam

original: Subhv_0710-3 santyeva pratideśamatraviṣame he haṃsa paṅkāṅkite
analyzed: santi eva pratideśa matra viṣame he haṃsa paṅka aṅkite

original: Subhv_0710-4 dhṛṣṭoktruṣṭabake jaratsarasi te koyaṃ nivāsagrahaḥ //
analyzed: dhṛṣṭa uktruṣṭa bake jarat sarasi te koyam nivāsa grahaḥ
āpūryeta punar sphurat śaphari kāsāra ūrmibhiḥ vāribhiḥ
bhūyas api pravibhajyamāna nalinam paśyema toyāśayam
iti āśā śata tantu baddha hṛdayaḥ naktaṃdinam dīna dhīḥ
śuṣyati ātapa śoṣitasya sarasaḥ tīre jarat sārasaḥ
tāvat dolita paṅkaja cyuta rajaḥ piṅka aṅgarāga ujjvalp
yaḥ śṛṇvan kala kūjitam madhulihām saṃjāta harṣa utsavaḥ

original: Subhv_0712-4 soyaṃ saṃprati haṃsako marugataḥ kaṣṭaṃ tṛṇaṃ vāñchati //
analyzed: saḥ ayam saṃprati haṃsakaḥ maru gataḥ kaṣṭam tṛṇam vāñchati

original: Subhv_0713-1 yāṃ smṛtvā sahasaiva mānasasarastyaktvā viśeṣārthinas-
analyzed: yām smṛtvā sahasā eva mānasa saraḥ tyaktvā viśeṣa arthinaḥ
tām eva utsuka cetasaḥ kamalinīm dṛṣṭvā baka adhyāsitām
līyante vigata abhimāna laghavaḥ tatra eva bhūyas pi ye

original: Subhv_0713-4 haṃsāste na bhavanti haṃsadhavalāḥ prāyo bakā eva te //
analyzed: haṃsāḥ te na bhavanti haṃsa dhavalāḥ prāyas bakāḥ eva te

original: Subhv_0714-1 yāmāliṅgya bakā raṭanti kaṭukaṃ dīrghocchvasatkaṃdharā
analyzed: yām āliṅgya bakāḥ raṭanti kaṭukam dīrgha ucchvasat kaṃdharā
yasyām aṃsa taṭa avaghaṭṭita jalam valganti amī madgavaḥ
yā śaśvat malina ātmakaiḥ api bakaiḥ naktaṃdinam sevyate

original: Subhv_0714-4 sā haṃsena manasvinā kamalinī yuktaṃ yadi tyajyate //
analyzed: sā haṃsena manasvinā kamalinī yuktam yadi tyajyate

original: Subhv_0715-1 rūpaṃ hāri manoharā sahacarī pānāya pādmaṃ madhu
analyzed: rūpam hāri manoharā sahacarī pānāya pādmam madhu

original: Subhv_0715-2 krīḍā cāpsu saroruheṣu vasatisteṣāṃ rajo maṇḍanam /
analyzed: krīḍā ca apsu saroruheṣu vasatiḥ teṣām rajaḥ maṇḍanam

original: Subhv_0715-3 vṛttiḥ sādhumatā bisena sahṛdaścārusvanāḥ ṣaṭpadāḥ
analyzed: vṛttiḥ sādhu matā bisena sahṛdaḥ cāru svanāḥ ṣaṭpadāḥ
sevā dainya vimānana virahitaḥ haṃsaḥ sukham jīvati

original: Subhv_0716-1 matsyā api hi jānanti kṣīranīravivecanam /
analyzed: matsyāḥ api hi jānanti kṣīra nīra vivecanam
prasiddham rājahaṃsānām yaśaḥ puṇyaiḥ avāpyate
kruddha ulūka nakha prapāta vigalat pakṣāḥ api sva āśrayam
ye na ujjhanti purīṣa puṣṭa vapuṣaḥ te kecid anye dvijāḥ
ye tu svarga taraṅgiṇī bisa latā leśena saṃvardhitā

original: Subhv_0718-2 gaṅgānīramapi tyajanti kaluṣaṃ te rājahaṃsāḥ kutaḥ //
analyzed: gaṅgā nīram api tyajanti kaluṣam te rājahaṃsāḥ kutas

original: Subhv_0718-1 samudgirasi vācaḥ kiṃ puṃskokila sukomalāḥ /
analyzed: samudgirasi vācaḥ kim puṃskokila su komalāḥ
śvabhre asmin jaḍa pāṣāṇa guru nirghoṣa bhairave

original: Subhv_0720-1 kākaiḥ saha vivṛddhasya kokilasya kalā giraḥ /
analyzed: kākaiḥ saha vivṛddhasya kokilasya kalāḥ giraḥ
khala saṅge api naiṣṭhuryam kalyāṇa prakṛteḥ kutas

original: Subhv_0720-1 śrotrotsavaṃ tava kalaṃ kalakaṇṭha kotra
analyzed: śrotra utsavam tava kalam kalakaṇṭha kotra
nādam śṛṇoti rati vigraha saṃdhi dūtam
dāva agni dagdha ghana pādapa koṭara anta
rāvis bhavat kaṭu ravāsu vana sthalīṣu

original: Subhv_0721-1 mūkīmūya tameva kokila madhuṃ bandhuṃ pratīkṣasva he
analyzed: mūkīmūya tam eva kokila madhum bandhum pratīkṣasva he
yatra etāḥ tava su uktayaḥ saphala tām āyānti amī tu ullasat
pāṃsu uttambha bhṛtaḥ nidāgha divasāḥ saṃtāpa saṃdhāyinaḥ
bhrātar kokila kūjitaiḥ alam alam yasmāt guṇāḥ
tūṣṇīm āḥsva viśīrṇa parṇa nicaya channaḥ kvacid koṭare

original: Subhv_0722-4 kāloyaṃ śiśirasya saṃprati sakhe nāyaṃ vasantotsavaḥ //
analyzed: kālaḥ ayam śiśirasya saṃprati sakhe na ayam vasanta utsavaḥ
kvacid jhillī nādaḥ kvacid atula kākola kalahaḥ
kvacid kaṅkā rāvaḥ kvacid api kapīnām kalakalaḥ
kvacid horaḥ pheru dhvaniḥ ayam aho daiva ghaṭanā

original: Subhv_0723-4 kathaṃkāraṃ tāraṃ kvaṇatu cakitaḥ kokilayuvā //
analyzed: kathaṃkāram tāram kvaṇatu cakitaḥ kokila yuvā
ketakī kusumam bhṛṅgaḥ pīḍyamānaḥ api sevate

original: Subhv_0724-3 doṣāḥ kiṃ nāma kurvanti guṇāpahṛtacetasaḥ //
analyzed: doṣāḥ kim nāma kurvanti guṇa apahṛta cetasaḥ

original: Subhv_0725-1 kṛtvāpi koṣapānaṃ bhramarayuvā purata eva kamalinyāḥ /
analyzed: kṛtvā api koṣa pānam bhramara yuvā puratas eva kamalinyāḥ

original: Subhv_0725-2 abhilaṣati bakulakalikāṃ madhulihi maline kutaḥ satyam //
analyzed: abhilaṣati bakula kalikām madhulihi maline kutas satyam
madanam avalokya niṣphalam anitya tām api ca bandhujīvānām

original: Subhv_0726-2 gurumupagamya bhramaraḥ saṃprati jāto japāsaktaḥ //
analyzed: gurum upagamya bhramaraḥ saṃprati jātaḥ japa āsaktaḥ
bhramara bhramatā digantarāṇi
kvacid āsāditam īkṣitam śrutam vā
vada satyam apāsya pakṣapātam
yadi jātī kusuma anukāri puṣpam
kamalam bhavanam
madhu pānam madhurāḥ priyā pralāpāḥ
śayanam mṛdu kesara upadhānam
bhramarasya ambhasi kā na rāja līlā
patitam utpatitam sthitam akriyam
sa karuṇam kvaṇitam gatam āgatam
kamalinī malinā tuhina āhatām

original: Subhv_0729-4 nahi tadasti vilokya na yatkṛtam //
analyzed: nahi tat asti vilokya na yat kṛtam
kamalinī malinī dayitam vinā

original: Subhv_0730-2 na sahate saha tena niṣevitām /
analyzed: na sahate saha tena niṣevitām
tam adhunā madhunā nihitam hṛdi
smarati sā rati sāram aharniśam

original: Subhv_0731-1 madaṃ na lipseta śilīmukho yadi
analyzed: madam na lipseta śilīmukhaḥ yadi
dvipāt na karṇa agra nipātam āpnuyāt
para upasarpī sukha leśa lipsayā
naraḥ bhavati eva parābhava āspadam
madhukara bahuśas tvayā nirastāḥ
kusuma latāḥ tṛṇāvat su puṣpita agrāḥ
phalam anubhava kaṇṭaka āvṛtābhyaḥ
tat idam apatrapa ketakī latābhyaḥ
cūteṣu yaḥ vilasitaḥ kalikā antara sthaḥ
paśya adya tasya madhupasya śarad vyapāye
kṛcchreṇa veṇu vivare divasāḥ prayānti
puṣpa āsavam surabhi gandhiḥ aja uṅga rāgaḥ

original: Subhv_0734-2 pītvā latāsu madhupaḥ kamale niṣaṇṇaḥ /
analyzed: pītvā latāsu madhupaḥ kamale niṣaṇṇaḥ
baddhaḥ adhunā śaśi karaiḥ karuṇam virauti
saṃtoṣa hīnam iha kam na bhajanti anarthāḥ
anyāsu tāvat upamarda sahāsu bhṛṅga
lolam vinodaya manaḥ sumanaḥ latāsu
bālām kadarthayasi kim navamālikāyāḥ
saṃsakta tāmarasa reṇu piśaṅgita aṅgaḥ
caṇḍa anila āhata tuṣāra viśīrṇa pakṣaḥ

original: Subhv_0736-4 kṣīṇaḥ kṣitau madhukaro vivaśotra śete //
analyzed: kṣīṇaḥ kṣitau madhukaraḥ vivaśaḥ utra śete
sa utkaḥ paribhramasi kim vyavapāti dhairyaḥ
kūjan dvirepha karuṇam kusuma āsava arthī
anyāsu pādapa latāsu dhṛtim badhāna

original: Subhv_0737-4 bhagnā hi sā kusumitā sahakāravallī //
analyzed: bhagnā hi sā kusumitā sahakāra vallī
sva āmoda vāsita samagra diś antarālā
raktā manohara mukhā sukumāra mūrtiḥ

original: Subhv_0738-3 sevyā sarojakalikā tu yadaiva jātā
analyzed: sevyā saroja kalikā tu yadā eva jātā
nītaḥ tadā eva vidhinā madhupaḥ nyadeśam
jāti ujjvale madhura komala vā agni lāsau
dvau puṣkare madhukarau yugapad praviṣṭau
ekaḥ tayoḥ madhu bhara ākula pūrṇa dehaḥ

original: Subhv_0739-4 kaṣṭe vidhau na rajasāpi yuto dvitīyaḥ //
analyzed: kaṣṭe vidhau na rajasā api yutaḥ dvitīyaḥ
madhukara gaṇaḥ cūtam tyaktvā gataḥ navamālikām

original: Subhv_0740-2 punarapi gato raktāśokaṃ kadambataruṃ tataḥ /
analyzed: punar api gataḥ rakta aśokam kadamba tarum tatas

original: Subhv_0740-3 tadapi suciraṃ sthitvā tebhyaḥ prayāti saroruhaṃ
analyzed: tat api su ciram sthitvā tebhyaḥ prayāti saroruham
paricita guṇa dveṣī lokaḥ navam navam īhate
likhita kamale saundaryeṇa prakāma hṛta ātmanā

original: Subhv_0741-2 kimiva na kṛtaṃ tatra bhrāntvā madhuspṛhayālinā /
analyzed: kim iva na kṛtam tatra bhrāntvā madhu spṛhā yālinā
adhigata rasaḥ saḥ bhūt tasmāt manāk api na alpa dhīḥ

original: Subhv_0741-4 dhuri tu likhitastṛṣṇāndhānāṃ janena vivekinā //
analyzed: dhuri tu likhitaḥ tṛṣṇā andhānām janena vivekinā

original: Subhv_0742-1 bhramati bakule mandaṃ kunde na vindati nirvṛtiṃ
analyzed: bhramati bakule mandam kunde na vindati nirvṛtim

original: Subhv_0742-2 prakṛtisurabhau raktāśoke na yāti viśokatām /
analyzed: prakṛti surabhau rakta aśoke na yāti viśoka tām
surabhi kusuma āmoda utkaṇṭhā apanīta manāḥ vane
vahati tanu tām aṅge bhṛṅgaḥ smaran navamālikām
spṛśati śanakais cumban aṅgaiḥ karoti nipīḍanam
caraṇa patanam mudrā bhedam vidhātum api īhate
samayam ucitam citta utsukyāt pratīkṣitum akṣamaḥ
madhukara yuvā puṇyaiḥ labdhvā navām navamālikām
hima utsannām dṛṣṭvā hata kamala nālām kamalinīm
dvirephāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ sapadi gaja gaṇḍa praṇayinaḥ
aho dhik bhūtānām prakṛtiḥ iyam apratyaya karī
na kaścid kṣīṇa arthe prathama guṇa gandham gaṇayati

original: Subhv_0745-1 kimāmodabhrāntyā bhramasi suciraṃ bhṛṅga nanu he
analyzed: kim āmoda bhrāntyā bhramasi su ciram bhṛṅga nanu he

original: Subhv_0745-2 na jānīṣe tattvaṃ pratapatitarāṃ grīṣmasamayaḥ /
analyzed: na jānīṣe tattvam pratapatitarām grīṣma samayaḥ

original: Subhv_0745-3 sthitaṃ śūnyaṃ puṣpaiḥ prakaṭaviṭapaṃ paśya vipinaṃ
analyzed: sthitam śūnyam puṣpaiḥ prakaṭa viṭapam paśya vipinam
gataḥ gaurabhi āḍhyaḥ prakṛti subhagaḥ caitra vibhavaḥ
kena āghrātam udāram asya kusumam kaiḥ cumbitam kesaram

original: Subhv_0746-2 pītaḥ kena rasosya kena rajasā codvellitaṃ kena vā /
analyzed: pītaḥ kena rasaḥ usya kena rajasā ca udvellitam kena vā

original: Subhv_0746-3 he he mugdhamadhuvrata vraja javādanyāṃstarūnpuṣpitā-
analyzed: he he mugdha madhu vrata vraja javāt anyān tarūn puṣpitā

original: Subhv_0746-4 nuttāletra vṛthaiva pippalatarau kiṃ kiṃcidāsādyate //
analyzed: vṛthā eva pippalatarau kim kiṃcid āsādyate

original: Subhv_0747-1 pratyagrotra yathāsukhaṃ madhurasaḥ pātavya ityutsukas-
analyzed: yathāsukham madhu rasaḥ pātavyaḥ iti utsukaḥ
tṛṣṇā vibhrama vipralabdha hrdayaḥ tattva avabodham vinā
nirviṇṇaḥ api aphala śramaḥ na viramati ālekhya padma ākare
durbuddhiḥ vyasanī tathā api madhupaḥ tṛṣṇā āśayā udbhrāmyati

original: Subhv_0748-1 yasyāḥ saṃgamavāñchayā na gaṇitā vāpyo vinidrotpalā
analyzed: yasyāḥ saṃgama vāñchayā na gaṇitāḥ vāpyaḥ vinidra utpalā

original: Subhv_0748-2 yāmāliṅgya samutsukena manasā yātaḥ parāṃ nirvṛtim /
analyzed: yām āliṅgya samutsukena manasā yātaḥ parām nirvṛtim

original: Subhv_0748-3 bhagnāṃ tāmavalokya candanalatāṃ bhṛṅgeṇa yajjīvyate
analyzed: bhagnām tām avalokya candana latām bhṛṅgeṇa yat jīvyate

original: Subhv_0748-4 dhairyaṃ nāma tadastu tasya na punaḥ snehānurūpaṃ kṛtam //
analyzed: dhairyam nāma tat astu tasya na punar sneha anurūpam kṛtam

original: Subhv_0749-1 yenāmodini kesarasya mukule pītaṃ madhu svecchayā
analyzed: yena āmodini kesarasya mukule pītam madhu sva icchayā

original: Subhv_0749-2 nītā yena niśā śaśāṅkadhavalā padmodare śārade /
analyzed: nītā yena niśā śaśāṅka dhavalā padma udare śārade

original: Subhv_0749-3 bhrāntaṃ yena madapravāhamaline guṇḍasthale dantināṃ
analyzed: bhrāntam yena mada pravāha maline guṇḍa sthale dantinām

original: Subhv_0749-4 soyaṃ bhṛṅgayuvā karīraviṭape badhnātu tuṣṭiṃ kutaḥ //
analyzed: sā uyam bhṛṅgayuvā karīra viṭape badhnātu tuṣṭim kutas

original: Subhv_0750-1 mā bhūnnāma sahāmunaiva nidhanaṃ daivātkathaṃcitpunas-
analyzed: mā bhūt nāma saha amunā eva nidhanam daivāt kathaṃcid punar

original: Subhv_0750-2 tṛṣṇā vā hatajīvite yadi tadā kiṃ puṣpaśūnyaṃ jagat /
analyzed: tṛṣṇā vā hata jīvite yadi tadā kim puṣpa śūnyam jagat

original: Subhv_0750-3 yenaivonmathitaḥ sa eva dayitaḥ padmākaro nirdayaṃ
analyzed: yena eva unmathitaḥ saḥ eva dayitaḥ padma ākaraḥ nirdayam
dāna ambhaḥ spṛhayā anuyāti aliḥ aho lolaḥ tam eva dvipam
sopūrvaḥ rasanā viparyaya vidhiḥ tad karṇayoḥ cāpalam

original: Subhv_0751-2 dṛṣṭiḥ sā madavismṛtasvaparadikkiṃ bhūyasoktena vā /
analyzed: dṛṣṭiḥ sā mada vismṛta sva para diś kim bhūyasā uktena vā

original: Subhv_0751-3 sarvaṃ niścitavānasi bhramara he yadvāraṇodyāpyasā-
analyzed: sarvam niścitavān asi bhramara he yat vāraṇa udyāpyasai

original: Subhv_0751-4 vantaḥśūnyakaro niṣevyata iti bhrātaḥ ka eṣa grahaḥ //
analyzed: vantaḥśūnya karaḥ niṣevyate iti bhrātar kaḥ eṣa grahaḥ
re re bhṛṅga mada andha vāraṇa calat karṇa anila āndolana

original: Subhv_0752-2 kleśaklāntatano mudhaiva bhavatā duḥkhaṃ kimityāsyate /
analyzed: kleśa klānta tano mudhā eva bhavatā duḥkham kim iti āsyate
utkūjat sa mada dvirepha valaya pyālupta kośa śriyaḥ

original: Subhv_0752-4 sāmodāḥ prakaṭāśayāḥ pratipadaṃ santyeva padmākarāḥ //
analyzed: sa āmodāḥ prakaṭa āśayāḥ pratipadam santi eva padma ākarāḥ

original: Subhv_0753-1 gandhāḍhyāṃ navamālikāṃ madhukarastyaktvā gato yūthikāṃ
analyzed: gandha āḍhyām navamālikām madhukaraḥ tyaktvā gataḥ yūthikām

original: Subhv_0753-2 tāṃ tyaktvāpi gataḥ sa candanataruṃ tasmātsarojaṃ gataḥ /
analyzed: tām tyaktvā api gataḥ sa candana tarum tasmāt sarojam gataḥ

original: Subhv_0753-3 baddhastatra niśākareṇa suciraṃ krandatyasau mandadhīḥ
analyzed: baddhaḥ tatra niśākareṇa su ciram krandati asau manda dhīḥ

original: Subhv_0753-4 saṃtoṣeṇa vinā parābhavaśataṃ prāpnoti lubdho janaḥ //
analyzed: saṃtoṣeṇa vinā parābhava śatam prāpnoti lubdhaḥ janaḥ
rātriḥ gamiṣyati bhaviṣyati su prabhātam
bhāsvān udeṣyati hasiṣyati padminī ca
evam vicintayati koṣa gate dvirephe

original: Subhv_0754-4 hā hanta hanta nalinīṃ gaja unmamātha //
analyzed: hā hanta hanta nalinīm gajaḥ unmamātha
bhraman vanānte vana mañjarīṣu
na ṣaṭpadaḥ gandha phalīm ajighrat

original: Subhv_0755-3 sā kiṃ na ramyā sa ca kiṃ na rantā
analyzed: sā kim na ramyā sa ca kim na rantā
balīyasī kevalam īśvara icchā
aṅke vṛddhim upāgatam śiśu tayā sarva aṅgam āliṅgitam
matsyaḥ śrī parirambha nirbhara taravya ākośa koṣa unmukhaiḥ
āśā āptaiḥ paripīyamānam aniśam niḥspandam indindiraiḥ
dūrāt eva nimeṣa śūnya nayanaḥ padmam samudvīkṣate
jīvataḥ nigiran matsyān muni vat dṛśyate bakaḥ
mṛnān api na gṛdhraḥ tu dhik ākāra muni indra tām
nālena iva sthitvā pādena ekena kuñcita grīvam
janayati kumuda bhrāntim vṛddha bakaḥ bāla matsyānām
eṣa bakaḥ sahasā eva vipannaḥ
śādyam aho kva nu tat gatam asya
sādhu kṛtāntaka kaścid api tvām
vañcayitum na kutopi samarthaḥ
nija kula ucita ceṣṭitam ātmanaḥ
yat apahāya yiyāsasi haṃsa tām

original: Subhv_0760-3 baka cara vratameva tathāpi te
analyzed: baka cara vratam eva tathā api te
phalati tat tat idam yatatām nṛṇām
na kolilānām iva mañcu kūjitam
na kabdha lāsyāni gatāni haṃsa vat
na barhiṇānām iva citra pakṣa tā
guṇaḥ tathā api asti bake baka vratam
tad vedagdhyam samudita payaḥ toya tattvam

original: Subhv_0762-2 mālāpāste sa ca mṛdupadanyāsahṛdyo vilāsaḥ /
analyzed: mālā apāste sa ca mṛdu padanyāsa hṛdyaḥ vilāsaḥ

original: Subhv_0762-3 āstāṃ tāvadbaka yadi tathā vetsi kiṃcidicchlathāśaṃ
analyzed: āstām tāvat baka yadi tathā vetsi kiṃcid id ślatha āśam

original: Subhv_0762-4 tūṣṇīmevāsitumayi sakhe tvaṃ kathaṃ me na haṃsaḥ //
analyzed: tūṣṇīm eva āsitum ayi sakhe tvam katham me na haṃsaḥ

original: Subhv_0763-1 kastvaṃ lohitalocanāsyacaraṇo haṃsaḥ kuto mānasāt-
analyzed: kaḥ tvam lohita locana āsya caraṇaḥ haṃsaḥ kutas mānasāt
kim tatra asti suvarṇa paṅkaja vanāni ambhaḥ sudhā saṃnibham
muktā śuktiḥ atha asti śaṅkha nicayaḥ vaidūrya rohāḥ kvacid

original: Subhv_0763-4 chambūkāḥ kimu santi neti ca bakairākarṇya hīhīkṛtam //
analyzed: chambūkāḥ kimu santi nā iti ca bakaiḥ ākarṇya hīhīkṛtam

original: Subhv_0764-1 tulyavarṇacchadaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ kokilaiḥ saha saṃgataḥ /
analyzed: tulya varṇa chadaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ kokilaiḥ saha saṃgataḥ

original: Subhv_0764-2 kena vijñāyate kākaḥ svayaṃ yadi na bhāṣate //
analyzed: kena vijñāyate kākaḥ svayam yadi na bhāṣate

original: Subhv_0765-1 ātmarutādapi virutaṃ kurvāṇāḥ spardhayā saha mayūraiḥ /
analyzed: ātma rutāt api virutam kurvāṇāḥ spardhayā saha mayūraiḥ

original: Subhv_0765-2 kiṃ jānanti varākāḥ kākāḥ kekāravānkartum //
analyzed: kim jānanti varākāḥ kākāḥ kekāravān kartum
kṛṣṇam vapuḥ vahatu cumbatu sat phalāni
ramyeṣu saṃcaratu cūta vana antareṣu
puṃskokilasya caritāni karotu nāma

original: Subhv_0766-4 kākaḥ kila dhvanividhau nanu kāka eva //
analyzed: kākaḥ kila dhvani vidhau nanu kākaḥ eva
saṃprāpya kokila kulaiḥ kamanīya kāntiḥ
kānta svaraiḥ api balāt khalu saṃnikarṣam
vaidhurya bhāji hata vedhasi kim varākaḥ

original: Subhv_0767-4 kākaḥ karotvanukṛtiṃ na yayau yadeṣām //
analyzed: kākaḥ karotu anukṛtim na yayau yat eṣām
iyam pallī bhillaiḥ anucita samārambha rasikaiḥ
samantāt ākrāntāḥ viṣa viṣama bāṇa praṇayibhiḥ

original: Subhv_0768-3 tarorasya skandhe gamaya samayaṃ kīra nibhṛtaṃ
analyzed: taroḥ asya skandhe gamaya samayam kīra nibhṛtam

original: Subhv_0768-4 na vāṇī kalyāṇī tadihamukhamudraiva śaraṇam //
analyzed: na vāṇī kalyāṇī tad iha mukha mudrā eva śaraṇam
kaati mukha gṛhītam bhukta śeṣam purīṣam
vilikhati caraṇa agraiḥ devatānām śirāṃsi
vrajati ca hata mānaḥ sādhu mūrdha sva śaṅkaḥ

original: Subhv_0769-4 kimiva na kurute khaṃ prāpya kāko varākaḥ //
analyzed: kim iva na kurute kham prāpya kākaḥ varākaḥ

original: Subhv_0770-1 daurbhāgyaṃ vacasāṃ tanormalinatā ceṣṭāsvaho cāpalaṃ
analyzed: daurbhāgyam vacasām tanoḥ malina tā ceṣṭāsu aho cāpalam
śaṅkāyāḥ tad upajña tā eva viditā vṛttiḥ tu avācyā eva sā

original: Subhv_0770-3 itthaṃ dṛṣkṛtaśākhinaḥ phalamiva sphītaṃ tathāpyāturaḥ
analyzed: ittham dṛṣkṛta śākhinaḥ phalam iva sphītam tathā api āturaḥ
kākaḥ kokila lāñchana chavi rucā kaṣṭam muhur mūrchati

original: Subhv_0771-1 nṛtyantaḥ śikhino manoharamamī śravyaṃ paṭhantaḥ śukā
analyzed: nṛtyantaḥ śikhinaḥ manoharam amī śravyam paṭhantaḥ

original: Subhv_0771-2 vīkṣyante na ta eva khalviha ruṣā vāryanta evāthavā /
analyzed: vīkṣyante na te eva khalu iha ruṣā vāryante eva athavā
pāntha strī gṛham iṣṭa lābha kathanāt labdha anvayena amunā
saṃprati etat anargalam balibhujā māyāvinā bhujyate

original: Subhv_0772-1 re re dhvāṅkṣa virūkṣatāstu vacasaḥ kāṇākṣitā kṣamyate
analyzed: re re dhvāṅkṣa virūkṣa tā astu vacasaḥ kāṇa akṣi tā kṣamyate

original: Subhv_0772-2 laulyaṃ nāma taveti kātra gaṇanā bhāṇḍyaṃ vibhūṣaiva te /
analyzed: laulyam nāma tava iti kā atra gaṇanā bhāṇḍyam vibhūṣā eva te

original: Subhv_0772-3 sarvaṃ soḍhamidaṃ svabhāvavihitaṃ vahnerivauṣṇyaṃ hi te
analyzed: sarvam soḍham idam svabhāva vihitam vahneḥ iva auṣṇyam hi te

original: Subhv_0772-4 yattvevaṃ viguṇasya kāpi bhavato grīvā na tatsahyate //
analyzed: yat tu evam viguṇasya kā api bhavataḥ grīvā na tat sahyate

original: Subhv_0773-1 kākaḥ kokilamunnamayya kurute cūte phalāsvādanaṃ
analyzed: kākaḥ kokilam unnamayya kurute cūte phala āsvādanam

original: Subhv_0773-2 bhuṅkte rājaśukaṃ nivārya kuraraḥ krīḍāparo dāḍimam /
analyzed: bhuṅkte rāja śukam nivārya kuraraḥ krīḍā paraḥ dāḍimam

original: Subhv_0773-3 dhūko barhiṇamasya śākhiśikhare śete sajāniḥ sukhaṃ
analyzed: dhūkaḥ barhiṇam asya śākhi śikhare śete sa jāniḥ sukham

original: Subhv_0773-4 hā jātaṃ viparītamadya vipine śyene parokṣaṃ gate //
analyzed: hā jātam viparītam adya vipine śyene parokṣam gate

original: Subhv_0774-1 kiṃ kekīva śikhaṇḍamaṇḍitatanuḥ kiṃ kīravatpāṭhakaḥ
analyzed: kim kekī iva śikhaṇḍa maṇḍita tanuḥ kim kīra vat pāṭhakaḥ

original: Subhv_0774-2 kiṃ puṃskokilavatsvanena madhuraḥ kiṃ haṃsavatsadgatiḥ /
analyzed: kim puṃskokila vat svanena madhuraḥ kim haṃsa vat sat gatiḥ
kim sāmānya śakunta śāvakaḥ iva krīḍā vinoda ākaraḥ

original: Subhv_0774-4 kākaḥ kena guṇena kāñcanamaye vyāpāritaḥ pañjare //
analyzed: kākaḥ kena guṇena kāñcana maye vyāpāritaḥ pañjare
utpattiḥ marutām prabhoḥ yuga dine prakhyāpya viśva utsave

original: Subhv_0775-2 puṇyāhaśrutiṣu prasiddhiradhikā pūrṇaṃ vayaḥ pauruṣam /
analyzed: puṇya aha śrutiṣu prasiddhiḥ adhikā pūrṇam vayaḥ pauruṣam

original: Subhv_0775-3 kākutsthena samaṃ sapatnakalaho daivajñatā tādṛśī
analyzed: kākutsthena samam sapatna kalahaḥ daiva jña tā tādṛśī

original: Subhv_0775-4 kākastena guṇena kāñcanamaye vyāpāritaḥ pañjare //
analyzed: kākaḥ tena guṇena kāñcana maye vyāpāritaḥ pañjare
ādyaḥ praveśa samayaḥ sa kaleḥ yugasya
prāptaḥ tiraskṛta bahu udaka haṃsa sārthaḥ
āhūye sādara tayā

original: Subhv_0776-4 kāṇo dvijaḥ pratigṛhaṃ bata yatra pūjyaḥ //
analyzed: kāṇaḥ dvijaḥ pratigṛham bata yatra pūjyaḥ
yat candra ipi artha saṃsparśi tat kṛtam

original: Subhv_0777-2 khadyota iti kīṭasya nāma tuṣṭena kenacit //
analyzed: khadyotaḥ iti kīṭasya nāma tuṣṭena kenacid
ghana saṃtamasa malīmasa daśa diśi niśi yat virājasi tat anyat
kīṭamaṇe dinam adhunā tarāṇi kara antarita cāru sitakiraṇam
jarjara tṛṇa agram adahan sarṣapa kaṇam aprakāyan ūnam
kīṭa tvam ātmatantraḥ khadyotaḥ khyāpayan bhāti
bhrājiṣṇavaḥ nabhasi bhūri hṛta andhakāra
su alpa prabhāḥ sva tanu mātra nibaddha bhāsaḥ
khadyotakāḥ prakaṭa tīvra guru prabhāvāḥ
tāvat na sapta turagaḥ samudeti yāvat
yuṣmādṛśaḥ kṛpaṇakāḥ yasyām
bhānti sma saṃtama samayī agamat niśā asau

original: Subhv_0781-4 bhātyatra nendurapi kīṭamaṇe kimu tvam //
analyzed: bhāti atra nā induḥ api kīṭamaṇe kimu tvam
induḥ prayāsyati vinaṅkṣyati tāraka śrīḥ
sthāsyanti līḍha timirāḥ na maṇi pradīpāḥ
andham samagram api kīṭamaṇe bhaviṣya
dunmeṣam eṣyati bhavān iti dūram etat

original: Subhv_0783-1 sattvāntaḥ sphuritāya vā kṛtaguṇādyāropatucchāya vā
analyzed: sattva antar sphuritāya vā kṛta guṇa ādi āropa tucchāya vā

original: Subhv_0783-2 tasmai kātaramohanāya mahaso leśāya mā svasti bhūt /
analyzed: tasmai kātara mohanāya mahasaḥ leśāya mā svasti bhūt
yat chāyā sphuraṇa aruṇena khacatā khadyota nāmnā amunā
kīṭena āhitayā api jaṅgama maṇi bhrāntyā viḍambyāmahe
pratyagraiḥ parṇa nicayaiḥ taruḥ yaiḥ eva śobhitaḥ

original: Subhv_0784-2 jahāti jīrṇāṃstāneva kiṃ vā citraṃ kujanmanaḥ //
analyzed: jahāti jīrṇān tān eva kim vā citram ku janmanaḥ
yathā pallava puṣpa āḍhyāḥ yathā puṣpa phala ṛddhayaḥ
yathā phala ṛddhi su ārohāḥ hā mātar kva agaman drumāḥ

original: Subhv_0786-1 sādhveva tadvidhāvasya vedhāḥ kliṣṭo na yanmudhā /
analyzed: sādhu eva tat vidhau asya vedhāḥ kliṣṭaḥ na yat mudhā
svarūpa an anurūpeṇa candanasya phalena kim
mayā badara lubdhena vṛkṣāṇām anabhijñayā
vane kaṇṭaka sādṛśyāt khadiraḥ paryupāsitaḥ

original: Subhv_0788-1 mahātarurvā bhavati samūlo vā vinaśyati /
analyzed: mahā taruḥ vā bhavati sa mūlaḥ vā vinaśyati
na aṅkura prakriyām eti nyagrodha kaṇikā aṅkuraḥ
puṣpa pattra phala chāyā mūla valkala dārubhiḥ

original: Subhv_0789-2 dhanyā mahīruhā yeṣāṃ vimukhā yānti nārthinaḥ //
analyzed: dhanyāḥ mahīruhāḥ yeṣām vimukhāḥ yānti na arthinaḥ

original: Subhv_0790-1 patatyaṅgāravarṣe vā vāti vā pralayānile /
analyzed: patati aṅgāra varṣe vā vāti vā pralaya anile
tālaḥ stabdha tayā ārabdhaḥ tayā eva saha naśyati
chāyāvantaḥ gata vyālāḥ su ārohāḥ phala dāyinaḥ
mārga drumāḥ mahāntaḥ ca pareṣām eva bhūtaye
agatīnām khalīkārāt duḥkham na eva upajāyate
bhavanti aśokāḥ prāyeṇa sa aṅkurāḥ pāda tāḍitāḥ

original: Subhv_0793-1 yadyapi candanaviṭapī vidhinā phalakusumavarjito vihitaḥ /
analyzed: yadi api candana viṭapī vidhinā phala kusuma varjitaḥ vihitaḥ
nija vapuṣā eva pareṣām tathā api saṃtāpam apaharati

original: Subhv_0794-1 prāpte vasantamāse vṛddhiṃ prāpnoti sakalavanarājinaḥ /
analyzed: prāpte vasanta māse vṛddhim prāpnoti sakala vana rājinaḥ

original: Subhv_0794-2 yanna karīre pattraṃ tatkiṃ doṣo vasantasya //
analyzed: yat na karīre pattram tat kim doṣaḥ vasantasya
phalita ghana viṭapa vighaṭita paṭu dinakara mahasi lasati kalpatarau

original: Subhv_0795-2 chāyārthī kaḥ paśurapi bhavati jaradvīrudhāṃ praṇayī //
analyzed: chāyā arthī kaḥ paśuḥ api bhavati jarat vīrudhām praṇayī
phala kusuma kisalaya ujjvala viṭapa śata antarita taraṇi kiraṇa oghe

original: Subhv_0796-2 mārgatarau nikaṭasthe kaḥ pathikaḥ klāntimanubhavati //
analyzed: mārga tarau nikaṭa sthe kaḥ pathikaḥ klāntim anubhavati
dūrīkṛta sva artha lavāḥ janasya
samudyatāḥ ye bhuvi tāpa śāntyai
drumāḥ te eva āgatikāḥ na vidmaḥ
prajāpateḥ āśaya leśam atra
candane viṣadharān sahāmahe
vastu sundaram aguptimat kutas
rakṣitum vada kim ātma sauṣṭhavam
saṃcitāḥ khadira kaṇṭakāḥ tvayā
grathitaḥ eṣa mithas kṛta śṛṅkhalo
viṣadharaiḥ adhiruhya mahā jaḍaḥ
malayajaḥ sumanobhiḥ anāśritaḥ

original: Subhv_0799-4 yadata eva phalena na yujyate //
analyzed: yat atas eva phalena na yujyate
yat kiṃcana anucitam api ucita anubandhi

original: Subhv_0800-2 kiṃ candanasya na kṛtaṃ kusumaṃ phalaṃ vā /
analyzed: kim candanasya na kṛtam kusumam phalam vā
lajjāmahe bhṛśam apakrame eva yātuḥ
tasya antikam parigṛhīta bṛhat kuṭhāraḥ
he bāla campaka taro taruṇī kapola
kim puṣpitena vijahi iha vikāsa hāsa
mud dāma pāmara gaṇā maru bhūmiḥ eṣā
antar pratapta maru saikata dahyamāna
mūlasya campaka taroḥ kva vikāsa cintā
prāyas bhavati anucita sthiti deśa bhājām
śreyaḥ sva jīva paripālana mātram eva
daurjanyam ātmani param prathitam vidhātrā
bhūrja drumasya viphala tva samarpaṇena
kim carmabhiḥ niśita śastra śata avakṛttaiḥ
āśām na pūrayati sorthi paramparāṇām
kim kaṇṭaka eka rasikena phala dviṣā kim
vairasya sīmani kimu sthira kautukena
chāyā vilāsa vimukhena satām kim aṅga

original: Subhv_0803-8 chātrā khalena khadiradruma eṣa sṛṣṭaḥ //
analyzed: chātrā khalena khadiradrumaḥ eṣa sṛṣṭaḥ
labdham cirāt amṛta vat kim amṛtyave syāt
dīrgham rasāyanavat āyuḥ uta pradadyāt
etat phalam yat ayam adhvaga śāpa dagdhaḥ

original: Subhv_0805-4 stabdhaḥ phalaṃ phalati varṣaśatena tālaḥ //
analyzed: stabdhaḥ phalam phalati varṣa śatena tālaḥ
he vṛkṣa śobhita mahā phala bhāra lakṣmyā
tvattaḥ mayā katham api idam adhas nirastam
ekam phalam śakuni khaṇḍitam alpam āptam
atyanta śītala tayā subhaga svabhāva

original: Subhv_0807-2 satyaṃ na kaścidapi te tarurasti tulyaḥ /
analyzed: satyam na kaścid api te taruḥ asti tulyaḥ
chāyā arthinām api punar vikaṭa dvijihva
saṅgena candana viṣa druma nirviśeṣaḥ

original: Subhv_0808-1 kathamiyati vanānte kaścideko na tādṛg-
analyzed: katham iyati vanānte kaścid ekaḥ na tādṛś
vara vana taruḥ uccais puṣpa vallī phala āḍhyaḥ
jagat asukha vidhātuḥ dagdha dhātuḥ niyogāt
dhava khadira palāśāḥ kevalam vṛddhi bhājaḥ
śākhā saṃtati saṃniruddha gagana ābhogasya labdhvā taroḥ

original: Subhv_0809-2 chāyāṃ yasya bhavidbhireva śamitā gharmāpadonekaśaḥ /
analyzed: chāyām yasya bhavidbhiḥ eva śamitāḥ gharma āpadā anekaśas

original: Subhv_0809-3 bhoḥ pānthā nanu dṛśyatāṃ vidhigatistasyaiva kālakṣaya-
analyzed: bhoḥ pānthāḥ nanu dṛśyatām vidhi gatiḥ tasya eva kāla kṣaya

original: Subhv_0809-4 prakṣīṇasya taledya taptasikatāṅgāraivaḥ paraṃ dahyate //
analyzed: prakṣīṇasya param dahyate

original: Subhv_0810-1 citrairyasya patittribhirdaśadiśo bhrāntvā sametaiḥ sukhaṃ
analyzed: citraiḥ yasya pati tribhiḥ daśa diśaḥ bhrāntvā sametaiḥ sukham

original: Subhv_0810-2 viśrāntaṃ śayitaṃ prabhuktamuṣitaṃ skandhe phalaiḥ praśrite /
analyzed: viśrāntam śayitam prabhuktam uṣitam skandhe phalaiḥ praśrite
tasya eva unmathitasya duṣṭa kariṇā mārga drumasya adhunā
kārīṣāya kaṣanti śoṣa paruṣām gopāla bālāḥ tvacam
saṃtoṣaḥ kim aśakta tā kim athavā tasmin asaṃbhāvanā

original: Subhv_0811-2 śobhaivātha ca kānanisthitiriyaṃ pradveṣa evāthavā /
analyzed: śobhā evā atha ca kānani sthitiḥ iyam pradveṣaḥ evā athavā

original: Subhv_0811-3 āstāṃ khalvanurūpayā saphalayā puṣpaśriyā durvidhe
analyzed: āstām khalu anurūpayā saphalayā puṣpa śriyā durvidhe

original: Subhv_0811-4 saṃbandhonanurūpayāpi na kṛtaḥ kiṃ candanasya tvayā //
analyzed: saṃbandhaḥ ūna anurūpayā api na kṛtaḥ kim candanasya tvayā
sat mūlaḥ sthitaḥ sat pathe
sevyaḥ sadbhiḥ iti idam ākalayatā tāla udhvagena āśritaḥ

original: Subhv_0812-3 puṃsaḥ śaktiriyatyasau sa tu phaledadyāthavā śvothavā
analyzed: puṃsaḥ śaktiḥ iyatī asau sa tu phalet adya athavā śvas thavā

original: Subhv_0812-4 kāle kvāpyathavā kadācidathavā netyatra vedhāḥ prabhuḥ //
analyzed: kāle kvāpi athavā kadācid athavā na iti atra vedhāḥ prabhuḥ

original: Subhv_0813-1 yajjātosi catuṣpathe ghanalasacchāyosi kiṃ chāyayā
analyzed: yat jātaḥ asi catuṣpathe ghana lasat chāyā usi kim chāyayā

original: Subhv_0813-2 saṃyuktaḥ phalitosi kiṃ yadi phalaiḥ pūrṇosi kiṃ saṃnataḥ /
analyzed: saṃyuktaḥ phalitaḥ asi kim yadi phalaiḥ pūrṇaḥ asi kim saṃnataḥ

original: Subhv_0813-3 he sadvṛkṣa sahasva saṃprati sakhe śākhāśikhākarṣaṇa-
analyzed: he sat vṛkṣa sahasva saṃprati sakhe śākhā śikhā ākarṣaṇa
kṣobha āmoṭana bhañjanāni janataḥ svaiḥ eva duścoṣṭitaiḥ
su skandhasya visāri saurabha guṇa ākrānta akhila āśasya te
tanvī cāru payodhara antara kṛta sparśasya gopī ākṛteḥ

original: Subhv_0814-3 doṣaḥ kopi bhujaṃgasaṃgamakṛtaḥ prodgūta eṣodhunā
analyzed: doṣaḥ kaḥ api bhujaṃga saṃgama kṛtaḥ prodgūtaḥ eṣa adhunā

original: Subhv_0814-4 yena tvāṃ parihṛtya candanataro yāntyadhvagā dūrataḥ //
analyzed: yena tvām parihṛtya candana taraḥ yānti adhvagāḥ dūratas
chinnaḥ tapta suhṛd sa candana taruḥ yūyam palāyya āgatā

original: Subhv_0815-2 bhogābhyāsasukhāsikāḥ pratidinaṃ tā vismṛtāstatra vaḥ /
analyzed: bhoga abhyāsa sukhāsikāḥ pratidinam tāḥ vismṛtāḥ tatra vaḥ

original: Subhv_0815-3 daṃṣṭrākoṭiviṣolkayā pratikṛtaṃ tasya praharturna cet-
analyzed: daṃṣṭrā koṭi viṣa ulkayā pratikṛtam tasya prahartuḥ na ced

original: Subhv_0815-4 kiṃ tenaiva saha svayaṃ na nidhanaṃ yātāḥstha bho bhoginaḥ //
analyzed: kim tena eva saha svayam na nidhanam yātāḥ stha bho bhoginaḥ

original: Subhv_0816-1 tvanmūle puruṣāyuṣaṃ gatamidaṃ kālena saṃśaṣyatāṃ
analyzed: tvad mūle puruṣa āyuṣam gatam idam kālena

original: Subhv_0816-2 ksodīyāṃsamapi kṣaṇaṃ paramataḥ śaktiḥ kutaḥ prāṇitum /
analyzed: ksodīyāṃsam api kṣaṇam param atas śaktiḥ kutas prāṇitum

original: Subhv_0816-3 tatsvastyastu vivṛddhimehi mahatīmadyāpi kā nastvarā
analyzed: tat svasti astu vivṛddhim ehi mahatīm adya api kā naḥ tvarā

original: Subhv_0816-4 kalyāṇaiḥ phalitāsi tālaviṭapinputreṣu pautreṣu vā //
analyzed: kalyāṇaiḥ phalitā asi tāla viṭapin putreṣu pautreṣu vā
chāyā asya eva ghana asugandhiḥ ayam eva āpanna tāpa chidā

original: Subhv_0817-2 magresyaiva guṇagrahaḥ saguṇatā kiṃ candanasyocyatām /
analyzed: guṇa grahaḥ sa guṇa tā kim candanasya ucyatām
mūlāt punar eṣu baddha vṛtibhiḥ vyālaiḥ tathā

original: Subhv_0817-4 jāne yena varaṃ dhavotha khadiropyanyothavā na tvayam //
analyzed: jāne yena varam na tu ayam

original: Subhv_0818-1 na ślāṣyāni phalāni pallavakṛtā chāyā na vāñchāpi sā
analyzed: na ślāṣyāni phalāni pallava kṛtā chāyā na vāñchā api sā

original: Subhv_0818-2 no puṣpaṃ sumanoharaṃ na vihagāḥ śabdāmṛtasyandinaḥ /
analyzed: no puṣpam su manoharam na vihagāḥ śabda amṛta syandinaḥ
kāka vrāta purīṣa nirbhara jarat mūrteḥ aśuddha ātmanaḥ

original: Subhv_0818-4 niḥstabdhasya taroradhaḥ kathamaho sṛṣṭosi durvedhasā //
analyzed: niḥstabdhasya taroḥ adhas katham aho sṛṣṭaḥ asi durvedhasā

original: Subhv_0819-1 nāsya svāduphalaṃ na cāru kusumaṃ na snigdhaparṇā latā
analyzed: na asya svādu phalam na cāru kusumam na snigdha parṇā latā

original: Subhv_0819-2 na cchāyā klamahāriṇī na ca kalakvāṇāstathā patriṇaḥ /
analyzed: na chāyā klama hāriṇī na ca kalakvāṇāḥ tathā patriṇaḥ

original: Subhv_0819-3 eṣosau khadiradumaḥ kimathavā pānthena dṛṣṭastvayā
analyzed: eṣa asau khadiradumaḥ kim athavā pānthena dṛṣṭaḥ tvayā
tat kim pāntha kaṭhora kaṇṭaka mukhaiḥ gātra kṣata arthī bhavān
snigdhāḥ pallavinaḥ prakāma viṭapa vyāviddha caṇḍa ātapā

original: Subhv_0820-3 dagdhāste taravaḥ prayāntu pathikāsteṣveva mārgeṣvamī
analyzed: dagdhāḥ te taravaḥ prayāntu pathikāḥ teṣu eva mārgeṣu amī

original: Subhv_0820-4 rūkṣāḥ kāṇṭakinaḥ sasarpavivarā bhūyaḥ prarūḍhā drumāḥ //
analyzed: rūkṣāḥ kāṇṭakinaḥ sa sarpa vivarāḥ bhūyas prarūḍhāḥ drumāḥ

original: Subhv_0821-1 chāyā nātmana eva yā kathamasāvanyasya niṣpragrahā
analyzed: chāyā na ātmanaḥ eva yā katham asau anyasya niṣpragrahā
grīṣma ūṣma āpadi śītalaḥ tala bhūvi spanda unila ādeḥ kutas

original: Subhv_0821-3 vārtā varṣaśate gate kila phalaṃ bhāvīti vārtaiva sā
analyzed: vārtā varṣa śate gate kila phalam bhāvi iti vārtā eva sā

original: Subhv_0821-4 drāghimṇā muṣitāḥ kiyacciramaho tālena bālā vayam //
analyzed: drāghimṇā muṣitāḥ kiyat ciram aho tālena bālāḥ vayam

original: Subhv_0822-1 kastvaṃ bhoḥ kathayāmi daivahatakaṃ māṃ viddhi śāhoṭakaṃ
analyzed: kaḥ tvam bhoḥ kathayāmi daivahatakam mām viddhi śāhoṭakam

original: Subhv_0822-2 vairāgyādiva vakṣi sādhu viditaṃ kasmādidaṃ kathyate /
analyzed: vairāgyāt iva vakṣi sādhu viditam kasmāt idam kathyate
vāmena atra vaṭaḥ tam adhvaga janaḥ sarva ātmanā sevate

original: Subhv_0822-4 na cchāyāpi paropakārakṛtaye mārgasthitasyāpi se //
analyzed: na chāyā api para upakāra kṛtaye mārga sthitasya api se
āmodaiḥ marutaḥ mṛgāḥ kisalayaiḥ lambaiḥ tvacā tāpasāḥ

original: Subhv_0823-2 puṣpaiḥ ṣaṭcaraṇāḥ phalaiḥ śakunayo gharmārditāśchāyayā /
analyzed: puṣpaiḥ ṣaṣ caraṇāḥ phalaiḥ śakunayaḥ gharma arditāḥ chāyayā
skandhaiḥ gandha gajāḥ ca viśrama rujāḥ śaśvat vibhaktāḥ tvayā

original: Subhv_0823-4 prāptastvaṃ druma bodhisattvapadavīṃ satyaṃ kujātāḥ pare //
analyzed: prāptaḥ tvam druma bodhisattva padavīm satyam ku jātāḥ pare
bhrāmyat bhṛṅga bhara avanamra kusuma cyotat madhu udgandhiṣu

original: Subhv_0824-2 cchāyāvatsu taleṣu pānthanivahā viśramya geheṣviva /
analyzed: chāyāvatsu taleṣu pāntha nivahāḥ viśramya geheṣu iva
nityam nirjhara vāri vārita tṛṣaḥ tṛpyanti yeṣām phalaiḥ

original: Subhv_0824-4 te nandantu phalantu yāntu ca parāmatyunnatiṃ pādapāḥ //
analyzed: te nandantu phalantu yāntu ca parām ati unnatim pādapāḥ

original: Subhv_0825-1 he he maṇḍitamārga mārgaviṭapiñjīvyāḥ samāḥ śāśvatīr-
analyzed: he he maṇḍita mārga mārga viṭa piñjīvyāḥ samāḥ śāśvatīḥ
adya api āvṛṇu diś taṭāni viṭapaiḥ sālaiḥ cucumba ambaram

original: Subhv_0825-3 mūle viśramaṇāśayaiva luṭhitā yanna tvayā kevalaṃ
analyzed: mūle viśramaṇa āśayā eva luṭhitā yat na tvayā kevalam
gharma ārteḥ parimocitāḥ phala śataiḥ yāvat vayam tarpitāḥ
vṛddhiḥ yasya taroḥ manoratha śataiḥ āśāvatā prārthitā
jātā asau sarasaḥ pravāsi phala daḥ sarva āśrita apāśrayaḥ
nānā deśa samāgataiḥ aviditaiḥ ākrāntam anyaiḥ khagaiḥ

original: Subhv_0826-4 taṃ labdhāvasaropi vṛddhaśakunirdūre sthito vīkṣate //
analyzed: tam labdha avasaraḥ upi vṛddha śakuniḥ dūre sthitaḥ vīkṣate
dāva agni ploṣa duḥkham khara pavana jala kleśam arkāt ca tāpam

original: Subhv_0827-2 mātaṅgākarṣaṇāni vyasanamapi guru prāptavantopi vajrāt /
analyzed: mātaṅga ākarṣaṇāni vyasanam api guru prāptavantaḥ api vajrāt

original: Subhv_0827-3 dārucchāyāphalāni tvacamapi kusumaṃ mañjarīḥ pallavānvā
analyzed: dāru chāyā phalāni tvacam api kusumam mañjarīḥ pallavān vā

original: Subhv_0827-4 nārthibhyo vārayanti pratidivasamaho sādhu vṛttaṃ tarūṇām //
analyzed: na arthibhyaḥ vārayanti pratidivasam aho sādhu vṛttam tarūṇām

original: Subhv_0828-1 haṃsāḥ padmavanāśayā balibhujo gṛdhrāśca māṃsāśayā
analyzed: haṃsāḥ padma vana āśayāḥ balibhujaḥ gṛdhrāḥ ca māṃsa āśayā
pānthāḥ svādu phala āśayāḥ madhulihaḥ saurabhya gandha āśayā
dūrāt niṣphala rakta puṣpa nicayaiḥ niḥsāra rathyā unnate

original: Subhv_0828-4 re re śalmalipādapa pratidinaṃ ke na tvayā vañcitāḥ //
analyzed: re re śalmali pādapa pratidinam ke na tvayā vañcitāḥ
bhrātar bhīma maru bhram śrama śama vyāpāra pāraṃgamam

original: Subhv_0829-2 matvā candanapādapaṃ pathika mā viśrāntaye śiśriyaḥ /
analyzed: matvā candana pādapam pathika mā viśrāntaye śiśriyaḥ
etasya antika vartibhiḥ ghana viṣa jvālā āvalī bīṣaṇaiḥ
āśvāsya smṛtiśeṣa tām viṣadharaiḥ kiyantaḥ adhvagāḥ
uccais yaḥ madhu pāna lubdha manasām bhṛṅga aṅganānām gaṇaiḥ
udgītaḥ racita ālayaḥ khaga kulaiḥ deśa antarāt āgataiḥ
niṣevitaḥ udhvaga śataiḥ grīṣma ūṣma tānti chide
saḥ ayam saṃprati durmadena dalitaḥ chāyā taruḥ dantinā

original: Subhv_0831-1 bhuktaṃ svāduphalaṃ kṛtaṃ ca śayanaṃ śākhāgrajaiḥ pallavais-
analyzed: bhuktam svādu phalam kṛtam ca śayanam śākhā agra jaiḥ pallavaiḥ

original: Subhv_0831-2 tvacchāyāpariśītalaṃ ca salilaṃ pītaṃ vinītaḥ klamaḥ /
analyzed: tvad chāyā pariśītalam ca salilam pītam vinītaḥ klamaḥ

original: Subhv_0831-3 viśrāntaṃ suciraṃ tatopi manasā prāptā parā nirvṛtis-
analyzed: viśrāntam su ciram tatas upi manasā prāptā parā nirvṛtiḥ

original: Subhv_0831-4 tvaṃ sanmārgatarurvayaṃ ca pathikā bhūyāspunaḥ saṃgamaḥ //
analyzed: tvam sat mārga taruḥ vayam ca pathikāḥ bhūyāḥ punar saṃgamaḥ

original: Subhv_0832-1 astyeva bhūbhṛtāṃ mūrdhni divi vā dyotatembudaḥ /
analyzed: asti eva bhūbhṛtām mūrdhni divi vā dyotatā imbudaḥ
marudbhiḥ bhujyamānaḥ upi sa kim eti rasātalam
ambudaḥ kṛta padaḥ nabhastale
toyapūra paripūrita udadhiḥ
goṣpadasya bharaṇe ipi aśaktimān
iti asatyam abhidīyate katham
etat atra pathika eka jīvitam
paśya śuṣyati katham mahat saraḥ
dhik mudhā ambudhara ruddha sat gatiḥ
vardhitā kim iha haṭṭavāhinī
sva artha an apekṣam janatā apaśāntyai
nitya uditāḥ santi payaḥ mucā umī
vivarṣiṇaḥ tān avagṛhṇate ye
santi eva te ke pi mahā anubhāvāḥ
kva dṛṣṭam andhena balāhakena

original: Subhv_0836-2 ghrātuṃ gavā yanna tṛṇaṃ nighṛṣṭam /
analyzed: ghrātum gavā yat na tṛṇam nighṛṣṭam
mahā taruḥ bandhuḥ iva adhva gānā
māyā tva vaśyāya kaṇaiḥ daridraḥ
uttuṅga śaila śikhara āśrayaṇena kecid
uddāma vīci valitāḥ saritaḥ bhavanti
anye punar jala kaṇāḥ tṛṇa loṣṭa pātā
dambhomucām payasi na kṣayamān puvanti
yatra uṣitaḥ asi cira kālam akiṃcanaḥ san
na ṛṇaḥ pratigraha dhana grahaṇa adhamarṇaḥ
nirlajja garjasi samudra taṭe pi tatra

original: Subhv_0838-4 dhṛṣṭodhamastava samo ghana naiva dṛṣṭaḥ //
analyzed: dhṛṣṭaḥ adhamaḥ tava samaḥ ghana nā eva dṛṣṭaḥ

original: Subhv_0839-1 āsyaṃ nirasya rasitaiḥ suciraṃ vihasya
analyzed: āsyam nirasya rasitaiḥ su ciram vihasya
gātra antareṣu ghana varṣasi cātakasya
tad cañcu koṭi kuṭila āyata kaṃdharasya
prāṇa atyayau usya bhavataḥ parihāsa mātram
ākramya uccais śirasi vasatiḥ bhūbhṛtām unnatānām
toyādānām tat api jaladheḥ loka saṃtāpa śāntyai

original: Subhv_0840-3 dīrghā chāyā prakṛtimahati vyomni cābhogabandho
analyzed: dīrghā chāyā prakṛti mahati vyomni ca ābhoga bandho

original: Subhv_0840-4 he he megha spṛhayati na te kaḥ kiletthaṃ vratāya //
analyzed: he he megha spṛhayati na te kaḥ kila ittham vratāya
ākramya uccais śirasi vasatiḥ bhūbhṛtām unnatānām
toya ādānam tat api jaladheḥ loka saṃtāpa śāntyai

original: Subhv_0841-3 dīrghā chāyā prakṛtimahati vyomni cābhogabandho
analyzed: dīrghā chāyā prakṛti mahati vyomni ca ābhoga bandho

original: Subhv_0841-4 he he megha spṛhayati na te kaḥ kiletthaṃ vratāya //
analyzed: he he megha spṛhayati na te kaḥ kila ittham vratāya

original: Subhv_0842-1 sādhūtpātaghanaugha sādhu sudhiyāṃ dheyaṃ dharāyāmidaṃ
analyzed: sādhu utpāta ghana ogha sādhu su dhiyām dheyam dharāyām idam

original: Subhv_0842-2 konyaḥ kartumalaṃ tavaiva ghaṭate karmedṛśaṃ duṣkaram /
analyzed: kaḥ nyaḥ kartum alam tava eva ghaṭate karma īdṛśam duṣkaram
sarvasya aupayikāni yāni katicid kṣetrāṇi tatra aśaniḥ
sarva anaupayikeṣu dagdha sikatā araṇyeṣu apām vṛṣṭayaḥ
bhekaiḥ koṭara śāyibhiḥ mṛtam iva kṣmā antargatam kacchapaiḥ
pāṭhīnaiḥ pṛthu paṅka kūṭa luṭhitaiḥ yasmin muhur mūrchitam
tasmin śuṣka sarasya kāla jaladena āgatya tat ceṣṭitam

original: Subhv_0843-4 yenā kaṇṭhanimagnavanyakariṇāṃ yūthaiḥ payaḥ pīyate //
analyzed: yena kaṇṭha nimagna vanya kariṇām yūthaiḥ payaḥ pīyate
yat bhūbhṛtaḥ laghu guṇaiḥ api baddha mūlam
āpāditāni sahasā eva tṛṇaiḥ śirāṃsi
ambhomucaḥ pracura varṣa viśṛṅkhalasya
tat ceṣṭitam duravadhāra gateḥ jalasya
kṛchrāt datte virala viralān vāri bindūn pravṛddhaḥ
garjati ekaḥ sarabhasataram paśya tad mātra lābhāt
nṛtyati anyaḥ api atula mahima ślāghya bhūmiḥ na jāne

original: Subhv_0845-4 madhyādābhyāṃ vipulahṛdayaścātakaḥ kiṃ nu meghaḥ //
analyzed: madhyāt ābhyām vipula hṛdayaḥ cātakaḥ kim nu meghaḥ
gatāḥ te jīmūtāḥ sphurat ali kula śyāma vapuṣaḥ
śriyā yeṣām loke sthala jala vibhāgaḥ upi apahṛtaḥ

original: Subhv_0846-3 vṛthā tṛṣṇāndhaḥ kiṃ bhramasi vidhuraścātakaśiśo
analyzed: vṛthā tṛṣṇā andhaḥ kim bhramasi vidhuraḥ cātaka śiśo

original: Subhv_0846-4 śarajjīmūtoyaṃ kuta iha payobindurapi te //
analyzed: śarad jīmūta uyam kutas iha payaḥ binduḥ api te

original: Subhv_0847-1 paśyāmaḥ kimayaṃ viceṣṭata iti svalpābhrasiddhikriyair-
analyzed: paśyāmaḥ kim ayam viceṣṭate iti su alpa abhra siddhi kriyaiḥ
darpāt dūram upekṣitena balavat karma īritaiḥ mantribhiḥ
labdha ātma prasareṇa rakṣitum atha aśakyena muktvā aśanim

original: Subhv_0847-4 sphītastāvadaho ghanena ripuṇā dagdho girigrāmakaḥ //
analyzed: sphītaḥ tāvat aho ghanena ripuṇā dagdhaḥ giri grāmakaḥ

original: Subhv_0848-1 garjitvā bahu saṃnirudhya gaganaṃ pracchādya diṅmaṇḍalaṃ
analyzed: garjitvā bahu saṃnirudhya gaganam pracchādya diś maṇḍalam
saṃpādya uddalita indranīla śakala śyāma abhirāmam vapuḥ
prāpte vāridhara āgame pi salilam tat tyaktam ambhomucā

original: Subhv_0848-4 cañcūśrātakapotakasya sakalā siktā na yena svayam //
analyzed: cañcū śrāta kapotakasya sakalā siktā na yena svayam
atrā utpāta ghanena mantri vikale śūnya ambara vyāpinā
dhṛṣṭa sva prakṛti kriyā samucite grāme tathā jṛmbhitam
rathyā kardama vāhinām ati śuci su accha ātmanām antaram
na api ajñāyi janaiḥ yathā ogha payasām strotaḥ jalānām api

original: Subhv_0850-1 re meghāḥ svaśarīradānaguru kiṃ bauddhaṃ yaśo na śrutaṃ
analyzed: re meghāḥ sva śarīra dāna guru kim bauddham yaśaḥ na śrutam

original: Subhv_0850-2 yaṣmābhiḥ kimu pārijātacaritaṃ nākarṇitaṃ vā kvacit /
analyzed: kimu pārijāta caritam na ākarṇitam vā kvacid
yena etat sukha labhyam ambu dadatām yuṣmākam udgarjatām
naḥ lajjā api abhijāyata iti rabhasāt vyomni uddhatam dhāvatām

original: Subhv_0851-1 sthāne varṣati naiva garjati vṛthā klāntiṃ haratyañjasā
analyzed: sthāne varṣati nā eva garjati vṛthā klāntim harati añjasā
kṣetrāṇām paritāpa jarjara rucām kṣemaṃkaraḥ kṣmā tale
yat yat bhadraka sāndra tām hṛdi dadhāti anyat karoti ullasa
nsat meghaḥ yama amogha darśana ghana snigdha chaviḥ vardhatām
naḥ garjati amburāśiḥ trijagat adhipati prārthita artha pradāna
tad toya stoka mātra vyapahṛta vikṛtiḥ prākṛ toyam prakṛtyā

original: Subhv_0852-4 śūnye kṣiptvāmbu garjatyagaṇitanidhano vārivāhaḥ sagarvam //
analyzed: śūnye kṣiptvā ambu garjati agaṇita nidhanaḥ vārivāhaḥ sa garvam
na pālayati maryādām velā ākhyām ambudhiḥ tathā
tṛṣyatām na upakartavyam iti imām aparām yathā

original: Subhv_0854-1 gavādīnāṃ payonyedyuḥ sadyo vā dadhi jāyate /
analyzed: gavā ādīnām payaḥ nyedyus sadyas vā dadhi jāyate

original: Subhv_0854-2 kṣīrodadhestu nādyāpi mahatāṃ vikṛtiḥ kutaḥ //
analyzed: kṣīrodadheḥ tu na adya api mahatām vikṛtiḥ kutas
yadi api svaccha bhāvena darśayati udadhiḥ maṇīn

original: Subhv_0855-2 tathāpi jānudaghnoyamiti cetasi mā kṛthāḥ //
analyzed: tathā api jānu daghnā iyam iti cetasi mā kṛthāḥ
yasya ambu kaṇikā api āsye na patati arthīnām kvacid

original: Subhv_0856-2 kaṣṭamambhonidhiḥ sopi nadīna iti kathyate //
analyzed: kaṣṭam ambhonidhiḥ saḥ api nadīnaḥ iti kathyate

original: Subhv_0857-1 yātu nāśaṃ samudrasya mahimā sa bhuvi śrutaḥ /
analyzed: yātu nāśam samudrasya mahimā sa bhuvi śrutaḥ

original: Subhv_0857-2 vāḍavaḥ kṣutpipāsārto yenaikopi na tarpitaḥ //
analyzed: vāḍavaḥ kṣudh pipāsā ārtaḥ yena ekaḥ api na tarpitaḥ

original: Subhv_0858-2 kasya sphuranti hṛdaye grīṣmataḍākā bhuvi varākāḥ //
analyzed: kasya sphuranti hṛdaye grīṣma taḍākāḥ bhuvi varākāḥ
yat ayam śaśiśekharaḥ haro
hariḥ api eṣa yadi īśitā śriyaḥ
amarāḥ api yat surāḥ amī
tat imāḥ tasya vibhūti vipruṣaḥ
kṣāra tā eva hi guṇaḥ tathā asti te
yena na vrajati kaścid antikam
bhīṣaṇa ākṛti bibharṣi yādasām
cakram arṇava kimartham agratas
apāsya lakṣmī haraṇa uttha vairi tā
ca tat adri manthanam
dadau nivāsam haraye mahā udadhiḥ
vimatsarāḥ dhīra dhiyām hi vṛttayaḥ
jita indu bhāsaḥ nayatām maṇinadhas
tṛṇāni mūrdhnā bibhṛtām jaleśvaraḥ
prabhoḥ na kaścid prabhuḥ asti

original: Subhv_0862-4 ratnāni ratnāni tṛṇaṃ tṛṇaṃ punaḥ //
analyzed: ratnāni ratnāni tṛṇam tṛṇam punar
grīṣmam dviṣantu jaladāgam arthayantām
te saṃkaṭa prakṛtayaḥ kṛpaṇāḥ taḍāgāḥ
abdheḥ tu mugdha śapharī caṭula acala indra
niṣkampa kukṣi payasaḥ dvayam api acintyam

original: Subhv_0864-1 grāvāṇo maṇayo harirjalacaro lakṣmīḥ payomānuṣī
analyzed: grāvāṇaḥ maṇayaḥ hariḥ jalacaraḥ lakṣmīḥ payaḥ mānuṣī

original: Subhv_0864-2 muktaughaḥ sikatā pravālalatikāḥ śevālamambhaḥ sudhā /
analyzed: mukta oghaḥ sikatā pravāla latikāḥ śevālam ambhaḥ sudhā

original: Subhv_0864-3 tīre kalpamahīruhāḥ kimaparaṃ nāmāpi ratnākaro
analyzed: tīre kalpa mahīruhāḥ kim aparam nāma api
dūrāt karṇa rasāyanam nikaṭatas tṛṣnā api no śāmyati
āstām klama apaharaṇam jaladheḥ jalena
dūre dava agni paridīpita mānasānām
etāvat astu yadi toya kaṇaiḥ na jihvā

original: Subhv_0865-4 dandahyate dviguṇatāṃ ca na yāti tṛṣṇā //
analyzed: dandahyate dviguṇa tām ca na yāti tṛṣṇā
ratnāni amūni makara ālaya mā avamaṃsthāḥ
kallola vellita dṛṣad paruṣa prahāraiḥ

original: Subhv_0866-3 kiṃ kaustubhena vihito bhavato na nāma
analyzed: kim kaustubhena vihitaḥ bhavataḥ na nāma
puruṣottamaḥ api
lajjāmahe vayam aho bhṛśam api aneke
sāṃyātrikāḥ salila rāśim amī viśānti
skandha adhiropita tadīya taṭa upakaṇṭha
kauleyaka ambu dṛtayaḥ yad udīrṇa tṛṣṇāḥ
ā strī śiśu prathitayā eṣa pipāsitebhyaḥ
saṃrakṣyate imbudhiḥ a peya tayā eva dūrāt
dṛṣṭvā karāla makara ali karālitābhiḥ
kim
dhik dhik dhik ambudhim amī nirapatrapasya
yasya adhvagāḥ maru bhuvi iva nitānta tāntāḥ
tṛṣ dāha śuṣka gala nirgata dīrgha jihvā
dīnāḥ vivartita dṛśaḥ nu taṭam prayānti
nirmathyate yadi sura asura sainya saṃghaiḥ
āpūryate yadi jalaiḥ jalada āpagābhiḥ
pepīyate ca vaḍavāmukha vahninā ced

original: Subhv_0870-4 na kṣubhyati sma jaladhirna tanutvameti //
analyzed: na kṣubhyati sma jaladhiḥ na tanu tvam eti
maināka ādibhiḥ adribhiḥ maghavataḥ saṃtrasya yatra asyate

original: Subhv_0871-2 caṇḍārcirbhagavānudeti ca yato yatrāstamabhyeti ca /
analyzed: caṇḍārciḥ bhagavān udeti ca yatas yatra astam abhyeti ca

original: Subhv_0871-3 śete kvāpi nilīya yasya jagatāṃ kukṣyekadeśe patir-
analyzed: śete kvāpi nilīya yasya jagatām kukṣi eka deśe patiḥ
gāmbhīrya śriyam asya kaḥ tulayitum vārām nidheḥ arhati
upakṛtavatā śrī ratnābhyām hareḥ śaśi lekhayā
manasija ripoḥ pīyūṣeṇa api aśeṣa divaukasām
katham itarathāḥ tena stheyam yaśaḥ bhara mantharam

original: Subhv_0872-4 yadi na mathanāyāsaṃ dhīraḥ saheta payonidhiḥ //
analyzed: yadi na mathana āyāsam dhīraḥ saheta payonidhiḥ

original: Subhv_0873-1 viṣamabhimukhaṃ muktaṃ raudraṃ diśo daśa saṃśritāḥ
analyzed: viṣam abhimukham muktam raudram diśaḥ daśa saṃśritāḥ
śaśi taru maṇi prāyaiḥ prāyas pralobhanam āhitam

original: Subhv_0873-3 kimiva na kṛtaṃ nanthārambhe śaṭhena payodhinā
analyzed: kim iva na kṛtam nanthā ārambhe śaṭhena payodhinā

original: Subhv_0873-4 tadapi nipuṇairnāsya kṣāntaṃ surairamṛtaṃ vinā //
analyzed: tat api nipuṇaiḥ na asya kṣāntam suraiḥ amṛtam vinā

original: Subhv_0874-1 yadiha bhavato gāmbhīryeṇa prayāti mahattayā-
analyzed: yat iha bhavataḥ gāmbhīryeṇa prayāti mahat tayā
pi anucita guṇa ārambhaḥ kālaḥ kim etat anantaram
ayi jalanidhe kim kallolaiḥ alabdha samāptibhiḥ

original: Subhv_0874-4 virama saritāmetattoyaṃ na testi manāgapi //
analyzed: virama saritām etat toyam na te sti manāk api
samāśritya utsaṅgam vipṛta vadanasya asya vasataḥ
kṣaṇena ekasya antar jvalita vapuṣaḥ yat kṣaṇam api
na tṛṣṇām aurva agneḥ apanayati puṣṭe api vibhave
nṛśaṃsasya ambhodheḥ vrajatu vilayam saḥ usya mahimā
aho bata saritpateḥ idam anārya rūpam param
yat ujjvala rucīn maṇīn su cira carcita āsthā guṇān
jaḍaiḥ anupayogibhiḥ paratas etya labdha āspadaiḥ
kṣipati aniśam ūrjitaiḥ jhak iti tanmaya tvam gataḥ
iha ekaḥ cūḍālobhī ajani kalaśa ādyasya sakalaiḥ
pipāsoḥ ambhobhiḥ culukam api no bhartum aśakaḥ
sva māhātmya ślāghā guru gahana garjābhiḥ abhitas

original: Subhv_0877-4 kuṣitvā kliśnāsi śrutikuharamabdhe kimiti naḥ //
analyzed: kuṣitvā kliśnāsi śruti kuharam abdhe kim iti naḥ

original: Subhv_0878-1 rūkṣaṃ kṣāramapeyamatra salilaṃ labdhvā paraṃ tapyate
analyzed: rūkṣam kṣāram apeyam atra salilam labdhvā param tapyate
vyāla grāha bhiyā avagāhanam api svasthena na āsādyate

original: Subhv_0878-3 tatkiṃ pāntha payodhināmani marau tṛṣṇāvimūḍho bhavān-
analyzed: tat kim pāntha payodhi nāmani marau tṛṣṇā vimūḍhaḥ bhavān
antar nihnuti nāśita amala maṇi vrāte mudhā dhāvasi
sarvāsām trijagatī apām iyam asau ādhāra tā tāvakī
prollāsaḥ yam asau tava ambu nilaye sā iyam mahā sattva tā
sevitvā bahu bhaṅga bhīṣaṇa tanum tvām eva velā acala

original: Subhv_0879-4 grāvasrotasi pāpa tāpakalaho yatkvāpi nirvāpyate //
analyzed: grāva srotasi pāpa tāpa kalahaḥ yat kvāpi nirvāpyate
kallolaiḥ vikiratu asau giri varān velā vilāsa utthitaiḥ

original: Subhv_0880-2 śabdairvā badhirīkarotu kakubho dhattāṃ ca vistīrṇatām /
analyzed: śabdaiḥ vā badhirīkarotu kakubhaḥ dhattām ca vistīrṇa tām
pānthānām ravi tāpa tapta vapuṣām tṛṣṇā atireka chidaḥ

original: Subhv_0880-4 kiṃ sāmyaṃ pratanoḥ karotu sarasopyabdhiḥ kṛtāḍamabaraḥ //
analyzed: kim sāmyam pratanoḥ karotu sarasā upi abdhiḥ kṛta āḍamabaraḥ
yena sudhā nidhānam asamam sattva adhikena arthine
śrīvāsaḥ api mahāmaṇiḥ vidhuḥ asau kalpadrumaḥ gauḥ tathā
śāpāt kṣāra jalaḥ tathā api jaladhiḥ prāpta ayaśāḥ iti aho
lokaḥ ayam tṛṇa vat guṇam vigaṇayan doṣa graha ekāgra dhīḥ

original: Subhv_0882-1 hā kaṣṭaṃ taṭavāsinopi viphalaprāgbhāramālokya mām-
analyzed: hā kaṣṭam taṭa vāsinaḥ api viphala prāgbhāram ālokya mām

original: Subhv_0882-2 anyatraiva vipāsavaḥ pratidinaṃ gacchantyamī jantavaḥ /
analyzed: anyatra eva vipāsavaḥ pratidinam gacchanti amī jantavaḥ
ittham vyartha jala ati bhāra vahana prodbhūta khedāt iva

original: Subhv_0882-4 svāṃ mūrtiṃ vaḍavānale jalanidhirmanye juhotyanvaham //
analyzed: svām mūrtim vaḍavānale jalanidhiḥ manye juhoti anvaham
maryādā paripālanena mahatām kṣauṇībhṛtām rakṣaṇāt
viśrāntyā madhusūdanasya su ciram yat kiṃcid āsāditam
gāmbhīrya ucitam ātmanaḥ jaladhinā mantha vyathā saṃbhramāt
deveṣu arpayata amṛtam drutam aho sarvam tat utpuṃsitam
āścaryam vaḍavānalaḥ sa bhagavān āścaryam ambhonidhiḥ

original: Subhv_0884-2 yatkarmātiśayaṃ vicintya manasaḥ kampaḥ samutpadyate /
analyzed: yad karma atiśayam vicintya manasaḥ kampaḥ samutpadyate
ekasya āśraya ghasmarasya pibataḥ tṛptiḥ na jātā jalaiḥ

original: Subhv_0884-4 anyasyāpi mahātmano na vapuṣaḥ svalpopi jātaḥ śramaḥ //
analyzed: anyasya api mahātmanaḥ na vapuṣaḥ su alpaḥ api jātaḥ śramaḥ

original: Subhv_0885-1 nodvegaṃ yadi yāsi yadyavahitaḥ karṇaṃ dadāsi kṣaṇaṃ
analyzed: na udvegam yadi yāsi yadi avahitaḥ karṇam dadāsi kṣaṇam

original: Subhv_0885-2 tvāṃ pṛcchāmi yadambudhe kimapi tanniścitya dehyuttaram /
analyzed: tvām pṛcchāmi yat ambudhe kim api tat niścitya dehi uttaram
nairāśya anuśaya atimātra niśitam niḥśvasya yat dṛśyase
tṛṣyadbhiḥ pathikaiḥ kiyat tat adhikam syāt aurva dāhāt atas
itas svapiti keśavaḥ kulam itas tadīya dviṣām

original: Subhv_0886-2 itaśca śaraṇārthināṃ śikhariṇāṃ guṇāḥ śerate /
analyzed: itas ca śaraṇa arthinām śikhariṇām guṇāḥ śerate
itas ca vaḍavānalaḥ saha samasta saṃvartakaiḥ

original: Subhv_0886-4 aho vitatamūrjitaṃ bharasahaṃ ca sindhorvapuḥ //
analyzed: aho vitatam ūrjitam bhara saham ca sindhoḥ vapuḥ
vaikuṇṭhāya śriyam abhinavam śītabhānum bhavāya

original: Subhv_0887-2 prādāduccaiḥśravasamapi vā vajriṇe tatkva gaṇyam /
analyzed: prādāt uccaiḥśravasam api vā vajriṇe tat kva gaṇyam

original: Subhv_0887-3 tṛṣṇārtāya svamapi munaye yaddadāti sma dehaṃ
analyzed: tṛṣṇā ārtāya svam api munaye yat dadāti sma deham
kaḥ nyaḥ tasmāt bhavati bhuvaneṣu ambudheḥ bodhisattvaḥ
ratna ujjvalāḥ samīraiḥ
abdhiḥ kriyeta yadi ruddha taṭa abhimukhyaḥ
doṣa ūrthinaḥ sa khalu bhāgya viparyayāṇām

original: Subhv_0888-4 dāturmanāgapi na tasya tu dātṛtāyāḥ //
analyzed: dātuḥ manāk api na tasya tu dātṛ tāyāḥ
antarye satatam luṭhanti agaṇitāḥ tān eva pāthodharaiḥ
rāttān āpatataḥ taraṅga valayaiḥ āliṅgya gṛhṇan asau
vyaktam mauktika ratna tām jala kaṇān saṃprāpayati ambudhiḥ

original: Subhv_0889-4 prāyonyena kṛtādaro laghurapi prāptorcyate svāmibhiḥ //
analyzed: prāyonyena kṛta ādaraḥ laghuḥ api prāptā ūrcyate svāmibhiḥ
svasti astu vidruma latā sumanaḥ maṇibhyaḥ
kalyāṇinī bhavatu mauktika śukti paṅktiḥ

original: Subhv_0890-3 prāptaṃ mayā sakalameva phalaṃ payodher-
analyzed: prāptam mayā sakalam eva phalam payodheḥ
yat dāruṇaiḥ jalacaraiḥ na vidāritaḥ asmi

original: Subhv_0891-1 ādāya vāri paritaḥ saritāṃ mukhebhyaḥ
analyzed: ādāya vāri paritas saritām mukhebhyaḥ
kim tāvat arjitam anena durarṇavena

original: Subhv_0891-3 kṣārīkṛtaṃ ca vaḍavādahane hutaṃ ca
analyzed: kṣārīkṛtam ca vaḍavā dahane hutam ca
pātāla kukṣi kuhare viniveśitam ca

original: Subhv_0892-1 kālaprāptaṃ mahāratnaṃ yo na gṛhṇātyabuddhimān /
analyzed: kāla prāptam mahā ratnam yaḥ na gṛhṇāti abuddhimān
anya hasta gatam dṛṣṭvā paścāt sa paritapyate
bhidyate nupraviśya antaryaḥ yathāruci upādhinā

original: Subhv_0893-2 viśuddhiḥ kīdṛśī tasya jaḍasya sphaṭikāśmanaḥ //
analyzed: viśuddhiḥ kīdṛśī tasya jaḍasya sphaṭika aśmanaḥ

original: Subhv_0894-1 sphaṭikasya guṇo yosau sa evāyāti doṣatām /
analyzed: sphaṭikasya guṇaḥ yaḥ asau saḥ eva āyāti doṣa tām

original: Subhv_0894-2 dhatte svacchatayā chāyāṃ yastāṃ malavatāmapi //
analyzed: dhatte svaccha tayā chāyām yaḥ tām malavatām api
yena pāṣāṇa khaṇḍasya mūlyam alpam vasuṃdharā
an astamita sārasya tejasaḥ tat vijṛmbhitam
śuṣka tanu tṛṇa lava agram gṛhṇāti dhana āśayā anyadīyam yaḥ
mūḍhāḥ tṛṇa maṇim api tam niyuñjate pāda rakṣāyai
sat vaṃśa jaḥ sādhu guṇaḥ su vṛttaḥ

original: Subhv_0897-3 kānto dṛśaḥ paśya tathāpi hāraḥ
analyzed: kāntaḥ dṛśaḥ paśya tathā api hāraḥ
kṣiptaḥ bahis tuṅga kuca dvayena
kanaka bhūṣaṇa saṃgrahaṇa ucitaḥ
yadi maṇiḥ trapuṇi pratibadhyate

original: Subhv_0898-3 na sa virauti na cāpi hi śobhate
analyzed: na sa virauti na ca api hi śobhate
bhavati yojayituḥ vacanīya tā
marakatasya varam malina ātma tā

original: Subhv_0899-2 tyajati jātu nijāṃ prakṛtiṃ na yaḥ /
analyzed: tyajati jātu nijām prakṛtim na yaḥ
amala tām sphaṭikasya dhik añjasā
bhajati rūpam upānta gatasya yaḥ
asmin sakhe nanu maṇi tva mahā subhikṣe

original: Subhv_0900-2 cintāmaṇe tvamupalo bhava mā maṇirbhūḥ /
analyzed: cintāmaṇe tvam upalaḥ bhava mā maṇiḥ bhūḥ

original: Subhv_0900-3 adyedṛśā hi maṇayaḥ prabhavanti loke
analyzed: adyā īdṛśāḥ hi maṇayaḥ prabhavanti loke
yeṣām tṛṇa grahaṇa kauśalam eva bhūṣā
bhūmau patan api rajaḥ paridhūsaraḥ api
jātyandha durjana janaiḥ avadhīritaḥ api
trailokya vandana mahā mahimānam antar
cintāmaṇiḥ na hi jahāti kadācid eva
cintāmaṇe bhuvi na kenacid īśvareṇa

original: Subhv_0902-2 mūrdhnā dhṛtosi yadi mā sma tato viṣīdaḥ /
analyzed: mūrdhnā dhṛtaḥ asi yadi mā sma tatas viṣīdaḥ
na asti eva hi tvad adhiropaṇa puṇya bījam
saubhāgya yogyam iha kasyacid uttamāṅgam
cintāmaṇeḥ tṛṇamaṇeḥ ca kṛtam vidhātrā
kena ubhayoḥ api maṇi tvam adaḥ samānam
na eka ūrthitāni dadat arthi janāya khinno
gṛhṇan jarat tṛṇa lavam na tu lajjitaḥ nyaḥ
manoratha śataiḥ vṛtaḥ bhuvana nātha cūḍā ucitaḥ
tṛṇaiḥ alam adhas kṛtaḥ kṛta padaḥ kvacid grāvasu

original: Subhv_0904-3 vrajatyapi sacetasāṃ viṣayamīdṛśāṃ yo dṛśo
analyzed: vrajati api sa cetasām viṣayam īdṛśām yaḥ
luṭhati acala kaṃdare vidhure eṣa cintāmaṇiḥ
parāmṛṣati sa spṛham muhur apelavam vīkṣate
mahat kim api ratnam iti asama saṃmadam gūhate
kutopi parilepa vat chavim avāpya kāca upale
vahati ati kadarthanām bata varākakaḥ pāmaraḥ
kiraṇa nikaraiḥ āśā cakram ciram paripūrayan

original: Subhv_0906-2 kimiha gahena bhrātarvyarthaṃ samullasito bhavān /
analyzed: kim iha gahena bhrātar vyartham samullasitaḥ bhavān

original: Subhv_0906-3 ka iha bhavato vettyatyantaṃ nisargamahārghatāṃ
analyzed: kaḥ iha bhavataḥ vetti atyantam nisarga mahārgha tām
dūre kasyacid eṣa kopya kṛta dhīḥ na eva asya vetti antaram

original: Subhv_0907-2 mānī kopi na yācate mṛgayate kopyalpamalpāśayaḥ /
analyzed: mānī kopi na yācate mṛgayate kopī alpam alpa āśayaḥ
ittham prārthita dāna durvyasaninaḥ na audārya rekhā ujjvalā

original: Subhv_0907-4 jātā naipuṇadustareṣu nikaṣā sthāneṣu cintāmaṇeḥ //
analyzed: jātā naipuṇa dustareṣu nikaṣā sthāneṣu cintāmaṇeḥ

original: Subhv_0908-1 ye gṛhṇanti haṭhāttṛṇāni maṇayo ye vāpyayaḥpiṇḍikāṃ
analyzed: ye gṛhṇanti haṭhāt tṛṇāni maṇayaḥ ye vā api ayaḥ piṇḍikām

original: Subhv_0908-2 te dṛṣṭāḥ pratidhāma dagdhamaṇayo vicchinnasaṃkhyāściram /
analyzed: te dṛṣṭāḥ pratidhāma dagdha maṇayaḥ vicchinna saṃkhyāḥ ciram

original: Subhv_0908-3 no jāne kimabhāvataḥ kimathavā daivādiha śrūyate
analyzed: no jāne kim abhāvataḥ kim athavā daivāt iha śrūyate

original: Subhv_0908-4 nāmāpyatra na tādṛśasya tu maṇe ratnāni gṛhṇāti yaḥ //
analyzed: nāma api atra na tādṛśasya tu maṇe ratnāni gṛhṇāti yaḥ
yat muktāmaṇayaḥ umbudheḥ udarataḥ kṣiptāḥ mahā vīcibhiḥ

original: Subhv_0909-2 paryanteṣu luṭhanti nirmalarucā spaṣṭāṭṭahāsā iva /
analyzed: paryanteṣu luṭhanti nirmala rucā spaṣṭa aṭṭahāsāḥ iva
tat tasya eva parikṣayāt jalanidheḥ dvīpa antara ālambinām

original: Subhv_0909-4 ratnānāṃ tu parigrahavyasaninaḥ santyeva sāṃyātrikāḥ //
analyzed: ratnānām tu parigraha vyasaninaḥ santi eva sāṃyātrikāḥ
māṇikyā uyam mahārghaḥ kṣiti tala mahitaḥ dīptimān ucca janmā
dṛṣṭvā enam nūnam ārāt vyapasaratitarām kā api daurgatya nītiḥ
ittham bhrānti prapañcaiḥ vipad apahṛtaye kenacid sthāpitaḥ sa

original: Subhv_0910-4 nnante dṛṣṭaḥ sa eva vraṇaśataparuṣaḥ kopi pāṣāṇakhaṇḍaḥ //
analyzed: dṛṣṭaḥ saḥ eva vraṇa śata paruṣaḥ kaḥ api pāṣāṇa khaṇḍaḥ

original: Subhv_0911-1 yāmaḥ svasti tavāstu rohaṇagire mattaḥ sthitipracyutā
analyzed: yāmaḥ svasti tava astu rohaṇagire mattaḥ sthiti pracyutā

original: Subhv_0911-2 vartiṣyanta ime kathaṃ kathamiti svapnepi maivaṃ kṛthāḥ /
analyzed: vartiṣyante ime katham katham iti svapne pi mā evam kṛthāḥ

original: Subhv_0911-3 śrīmaṃste maṇayo vayaṃ yadi bhavallabdhapratiṣṭhāstadā
analyzed: śrīman te maṇayaḥ vayam yadi bhavat labdha pratiṣṭhāḥ tadā

original: Subhv_0911-4 te śṛṅgāraparāyaṇāḥ kṣitibhujo maulau kariṣyanti naḥ //
analyzed: te śṛṅgāra parāyaṇāḥ kṣitibhujaḥ maulau kariṣyanti naḥ

original: Subhv_0912-1 uccairuccaratu ciraṃ cīrī vartmani taruṃ samāruhya /
analyzed: uccais uccaratu ciram cīrī vartmani tarum samāruhya
diś vyāpini śabda guṇe śaṅkhaḥ saṃbhāvanā bhūmiḥ
śaṅkha usthi śeṣaḥ sphuṭitaḥ mṛtaḥ yat
ucchvāsitena ucchvasate nu satyam

original: Subhv_0913-3 kiṃ tūccaratyeva na sosya śabdaḥ
analyzed: kim tu uccarati eva na saḥ usya śabdaḥ

original: Subhv_0913-4 śravyo na yo yo na sadarthaśaṃsī //
analyzed: śravyaḥ na yaḥ yaḥ na sat artha śaṃsī
prāṇān vihāya dhavala tva guṇa ucitāni
prāptāni yat jagati vaktra viśeṣa yogāt
śaṅkhaiḥ mahā vibhava śabda vijṛmbhitāni
tad jīvitam sahṛdayāḥ prabhavanti yeṣām

original: Subhv_0915-1 dhīraḥ śrotrasukhāvahopi sadṛśaḥ satyaṃ paraṃ maṅgalaṃ
analyzed: dhīraḥ sadṛśaḥ satyam param maṅgalam

original: Subhv_0915-2 kvāpi grāmasurāṅgaṇe sa tu lasansaṃdhyāsu śaṅkhadhvaniḥ /
analyzed: kvāpi grāma sura aṅgaṇe sa tu lasan saṃdhyāsu śaṅkha dhvaniḥ
mādyat medura sāra meya sarala grīvā agra dīrghībhavan
nādaḥ nāma kṛta anukāra mudita grāmya aṭṭahāsa āhataḥ
ratnākarāt jani bhuvā upi apacāyamānaḥ
śuṣka asthi śeṣa tanu tām api lambamānaḥ
śvāsaiḥ sa phūtkṛtibhiḥ api upahanyamānaḥ
śuddha āśayaḥ vadati maṅgalam eva śaṅkhaḥ
śaṅkhāḥ santi sahasraśas jalanidheḥ vīci chaṭā ghaṭṭitāḥ

original: Subhv_0917-2 paryanteṣu luṭhanti ye dalaśataiḥ kalmāṣitakṣmātalāḥ /
analyzed: paryanteṣu luṭhanti ye dala śataiḥ kalmāṣita kṣmā talāḥ

original: Subhv_0917-3 ekaḥ kopi sa pāñcajanya udabhūdāścaryabhūtaḥ satāṃ
analyzed: ekaḥ kaḥ api sa pāñcajanyaḥ udabhūt āścarya bhūtaḥ satām
yaḥ saṃvarta bhara kṣamaiḥ madhuripoḥ śvāsa anilaiḥ pūryate
sarva āśā paripūri huṃkṛta madaḥ janma api dugdha udadheḥ
govinda ānana cumbi sunadarataram pūrṇa indu bimbāt vapuḥ

original: Subhv_0918-3 śrīreṣā sahajā guṇāḥ kimaparaṃ bhaṇyanta ete hi yat-
analyzed: śrīḥ eṣā sahajāḥ guṇāḥ kim aparam bhaṇyante ete hi yat
kauṭilyam hṛdi pāñcajanya bhavataḥ tena atilajjāmahe
varam aśrīka tā eva astu na itara śrī samāna tā
iti kairavaka udbhede kamalam mukulāyate
lakṣmī saṃparka rūpaḥ yam doṣaḥ padmasya niścitam
yat ayam guṇa saṃdoha dhāmani indau parāṅmukhaḥ

original: Subhv_0921-1 antaśchidrāṇi bhūyāṃsi kaṇṭakā bahavo bahiḥ /
analyzed: antar chidrāṇi bhūyāṃsi kaṇṭakāḥ bahavaḥ bahis

original: Subhv_0921-2 kathaṃ kamalanālasya mā bhūvanbhaṅgurā guṇāḥ //
analyzed: katham kamala nālasya mā bhūvan bhaṅgurāḥ guṇāḥ
kim dīrgha dīrgheṣu guṇeṣu padma
siteṣu avachādana kāraṇam te
asti eva tān paśyati ced anāryā
trastā iva lakṣmīḥ na padam vidhatte
sthalakuśeśaya saṃcinu kaṇṭakān
prathaya paṅka kula udbhavatām mudā
api badhāna dhṛtim jalasaṃgame
vrajasi yena para āspada tām śriyaḥ
akṣeṣu iyam vyasani tā hṛdaye yat ete
rāgaḥ ghanaḥ madhu mada utkaṭam ānanam ca
padmaḥ tathā api parama āspadam eva lakṣmyāḥ
tat dainyam eva kila durbhaga tā yat ebhiḥ
padma ādayaḥ bahu guṇāḥ api yat niśāsu

original: Subhv_0925-2 nāśaṃ na yānti viraheṇa divākarasya /
analyzed: nāśam na yānti viraheṇa divākarasya
jyāyaḥ vijṛmbhitam idam trijagat pratītam
lakṣmīm viśeṣaya kuśeśaya kauśala aṅkām

original: Subhv_0926-2 jṛmbhā jahīhi calatāṃ ca vimuñca kiṃcit /
analyzed: jṛmbha jahīhi cala tām ca vimuñca kiṃcid
āśā gatāni ali kulāni mudam naya iha

original: Subhv_0926-4 mittre vidhau sati vidhatsa yatheṣṭametat //
analyzed: mittre vidhau sati vidhatsa yathā iṣṭam etat

original: Subhv_0927-1 nityaṃ tathā śṛṇu kuśeśaya madvacāṃsi
analyzed: nityam tathā śṛṇu kuśeśaya mad vacāṃsi

original: Subhv_0927-2 snehena yāni bhavataḥ kathayāmi kiṃcit /
analyzed: snehena yāni bhavataḥ kathayāmi kiṃcid
kāntyā anayā vimalayā bhramaraiḥ guṇaiḥ vā
kim yāsi ramyatama tām uta kaṇṭaka ṛddheḥ
saṃkocam ehi bisa puṣpa jahīhi śobhām
doṣākarā iyam adhunā samudeti paśya
vakra ātmani prabhavati kramaśas vicintya
pracchanna tā guṇavatām svayam eva yogyā
truṭyat guṇaḥ api bahu kaṇṭaka tām gataḥ api
randhra anvitaḥ api hata kardama saṃbhavaḥ api
bhṛṅga upabhogya vibhavaḥ api tathā api
mitra udaye vikasanam labhate sadā eva
kāmam bhavantu madhu lampaṭa ṣaṭpada ogha
saṃghaṭṭa ghuṃghuma ghana dhvanayaḥ ubja khaṇḍāḥ
gāyan ati śruti sukham vidhiḥ eva yatra
bhṛṅgaḥ sa kopi dharaṇidhara nābhi padmaḥ
tāpa apahe sahṛdaye rucire prabuddhe
sva aṅga pradāna paritoṣita ṣaṭpade asmin

original: Subhv_0931-4 yuktaṃ taveha kamale kamale sthitiryat //
analyzed: yuktam tava iha kamale kamale sthitiḥ yat
na paṅkāt udbhūtiḥ na jaḍa sahavāsa vyasani tā
vapuḥ digdham kāntyā sthala nalina ratna dyuti muṣā

original: Subhv_0932-3 vyadhāsyaddurvedhā hṛdayalaghimānaṃ yadi na te
analyzed: vyadhāsyat durvedhāḥ hṛdaya laghimānam yadi na te
tvam eva ekam lakṣmyāḥ paramam abhaviṣyaḥ padam iha
utpannāḥ bahavaḥ taleṣu sarasām ambhoruhāṇām cayā
ye yāminī adhipa anukāri ramaṇī vaktra upamānam gatāḥ

original: Subhv_0933-3 nābhau bhaumariporajāyata mahāpadmaḥ sa kopyekako
analyzed: nābhau bhauma ripoḥ ajāyata mahāpadmaḥ sa
yaḥ trailokya samudbhava prabhavituḥ janma avani tvam gataḥ
sva ābhoge ntar praveśaḥ upi a śithila nibiḍaḥ kośa bhāvāt na dattaḥ

original: Subhv_0934-3 nītvā nairāśyamitthaṃ galitagatirasau mugdhabuddhiḥ pradoṣe
analyzed: nītvā nairāśyam ittham galita gatiḥ asau mugdha buddhiḥ pradoṣe

original: Subhv_0934-4 padmena śrīmatāpi prasabhamubhayato bhraṃśitaḥ paśya bhṛṅgaḥ //
analyzed: padmena śrīmatā api prasabham ubhayatas bhraṃśitaḥ paśya bhṛṅgaḥ

original: Subhv_0935-1 bhrātaḥ paṅkaja saṃkocaḥ kaṃcitkālaṃ viṣahyatām /
analyzed: bhrātar paṅkaja saṃkocaḥ kaṃcid kālam viṣahyatām

original: Subhv_0935-2 saiva prabhāte śobhā te bhāte dinakare bhavet //
analyzed: sā eva prabhāte śobhā te bhāte dinakare bhavet

original: Subhv_0936-1 adhogatiṃ ca saṃprāpya bisāḥ paṅkakalaṅkitāḥ /
analyzed: adhogatim ca saṃprāpya bisāḥ paṅka kalaṅkitāḥ
guṇinaḥ nirguṇaiḥ dāśaiḥ kṛṣṭāḥ sva aṅkura darśitāḥ
tad aṅkurāṇi padmāni guṇaiḥ yuktāni mānibhiḥ
śirasā dhāryamāṇāni mīlitāni jaḍa ātmanā

original: Subhv_0938-1 marau nāstyeva salilaṃ kṛchrādyadyapi labhyate /
analyzed: marau na asti eva salilam kṛchrāt yadi api labhyate

original: Subhv_0938-2 tatkaṭu stokamuṣṇaṃ ca na karoti vitṛṣṇatām //
analyzed: tat kaṭu stokam uṣṇam ca na karoti vitṛṣṇa tām
caṭula cātaka cañcu puṭāt pata
ñjala kaṇaḥ api maroḥ ati gocaraḥ
sa punar adya ghanāgama bandhunā
jaladhareṇa jalaiḥ aparaḥ kṛtaḥ
kim pāntha nirmathana siddhi upayogi vastu
saṃbhāra śālini marau su gṛhīta nāmni
saṃdṛśyate iti viparītam idam hi tatra

original: Subhv_0940-4 kūposti tatra ca jalaṃ yadayatnalabhyam //
analyzed: kūpaḥ asti tatra ca jalam yat ayatna labhyam
asmin marau kim aparam vacasām avācyam

original: Subhv_0941-2 mā muñca pāntha muhurāśritavatsalo bhūḥ /
analyzed: mā muñca pāntha muhur āśrita vatsalaḥ bhūḥ
etat tvayā jala lava āmiṣa lālasena
dṛṣṭam jvalat parikaram sikatā vitānam
sat pādapān vipula pallava puṣpa bhāra
saṃpad parīta vapuṣaḥ phala bhāra nabhrān
yaḥ muñju śiñjita śakunta śata āśrita ūru

original: Subhv_0942-4 śākhānmarau mṛgayate na tatosti mugdhaḥ //
analyzed: śākhān marau mṛgayate na tatas asti mugdhaḥ
jala taru tṛṇa śūnyaḥ śrāmyatām adhvagānām

original: Subhv_0943-2 kimapi kila batāhaṃ nopakartuṃ samarthaḥ /
analyzed: kim api kila bata aham na upakartum samarthaḥ

original: Subhv_0943-3 iti na paramabhīkṣṇaṃ nānuśete na yāvac-
analyzed: iti na param abhīkṣṇam na anuśete na yāvat
chaṭha maruḥ anṛta ambhaḥ prāptaye tān prayuṅkte

original: Subhv_0944-1 gatamatijavādbhrāntaṃ bhrāntaṃ samutkaṣitā ca bhūś-
analyzed: gata mati javāt bhrāntam bhrāntam samutkaṣitā ca bhūḥ
cirataram atho niḥśvasya atho sa dainyam avasthitam

original: Subhv_0944-3 kimiva na kṛtaṃ pānthenetthaṃ tathāpi śaṭho maruḥ
analyzed: kim iva na kṛtam pānthena ittham tathā api śaṭhaḥ maruḥ

original: Subhv_0944-4 prakṛtivirasaḥ kaṣṭaṃ yāto manāgapi nārdratām //
analyzed: prakṛti virasaḥ kaṣṭam yātaḥ manāk api na ārdra tām
itas kāka anīkam pratibhayam itas kauśika kṛtā
gṛdhra ādyāḥ kulam idam itas kaṅka vayasām
śmaśāna sthāne ismin akhila guṇa vandhye hatatarau

original: Subhv_0945-4 api dvitrāḥ kecinna khalu kalavācaḥ śakunayaḥ //
analyzed: api dvitrāḥ kecid na khalu kala vācaḥ śakunayaḥ

original: Subhv_0946-1 kimasi vimatiḥ kiṃ vobmādī kṣaṇādabhilakṣyase
analyzed: kim asi vimatiḥ kim vā ubmādī kṣaṇāt abhilakṣyase

original: Subhv_0946-2 punarapi punaḥ prekṣāpūrvā na kācana te kriyā /
analyzed: punar api punar prekṣā pūrvā na kācana te kriyā
svayam ajalakām jānānaḥ upi praviśya maru sthalīm

original: Subhv_0946-4 śiśiramadhuraṃ vāri prāptuṃ yadadhvaga vāñchasi //
analyzed: śiśira madhuram vāri prāptum yat adhvaga vāñchasi

original: Subhv_0947-1 parārthe yaḥ pīḍāmanubhavati bhaṅgepi madhuro
analyzed: para arthe yaḥ pīḍām anubhavati bhaṅge pi
yadīyaḥ sarveṣām iha khalu vikāraḥ api abhimataḥ

original: Subhv_0947-3 na saṃprāpto vṛddhiṃ yadi sa bhṛśamakṣetrapatitaḥ
analyzed: na saṃprāptaḥ vṛddhim yadi sa bhṛśam akṣetra patitaḥ
kim ikṣoḥ doṣaḥ usau na punar aguṇāyāḥ maru bhavaḥ
tāpaḥ sva ātmani saṃśrita druma latā doṣaḥ dhvagaiḥ varjanam

original: Subhv_0948-2 satyaṃ tīvratayā tṛṣastava maro kosāvanarthodayaḥ /
analyzed: satyam tīvra tayā tṛṣaḥ tava maro kaḥ asau anartha udayaḥ
nanu arthaḥ su mahān ayam jala lava svāmi asmaya udgarjinaḥ
saṃnahyanti yatas tava upakṛtaye dhārādharāḥ prākṛtāḥ
evam ca ud vidhinā kṛtaḥ asi upakṛtau kasyāṃcid api akṣamaḥ

original: Subhv_0949-2 kāmaṃ mopakṛthāstatastava maro vācyaṃ na dhīro bhava /
analyzed: kāmam mā upakṛthāḥ tatas tava maraḥ vācyam na dhīraḥ bhava
kim tu ārāt mṛgatṛṣṇayā upajanayan ambhomucām vañcanām
premṇā karṣasi tarṣa mūrchita dhiyā upi anyān atas śocyase

original: Subhv_0950-1 āmrāḥ kiṃ phalabhāranabhraśiraso ramyāḥ kimūṣmacchidaḥ
analyzed: āmrāḥ kim phala bhāra nabhra śirasaḥ ramyāḥ kim ūṣma chidaḥ

original: Subhv_0950-2 sacchāyāḥ kadalīdrumāḥ surabhayaḥ kiṃ puṣpitāścampakāḥ /
analyzed: sat chāyāḥ kadalī drumāḥ surabhayaḥ kim puṣpitāḥ campakāḥ
etāḥ tāḥ niravagraha ugra karabha ullīḍha avarūḍhāḥ punar

original: Subhv_0950-4 śamyo bhrāmyasi mūḍha nirmaruti kiṃ mithyaiva martuṃ marau //
analyzed: śamyaḥ bhrāmyasi mūḍha nirmaruti kim mithyā eva martum marau

original: Subhv_0951-1 jalāntarāṇi śvabhreṣu tiṣṭhantu kvāpi yāntu vā /
analyzed: jala antarāṇi śvabhreṣu tiṣṭhantu kvāpi yāntu vā
sura sindhu pravāhasya sṛtau ratnākaraḥ avadhiḥ

original: Subhv_0952-1 kvāntaḥ śūnyo naḍaḥ kvekṣustathāpi sudṛśākṛtī /
analyzed: kva antaḥ śūnyaḥ naḍaḥ kva ikṣuḥ tathā api sudṛś ākṛtī
viveka śūnya manasām vipralambhāya nirmitau

original: Subhv_0953-1 nāsya bhāragrahe śaktirna ca vāhaguṇaḥ kṛṣau /
analyzed: na asya bhāra grahe śaktiḥ na ca vāha guṇaḥ kṛṣau
devāgāra balīvardaḥ tathā api aśnāti śobhanam
nakraḥ sva sthānam āsādya gaja indram api karṣati

original: Subhv_0954-2 sa eva pracyutaḥ sthānācchunāpi paribhūyate //
analyzed: saḥ eva pracyutaḥ sthānāt śunā api paribhūyate
varam unnata lāṅgūlāt saṭā dhūnana bhīṣaṇāt
siṃhāt pāda prahāraḥ api na sṛgāla adhirohaṇam

original: Subhv_0956-2 bhujaṃgāḥ pavanāhārāḥ sevakāḥ sadṛśo vidhiḥ //
analyzed: bhujaṃgāḥ pavana āhārāḥ sevakāḥ sadṛśaḥ vidhiḥ

original: Subhv_0957-1 kva gato mṛgo na jīvatyanudinamaśnaṃstṛṇāni vividhāni /
analyzed: kva gataḥ mṛgaḥ na jīvati anudinam aśnan tṛṇāni vividhāni

original: Subhv_0957-2 svayamāhatagajabhoktuḥ siṃhasya tu durlabhā vṛttiḥ //
analyzed: svayam āhata gaja bhoktuḥ siṃhasya tu durlabhā vṛttiḥ
vakram aśayyā saṃsthitam antar koṭaram aneka durgranthi

original: Subhv_0958-2 praguṇīkartuṃ śakto durdāru na viśvakarmāpi //
analyzed: praguṇīkartum śaktaḥ durdāru na viśvakarmā api

original: Subhv_0959-1 na tadanukṛtaṃ manāgapi na vā jalaṃ sucirasevitaiḥ śītam /
analyzed: na tad anukṛtam manāk api na vā jalam su cira sevitaiḥ śītam

original: Subhv_0959-2 andhīkṛte kudīpaiḥ pratyuta dhūmena me nayane //
analyzed: andhīkṛte ku dīpaiḥ pratyuta dhūmena me nayane

original: Subhv_0960-1 utsannamāpaṇamamuṃ drakṣyāmo nirmalaiḥ kadā nayanaiḥ /
analyzed: utsannam āpaṇam amum drakṣyāmaḥ nirmalaiḥ kadā nayanaiḥ
ujjvala campaka mukula āśaṅkitayā yaḥ pradīpakam spṛśati
kajjala kalaṅka dāham muktvā anyat tasya kim ghaṭatām

original: Subhv_0962-2 kasyāpi laṅghanīyau na tu nagarāvakaranikaroyam //
analyzed: kasya api laṅghanīyau na tu nagara avakara nikaraḥ ayam
phaṇa maṇi bhāsura gura tara samartha bahu mastake śeṣe
kaḥ kṣiti bharam udvoḍhum prārthayate kṛpaṇa kaṇi kīṭān
yatnāt api kaḥ paśyet śikhinām āhāra niḥsaraṇa mārgam

original: Subhv_0964-2 yadi jaladaninadamuditāsta eva mūḍhā na nṛtyeyuḥ //
analyzed: yadi jalada ninada muditāḥ te eva mūḍhāḥ na nṛtyeyuḥ
śaradi samagra niśākara kara śata hata timira saṃcayā rajanī
jalada antarita arkām api divasa chāyām na pūrayati
mṛdu subhaga parikara rucaḥ upi anucitam idam ekam eva madanasya

original: Subhv_0966-2 yadanena kṛtaḥ ketau makaro daṃṣṭrākarālamukhaḥ //
analyzed: yat anena kṛtaḥ ketau makaraḥ daṃṣṭrā karāla mukhaḥ
hemakāra sudhiyaḥ namaḥ astu te
dustareṣu bahuśas parīkṣitum
kāñcana ābharaṇam aśmanā samam
yat tvayā etat adhurā āpyate tulām

original: Subhv_0968-1 vṛtte eva sa ghaṭondhakūpa yas-
analyzed: vṛtte eva sa yaḥ
tvad prasādam apanetum akṣamaḥ
mudritam tu adhama ceṣṭitam tvayā
tad mukha ambu kaṇikāḥ pratīcchatā
śatapadī sati pāda śate kṣamā
yadi na goṣpadam api ativartitum
kim iyatā dvipadasya
jaladhi vikramaṇe vivadāmahe
na guru vaṃśa parigraha śauṇḍa tā
na ca mahā guṇa saṃgrahaṇa ādaraḥ
phala vidhāna kathā api na mārgaṇe
kim iha lubdhaka bāla gṛha idhunā
tṛṇamaṇeḥ manujasya ca tadvataḥ
kim ubhayoḥ vipula āśaya tā ucyate
tanu tṛṇa agra lava avayavaiḥ yayoḥ
avasite grahaṇa pratipādane
bhrātar suvarṇa maya rūpaka tāra citrā
laṃkāra yatna ghaṭanāsu suvarṇakāra
dūrīkuru śramam iha adya suvarṇa pātre
durvarṇa yojayituḥ asti mahārgha lābhaḥ
tanu tṛṇa agra dhṛtena hṛtaḥ ciram

original: Subhv_0973-2 ka iha yena na mauktikaśaṅkayā /
analyzed: kaḥ iha yena na mauktika śaṅkayā
sa jala bindu rataḥ viparīta dṛś
jagat idam vayam atra sa cetanāḥ
re dandaśūka tad ayuktam api īśvaraḥ tvām
vāllabhyataḥ nayati nūpura dhāma satyam
āvarjita ali kula satkṛti mūrchitāni

original: Subhv_0974-4 kiṃ śiñjitāni bhavataḥ kṣama eṣa kartum //
analyzed: kim śiñjitāni bhavataḥ kṣamaḥ eṣa kartum
suvarṇakāra śravaṇa ucitāni
vastūni vikretum iha āgataḥ si
adya api na aśrāvi yat atra pallyām
pallī patiḥ nūnam aviddha karṇaḥ
tān unnatān kṣitibhṛtaḥ nanu rūpayāmaḥ
pakṣa kṣaya vyatikare mathitam tat ojaḥ
yuktam kim aurva śikhinaḥ parikopitasya
tejasvinaḥ api udadhi nirmathanam visoḍhum
citram kiyat yat ayam ambudhiḥ ambuda ogha
sindhu pravāha paripūrṇa tayā mahīyān
tvam tu arthinām upakaroṣi yat alpa kūpa
niṣpīḍya kukṣi kuharam hi mahat tvam etat
dhigvāḍavam dahanam arthi tayā vipakṣa
m abhyeti yaḥ sva jaṭhara pratipūraṇāya
dhik vāri rāśim api yaḥ tu tathāvidhasya
śatroḥ jalaiḥ api na pūraya abhilāṣam
śāvān kulāyaka gatān paripātu kāmā

original: Subhv_0979-2 nadyāḥ pragṛhya laghu pakṣapuṭena toyam /
analyzed: nadyāḥ pragṛhya laghu pakṣa puṭena toyam

original: Subhv_0979-3 dāvānalaṃ kila siṣeca muhuḥ kopotī
analyzed: dāva analam kila siṣeca muhur kopa ūtī

original: Subhv_0979-4 snigdho jano na khalu cintayate svapīḍām //
analyzed: snigdhaḥ janaḥ na khalu cintayate sva pīḍām
kākaḥ svabhāva capalaḥ pariśuddha vṛttiḥ
labdhvā balim sva janam āhvayate parān ca
carma asthi māṃsavati hasti kalevare pi

original: Subhv_0980-4 śvā dveṣṭi hanti ca parānkṛpaṇasvabhāvaḥ //
analyzed: śvā dveṣṭi hanti ca parān kṛpaṇa svabhāvaḥ

original: Subhv_0981-1 ādāyi vāri yata eva jahāti bhūyas-
analyzed: ādāyi vāri yatas eva jahāti bhūyas

original: Subhv_0981-2 tatraiva yaḥ sa jaladaḥ prathamo jaḍānām /
analyzed: tatra eva yaḥ sa jaladaḥ prathamaḥ jaḍānām

original: Subhv_0981-3 vāntaṃ pratīpsati tadeva tadeva yastu
analyzed: vāntam pratīpsati tat eva tat eva yaḥ tu
strotaḥ patiḥ sa nirapatrapa sārthavāhaḥ
budhyāmahe na bahudhā api vikalpamānāḥ
