kaiḥ nāmabhiḥ vyapadiśāma mahā matīn tān
yeṣām aśeṣa bhuvana ābharaṇasya hemnaḥ
tattvam vivektum upalāḥ paramam pramāṇam
na mlānitāni akhila dhāmavatām mukhāni

original: Subhv_0983-2 nāstaṃ tamo na ca kṛto bhuvanopakāraḥ /
analyzed: na astam tamaḥ na ca kṛtaḥ bhuvana upakāraḥ
kena guṇena lokān

original: Subhv_0983-4 pratyāpayiṣyasi śane śapathaṃ vinā tvam //
analyzed: pratyāpayiṣyasi śane śapatham vinā tvam
saṃrakṣitum kṛṣim akāri kṛṣīvalena
paśya ātmanaḥ pratikṛtiḥ tṛṇa pūruṣaḥ yam
stabdhasya niṣkriya tayā asta bhiyaḥ usya nūna
matsyanti go mṛga ganāḥ punar eva sasyam
kasya a nimeṣa vitate nayane divauko

original: Subhv_0985-2 lokādṛte jagati te api vai gṛhītvā /
analyzed: lokāt ṛte jagati te api vai gṛhītvā
piṇḍe prasārita mukhena time kim etat

original: Subhv_0985-4 dṛṣṭaṃ na bāliśa viśadbaḍiśaṃ tvayāntaḥ //
analyzed: dṛṣṭam na bāliśa viśat baḍiśam tvayā antar

original: Subhv_0986-1 ā janmanaḥ kuśalamaṇvapi te kujanman-
analyzed: ā janmanaḥ kuśalam aṇu api te ku janman

original: Subhv_0986-2 pāṃso tvayā yadi kṛtaṃ vada tattvametat /
analyzed: pāṃso tvayā yadi kṛtam vada tattvam etat
utthāpitaḥ asi anala sārathinā yat artham
duṣṭena tat kuru viśvam etat
puṃstvāt api pravicalet yadi adhas upi
yāyādi api praṇayanena mahān api syāt
abhyuddharet tat api viśvam iti īdṛśī iyam
kena api diś prakaṭitā puruṣottamena
su alpa āśayaḥ sva kula śilpa vikalpam eva
yaḥ kalpayan skhalati kāca vaṇij piśācaḥ
grastaḥ sa kaustubha maṇi indra sapatna ratna
niryatna gumpha paṭu vaikaṭika īrṣyayā antar

original: Subhv_0989-1 devī kva durgatiharā bhaginī bhavānī
analyzed: devī kva durgati harā bhaginī bhavānī
devaḥ haraḥ kva bhaginī patiḥ ārta bandhuḥ
ambhonidhau kva śaraṇa āgata vṛtti dainyam
maināka na a kathayitavyam idam tvayā naḥ
tuṅga ātma tā asta śikharasya vṛthā eva bhānoḥ
na ālambinī bhavati yā astamaye prapitsoḥ
ślāghyaḥ sa tāmarasa nāla guṇaḥ api daitya
bhītyā yam etya marutām patiḥ ālalambe
gṛham śmaśānam gaja carma ca ambaram
vilepanam bhasma vṛṣaḥ ca vāhanam

original: Subhv_0991-3 kubera he vittapate na lajjase
analyzed: kubera he vittapate na lajjase
priyasya te sakhyuḥ iyam daridra tā
nā ekatra śakti viratiḥ kvacid asti
bhāvāḥ svabhāva pariniṣṭhita tāratamyāḥ
ākalpa maurva dahanena nipīyamāna
papau agastyaḥ
viṣṇuḥ bibharti bhagavān akhilām dharitrīm
tam pannagaḥ tam api tad sahitam payodhiḥ
kumbhodbhavaḥ tam apibat khalu helayā eva
satyam na kaścid avadhiḥ mahatām mahimnaḥ
āropitaḥ pṛthu nitamba taṭe taruṇyā

original: Subhv_0994-2 kaṇṭhe ca bāhulatayā niviḍaṃ gṛhītaḥ /
analyzed: kaṇṭhe ca bāhu latayā nibiḍam gṛhītaḥ
utuṅga pīna kuca nirbhara pīḍita uyam
kumbhaḥ karīṣa dahanasya phalāni bhuṅkte
ābaddha kṛtrima saṭā āvalita aṃsa bhitti

original: Subhv_0995-2 rāropyate mṛgapateḥ padavīṃ yadi śvā /
analyzed: rāropyate mṛgapateḥ padavīm yadi śvā
matta ibha kumbha taṭa pāṭana lampaṭasya
nādam kariṣyati katham hariṇādhipasya
mukham api pariśiṣṭam yasya tejaḥ prasūtim
kharakiraṇam atha indum grāsapātrīkaroti
yadi kila vapuḥ asya prābhaviṣyat samagram
kim iva kim iva rāhuḥ na akariṣyat tadānīm
yat puṣpa pallava phala āhita sāmya mohaiḥ

original: Subhv_0997-2 na jñāyate śuka tava sthitirasthitirvā /
analyzed: na jñāyate śuka tava sthitiḥ asthitiḥ vā

original: Subhv_0997-3 taddāḍimaṃ tyajasi naiva phalāśayā tvam-
analyzed: tat dāḍimam tyajasi nā eva phala āśayā tvam
artha āturaḥ na gaṇayati apakarṣa doṣam

original: Subhv_0998-1 varamiha ravitāpaiḥ kiṃ na śīrṇāsi gulme
analyzed: varam iha ravi tāpaiḥ kim na śīrṇā asi gulme

original: Subhv_0998-2 kimu davadahanairvā sarvadāhaṃ na dagdhā /
analyzed: kimu dava dahanaiḥ vā sarva dāham na dagdhā
yat ahṛdaya jana oghaiḥ vṛnta parṇa anabhijñaiḥ
itara kusuma madhye mālati prombhitā asi
kim idam ucitam śuddheḥ spaṣṭam sapakṣa samunnateḥ
phala pariṇateḥ yuktam prāptum guṇa praṇayasya te

original: Subhv_0999-3 kṣaṇamupagataḥ karṇopāntaṃ parasya puraḥ sthitān-
analyzed: kṣaṇam upagataḥ karṇa upāntam parasya puras sthitān

original: Subhv_0999-4 viśikha nipatankrūraṃ dūrānnṛśaṃsa nihaṃsi yat //
analyzed: viśikha nipatan krūram dūrāt nṛśaṃsa nihaṃsi yat
sa hema alaṃkāraḥ kṣitipatana lagnena rajasā
tathā dainyam nītaḥ narapati śiraḥ ślāghya vibhavaḥ
yathā
vilokya enam lokaḥ pariharati pāda kṣati bhayāt
āhūteṣu vihaṃgameṣu maśakaḥ na ayān puras vāryate

original: Subhv_1001-2 madhye vā dhuri vā vasaṃstṛṇamaṇirdhatte maṇīnāṃ rucam /
analyzed: madhye vā dhuri vā vasan tṛṇamaṇiḥ dhatte maṇīnām rucam

original: Subhv_1001-3 khadyotopi na kampate pracalituṃ madhyepi tejasvināṃ
analyzed: khadyotaḥ api na kampate pracalitum madhye pi tejasvinām
dhik sāmānyam acetanam prabhum iva an āmṛṣṭa tattva antaram
evam ced sa rasa svabhāva para tā jāḍyam kim etādṛśam

original: Subhv_1002-2 yadyastyeva nisargataḥ saralatā kiṃ granthimattedṛśī /
analyzed: yadi asti eva nisargataḥ sarala tā kim granthimat tā īdṛśī

original: Subhv_1002-3 mūlaṃ cecchuvi paṅkajaśrutiriyaṃ kasmādguṇā yadyamī
analyzed: mūlam ced śuvi paṅkaja śrutiḥ iyam kasmāt guṇāḥ yadi amī

original: Subhv_1002-4 kiṃ chidrāṇi sakhe mṛṇāla bhavatastattvaṃ na manyāmahe //
analyzed: kim chidrāṇi sakhe mṛṇāla bhavataḥ tattvam na manyāmahe

original: Subhv_1003-1 tvaṃ bhogī yadi kuṇḍalī yadi bhavāṃstvaṃ cedbhujaṃgaḥ sakhe
analyzed: tvam bhogī yadi kuṇḍalī yadi bhavān tvam ced bhujaṃgaḥ sakhe

original: Subhv_1003-2 dhatse cenmukuṭaṃ saratnamuraga svastyastu te kiṃ tataḥ /
analyzed: dhatse ced mukuṭam sa ratnam uraga svasti astu te kim tatas

original: Subhv_1003-3 asthāne yadi kañcukaṃ tyajasi tannāsmākamatra spṛhā
analyzed: asthāne yadi kañcukam tyajasi tat na asmākam atra spṛhā

original: Subhv_1003-4 kiṃ tu krūraviṣolkayā dahasi yadbhrātaḥ ka eṣa grahaḥ //
analyzed: kim tu krūra viṣa ulkayā dahasi yat bhrātar kaḥ eṣa grahaḥ

original: Subhv_1004-1 maulau sanmaṇayo gṛhaṃ giriguhā tyāgaḥ kilātmatvaco
analyzed: maulau sat maṇayaḥ gṛham giri guhā tyāgaḥ kila ātma tvacaḥ
niryatna upanataiḥ ca vṛttiḥ anilaiḥ ekatra caryā īdṛśī

original: Subhv_1004-3 anyatrānṛju vartma vāgvitasanā dṛṣṭau viṣaṃ dṛśyate
analyzed: anyatra anṛju vartma vāc vitasanāḥ dṛṣṭau viṣam dṛśyate

original: Subhv_1004-4 yādṛktāmanu dīpako jvalati kiṃ bhoginsakhe kinvidam //
analyzed: yādṛś tām anu dīpakaḥ jvalati kim bhogin sakhe kinu idam

original: Subhv_1005-1 bhūyāṃsyasya mukhāni nāma viditaivāste mahāsattvatā
analyzed: bhūyāṃsi asya mukhāni nāma viditā eva āste mahā sattva tā

original: Subhv_1005-2 kadrvāḥ prākprasavoyamatra kupite cintyaṃ yathedaṃ jagat /
analyzed: kadrvāḥ prāc prasavaḥ yam atra kupite cintyam yathā idam jagat

original: Subhv_1005-3 trailokyādbhutamīdṛśaṃ tu caritaṃ śoṣasya yenāsya sā
analyzed: trailokya adbhutam īdṛśam tu caritam śoṣasya yena asya sā
pronmṛjya iva nivartitā viṣadhara jñāne pi durvarṇikā

original: Subhv_1006-1 kiṃ tena hemagiriṇā rajatādriṇā vā
analyzed: kim tena hema giriṇā rajata adriṇā vā
yasya āśrayeṇa taravaḥ taravaḥ te eva
manyāmahe malayam eva yad āśritāni
śāhoṭa nimba kuṭajāni api candanāni

original: Subhv_1007-1 yāndigdhvaiva kṛtā viṣeṇa kusṛtiryeṣāṃ kiyadgaṇyate
analyzed: yān digdhvā eva kṛtā viṣeṇa kusṛtiḥ yeṣām kiyat gaṇyate

original: Subhv_1007-2 lokaṃ hantumanāgasaṃ dvirasanā randhreṣu ye jāgrati /
analyzed: lokam hantum anāgasam dvis asanāḥ randhreṣu ye jāgrati
vyālāḥ te pi dadhati amī sat asatoḥ mūḍhāḥ maṇīn mūrdhabhiḥ
na aucityāt guṇa śālinām kvacid api bhraṃśoḥ ti alam cintayā

original: Subhv_1008-1 tatpratyastratayā dhṛto na tu kṛtaḥ samyaksvatantro bhayāt-
analyzed: tad pratyastra tayā dhṛtaḥ na tu kṛtaḥ samyak svatantraḥ bhayāt
svasthaḥ tān pratighātayet iti yathākāmam na saṃpoṣitaḥ

original: Subhv_1008-3 saṃśuṣyanvṛṣadaṃśa eṣa kurutāṃ mūkaḥ sthitopyatra kiṃ
analyzed: saṃśuṣyan vṛṣadaṃśaḥ eṣa kurutām mūkaḥ sthitaḥ api atra kim
gehe kim bahunā adhunā gṛhapateḥ caurāḥ caranti ākhavaḥ

original: Subhv_1009-1 svātmīyānna dadāsi cetphaṇamaṇīnmā dāḥ parārthaṃ parair-
analyzed: svātmīyān na dadāsi ced phaṇa maṇīn mā dāḥ para artham paraiḥ

original: Subhv_1009-2 yatkiṃcinnihitaṃ ruṇatsi kimidaṃ nidhyādi duṣṭāśayā /
analyzed: yat kiṃcid nihitam ruṇatsi kim idam nidhi ādi duṣṭa āśayā
etat tāvat alam bhavantam aparam pṛcchāmi kasmāt ahe
phūtkāraiḥ viṣa vahni vega gurubhiḥ dandahya sa emum janam

original: Subhv_1010-1 niḥsārāḥ sutarāṃ laghuprakṛtayo yogyā na kārye kvacic-
analyzed: niḥsārāḥ sutarām laghu prakṛtayaḥ yogyāḥ na kārye kvacid

original: Subhv_1010-2 chuṣyantodya jarattṛṇādyavayavāḥ prāptāḥ svatantreṣu ye /
analyzed: jarat tṛṇa ādi avayavāḥ prāptāḥ svatantreṣu ye
antar sāra parāṅmukheṇa dhik aho te mārutena amunā
paśya atyanta calena vartma mahatām ākāśam āropitāḥ

original: Subhv_1011-1 ye jātyā laghavaḥ sadaiva gaṇanāṃ yātā na ye kutracit-
analyzed: ye jātyā laghavaḥ sadā eva gaṇanām yātāḥ na ye kutracid

original: Subhv_1011-2 padbhyāmeva vimarditāḥ pratidinaṃ bhūmau nilīnāściram /
analyzed: padbhyām eva vimarditāḥ pratidinam bhūmau nilīnāḥ ciram
utkṣiptāḥ capala āśayena marutā paśya antarikṣe sakhe

original: Subhv_1011-4 tuṅgānāmupari sthitaṃ kṣitibhṛtāṃ kurvantyamī pāṃsavaḥ //
analyzed: tuṅgānām upari sthitam kṣitibhṛtām kurvanti amī pāṃsavaḥ

original: Subhv_1012-1 anīrṣyāḥ śrotāro mama vacasi cedvacmi tadahaṃ
analyzed: anīrṣyāḥ śrotāraḥ mama vacasi ced vacmi tat aham

original: Subhv_1012-2 svapakṣādbhetavyaṃ bahu na tu vipakṣātprabhavataḥ /
analyzed: sva pakṣāt bhetavyam bahu na tu vipakṣāt prabhavataḥ
tamasi ākrānta āśe kiyat api hi tejaḥ vayavinaḥ

original: Subhv_1012-4 svaśaktyā bhāsante divasakṛti satyeva na punaḥ //
analyzed: sva śaktyā bhāsante divasakṛti sati eva na punar

original: Subhv_1013-1 sāṃmukhyaṃ vastujātaṃ nayati nanu cidīśasya yaddarśanāḍhyaṃ
analyzed: sāṃmukhyam vastu jātam nayati nanu cit īśasya yat darśana āḍhyam
netra dvandvam kila etat vimalam iti tatonya aṅga saṅgam vihāya
ghrāṇam vaṃśa abhirāmam parimala niratam cakṣuṣoḥ madhya bhāge

original: Subhv_1013-4 nityaṃ līnaṃ na cāsminmṛgasi nayanayoḥ śvāsamāmuñca khinne //
analyzed: nityam līnam na ca asmin mṛgasi nayanayoḥ śvāsam āmuñca khinne
etat tasya mukhāt kiyat kamalinī pattre kaṇam
yat muktāphalam iti amaṃsta sa jaḍaḥ śṛṇvan yat asmāt api
aṅguli agra laghu kriyā pravilayini ādīyamāne śanais

original: Subhv_1014-4 tatroḍḍīya gate hahetyanudinaṃ nidrāti nāntaḥśucā //
analyzed: tatra uḍḍīya gate hahā iti anudinam nidrāti na antar śucā
āstetra eva sarasi aho bata kiyān saṃtoṣa pakṣa graho

original: Subhv_1015-2 haṃsasyāsya manāṅna dhāvati matiḥ śrīdhāmni padme kvacit /
analyzed: haṃsasya asya manāk na dhāvati matiḥ śrī dhāmni padme kvacid
vibudhyate na tat itas tāvat pratīkṣāmahe

original: Subhv_1015-4 velāmityuṣasi priyā madhulihaḥ soḍhuṃ tu eva kṣamāḥ //
analyzed: velām iti uṣasi priyāḥ madhulihaḥ soḍhum tu eva kṣamāḥ
vāta āhāra tayā jagat viṣadharaiḥ āśvāsya niḥśeṣitam
te grastāḥ punar abhra toya kaṇikā tīvra vrataiḥ barhibhiḥ
te api krūra camūru carma vasanaiḥ nītāḥ kṣayam lubdhakaiḥ

original: Subhv_1016-4 dambhasya sphuritaṃ vidannapi jano jālmo guṇānīhate //
analyzed: dambhasya sphuritam vidan api janaḥ jālmaḥ guṇān īhate
nāma api anya taroḥ nimīlitam abhūt tat tāvat unmīlitam

original: Subhv_1017-2 prasthāne skhalataḥ svavartmani vidheranyairgṛhītaḥ karaḥ /
analyzed: prasthāne skhalataḥ sva vartmani vidheḥ anyaiḥ gṛhītaḥ karaḥ
lokaḥ ca ayam adṛṣṭa darśana daśā dṛś vaiśasāt uddhṛtaḥ
yuktam

original: Subhv_1018-1 ūḍhā yena mahādhuraḥ suviṣame mārge sadaikākinā
analyzed: ūḍhāḥ yena mahā dhuraḥ su viṣame mārge sadā ekākinā

original: Subhv_1018-2 soḍho yena kadācideva na nije goṣṭhenyaśauṇḍadhvaniḥ /
analyzed: soḍhaḥ yena kadācid eva na nije

original: Subhv_1018-3 āsīdyaśca gavāṃ gaṇasya tilakastasyaiva saṃpratyaho
analyzed: āsīt yaḥ ca gavām gaṇasya tilakaḥ tasya eva saṃprati aho

original: Subhv_1018-4 dhikkaṣṭaṃ dhavalasya jātajaraso goḥ paṇyamuddhoṣyate //
analyzed: dhik kaṣṭam dhavalasya jāta jarasaḥ goḥ paṇyam uddhā uṣyate
bhekena kvaṇatā sa roṣa paruṣam yat kṛṣṇa sarpa ānane
dātum karṇa capeṭam ujjhita bhiyā hastaḥ samullāsitaḥ

original: Subhv_1019-3 yaccādhomukhamakṣiṇī pidadhatā nāgena tatra sthitaṃ
analyzed: yat ca adhomukham akṣiṇī pidadhatā nāgena tatra sthitam

original: Subhv_1019-4 tatsarvaṃ viṣamantriṇo bhagavataḥ kasyāpi līlāyitam //
analyzed: tat sarvam viṣa mantriṇaḥ bhagavataḥ kasya api līlāyitam

original: Subhv_1020-1 nityaṃ tīrthe nivāsaḥ prakṛtiratitarāṃ snigdhamugdhasvabhāvā
analyzed: nityam tīrthe nivāsaḥ prakṛtiḥ atitarām snigdha mugdha svabhāvā
vṛttiḥ daivāt hi vaktre gagana nipatitaiḥ nirmalaiḥ vāri leśaiḥ

original: Subhv_1020-3 itthaṃ sarvaṃ vilokya prakaṭamiha time mugdhalokena loke
analyzed: ittham sarvam vilokya prakaṭam iha time mugdha lokena loke

original: Subhv_1020-4 sādhutvaṃ darśitaṃ te bahirabahiramī kaṇṭakāḥ kena dṛṣṭāḥ //
analyzed: sādhu tvam darśitam te bahis abahir amī kaṇṭakāḥ kena dṛṣṭāḥ
mṛtyoḥ āsyam iva ātatam dhanuḥ amī ca āśīviṣa ābhāḥ śarāḥ

original: Subhv_1021-2 śikṣā sāpi jitārjunā pratibhayaṃ sarvāṅganimnā gatiḥ /
analyzed: śikṣā sā api jita arjunā pratibhayam sarva aṅga nimnā gatiḥ

original: Subhv_1021-3 antaḥ krauryamaho śaṭhasya madhuraṃ hā hāri geyaṃ mukhe
analyzed: antar krauryam aho śaṭhasya madhuram hā hāri geyam mukhe

original: Subhv_1021-4 vyādhasyāsya yathā bhaviṣyati tathā manye vanaṃ nirmṛgam //
analyzed: vyādhasya asya yathā bhaviṣyati tathā manye vanam nirmṛgam

original: Subhv_1022-1 dhigvyomno mahimānametu dalaśaḥ proccaistadīyaṃ padaṃ
analyzed: dhik vyomnaḥ mahimānam etu dalaśas proccais tadīyam padam

original: Subhv_1022-2 nindyāṃ daivagatiṃ prayātvabhavanistasyāstu śūnyasya vā /
analyzed: nindyām daiva gatim prayātu a bhava niḥ tasya astu śūnyasya vā
yena utkṣipta karasya naṣṭa mahasaḥ śrāntasya

original: Subhv_1022-4 mitrasyāpi nirāśrayasya na kṛtaṃ dhṛtyai karālambanam //
analyzed: mitrasya api nirāśrayasya na kṛtam dhṛtyai kara ālambanam

original: Subhv_1023-1 digdāhaikarate vanāntakara te jvālā na me rocate
analyzed: digdāha eka rate vanānta kara te jvālā na me rocate

original: Subhv_1023-2 dugdhaṃ svāśrayamudyatasya bhavato necchanti vṛddhiṃ janāḥ /
analyzed: dugdham sva āśrayam udyatasya bhavataḥ na icchanti vṛddhim janāḥ

original: Subhv_1023-3 mūlānyasya mahībhṛto dalayituṃ durvedhasā nirmitaḥ
analyzed: mūlāni asya mahībhṛtaḥ dalayitum durvedhasā nirmitaḥ

original: Subhv_1023-4 ko vā na tvayi śaṅkate khala jagatkhedāvahe dāva he //
analyzed: kaḥ vā na tvayi śaṅkate khala jagat kheda āvahe dāva he

original: Subhv_1024-1 kṣutkṣāmeṇa kathaṃ kathaṃcidaniśaṃ gātraṃ kṛśaṃ bibhratā
analyzed: kṣudh kṣāmeṇa katham kathaṃcid aniśam gātram kṛśam bibhratā

original: Subhv_1024-2 bhrāntaṃ yena gṛhe gṛhe gṛhavatāmucchiṣṭapiṇḍārthinā /
analyzed: bhrāntam yena gṛhe gṛhe gṛhavatām ucchiṣṭa piṇḍa arthinā

original: Subhv_1024-3 asthnaḥ khaṇḍamavāpya daivapatitaṃ śūnyāṃ trilokīmimāṃ
analyzed: asthnaḥ khaṇḍam avāpya daiva patitam śūnyām trilokīm imām

original: Subhv_1024-4 manvāno dhigaho sa eva saramāputrodya siṃhāyate //
analyzed: manvānaḥ dhik aho saḥ eva saramā putra udya siṃhāyate
śuṣka snāyu vasā avaseka malinam nirmāṃsam api asthi goḥ

original: Subhv_1025-2 śvā labdhā paritoṣameti na tu tattasya kṣudhaḥ śāntaye /
analyzed: śvā labdhā paritoṣam eti na tu tat tasya kṣudhaḥ śāntaye

original: Subhv_1025-3 siṃho jambukamaṅkamāgatamapi tyaktvā nihanti dvipaṃ
analyzed: siṃhaḥ jambukam aṅkam āgatam api tyaktvā nihanti dvipam

original: Subhv_1025-4 sarvaḥ kṛchragatopi vāñchati janaḥ sattvānurūpaṃ phalam //
analyzed: sarvaḥ kṛchra gataḥ api vāñchati janaḥ sattva anurūpam phalam

original: Subhv_1026-1 kāluṣyaṃ payasāṃ vilokya śanakairuḍḍīya haṃsā gatā
analyzed: kāluṣyam payasām vilokya śanakais uḍḍīya haṃsā gatā
dhārā jarjara kesara āsphuṭa rucaḥ padmāḥ nimignāḥ jale
sā sarva ṛtu sukha avatāra padavī channā tṛṇaiḥ nūtanaiḥ

original: Subhv_1026-4 kaṣṭaṃ tādṛgapi svabhāvavimalaṃ vṛdchyaiva naṣṭaṃ saraḥ //
analyzed: kaṣṭam tādṛś api svabhāva vimalam vṛdchyā eva naṣṭam saraḥ
ye saṃtoṣa sukha prabuddha manasaḥ teṣām abhinnaḥ mṛdo

original: Subhv_1027-2 yepyete dhanalobhasaṃkuladhiyasteṣāṃ tu dūre nṛṇām /
analyzed: ye pi ete dhana lobha saṃkula dhiyaḥ teṣām tu dūre nṛṇām

original: Subhv_1027-3 itthaṃ kasya kṛte kṛtaḥ sa vidhinā tādṛkpadaṃ saṃpadāṃ
analyzed: ittham kasya kṛte kṛtaḥ sa vidhinā tādṛś padam saṃpadām

original: Subhv_1027-4 svātmanyeva samāptahemamahimā merurna me rocate //
analyzed: sva ātmani eva samāpta hema mahimā meruḥ na me rocate
dravyāṇām adhara uttara vyatikaraḥ bhagna āśayānām adhas

original: Subhv_1028-2 bījānāṃ nayanaṃ svayaṃ ca nijavacchidrakriyānveṣaṇam /
analyzed: bījānām nayanam svayam ca nija vat chidra kriyā anveṣaṇam
vyūha ābandha vidhāyibhiḥ gata bhayaiḥ mugdha prasupta arbhakam

original: Subhv_1028-4 śūnyaṃ prāpya nivāsamākhubhiraho kiṃ kiṃ na yadyatkṛtam //
analyzed: śūnyam prāpya nivāsam ākhubhiḥ aho kim kim na yat yat kṛtam

original: Subhv_1029-1 anyonyasya layaṃ bhayādiva mahābhūteṣu yāteṣvalaṃ
analyzed: anyonyasya layam bhayāt iva mahābhūteṣu yāteṣu alam

original: Subhv_1029-2 kalpānte parameka eva sa taruḥ skandhoccayairjṛmbhate /
analyzed: kalpa ante param ekaḥ eva sa taruḥ skandha uccayaiḥ jṛmbhate

original: Subhv_1029-3 vinyasya trijaganti kukṣikuhare devena yasyāsyate
analyzed: vinyasya tri jaganti kukṣi kuhare devena yasya āsyate
śākhā agre śiśunā iva sevita jala krīḍā vilāsa alasam
trivikramasya
trailokya upakṛti prasakta manasaḥ devasya śaṃbhoḥ priyā
jātā śaila kule varaiḥ abhimataiḥ ānandayantī surān
mlecchānām api vāñchita arpaṇa parā svasya āspadasya ambikā

original: Subhv_1030-4 vindhyasyonnatimātanoti na nijāṃ daivasya kīdṛgbalam //
analyzed: vindhyasya unnatim ātanoti na nijām daivasya kīdṛś balam
bhā amṛtadattasya

original: Subhv_1031-1 kiṃ tvaṃ hālika mūḍhadhīrhataphalaṃ mā mā kṛthā lāṅgalaṃ
analyzed: kim tvam hālika mūḍha dhīḥ hata phalam mā mā kṛthāḥ lāṅgalam

original: Subhv_1031-2 kṣetraṃ naiva bhavatyadhaḥ kaṭhinatā naivātra dṛṣṭā tvayā /
analyzed: kṣetram nā eva bhavati adhas kaṭhina tā nā eva atra dṛṣṭā tvayā

original: Subhv_1031-3 ullekhopi na jāyatetra virama kleśaḥ phalaṃ kevalaṃ
analyzed: ullekhaḥ api na jāyate itra virama kleśaḥ phalam kevalam

original: Subhv_1031-4 nirbījā bahavo gatāśca satataṃ dṛṣṭāḥ śrutā vā na kim //kasyāpi
analyzed: nirbījāḥ bahavaḥ gatāḥ ca satatam dṛṣṭāḥ śrutāḥ vā na kim kasya api
kaḥ oyam bhrānti prakāraḥ tava pavana ghana avaskara sthāna jātam

original: Subhv_1032-2 tejasvivrātasevye nabhasi nayasi yatpāṃsupūraṃ pratiṣṭhām /
analyzed: tejasvi vrāta sevye nabhasi nayasi yat pāṃsu pūram pratiṣṭhām
yasmin utthāpyamāne jana nayana pathā upadravaḥ tāvat āstām

original: Subhv_1032-4 kenopāyena sahyo vapuṣi malinatādoṣa eṣa tvayaiva //
analyzed: kena upāyena sahyaḥ vapuṣi malina tā doṣaḥ eṣa tvayā eva
bhā amṛtadattasya

original: Subhv_1033-1 jātaḥ kūrmaḥ sa ekaḥ pṛthubhuvanabharāyārpitaṃ yena pṛṣṭhaṃ
analyzed: jātaḥ kūrmaḥ saḥ ekaḥ pṛthu bhuvana bharāya arpitam yena pṛṣṭham

original: Subhv_1033-2 ślāghyaṃ janma dhruvasya bhramati niyamitaṃ yatra tejasvicakram /
analyzed: ślāghyam janma dhruvasya bhramati niyamitam yatra tejasvi cakram
saṃjāta vyartha pakṣāḥ para hita karaṇe na upariṣṭāt na ca adhas
brahmāṇḍa udumbara antar maśaka vat apare jantavaḥ jāta naṣṭāḥ kasya api

original: Subhv_1034-1 kaṭu raṭasi kimevaṃ karṇayoḥ kuñjarāre-
analyzed: kaṭu raṭasi kim evam karṇayoḥ kuñjara are
ravi dita nija buddhe kim na vijñātam asti
śiratara kara daṃṣṭra ṭaṅka nirbhinna kumbham
maśaka galaka randhre hasti yūtham mamajja kasya api
udrarjan kuṭilaḥ taṭa āśraya taru pronmūlana uḍḍāmaraḥ

original: Subhv_1035-2 mā garvīḥ saritaḥ pravāha jaladhiṃ prakṣobhayāmīti bhoḥ /
analyzed: mā garvīḥ saritaḥ pravāha jaladhim prakṣobhayāmi iti bhoḥ

original: Subhv_1035-3 svāṃ sattāṃ yadi vāñchasi bhrama maruṣvevāḥsva tatraiva vā
analyzed: svām sattām yadi vāñchasi bhrama maruṣu eva āḥsva tatra eva vā
dūre vāḍaba vahniḥ atra tu mahāsattvaiḥ viśan pīyase
sthairyam tuṅgaśirāḥ jagat sthiti kṛte

original: Subhv_1036-2 dūrātpreraṇayā kalāvata imaṃ krāntuṃ jalānāṃ pate /
analyzed: dūrāt preraṇayā kalāvataḥ imam krāntum jalānām pate

original: Subhv_1036-3 mithyā vāñchasi kiṃ tatastava paraṃ syādratnasattvakṣayo
analyzed: mithyā vāñchasi kim tatas tava param syāt ratna sattva kṣayo

original: Subhv_1036-4 nūnaṃ ghaṭṭanamāpya pādatalagastvasyaiva cānte luṭheḥ //
analyzed: nūnam ghaṭṭanam āpya pāda tala gaḥ tu asya eva ca ante luṭheḥ
āndolayasi aviratam gagana arkam aṅke

original: Subhv_1037-2 tārāgaṇaṃ ca śaśinaṃ ca tathetarāṇi /
analyzed: tārā gaṇam ca śaśinam ca tathā itarāṇi
tejāṃsi bhāsura taḍit prabhṛtīni sādho

original: Subhv_1037-4 citraṃ tathāpi na jahāsi yadāndhyamantaḥ //
analyzed: citram tathā api na jahāsi yat āndhyam antar
ayam sa bhuvana traya prathita saṃyamaḥ
bibharti vapuṣā adhunā viraha kātaraḥ kāminīm

original: Subhv_1038-3 anena kila nirjitā vayamiti priyāyāḥ karaṃ
analyzed: anena kila nirjitāḥ vayam iti priyāyāḥ karam
kareṇa paripīḍayan jayati jāta hāsaḥ smaraḥ
bhrū śārṅga ākṛṣṭa muktāḥ kuvalaya madhupa vyoma lakṣmī muṣaḥ ye
kṣīvāḥ ye kṛṣṇa śārāḥ nara hṛdaya bhidaḥ tāraka krūra śalyāḥ

original: Subhv_1039-3 te dīrghāpāṅgapuṅkhāḥ smitaviṣaviṣamāḥ pakṣmalāḥ strīkaṭākṣāḥ
analyzed: te dīrgha apāṅga puṅkhāḥ smita viṣa viṣamāḥ pakṣmalāḥ strī kaṭākṣāḥ
pāyāsuḥ vā ūti vīryāḥ tribhuvana jayinaḥ pañcabāṇasya bāṇāḥ

original: Subhv_1040-1 gaccha gacchasi cetkānta panthānaḥ santu te śivāḥ /
analyzed: gaccha gacchasi ced kānta panthānaḥ santu te śivāḥ

original: Subhv_1040-2 mamāpi janma tatraiva bhūyādyatra gato bhavān //
analyzed: mama api janma tatra eva bhūyāt yatra gataḥ bhavān
